GE07mbh_12_u:0: 12,001.000*0001_01 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam 12,001.000*0001_02 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:1: 12,001.000*0002_01 dvaipāyanauṣṭhapuṭaniḥsṛtam aprameyaṃ 12,001.000*0002_02 puṇyaṃ pavitram atha pāpaharaṃ śivaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6: 12,001.000*0002_07 ekāṃ ca bhāratakathāṃ śṛṇuyāt samagrāṃ 12,001.000*0002_08 tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tasya ca tasya ceti
GE07mbh_12_u:7: 12,001.000*0003_01 vyāsaṃ vasiṣṭhanaptāraṃ śakteḥ pautram akalmaṣam 12,001.000*0003_02 parāśarātmajaṃ vande śukatātaṃ taponidhim
GE07mbh_12_u:9: 12,001.000*0003_04 namo vai brahmanidhaye vāsiṣṭhāya namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10: 12,001.000*0003_05 namo dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase
GE07mbh_12_u:11: 12,001.000*0003_06 brāhmaṇebhyo namaskṛtya dharmān vakṣyāmi śāśvatān 12,001.000*0003_07 namo bhagavate tasmai vyāsāyāmitatejase
GE07mbh_12_u:12: 12,001.000*0003_08 yasya prasādād vakṣyāmi nārāyaṇakathām imām 12,001.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,001.001a kṛtodakās te suhṛdāṃ sarveṣāṃ pāṇḍunandanāḥ 12,001.001c viduro dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca sarvāś ca bharatastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:13: 12,001.002a tatra te sumahātmāno nyavasan kurunandanāḥ 12,001.002c śaucaṃ nivartayiṣyanto māsam ekaṃ bahiḥ purāt
GE07mbh_12_u:14: 12,001.003a kṛtodakaṃ tu rājānaṃ dharmātmānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram 12,001.003c abhijagmur mahātmānaḥ siddhā brahmarṣisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15: 12,001.004a dvaipāyano nāradaś ca devalaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16: 12,001.004c devasthānaś ca kaṇvaś ca teṣāṃ śiṣyāś ca sattamāḥ 12,001.005a anye ca vedavidvāṃsaḥ kṛtaprajñā dvijātayaḥ 12,001.005c gṛhasthāḥ snātakāḥ sarve dadṛśuḥ kurusattamam 12,001.006a abhigamya mahātmānaḥ pūjitāś ca yathāvidhi 12,001.006c āsaneṣu mahārheṣu viviśus te maharṣayaḥ 12,001.007a pratigṛhya tataḥ pūjāṃ tatkālasadṛśīṃ tadā 12,001.007c paryupāsan yathānyāyaṃ parivārya yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_12_u:19: 12,001.009a nāradas tv abravīt kāle dharmātmānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_12_u:20: 12,001.009c vicārya munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ tatkālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ 12,001.010a bhavato bāhuvīryeṇa prasādān mādhavasya ca 12,001.010c jiteyam avaniḥ kṛtsnā dharmeṇa ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:21: 12,001.011a diṣṭyā muktāḥ stha saṃgrāmād asmāl lokabhayaṃkarāt
GE07mbh_12_u:22: 12,001.011c kṣatradharmarataś cāpi kaccin modasi pāṇḍava 12,001.012a kaccic ca nihatāmitraḥ prīṇāsi suhṛdo nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:23: 12,001.012c kaccic chriyam imāṃ prāpya na tvāṃ śokaḥ prabādhate 12,001.013 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,001.013a vijiteyaṃ mahī kṛtsnā kṛṣṇabāhubalāśrayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:25: 12,001.014a idaṃ tu me mahad duḥkhaṃ vartate hṛdi nityadā 12,001.014c kṛtvā jñātikṣayam imaṃ mahāntaṃ lobhakāritam 12,001.015a saubhadraṃ draupadeyāṃś ca ghātayitvā priyān sutān
GE07mbh_12_u:27: 12,001.016a kiṃ nu vakṣyati vārṣṇeyī vadhūr me madhusūdanam
GE07mbh_12_u:28: 12,001.016c dvārakāvāsinī kṛṣṇam itaḥ pratigataṃ harim 12,001.017a draupadī hataputreyaṃ kṛpaṇā hatabāndhavā
GE07mbh_12_u:29: 12,001.017c asmatpriyahite yuktā bhūyaḥ pīḍayatīva mām 12,001.018a idam anyac ca bhagavan yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi nārada 12,001.018c mantrasaṃvaraṇenāsmi kuntyā duḥkhena yojitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:31: 12,001.019c siṃhakhelagatir dhīmān ghṛṇī dānto yatavrataḥ 12,001.020a āśrayo dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ mānī tīkṣṇaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:32: 12,001.020c amarṣī nityasaṃrambhī kṣeptāsmākaṃ raṇe raṇe 12,001.021a śīghrāstraś citrayodhī ca kṛtī cādbhutavikramaḥ 12,001.021c gūḍhotpannaḥ sutaḥ kuntyā bhrātāsmākaṃ ca sodaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:33: 12,001.022a toyakarmaṇi yaṃ kuntī kathayām āsa sūryajam
GE07mbh_12_u:34: 12,001.022c putraṃ sarvaguṇopetam avakīrṇaṃ jale purā 12,001.022d*0004_01 mañjūṣāyāṃ samādhāya gaṅgāsrotasy amajjayat
GE07mbh_12_u:35: 12,001.023a yaṃ sūtaputraṃ loko 'yaṃ rādheyaṃ cāpy amanyata
GE07mbh_12_u:36: 12,001.023c sa jyeṣṭhaputraḥ kuntyā vai bhrātāsmākaṃ ca mātṛjaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:37: 12,001.024a ajānatā mayā saṃkhye rājyalubdhena ghātitaḥ 12,001.024c tan me dahati gātrāṇi tūlarāśim ivānalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:38: 12,001.025a na hi taṃ veda pārtho 'pi bhrātaraṃ śvetavāhanaḥ 12,001.025c nāhaṃ na bhīmo na yamau sa tv asmān veda suvrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:39: 12,001.026a gatā kila pṛthā tasya sakāśam iti naḥ śrutam 12,001.026c asmākaṃ śamakāmā vai tvaṃ ca putro mamety atha 12,001.027a pṛthāyā na kṛtaḥ kāmas tena cāpi mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:40: 12,001.027c atipaścād idaṃ mātary avocad iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:41: 12,001.028a na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ tyaktuṃ nṛpaṃ duryodhanaṃ raṇe 12,001.028c anāryaṃ ca nṛśaṃsaṃ ca kṛtaghnaṃ ca hi me bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:42: 12,001.029a yudhiṣṭhireṇa saṃdhiṃ ca yadi kuryāṃ mate tava
GE07mbh_12_u:43: 12,001.029c bhīto raṇe śvetavāhād iti māṃ maṃsyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:45: 12,001.030c saṃdhāsye dharmaputreṇa paścād iti ca so 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:46: 12,001.031a tam avocat kila pṛthā punaḥ pṛthulavakṣasam
GE07mbh_12_u:47: 12,001.031c caturṇām abhayaṃ dehi kāmaṃ yudhyasva phalgunam
GE07mbh_12_u:49: 12,001.032c prāptān viṣahyāṃś caturo na haniṣyāmi te sutān
GE07mbh_12_u:50: 12,001.033a pañcaiva hi sutā mātar bhaviṣyanti hi te dhruvam 12,001.033c sakarṇā vā hate pārthe sārjunā vā hate mayi 12,001.034a taṃ putragṛddhinī bhūyo mātā putram athābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:51: 12,001.034c bhrātṝṇāṃ svasti kurvīthā yeṣāṃ svasti cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_12_u:52: 12,001.035a tam evam uktvā tu pṛthā visṛjyopayayau gṛhān
GE07mbh_12_u:53: 12,001.035c so 'rjunena hato vīro bhrātā bhrātrā sahodaraḥ 12,001.036a na caiva vivṛto mantraḥ pṛthāyās tasya vā mune 12,001.036c atha śūro maheṣvāsaḥ pārthenāsau nipātitaḥ 12,001.037a ahaṃ tv ajñāsiṣaṃ paścāt svasodaryaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:54: 12,001.037c pūrvajaṃ bhrātaraṃ karṇaṃ pṛthāyā vacanāt prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:55: 12,001.038a tena me dūyate 'tīva hṛdayaṃ bhrātṛghātinaḥ 12,001.038c karṇārjunasahāyo 'haṃ jayeyam api vāsavam
GE07mbh_12_u:57: 12,001.039c sahasotpatitaḥ krodhaḥ karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā praśāmyati 12,001.040a yadā hy asya giro rūkṣāḥ śṛṇomi kaṭukodayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:59: 12,001.041a tadā naśyati me krodhaḥ pādau tasya nirīkṣya ha 12,001.041c kuntyā hi sadṛśau pādau karṇasyeti matir mama
GE07mbh_12_u:60: 12,001.042a sādṛśyahetum anvicchan pṛthāyās tava caiva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:61: 12,001.042c kāraṇaṃ nādhigacchāmi kathaṃ cid api cintayan
GE07mbh_12_u:62: 12,001.043a kathaṃ nu tasya saṃgrāme pṛthivī cakram agrasat
GE07mbh_12_u:63: 12,001.043c kathaṃ ca śapto bhrātā me tat tvaṃ vaktum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:64: 12,001.044a śrotum icchāmi bhagavaṃs tvattaḥ sarvaṃ yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:65: 12,001.044c bhavān hi sarvavid vidvāṃl loke veda kṛtākṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:66: 12,001.044d*0005_01 anāgate vartamāne trailokye nātra saṃśayaḥ 12,002.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,002.001a sa evam uktas tu munir nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ 12,002.001c kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ yathā śaptaḥ sa sūtajaḥ 12,002.002a evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:67: 12,002.002c na karṇārjunayoḥ kiṃ cid aviṣahyaṃ bhaved raṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:68: 12,002.003a guhyam etat tu devānāṃ kathayiṣyāmi te nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:69: 12,002.003c tan nibodha mahārāja yathā vṛttam idaṃ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:70: 12,002.004a kṣatraṃ svargaṃ kathaṃ gacchec chastrapūtam iti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:72: 12,002.005a sa bālas tejasā yuktaḥ sūtaputratvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:73: 12,002.005c cakārāṅgirasāṃ śreṣṭhe dhanurvedaṃ gurau tava 12,002.006a sa balaṃ bhīmasenasya phalgunasya ca lāghavam
GE07mbh_12_u:74: 12,002.006c buddhiṃ ca tava rājendra yamayor vinayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:75: 12,002.007a sakhyaṃ ca vāsudevena bālye gāṇḍivadhanvanaḥ 12,002.007c prajānām anurāgaṃ ca cintayāno vyadahyata 12,002.008a sa sakhyam agamad bālye rājñā duryodhanena vai
GE07mbh_12_u:76: 12,002.008c yuṣmābhir nityasaṃdviṣṭo daivāc cāpi svabhāvataḥ 12,002.009a vidyādhikam athālakṣya dhanurvede dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_12_u:77: 12,002.009c droṇaṃ rahasy upāgamya karṇo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:79: 12,002.010b*0006_01 aho citraṃ mahac citraṃ viparītam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:80: 12,002.010b*0006_02 yenāpatrapate sādhur asādhus tena tuṣyati 12,002.010c arjunena samo yuddhe bhaveyam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:81: 12,002.011a samaḥ putreṣu ca snehaḥ śiṣyeṣu ca tava dhruvam 12,002.011c tvatprasādān na māṃ brūyur akṛtāstraṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:82: 12,002.012a droṇas tathoktaḥ karṇena sāpekṣaḥ phalgunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:83: 12,002.012c daurātmyaṃ cāpi karṇasya viditvā tam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:84: 12,002.013a brahmāstraṃ brāhmaṇo vidyād yathāvac caritavrataḥ 12,002.013c kṣatriyo vā tapasvī yo nānyo vidyāt kathaṃ cana 12,002.014a ity ukto 'ṅgirasāṃ śreṣṭham āmantrya pratipūjya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:85: 12,002.014c jagāma sahasā rāmaṃ mahendraṃ parvataṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:86: 12,002.015a sa tu rāmam upāgamya śirasābhipraṇamya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:88: 12,002.016a rāmas taṃ pratijagrāha pṛṣṭvā gotrādi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:89: 12,002.016c uṣyatāṃ svāgataṃ ceti prītimāṃś cābhavad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:90: 12,002.017a tatra karṇasya vasato mahendre parvatottame 12,002.017c gandharvai rākṣasair yakṣair devaiś cāsīt samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:91: 12,002.018a sa tatreṣv astram akarod bhṛguśreṣṭhād yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:93: 12,002.019a sa kadā cit samudrānte vicarann āśramāntike
GE07mbh_12_u:97: 12,002.021a tad ajñānakṛtaṃ matvā brāhmaṇāya nyavedayat 12,002.021c karṇaḥ prasādayaṃś cainam idam ity abravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:98: 12,002.022a abuddhipūrvaṃ bhagavan dhenur eṣā hatā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:99: 12,002.022c mayā tatra prasādaṃ me kuruṣveti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:100: 12,002.023a taṃ sa vipro 'bravīt kruddho vācā nirbhartsayann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:101: 12,002.023c durācāra vadhārhas tvaṃ phalaṃ prāpnuhi durmate
GE07mbh_12_u:103: 12,002.024c yudhyatas tena te pāpa bhūmiś cakraṃ grasiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:104: 12,002.025a tataś cakre mahīgraste mūrdhānaṃ te vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105: 12,002.025c pātayiṣyati vikramya śatrur gaccha narādhama 12,002.026a yatheyaṃ gaur hatā mūḍha pramattena tvayā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:106: 12,002.026c pramattasyaivam evānyaḥ śiras te pātayiṣyati 12,002.027a tataḥ prasādayām āsa punas taṃ dvijasattamam
GE07mbh_12_u:107: 12,002.027c gobhir dhanaiś ca ratnaiś ca sa cainaṃ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:108: 12,002.028a nedaṃ madvyāhṛtaṃ kuryāt sarvaloko 'pi vai mṛṣā 12,002.028c gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā yad vā kāryaṃ te tat samācara
GE07mbh_12_u:109: 12,002.029a ity ukto brāhmaṇenātha karṇo dainyād adhomukhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110: 12,002.029c rāmam abhyāgamad bhītas tad eva manasā smaran
GE07mbh_12_u:111: 12,003.001 nārada uvāca 12,003.001a karṇasya bāhuvīryeṇa praśrayeṇa damena ca 12,003.001c tutoṣa bhṛguśārdūlo guruśuśrūṣayā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:112: 12,003.002a tasmai sa vidhivat kṛtsnaṃ brahmāstraṃ sanivartanam
GE07mbh_12_u:115: 12,003.003c cakāra vai dhanurvede yatnam adbhutavikramaḥ 12,003.004a tataḥ kadā cid rāmas tu carann āśramam antikāt 12,003.004c karṇena sahito dhīmān upavāsena karśitaḥ 12,003.005a suṣvāpa jāmadagnyo vai visrambhotpannasauhṛdaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:116: 12,003.005c karṇasyotsaṅga ādhāya śiraḥ klāntamanā guruḥ 12,003.006a atha kṛmiḥ śleṣmamayo
GE07mbh_12_u:118: 12,003.007a sa tasyorum athāsādya bibheda rudhirāśanaḥ 12,003.007c na cainam aśakat kṣeptuṃ hantuṃ vāpi guror bhayāt 12,003.008a saṃdaśyamāno 'pi tathā kṛmiṇā tena bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:119: 12,003.008c guruprabodhaśaṅkī ca tam upaikṣata sūtajaḥ 12,003.009a karṇas tu vedanāṃ dhairyād asahyāṃ vinigṛhya tām
GE07mbh_12_u:120: 12,003.009c akampann avyathaṃś caiva dhārayām āsa bhārgavam
GE07mbh_12_u:121: 12,003.010a yadā tu rudhireṇāṅge parispṛṣṭo bhṛgūdvahaḥ 12,003.010c tadābudhyata tejasvī saṃtaptaś cedam abravīt 12,003.011a aho 'smy aśucitāṃ prāptaḥ kim idaṃ kriyate tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:122: 12,003.011c kathayasva bhayaṃ tyaktvā yāthātathyam idaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:123: 12,003.012a tasya karṇas tadācaṣṭa kṛmiṇā paribhakṣaṇam 12,003.012c dadarśa rāmas taṃ cāpi kṛmiṃ sūkarasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_12_u:124: 12,003.013a aṣṭapādaṃ tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraṃ sūcībhir iva saṃvṛtam 12,003.013c romabhiḥ saṃniruddhāṅgam alarkaṃ nāma nāmataḥ 12,003.014a sa dṛṣṭamātro rāmeṇa kṛmiḥ prāṇān avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_12_u:125: 12,003.014c tasminn evāsṛksaṃklinne tad adbhutam ivābhavat 12,003.015a tato 'ntarikṣe dadṛśe viśvarūpaḥ karālavān
GE07mbh_12_u:127: 12,003.016a sa rāmaṃ prāñjalir bhūtvā babhāṣe pūrṇamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128: 12,003.016c svasti te bhṛguśārdūla gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam 12,003.017a mokṣito narakād asmi bhavatā munisattama 12,003.017c bhadraṃ ca te 'stu nandiś ca priyaṃ me bhavatā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:129: 12,003.018a tam uvāca mahābāhur jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān 12,003.018c kas tvaṃ kasmāc ca narakaṃ pratipanno bravīhi tat 12,003.019a so 'bravīd aham āsaṃ prāg gṛtso nāma mahāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:130: 12,003.019c purā devayuge tāta bhṛgos tulyavayā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:131: 12,003.020a so 'haṃ bhṛgoḥ sudayitāṃ bhāryām apaharaṃ balāt 12,003.020c maharṣer abhiśāpena kṛmibhūto 'pataṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:132: 12,003.021a abravīt tu sa māṃ krodhāt tava pūrvapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:134: 12,003.022a śāpasyānto bhaved brahmann ity evaṃ tam athābruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:135: 12,003.022c bhavitā bhārgave rāma iti mām abravīd bhṛguḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136: 12,003.023a so 'ham etāṃ gatiṃ prāpto yathā nakuśalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:137: 12,003.023c tvayā sādho samāgamya vimuktaḥ pāpayonitaḥ 12,003.024a evam uktvā namaskṛtya yayau rāmaṃ mahāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138: 12,003.024c rāmaḥ karṇaṃ tu sakrodham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:139: 12,003.025a atiduḥkham idaṃ mūḍha na jātu brāhmaṇaḥ sahet
GE07mbh_12_u:140: 12,003.025c kṣatriyasyaiva te dhairyaṃ kāmayā satyam ucyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:141: 12,003.026a tam uvāca tataḥ karṇaḥ śāpabhītaḥ prasādayan
GE07mbh_12_u:142: 12,003.026c brahmakṣatrāntare sūtaṃ jātaṃ māṃ viddhi bhārgava
GE07mbh_12_u:143: 12,003.027a rādheyaḥ karṇa iti māṃ pravadanti janā bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:144: 12,003.027c prasādaṃ kuru me brahmann astralubdhasya bhārgava
GE07mbh_12_u:145: 12,003.028a pitā gurur na saṃdeho vedavidyāpradaḥ prabhuḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:730: 12,014.038c saparvatavanadvīpāṃ mā rājan vimanā bhava 12,014.039a yajasva vividhair yajñair juhvann agnīn prayaccha ca
GE07mbh_12_u:731: 12,014.039c purāṇi bhogān vāsāṃsi dvijātibhyo nṛpottama 12,015.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,015.001a yājñasenyā vacaḥ śrutvā punar evārjuno 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:732: 12,015.001c anumānya mahābāhuṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram īśvaram 12,015.002a daṇḍaḥ śāsti prajāḥ sarvā daṇḍa evābhirakṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:733: 12,015.002c daṇḍaḥ supteṣu jāgarti daṇḍaṃ dharmaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:734: 12,015.003a dharmaṃ saṃrakṣate daṇḍas tathaivārthaṃ narādhipa 12,015.003c kāmaṃ saṃrakṣate daṇḍas trivargo daṇḍa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:735: 12,015.004a daṇḍena rakṣyate dhānyaṃ dhanaṃ daṇḍena rakṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:736: 12,015.004c etad vidvann upādatsva svabhāvaṃ paśya laukikam
GE07mbh_12_u:737: 12,015.005a rājadaṇḍabhayād eke pāpāḥ pāpaṃ na kurvate
GE07mbh_12_u:739: 12,015.006a parasparabhayād eke pāpāḥ pāpaṃ na kurvate
GE07mbh_12_u:740: 12,015.006c evaṃ sāṃsiddhike loke sarvaṃ daṇḍe pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:741: 12,015.007a daṇḍasyaiva bhayād eke na khādanti parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:742: 12,015.007c andhe tamasi majjeyur yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:743: 12,015.008a yasmād adāntān damayaty aśiṣṭān daṇḍayaty api
GE07mbh_12_u:744: 12,015.008c damanād daṇḍanāc caiva tasmād daṇḍaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:745: 12,015.008d*0015_01 paralokabhayād ete pāpāḥ pāpaṃ na kurvate
GE07mbh_12_u:746: 12,015.009a vāci daṇḍo brāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ bhujārpaṇam 12,015.009c dānadaṇḍaḥ smṛto vaiśyo nirdaṇḍaḥ śūdra ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:748: 12,015.010c maryādā sthāpitā loke daṇḍasaṃjñā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:749: 12,015.011a yatra śyāmo lohitākṣo daṇḍaś carati sūnṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:750: 12,015.011c prajās tatra na muhyanti netā cet sādhu paśyati 12,015.012a brahmacārī gṛhasthaś ca vānaprastho 'tha bhikṣukaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:751: 12,015.012c daṇḍasyaiva bhayād ete manuṣyā vartmani sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:752: 12,015.013a nābhīto yajate rājan nābhīto dātum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:753: 12,015.013c nābhītaḥ puruṣaḥ kaś cit samaye sthātum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:754: 12,015.014a nācchittvā paramarmāṇi nākṛtvā karma dāruṇam 12,015.014c nāhatvā matsyaghātīva prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyam 12,015.015a nāghnataḥ kīrtir astīha na vittaṃ na punaḥ prajāḥ 12,015.015c indro vṛtravadhenaiva mahendraḥ samapadyata
GE07mbh_12_u:755: 12,015.015d*0016_01 māhendraṃ ca grahaṃ lebhe lokānāṃ ceśvaro 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:756: 12,015.016a ya eva devā hantāras tāṃl loko 'rcayate bhṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:757: 12,015.016c hantā rudras tathā skandaḥ śakro 'gnir varuṇo yamaḥ 12,015.017a hantā kālas tathā vāyur mṛtyur vaiśravaṇo raviḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:758: 12,015.017c vasavo marutaḥ sādhyā viśvedevāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:759: 12,015.018a etān devān namasyanti pratāpapraṇatā janāḥ 12,015.018c na brahmāṇaṃ na dhātāraṃ na pūṣāṇaṃ kathaṃ cana 12,015.019a madhyasthān sarvabhūteṣu dāntāñ śamaparāyaṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:760: 12,015.019c yajante mānavāḥ ke cit praśāntāḥ sarvakarmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:761: 12,015.020a na hi paśyāmi jīvantaṃ loke kaṃ cid ahiṃsayā 12,015.020c sattvaiḥ sattvāni jīvanti durbalair balavattarāḥ 12,015.021a nakulo mūṣakān atti biḍālo nakulaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:762: 12,015.021c biḍālam atti śvā rājañ śvānaṃ vyālamṛgas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:763: 12,015.022a tān atti puruṣaḥ sarvān paśya dharmo yathāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:764: 12,015.022c prāṇasyānnam idaṃ sarvaṃ jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:765: 12,015.023a vidhānaṃ devavihitaṃ tatra vidvān na muhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:766: 12,015.023c yathā sṛṣṭo 'si rājendra tathā bhavitum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:767: 12,015.024a vinītakrodhaharṣā hi mandā vanam upāśritāḥ 12,015.024c vinā vadhaṃ na kurvanti tāpasāḥ prāṇayāpanam
GE07mbh_12_u:768: 12,015.025a udake bahavaḥ prāṇāḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca phaleṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:769: 12,015.025c na ca kaś cin na tān hanti kim anyat prāṇayāpanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:770: 12,015.026a sūkṣmayonīni bhūtāni tarkagamyāni kāni cit 12,015.026c pakṣmaṇo 'pi nipātena yeṣāṃ syāt skandhaparyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:773: 12,015.028a bhūmiṃ bhittvauṣadhīś chittvā vṛkṣādīn aṇḍajān paśūn
GE07mbh_12_u:774: 12,015.028c manuṣyās tanvate yajñāṃs te svargaṃ prāpnuvanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:775: 12,015.029a daṇḍanītyāṃ praṇītāyāṃ sarve sidhyanty upakramāḥ 12,015.029c kaunteya sarvabhūtānāṃ tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:776: 12,015.030a daṇḍaś cen na bhavel loke vyanaśiṣyann imāḥ prajāḥ 12,015.030c śūle matsyān ivāpakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥ 12,015.031a satyaṃ cedaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvam uktaṃ; daṇḍaḥ prajā rakṣati sādhu nītaḥ 12,015.031c paśyāgnayaś ca pratiśāmyanty abhītāḥ; saṃtarjitā daṇḍabhayāj jvalanti
GE07mbh_12_u:777: 12,015.031d*0017_01 yadi na praṇayed rājan daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣv atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:778: 12,015.032a andhaṃ tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃ cana 12,015.032c daṇḍaś cen na bhavel loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī
GE07mbh_12_u:781: 12,015.034a sarvo daṇḍajito loko durlabho hi śucir naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:782: 12,015.034c daṇḍasya hi bhayād bhīto bhogāyeha prakalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:784: 12,015.035c daṇḍo vidhātrā vihito dharmārthāv abhirakṣitum 12,015.036a yadi daṇḍān na bibhyeyur vayāṃsi śvāpadāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:785: 12,015.036c adyuḥ paśūn manuṣyāṃś ca yajñārthāni havīṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:786: 12,015.037a na brahmacāry adhīyīta kalyāṇī gaur na duhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:787: 12,015.037c na kanyodvahanaṃ gacched yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:789: 12,015.038c mamatvaṃ na prajānīyur yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:791: 12,015.039c vidhivad dakṣiṇāvanti yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:792: 12,015.040a careyur nāśrame dharmaṃ yathoktaṃ vidhim āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:793: 12,015.040c na vidyāṃ prāpnuyāt kaś cid yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:794: 12,015.041a na coṣṭrā na balīvardā nāśvāśvataragardabhāḥ 12,015.041c yuktā vaheyur yānāni yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:795: 12,015.042a na preṣyā vacanaṃ kuryur na bālo jātu karhi cit
GE07mbh_12_u:796: 12,015.042c tiṣṭhet pitṛmate dharme yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:797: 12,015.043a daṇḍe sthitāḥ prajāḥ sarvā bhayaṃ daṇḍaṃ vidur budhāḥ 12,015.043c daṇḍe svargo manuṣyāṇāṃ loko 'yaṃ ca pratiṣṭhitaḥ 12,015.044a na tatra kūṭaṃ pāpaṃ vā vañcanā vāpi dṛṣyate 12,015.044c yatra daṇḍaḥ suvihitaś caraty arivināśanaḥ 12,015.045a haviḥ śvā prapibed dhṛṣṭo daṇḍaś cen nodyato bhavet 12,015.045c haret kākaḥ puroḍāśaṃ yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:798: 12,015.046a yad idaṃ dharmato rājyaṃ vihitaṃ yady adharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:799: 12,015.046c kāryas tatra na śoko vai bhuṅkṣva bhogān yajasva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:800: 12,015.047a sukhena dharmaṃ śrīmantaś caranti śucivāsasaḥ 12,015.047c saṃvasantaḥ priyair dārair bhuñjānāś cānnam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:801: 12,015.048a arthe sarve samārambhāḥ samāyattā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:802: 12,015.048c sa ca daṇḍe samāyattaḥ paśya daṇḍasya gauravam
GE07mbh_12_u:805: 12,015.050a nātyantaguṇavān kaś cin na cāpy atyantanirguṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:806: 12,015.050c ubhayaṃ sarvakāryeṣu dṛśyate sādhv asādhu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:807: 12,015.051a paśūnāṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ chittvā tato bhindanti nastakān
GE07mbh_12_u:808: 12,015.051c kṛṣanti bahavo bhārān badhnanti damayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:809: 12,015.052a evaṃ paryākule loke vipathe jarjarīkṛte 12,015.052c tais tair nyāyair mahārāja purāṇaṃ dharmam ācara
GE07mbh_12_u:810: 12,015.053a yaja dehi prajā rakṣa dharmaṃ samanupālaya
GE07mbh_12_u:811: 12,015.053c amitrāñ jahi kaunteya mitrāṇi paripālaya 12,015.054a mā ca te nighnataḥ śatrūn manyur bhavatu bhārata 12,015.054c na tatra kilbiṣaṃ kiṃ cit kartur bhavati bhārata 12,015.055a ātatāyī hi yo hanyād ātatāyinam āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:812: 12,015.055c na tena bhrūṇahā sa syān manyus taṃ manyum ṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:813: 12,015.056a avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānām antarātmā na saṃśayaḥ 12,015.056c avadhye cātmani kathaṃ vadhyo bhavati kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:814: 12,015.057a yathā hi puruṣaḥ śālāṃ punaḥ saṃpraviśen navām
GE07mbh_12_u:815: 12,015.057c evaṃ jīvaḥ śarīrāṇi tāni tāni prapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:816: 12,015.058a dehān purāṇān utsṛjya navān saṃpratipadyate 12,015.058c evaṃ mṛtyumukhaṃ prāhur ye janās tattvadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:817: 12,016.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,016.001a arjunasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhīmaseno 'tyamarṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:818: 12,016.001c dhairyam āsthāya tejasvī jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:819: 12,016.002a rājan viditadharmo 'si na te 'sty aviditaṃ bhuvi 12,016.002c upaśikṣāma te vṛttaṃ sadaiva na ca śaknumaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:820: 12,016.003a na vakṣyāmi na vakṣyāmīty evaṃ me manasi sthitam 12,016.003c atiduḥkhāt tu vakṣyāmi tan nibodha janādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:821: 12,016.004a bhavatas tu pramohena sarvaṃ saṃśayitaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:822: 12,016.004c viklavatvaṃ ca naḥ prāptam abalatvaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:823: 12,016.005a kathaṃ hi rājā lokasya sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ 12,016.005c moham āpadyate dainyād yathā kupuruṣas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:824: 12,016.006a āgatiś ca gatiś caiva lokasya viditā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:825: 12,016.006c āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca na te 'sty aviditaṃ prabho 12,016.007a evaṃ gate mahārāja rājyaṃ prati janādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:826: 12,016.007c hetum atra pravakṣyāmi tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:827: 12,016.008a dvividho jāyate vyādhiḥ śārīro mānasas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:828: 12,016.008c parasparaṃ tayor janma nirdvaṃdvaṃ nopalabhyate 12,016.009a śārīrāj jāyate vyādhir mānaso nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:829: 12,016.009c mānasāj jāyate vyādhiḥ śārīra iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:831: 12,016.010c duḥkhena labhate duḥkhaṃ dvāv anarthau prapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:832: 12,016.011a śītoṣṇe caiva vāyuś ca trayaḥ śārīrajā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:833: 12,016.011c teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ sāmyaṃ ca tad āhuḥ svasthalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:835: 12,016.012c uṣṇena bādhyate śītaṃ śītenoṣṇaṃ prabādhyate 12,016.012d*0018_01 ubhābhyāṃ vadhyate vāyur vidhānam idam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:836: 12,016.013a sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva mānasāḥ syus trayo guṇāḥ 12,016.013b*0019_01 rajasā śāmyate sattvaṃ rajaḥ sattvena śāmyati
GE07mbh_12_u:837: 12,016.013c harṣeṇa bādhyate śoko harṣaḥ śokena bādhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:838: 12,016.014a kaś cit sukhe vartamāno duḥkhasya smartum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:839: 12,016.014c kaś cid duḥkhe vartamānaḥ sukhasya smartum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:840: 12,016.015a sa tvaṃ na duḥkhī duḥkhasya na sukhī ca sukhasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:841: 12,016.015c na duḥkhī sukhajātasya na sukhī duḥkhajasya vā
GE07mbh_12_u:842: 12,016.016a smartum arhasi kauravya diṣṭaṃ tu balavattaram
GE07mbh_12_u:843: 12,016.016c atha vā te svabhāvo 'yaṃ yena pārthiva kṛṣyase
GE07mbh_12_u:844: 12,016.017a dṛṣṭvā sabhāgatāṃ kṛṣṇām ekavastrāṃ rajasvalām 12,016.017c miṣatāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ na tasya smartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:845: 12,016.018a pravrājanaṃ ca nagarād ajinaiś ca nivāsanam
GE07mbh_12_u:846: 12,016.018c mahāraṇyanivāsaś ca na tasya smartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:848: 12,016.019c saindhavāc ca parikleśaṃ kathaṃ vismṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_12_u:849: 12,016.019e punar ajñātacaryāyāṃ kīcakena padā vadham 12,016.019f*0020_01 draupadyā rājaputryāś ca kathaṃ vismṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_12_u:850: 12,016.019f*0021_01 balavanto vayaṃ rājan devair api sudurjayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:851: 12,016.019f*0021_02 kathaṃ bhṛtyatvam āpannā virāṭanagare smara 12,016.020a yac ca te droṇabhīṣmābhyāṃ yuddham āsīd ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:852: 12,016.020c manasaikena te yuddham idaṃ ghoram upasthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:853: 12,016.021a yatra nāsti śaraiḥ kāryaṃ na mitrair na ca bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:854: 12,016.021c ātmanaikena yoddhavyaṃ tat te yuddham upasthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:855: 12,016.022a tasminn anirjite yuddhe prāṇān yadi ha mokṣyase
GE07mbh_12_u:856: 12,016.022c anyaṃ dehaṃ samāsthāya punas tenaiva yotsyase
GE07mbh_12_u:857: 12,016.022d*0022_01 yo hy anāḍhyaḥ sa patitas tad ucchiṣṭaṃ yad alpakam
GE07mbh_12_u:858: 12,016.022d*0022_02 bahv apathyaṃ balavato na kiṃ cit trāyate dhanam 12,016.023a tasmād adyaiva gantavyaṃ yuddhasya bharatarṣabha 12,016.023b*0023_01 pāram avyaktarūpasya vyaktaṃ tyaktvā svakarmabhiḥ 12,016.023b*0023_02 tasminn anirjite yuddhe kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:859: 12,016.023c etaj jitvā mahārāja kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi 12,016.024a etāṃ buddhiṃ viniścitya bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:860: 12,016.024c pitṛpaitāmahe vṛtte śādhi rājyaṃ yathocitam 12,016.025a diṣṭyā duryodhanaḥ pāpo nihataḥ sānugo yudhi
GE07mbh_12_u:861: 12,016.025c draupadyāḥ keśapakṣasya diṣṭyā tvaṃ padavīṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:863: 12,016.026c vayaṃ te kiṃkarāḥ pārtha vāsudevaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:864: 12,017.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,017.001a asaṃtoṣaḥ pramādaś ca mado rāgo 'praśāntatā
GE07mbh_12_u:865: 12,017.001c balaṃ moho 'bhimānaś ca udvegaś cāpi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:866: 12,017.002a ebhiḥ pāpmabhir āviṣṭo rājyaṃ tvam abhikāṅkṣasi
GE07mbh_12_u:867: 12,017.002c nirāmiṣo vinirmuktaḥ praśāntaḥ susukhī bhava 12,017.003a ya imām akhilāṃ bhūmiṃ śiṣyād eko mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:868: 12,017.003c tasyāpy udaram evaikaṃ kim idaṃ tvaṃ praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_12_u:869: 12,017.004a nāhnā pūrayituṃ śakyā na māsena nararṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:870: 12,017.004c apūryāṃ pūrayann icchām āyuṣāpi na śaknuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:871: 12,017.005a yatheddhaḥ prajvalaty agnir asamiddhaḥ praśāmyati 12,017.005c alpāhāratayā tv agniṃ śamayaudaryam utthitam 12,017.005d*0024_01 ātmodarakṛte 'thājñaḥ karoti vighasaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_12_u:872: 12,017.005e jayodaraṃ pṛthivyā te śreyo nirjitayā jitam
GE07mbh_12_u:873: 12,017.006a mānuṣān kāmabhogāṃs tvam aiśvaryaṃ ca praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_12_u:875: 12,017.007a yogakṣemau ca rāṣṭrasya dharmādharmau tvayi sthitau
GE07mbh_12_u:876: 12,017.007c mucyasva mahato bhārāt tyāgam evābhisaṃśraya 12,017.008a ekodarakṛte vyāghraḥ karoti vighasaṃ bahu 12,017.008c tam anye 'py upajīvanti mandavegaṃcarā mṛgāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:899: 12,017.023c nābuddhayo nātapasaḥ sarvaṃ buddhau pratiṣṭhitam 12,018.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,018.001a tūṣṇīṃbhūtaṃ tu rājānaṃ punar evārjuno 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:901: 12,018.002a kathayanti purāvṛttam itihāsam imaṃ janāḥ 12,018.002c videharājñaḥ saṃvādaṃ bhāryayā saha bhārata 12,018.003a utsṛjya rājyaṃ bhaikṣārthaṃ kṛtabuddhiṃ janeśvaram 12,018.003c videharājaṃ mahiṣī duḥkhitā pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:902: 12,018.004a dhanāny apatyaṃ mitrāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca

GE07mbh_12_u:908: 12,018.008a pratijñā te 'nyathā rājan viceṣṭā cānyathā tava

GE07mbh_12_u:912: 12,018.010a devatātithibhiś caiva pitṛbhiś caiva pārthiva 12,018.010c sarvair etaiḥ parityaktaḥ parivrajasi niṣkriyaḥ 12,018.011a yas tvaṃ traividyavṛddhānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasraśaḥ 12,018.011c bhartā bhūtvā ca lokasya so 'dyānyair bhṛtim icchasi 12,018.012a śriyaṃ hitvā pradīptāṃ tvaṃ śvavat saṃprati vīkṣyase
GE07mbh_12_u:913: 12,018.012c aputrā jananī te 'dya kausalyā cāpatis tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:914: 12,018.013a aśītir dharmakāmās tvāṃ kṣatriyāḥ paryupāsate 12,018.013c tvadāśām abhikāṅkṣantyaḥ kṛpaṇāḥ phalahetukāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:917: 12,018.015c dharmyān dārān parityajya yas tvam icchasi jīvitum
GE07mbh_12_u:918: 12,018.016a srajo gandhān alaṃkārān vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:920: 12,018.017a nipānaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ bhūtvā tvaṃ pāvanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:922: 12,018.018a khādanti hastinaṃ nyāse kravyādā bahavo 'py uta
GE07mbh_12_u:923: 12,018.018c bahavaḥ kṛmayaś caiva kiṃ punas tvām anarthakam
GE07mbh_12_u:924: 12,018.019a ya imāṃ kuṇḍikāṃ bhindyāt triviṣṭabdhaṃ ca te haret 12,018.019c vāsaś cāpaharet tasmin kathaṃ te mānasaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:925: 12,018.020a yas tv ayaṃ sarvam utsṛjya dhānāmuṣṭiparigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:926: 12,018.020c yadānena samaṃ sarvaṃ kim idaṃ mama dīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:927: 12,018.020e dhānāmuṣṭir ihārthaś cet pratijñā te vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:928: 12,018.021a kā vāhaṃ tava ko me tvaṃ ko 'dya te mayy anugrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:929: 12,018.021c praśādhi pṛthivīṃ rājan yatra te 'nugraho bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:930: 12,018.021e prāsādaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:931: 12,018.022a śriyā nirāśair adhanais tyaktamitrair akiṃcanaiḥ 12,018.022c saukhikaiḥ saṃbhṛtān arthān yaḥ saṃtyajasi kiṃ nu tat 12,018.023a yo 'tyantaṃ pratigṛhṇīyād yaś ca dadyāt sadaiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:932: 12,018.023c tayos tvam antaraṃ viddhi śreyāṃs tābhyāṃ ka ucyate 12,018.024a sadaiva yācamāneṣu satsu dambhavivarjiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:933: 12,018.024c eteṣu dakṣiṇā dattā dāvāgnāv iva durhutam
GE07mbh_12_u:935: 12,018.025c sadaiva yācamāno vai tathā śāmyati na dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:936: 12,018.026a satāṃ ca vedā annaṃ ca loke 'smin prakṛtir dhruvā 12,018.026c na ced dātā bhaved dātā kutaḥ syur mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ 12,018.027a annād gṛhasthā loke 'smin bhikṣavas tata eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:937: 12,018.027c annāt prāṇaḥ prabhavati annadaḥ prāṇado bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:939: 12,018.028c prabhavaṃ ca pratiṣṭhāṃ ca dāntā nindanta āsate
GE07mbh_12_u:940: 12,018.029a tyāgān na bhikṣukaṃ vidyān na mauṇḍyān na ca yācanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:941: 12,018.029c ṛjus tu yo 'rthaṃ tyajati taṃ sukhaṃ viddhi bhikṣukam 12,018.030a asaktaḥ saktavad gacchan niḥsaṅgo muktabandhanaḥ 12,018.030c samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca sa vai mukto mahīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:943: 12,018.031c sitā bahuvidhaiḥ pāśaiḥ saṃcinvanto vṛthāmiṣam 12,018.032a trayīṃ ca nāma vārtāṃ ca tyaktvā putrāṃs tyajanti ye
GE07mbh_12_u:944: 12,018.032c triviṣṭabdhaṃ ca vāsaś ca pratigṛhṇanty abuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:945: 12,018.033a aniṣkaṣāye kāṣāyam īhārtham iti viddhi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:946: 12,018.033c dharmadhvajānāṃ muṇḍānāṃ vṛttyartham iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:947: 12,018.034a kāṣāyair ajinaiś cīrair nagnān muṇḍāñ jaṭādharān
GE07mbh_12_u:948: 12,018.034c bibhrat sādhūn mahārāja jaya lokāñ jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:950: 12,018.035c dadāty aharahaḥ pūrvaṃ ko nu dharmataras tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:951: 12,018.036a tattvajño janako rājā loke 'sminn iti gīyate 12,018.036c so 'py āsīn mohasaṃpanno mā mohavaśam anvagāḥ 12,018.037a evaṃ dharmam anukrāntaṃ sadā dānaparair naraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:952: 12,018.037c ānṛśaṃsyaguṇopetaiḥ kāmakrodhavivarjitāḥ 12,018.038a pālayantaḥ prajāś caiva dānam uttamam āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:956: 12,019.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,019.001a vedāhaṃ tāta śāstrāṇi aparāṇi parāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:957: 12,019.001c ubhayaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:958: 12,019.002a ākulāni ca śāstrāṇi hetubhiś citritāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:959: 12,019.002c niścayaś caiva yanmātro vedāhaṃ taṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:960: 12,019.003a tvaṃ tu kevalam astrajño vīravratam anuṣṭhitaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:963: 12,019.004c tenāpy evaṃ na vācyo 'haṃ yadi dharmaṃ prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:964: 12,019.005a bhrātṛsauhṛdam āsthāya yad uktaṃ vacanaṃ tvayā

GE07mbh_12_u:966: 12,019.005d*0026_01 mameśvarasamaṃ sattvaṃ brahmaṇā caiva yat samam
GE07mbh_12_u:967: 12,019.005d*0026_02 vāsudevasamaṃ caiva na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:968: 12,019.005d*0026_03 tathā tvaṃ yaudhamukhyeṣu sattvaṃ paramam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:969: 12,019.005d*0026_04 balam indre ca vāyau ca balaṃ yac ca janārdane

GE07mbh_12_u:971: 12,019.005d*0026_06 tvatsamaś citrayodhī ca dūrapātī ca pāṇḍava

GE07mbh_12_u:973: 12,019.006a yuddhadharmeṣu sarveṣu kriyāṇāṃ naipuṇeṣu ca 12,019.006c na tvayā sadṛśaḥ kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate 12,019.006d*0027_01 dhārmikaṃ dharmayuktaṃ ca niḥśeṣaṃ jñāyate mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:974: 12,019.007a dharmasūkṣmaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ tatra duṣprataraṃ tvayā

GE07mbh_12_u:977: 12,019.008c samāsavistaravidāṃ na teṣāṃ vetsi niścayam 12,019.009a tapas tyāgo vidhir iti niścayas tāta dhīmatām
GE07mbh_12_u:978: 12,019.009c paraṃ paraṃ jyāya eṣāṃ saiṣā naiḥśreyasī gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:979: 12,019.010a na tv etan manyase pārtha na jyāyo 'sti dhanād iti 12,019.010c atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathā naitat pradhānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:980: 12,019.011a tapaḥsvādhyāyaśīlā hi dṛśyante dhārmikā janāḥ 12,019.011c ṛṣayas tapasā yuktā yeṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:982: 12,019.012c anantā adhanā eva svādhyāyena divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:983: 12,019.013a uttareṇa tu panthānam āryā viṣayanigrahāt 12,019.013c abuddhijaṃ tamas tyaktvā lokāṃs tyāgavatāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:984: 12,019.014a dakṣiṇena tu panthānaṃ yaṃ bhāsvantaṃ prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:985: 12,019.014c ete kriyāvatāṃ lokā ye śmaśānāni bhejire
GE07mbh_12_u:986: 12,019.015a anirdeśyā gatiḥ sā tu yāṃ prapaśyanti mokṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:987: 12,019.015c tasmāt tyāgaḥ pradhāneṣṭaḥ sa tu duḥkhaḥ praveditum
GE07mbh_12_u:988: 12,019.016a anusṛtya tu śāstrāṇi kavayaḥ samavasthitāḥ 12,019.016c apīha syād apīha syāt sārāsāradidṛkṣayā 12,019.017a vedavādān atikramya śāstrāṇy āraṇyakāni ca 12,019.017c vipāṭya kadalīskandhaṃ sāraṃ dadṛśire na te
GE07mbh_12_u:991: 12,019.019a agrāhyaś cakṣuṣā so 'pi anirdeśyaṃ ca tad girā

GE07mbh_12_u:995: 12,019.021c katham artham anarthāḍhyam arjuna tvaṃ praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_12_u:996: 12,019.022a pūrvaśāstravido hy evaṃ janāḥ paśyanti bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:997: 12,019.022c kriyāsu niratā nityaṃ dāne yajñe ca karmaṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:999: 12,019.023c dṛḍhapūrvaśrutā mūḍhā naitad astīti vādinaḥ 12,019.024a amṛtasyāvamantāro vaktāro
GE07mbh_12_u:1000: 12,019.024c caranti vasudhāṃ kṛtsnāṃ vāvadūkā bahuśrutāḥ 12,019.025a yān vayaṃ nābhijānīmaḥ kas tāñ jñātum ihārhati
GE07mbh_12_u:1001: 12,019.025c evaṃ prājñān sataś cāpi mahataḥ śāstravittamān
GE07mbh_12_u:1002: 12,019.026a tapasā mahad āpnoti buddhyā vai vindate mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:1003: 12,019.026c tyāgena sukham āpnoti sadā kaunteya dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:1004: 12,020.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,020.001a tasmin vākyāntare vaktā devasthāno mahātapāḥ 12,020.001c abhinītataraṃ vākyam ity uvāca yudhiṣṭhiram 12,020.002a yad vacaḥ phalgunenoktaṃ na jyāyo 'sti dhanād iti 12,020.002c atra te vartayiṣyāmi tad ekāgramanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:1005: 12,020.003a ajātaśatro dharmeṇa kṛtsnā te vasudhā jitā
GE07mbh_12_u:1006: 12,020.003c tāṃ jitvā na vṛthā rājaṃs tvaṃ parityaktum arhasi 12,020.004a catuṣpadī hi niḥśreṇī karmaṇy eṣā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:1007: 12,020.004c tāṃ krameṇa mahābāho yathāvaj jaya pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:1008: 12,020.005a tasmāt pārtha mahāyajñair yajasva bahudakṣiṇaiḥ 12,020.005c svādhyāyayajñā ṛṣayo jñānayajñās tathāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:1009: 12,020.006a karmaniṣṭhāṃs tu budhyethās taponiṣṭhāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:1010: 12,020.006c vaikhānasānāṃ rājendra vacanaṃ śrūyate yathā 12,020.007a īhate dhanahetor yas tasyānīhā garīyasī 12,020.007c bhūyān doṣaḥ pravardheta yas taṃ dhanam apāśrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:1011: 12,020.008a kṛcchrāc ca dravyasaṃhāraṃ kurvanti dhanakāraṇāt 12,020.008c dhanena tṛṣito 'buddhyā bhrūṇahatyāṃ na budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:1012: 12,020.009a anarhate yad dadāti na dadāti yad arhate
GE07mbh_12_u:1014: 12,020.010a yajñāya sṛṣṭāni dhanāni dhātrā; yaṣṭādiṣṭaḥ puruṣo rakṣitā ca
GE07mbh_12_u:1015: 12,020.010c tasmāt sarvaṃ yajña evopayojyaṃ; dhanaṃ tato 'nantara eva kāmaḥ 12,020.011a yajñair indro vividhair annavadbhir; devān sarvān abhyayān
GE07mbh_12_u:1017: 12,020.011c tenendratvaṃ prāpya vibhrājate 'sau; tasmād yajñe sarvam
GE07mbh_12_u:1019: 12,020.012a mahādevaḥ sarvamedhe mahātmā; hutvātmānaṃ devadevo vibhūtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1020: 12,020.012c viśvāṃl lokān vyāpya viṣṭabhya kīrtyā; virocate dyutimān kṛttivāsāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1021: 12,020.013a āvikṣitaḥ pārthivo vai maruttaḥ; svṛddhyā martyo yo 'jayad
GE07mbh_12_u:1023: 12,020.013c yajñe yasya śrīḥ svayaṃ saṃniviṣṭā; yasmin bhāṇḍaṃ kāñcanaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:1024: sarvam āsīt 12,020.014a hariścandraḥ pārthivendraḥ śrutas te; yajñair iṣṭvā puṇyakṛd
GE07mbh_12_u:1026: 12,020.014c ṛddhyā śakraṃ yo 'jayan mānuṣaḥ saṃs; tasmād yajñe sarvam
GE07mbh_12_u:1029: 12,021.001c indreṇa samaye pṛṣṭo yad uvāca bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1030: 12,021.002a saṃtoṣo vai svargatamaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:1031: 12,021.002c tuṣṭer na kiṃ cit parataḥ susamyak paritiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:1034: 12,021.004a na bibheti yadā cāyaṃ yadā cāsmān na bibhyati 12,021.004c kāmadveṣau ca jayati tadātmānaṃ prapaśyati 12,021.005a yadāsau sarvabhūtānāṃ na krudhyati na duṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:1035: 12,021.005c karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā

GE07mbh_12_u:1619: 12,029.125a yaḥ prādāt kāñcanastambhaṃ prāsādaṃ sarvakāñcanam 12,029.125c pūrṇaṃ padmadalākṣīṇāṃ strīṇāṃ śayanasaṃkulam
GE07mbh_12_u:1621: 12,029.126c yasyādeśena tad vittaṃ vyabhajanta dvijātayaḥ 12,029.127a khānayām āsa yaḥ kopāt pṛthivīṃ sāgarāṅkitām
GE07mbh_12_u:1622: 12,029.127c yasya nāmnā samudraś ca sāgaratvam upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1623: 12,029.128a sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:1624: 12,029.128c putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1625: 12,029.129a rājānaṃ ca pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ mṛtaṃ śuśruma sṛñjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:1626: 12,029.129c yam abhyaṣiñcan saṃbhūya mahāraṇye maharṣayaḥ 12,029.130a prathayiṣyati vai lokān pṛthur ity eva śabditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1627: 12,029.130c kṣatāc ca nas trāyatīti sa tasmāt kṣatriyaḥ smṛtaḥ 12,029.131a pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ prajā dṛṣṭvā raktāḥ smeti yad abruvan 12,029.131c tato rājeti nāmāsya anurāgād ajāyata 12,029.132a akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī puṭake puṭake madhu 12,029.132c sarvā droṇadughā gāvo vainyasyāsan praśāsataḥ 12,029.133a arogāḥ sarvasiddhārthā manuṣyā akutobhayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1628: 12,029.133c yathābhikāmam avasan kṣetreṣu ca gṛheṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:1629: 12,029.134a āpaḥ saṃstambhire yasya samudrasya yiyāsataḥ 12,029.134c saritaś cānudīryanta dhvajasaṅgaś ca nābhavat 12,029.135a hairaṇyāṃs trinalotsedhān parvatān ekaviṃśatim
GE07mbh_12_u:1631: 12,029.136a sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:1632: 12,029.136c putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1633: 12,029.137a kiṃ vai tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyasi sṛñjaya tvaṃ; na me rājan vācam imāṃ śṛṇoṣi
GE07mbh_12_u:1634: 12,029.137c na cen moghaṃ vipralaptaṃ mayedaṃ; pathyaṃ mumūrṣor iva samyag uktam 12,029.138 sṛñjaya uvāca 12,029.138a śṛṇomi te nārada vācam etāṃ; vicitrārthāṃ srajam iva
GE07mbh_12_u:1636: 12,029.138c rājarṣīṇāṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ mahātmanāṃ; kīrtyā yuktāṃ śokanirṇāśanārtham
GE07mbh_12_u:1637: 12,029.139a na te moghaṃ vipralaptaṃ maharṣe; dṛṣṭvaiva tvāṃ nāradāhaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:1639: 12,029.139c śuśrūṣe te vacanaṃ brahmavādin; na te tṛpyāmy amṛtasyeva pānāt 12,029.140a amoghadarśin mama cet prasādaṃ; sutāghadagdhasya vibho prakuryāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1640: 12,029.140c mṛtasya saṃjīvanam adya me syāt; tava prasādāt sutasaṃgamaś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:1641: 12,029.141 nārada uvāca 12,029.141a yas te putro dayito 'yaṃ viyātaḥ; svarṇaṣṭhīvī yam
GE07mbh_12_u:1642: parvatas te 12,029.141c punas te taṃ putram ahaṃ dadāmi; hiraṇyanābhaṃ varṣasahasriṇaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:1643: 12,030.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,030.001a sa kathaṃ kāñcanaṣṭhīvī sṛñjayasya suto 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:1644: 12,030.001c parvatena kimarthaṃ ca dattaḥ kena mamāra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:1645: 12,030.002a yadā varṣasahasrāyus tadā bhavati mānavaḥ 12,030.002c katham aprāptakaumāraḥ sṛñjayasya suto mṛtaḥ 12,030.003a utāho nāmamātraṃ vai suvarṇaṣṭhīvino 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:1646: 12,030.003c tathyaṃ vā kāñcanaṣṭhīvīty etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_12_u:1647: 12,030.004 vāsudeva uvāca 12,030.004a atra te kathayiṣyāmi yathā vṛttaṃ janeśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:1648: 12,030.004c nāradaḥ parvataś caiva prāg ṛṣī lokapūjitau
GE07mbh_12_u:1649: 12,030.005a mātulo bhāgineyaś ca devalokād ihāgatau 12,030.005c vihartukāmau saṃprītyā mānuṣyeṣu purā prabhū 12,030.006a haviḥpavitrabhojyena devabhojyena caiva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:1650: 12,030.006c nārado mātulaś caiva bhāgineyaś ca parvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1652: 12,030.007c bhuñjānau mānuṣān bhogān yathāvat paryadhāvatām 12,030.008a prītimantau mudā yuktau samayaṃ tatra cakratuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1653: 12,030.008c yo bhaved dhṛdi saṃkalpaḥ śubho vā yadi vāśubhaḥ 12,030.008e anyonyasya sa ākhyeyo mṛṣā śāpo 'nyathā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:1654: 12,030.009a tau tatheti pratijñāya maharṣī lokapūjitau 12,030.009c sṛñjayaṃ śvaityam abhyetya rājānam idam ūcatuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1655: 12,030.010a āvāṃ bhavati vatsyāvaḥ kaṃ cit kālaṃ hitāya te 12,030.010c yathāvat pṛthivīpāla āvayoḥ praguṇībhava
GE07mbh_12_u:1656: 12,030.010e tatheti kṛtvā tau rājā satkṛtyopacacāra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:1657: 12,030.011a tataḥ kadā cit tau rājā mahātmānau tathāgatau
GE07mbh_12_u:1659: 12,030.012a ekaiva mama kanyaiṣā yuvāṃ paricariṣyati 12,030.012c darśanīyānavadyāṅgī śīlavṛttasamanvitā 12,030.012e sukumārī kumārī ca padmakiñjalkasaṃnibhā
GE07mbh_12_u:1660: 12,030.013a paramaṃ saumya ity uktas tābhyāṃ rājā śaśāsa tām 12,030.013c kanye viprāv upacara devavat pitṛvac ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:1661: 12,030.014a sā tu kanyā tathety uktvā pitaraṃ dharmacāriṇī
GE07mbh_12_u:1662: 12,030.014c yathānideśaṃ rājñas tau satkṛtyopacacāra ha 12,030.015a tasyās tathopacāreṇa rūpeṇāpratimena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:1664: 12,030.016a vavṛdhe ca tatas tasya hṛdi kāmo mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1665: 12,030.016c yathā śuklasya pakṣasya pravṛttāv uḍurāṭ chanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1666: 12,030.017a na ca taṃ bhāgineyāya parvatāya mahātmane
GE07mbh_12_u:1667: 12,030.017c śaśaṃsa manmathaṃ tīvraṃ vrīḍamānaḥ sa dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:1668: 12,030.018a tapasā ceṅgitenātha parvato 'tha bubodha tat 12,030.018c kāmārtaṃ nāradaṃ kruddhaḥ śaśāpainaṃ tato bhṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:1669: 12,030.019a kṛtvā samayam avyagro bhavān vai sahito mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:1670: 12,030.019c yo bhaved dhṛdi saṃkalpaḥ śubho vā yadi vāśubhaḥ 12,030.020a anyonyasya sa ākhyeya iti tad vai mṛṣā kṛtam 12,030.020c bhavatā vacanaṃ brahmaṃs tasmād etad vadāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:1671: 12,030.021a na hi kāmaṃ pravartantaṃ bhavān ācaṣṭa me purā 12,030.021c sukumāryāṃ kumāryāṃ te tasmād eṣa śapāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:1672: 12,030.022a brahmavādī gurur yasmāt tapasvī brāhmaṇaś ca san
GE07mbh_12_u:1673: 12,030.022c akārṣīḥ samayabhraṃśam āvābhyāṃ yaḥ kṛto mithaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1674: 12,030.023a śapsye tasmāt susaṃkruddho bhavantaṃ taṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:1675: 12,030.023c sukumārī ca te bhāryā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1676: 12,030.024a vānaraṃ caiva kanyā tvāṃ vivāhāt prabhṛti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:1677: 12,030.024c saṃdrakṣyanti narāś cānye svarūpeṇa vinākṛtam 12,030.025a sa tad vākyaṃ tu vijñāya nāradaḥ parvatāt tadā 12,030.025c aśapat tam api krodhād bhāgineyaṃ sa mātulaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1678: 12,030.026a tapasā brahmacaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:1679: 12,030.026c yukto 'pi dharmanityaś ca na svargavāsam āpsyasi 12,030.027a tau tu śaptvā bhṛśaṃ kruddhau parasparam amarṣaṇau
GE07mbh_12_u:1680: 12,030.027c pratijagmatur anyonyaṃ kruddhāv iva gajottamau 12,030.028a parvataḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ vicacāra mahāmuniḥ 12,030.028c pūjyamāno yathānyāyaṃ tejasā svena bhārata 12,030.029a atha tām alabhat kanyāṃ nāradaḥ sṛñjayātmajām
GE07mbh_12_u:1682: 12,030.030a sā tu kanyā yathāśāpaṃ nāradaṃ taṃ dadarśa ha 12,030.030c pāṇigrahaṇamantrāṇāṃ prayogād eva vānaram
GE07mbh_12_u:1684: 12,030.031c naivāvamanyata tadā prītimaty eva cābhavat 12,030.032a upatasthe ca bhartāraṃ na cānyaṃ manasāpy agāt
GE07mbh_12_u:1685: 12,030.032c devaṃ muniṃ vā yakṣaṃ vā patitve pativatsalā
GE07mbh_12_u:1686: 12,030.033a tataḥ kadā cid bhagavān parvato 'nusasāra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:1687: 12,030.033c vanaṃ virahitaṃ kiṃ cit tatrāpaśyat sa nāradam
GE07mbh_12_u:1689: 12,030.034c bhavān prasādaṃ kurutāṃ svargādeśāya me prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:1690: 12,030.035a tam uvāca tato dṛṣṭvā parvataṃ nāradas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:1691: 12,030.035c kṛtāñjalim upāsīnaṃ dīnaṃ dīnataraḥ svayam 12,030.036a tvayāhaṃ prathamaṃ śapto vānaras tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:1692: 12,030.036c ity uktena mayā paścāc chaptas tvam api matsarāt 12,030.036e adyaprabhṛti vai vāsaṃ svarge nāvāpsyasīti ha
GE07mbh_12_u:1693: 12,030.037a tava naitad dhi sadṛśaṃ putrasthāne hi me bhavān 12,030.037c nivartayetāṃ tau śāpam anyo 'nyena tadā munī 12,030.038a śrīsamṛddhaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā nāradaṃ devarūpiṇam 12,030.038c sukumārī pradudrāva parapaty abhiśaṅkayā
GE07mbh_12_u:1694: 12,030.039a tāṃ parvatas tato dṛṣṭvā pradravantīm aninditām
GE07mbh_12_u:1695: 12,030.039c abravīt tava bhartaiṣa nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:1696: 12,030.040a ṛṣiḥ paramadharmātmā nārado bhagavān prabhuḥ 12,030.040c tavaivābhedyahṛdayo mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1698: 12,030.041c śāpadoṣaṃ ca taṃ bhartuḥ śrutvā svāṃ prakṛtiṃ gatā 12,030.041e parvato 'tha yayau svargaṃ nārado 'tha yayau gṛhān 12,030.042a pratyakṣakarmā sarvasya nārado 'yaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ 12,030.042c eṣa vakṣyati vai pṛṣṭo yathā vṛttaṃ narottama
GE07mbh_12_u:1699: 12,031.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,031.001a tato rājā pāṇḍusuto nāradaṃ pratyabhāṣata 12,031.001c bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi suvarṇaṣṭhīvisaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:1700: 12,031.002a evam uktaḥ sa ca munir dharmarājena nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1701: 12,031.002c ācacakṣe yathā vṛttaṃ suvarṇaṣṭhīvinaṃ prati 12,031.003a evam etan mahārāja yathāyaṃ keśavo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:1702: 12,031.003c kāryasyāsya tu yac cheṣaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi pṛcchataḥ 12,031.004a ahaṃ ca parvataś caiva svasrīyo me mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1703: 12,031.004c vastukāmāv abhigatau sṛñjayaṃ jayatāṃ varam 12,031.005a tatra saṃpūjitau tena vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā 12,031.005c sarvakāmaiḥ suvihitau nivasāvo 'sya veśmani
GE07mbh_12_u:1704: 12,031.006a vyatikrāntāsu varṣāsu samaye gamanasya ca 12,031.006c parvato mām uvācedaṃ kāle vacanam arthavat
GE07mbh_12_u:1705: 12,031.007a āvām asya narendrasya gṛhe paramapūjitau 12,031.007c uṣitau samaye brahmaṃś cintyatām atra sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_12_u:1707: 12,031.008c sarvam etat tvayi vibho bhāgineyopapadyate 12,031.009a vareṇa chandyatāṃ rājā labhatāṃ yad yad icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:1708: 12,031.009c āvayos tapasā siddhiṃ prāpnotu yadi manyase
GE07mbh_12_u:1709: 12,031.010a tata āhūya rājānaṃ sṛñjayaṃ śubhadarśanam 12,031.010c parvato 'numataṃ vākyam uvāca munipuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1710: 12,031.011a prītau svo nṛpa satkārais tava hy ārjavasaṃbhṛtaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1711: 12,031.011c āvābhyām abhyanujñāto varaṃ nṛvara cintaya 12,031.012a devānām avihiṃsāyāṃ yad bhaven mānuṣakṣamam 12,031.012c tad gṛhāṇa mahārāja pūjārho nau mato bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:1712: 12,031.013 sṛñjaya uvāca 12,031.013a prītau bhavantau yadi me kṛtam etāvatā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:1713: 12,031.013c eṣa eva paro lābho nirvṛtto me mahāphalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1714: 12,031.014 nārada uvāca 12,031.014a tam evaṃvādinaṃ bhūyaḥ parvataḥ pratyabhāṣata 12,031.014c vṛṇīṣva rājan saṃkalpo yas te hṛdi ciraṃ sthitaḥ 12,031.015 sṛñjaya uvāca 12,031.015a abhīpsāmi sutaṃ vīraṃ vīryavantaṃ dṛḍhavratam 12,031.015c āyuṣmantaṃ mahābhāgaṃ devarājasamadyutim
GE07mbh_12_u:1715: 12,031.016 parvata uvāca 12,031.016a bhaviṣyaty eṣa te kāmo na tv āyuṣmān bhaviṣyati 12,031.016c devarājābhibhūtyarthaṃ saṃkalpo hy eṣa te hṛdi
GE07mbh_12_u:1717: 12,031.017c rakṣyaś ca devarājāt sa devarājasamadyutiḥ 12,031.018 nārada uvāca 12,031.018a tac chrutvā sṛñjayo vākyaṃ parvatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1718: 12,031.018c prasādayām āsa tadā naitad evaṃ bhaved iti
GE07mbh_12_u:1719: 12,031.019a āyuṣmān me bhavet putro bhavatas tapasā mune
GE07mbh_12_u:1720: 12,031.019c na ca taṃ parvataḥ kiṃ cid uvācendravyapekṣayā
GE07mbh_12_u:1721: 12,031.020a tam ahaṃ nṛpatiṃ dīnam abruvaṃ punar eva tu 12,031.020c smartavyo 'haṃ mahārāja darśayiṣyāmi te smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1722: 12,031.021a ahaṃ te dayitaṃ putraṃ pretarājavaśaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:1723: 12,031.021c punar dāsyāmi tad rūpaṃ mā śucaḥ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:1724: 12,031.022a evam uktvā tu nṛpatiṃ prayātau svo yathepsitam
GE07mbh_12_u:1725: 12,031.022c sṛñjayaś ca yathākāmaṃ praviveśa svamandiram 12,031.023a sṛñjayasyātha rājarṣeḥ kasmiṃś cit kālaparyaye 12,031.023c jajñe putro mahāvīryas tejasā prajvalann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:1726: 12,031.024a vavṛdhe sa yathākālaṃ sarasīva mahotpalam 12,031.024c babhūva kāñcanaṣṭhīvī yathārthaṃ nāma tasya tat
GE07mbh_12_u:1727: 12,031.025a tad adbhutatamaṃ loke paprathe kurusattama 12,031.025c bubudhe tac ca devendro varadānaṃ mahātmanoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1728: 12,031.026a tatas tv abhibhavād bhīto bṛhaspatimate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1730: 12,031.027a codayām āsa vajraṃ sa divyāstraṃ mūrtisaṃsthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:1731: 12,031.027c vyāghro bhūtvā jahīmaṃ tvaṃ rājaputram iti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:1733: 12,031.028c sṛñjayasya suto vajra yathainaṃ parvato dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:1734: 12,031.029a evam uktas tu śakreṇa vajraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1738: 12,031.031a tato bhāgīrathītīre kadā cid vananirjhare 12,031.031c dhātrīdvitīyo bālaḥ sa krīḍārthaṃ paryadhāvata 12,031.032a pañcavarṣakadeśīyo bālo nāgendravikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1740: 12,031.033a tena caiva viniṣpiṣṭo vepamāno nṛpātmajaḥ 12,031.033c vyasuḥ papāta medinyāṃ tato dhātrī vicukruśe
GE07mbh_12_u:1741: 12,031.034a hatvā tu rājaputraṃ sa tatraivāntaradhīyata 12,031.034c śārdūlo devarājasya māyayāntarhitas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:1742: 12,031.035a dhātryās tu ninadaṃ śrutvā rudatyāḥ paramārtavat
GE07mbh_12_u:1743: 12,031.035c abhyadhāvata taṃ deśaṃ svayam eva mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1744: 12,031.036a sa dadarśa gatāsuṃ taṃ śayānaṃ pītaśoṇitam
GE07mbh_12_u:1745: 12,031.036c kumāraṃ vigatānandaṃ niśākaram iva cyutam 12,031.037a sa tam utsaṅgam āropya paripīḍitavakṣasam 12,031.037c putraṃ rudhirasaṃsiktaṃ paryadevayad āturaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1746: 12,031.038a tatas tā mātaras tasya rudantyaḥ śokakarśitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1747: 12,031.038c abhyadhāvanta taṃ deśaṃ yatra rājā sa sṛñjayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1748: 12,031.039a tataḥ sa rājā sasmāra mām antargatamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1749: 12,031.039c tac cāhaṃ cintitaṃ jñātvā gatavāṃs tasya darśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:1750: 12,031.040a sa mayaitāni vākyāni śrāvitaḥ śokalālasaḥ 12,031.040c yāni te yaduvīreṇa kathitāni mahīpate 12,031.041a saṃjīvitaś cāpi mayā vāsavānumate tadā 12,031.041c bhavitavyaṃ tathā tac ca na tac chakyam ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:1751: 12,031.042a ata ūrdhvaṃ kumāraḥ sa svarṇaṣṭhīvī mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1752: 12,031.042c cittaṃ prasādayām āsa pitur mātuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:1753: 12,031.043a kārayām āsa rājyaṃ sa pitari svargate vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1755: 12,031.044a tata iṣṭvā mahāyajñair bahubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ 12,031.044c tarpayām āsa devāṃś ca pitṝṃś caiva mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1756: 12,031.045a utpādya ca bahūn putrān kulasaṃtānakāriṇaḥ 12,031.045c kālena mahatā rājan kāladharmam upeyivān 12,031.046a sa tvaṃ rājendra saṃjātaṃ śokam etan nivartaya
GE07mbh_12_u:1757: 12,031.046c yathā tvāṃ keśavaḥ prāha vyāsaś ca sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1758: 12,031.047a pitṛpaitāmahaṃ rājyam āsthāya duram udvaha 12,031.047c iṣṭvā puṇyair mahāyajñair iṣṭāṃl lokān avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:1759: 12,032.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,032.001a tūṣṇīṃbhūtaṃ tu rājānaṃ śocamānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram 12,032.001c tapasvī dharmatattvajñaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:1760: 12,032.002a prajānāṃ pālanaṃ dharmo rājñāṃ rājīvalocana 12,032.002c dharmaḥ pramāṇaṃ lokasya nityaṃ dharmānuvartanam 12,032.003a anutiṣṭhasva vai rājan pitṛpaitāmahaṃ padam 12,032.003c brāhmaṇeṣu ca yo dharmaḥ sa nityo vedaniścitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1761: 12,032.004a tat pramāṇaṃ pramāṇānāṃ śāśvataṃ bharatarṣabha 12,032.004c tasya dharmasya kṛtsnasya kṣatriyaḥ parirakṣitā 12,032.005a tathā yaḥ pratihanty asya śāsanaṃ viṣaye naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1763: 12,032.006a pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ yaḥ kuryān mohavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1764: 12,032.006c bhṛtyo vā yadi vā putras tapasvī vāpi kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:1765: 12,032.006e pāpān sarvair upāyais tān niyacched ghātayeta vā
GE07mbh_12_u:1767: 12,032.007c dharmaṃ vinaśyamānaṃ hi yo na rakṣet sa dharmahā 12,032.008a te tvayā dharmahantāro nihatāḥ sapadānugāḥ 12,032.008c svadharme vartamānas tvaṃ kiṃ nu śocasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:1768: 12,032.008e rājā hi hanyād dadyāc ca prajā rakṣec ca dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1769: 12,032.009 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,032.009a na te 'bhiśaṅke vacanaṃ yad bravīṣi tapodhana
GE07mbh_12_u:1770: 12,032.009c aparokṣo hi te dharmaḥ sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:1771: 12,032.010a mayā hy avadhyā bahavo ghātitā rājyakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:1772: 12,032.010c tāny akāryāṇi me brahman dahanti ca tapanti ca 12,032.011 vyāsa uvāca 12,032.011a īśvaro vā bhavet kartā puruṣo vāpi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:1773: 12,032.011c haṭho vā vartate loke karmajaṃ vā phalaṃ smṛtam 12,032.012a īśvareṇa niyuktā hi sādhv asādhu ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:1774: 12,032.012c kurvanti puruṣāḥ karma phalam īśvaragāmi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:1775: 12,032.013a yathā hi puruṣaś chindyād vṛkṣaṃ paraśunā vane
GE07mbh_12_u:1776: 12,032.013c chettur eva bhavet pāpaṃ paraśor na kathaṃ cana 12,032.014a atha vā tad upādānāt prāpnuyuḥ karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:1777: 12,032.014c daṇḍaśastrakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ puruṣe tan na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:1778: 12,032.015a na caitad iṣṭaṃ kaunteya yad anyena phalaṃ kṛtam 12,032.015c prāpnuyād iti tasmāc ca īśvare tan niveśaya
GE07mbh_12_u:1779: 12,032.016a atha vā puruṣaḥ kartā karmaṇoḥ śubhapāpayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1780: 12,032.016c na paraṃ vidyate tasmād evam anyac chubhaṃ kuru 12,032.017a na hi kaś cit kva cid rājan diṣṭāt pratinivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:1781: 12,032.017c daṇḍaśastrakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ puruṣe tan na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:1782: 12,032.018a yadi vā manyase rājan haṭhe lokaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:1783: 12,032.018c evam apy aśubhaṃ karma na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati 12,032.019a athābhipattir lokasya kartavyā śubhapāpayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1785: 12,032.020a athāpi loke karmāṇi samāvartanta bhārata 12,032.020c śubhāśubhaphalaṃ ceme prāpnuvantīti me matiḥ 12,032.021a evaṃ satyaṃ śubhādeśaṃ karmaṇas tat phalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:1786: 12,032.021c tyaja tad rājaśārdūla maivaṃ śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1788: 12,032.022c evam ātmaparityāgas tava rājan na śobhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1790: 12,032.023c śarīravāṃs tāni kuryād aśarīraḥ parābhavet 12,032.024a tad rājañ jīvamānas tvaṃ prāyaścittaṃ cariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:1791: 12,032.024c prāyaścittam akṛtvā tu pretya taptāsi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:1792: 12,033.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,033.001a hatāḥ putrāś ca pautrāś ca bhrātaraḥ pitaras tathā 12,033.001c śvaśurā guravaś caiva mātulāḥ sapitāmahāḥ 12,033.002a kṣatriyāś ca mahātmānaḥ saṃbandhisuhṛdas tathā 12,033.002c vayasyā jñātayaś caiva bhrātaraś ca pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:1795: 12,033.004a tāṃs tādṛśān ahaṃ hatvā dharmanityān mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1796: 12,033.004c asakṛt somapān vīrān kiṃ prāpsyāmi tapodhana
GE07mbh_12_u:1797: 12,033.005a dahyāmy aniśam adyāhaṃ cintayānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1798: 12,033.005c hīnāṃ pārthivasiṃhais taiḥ śrīmadbhiḥ pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:1799: 12,033.006a dṛṣṭvā jñātivadhaṃ ghoraṃ hatāṃś ca śataśaḥ parān
GE07mbh_12_u:1800: 12,033.006c koṭiśaś ca narān anyān paritapye pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:1801: 12,033.007a kā nu tāsāṃ varastrīṇām avasthādya bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:1802: 12,033.007c vihīnānāṃ svatanayaiḥ patibhir bhrātṛbhis tathā 12,033.008a asmān antakarān ghorān pāṇḍavān vṛṣṇisaṃhitān 12,033.008c ākrośantyaḥ kṛśā dīnā nipatantyaś ca bhūtale
GE07mbh_12_u:1803: 12,033.009a apaśyantyaḥ pitṝn bhrātṝn patīn putrāṃś ca yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1804: 12,033.009c tyaktvā prāṇān priyān sarvā gamiṣyanti yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_12_u:1805: 12,033.010a vatsalatvād dvijaśreṣṭha tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1806: 12,033.010c vyaktaṃ saukṣmyāc ca dharmasya prāpsyāmaḥ strīvadhaṃ vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:1807: 12,033.011a te vayaṃ suhṛdo hatvā kṛtvā pāpam anantakam
GE07mbh_12_u:1808: 12,033.011c narake nipatiṣyāmo hy adhaḥśirasa eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:1810: 12,033.012c āśramāṃś ca viśeṣāṃs tvaṃ mamācakṣva pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:1811: 12,034.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,034.001a yudhiṣṭhirasya tad vākyaṃ śrutvā dvaipāyanas
GE07mbh_12_u:1812: 12,034.001c samīkṣya nipuṇaṃ buddhyā ṛṣiḥ provāca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_12_u:1813: 12,034.002a mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā rājan kṣatradharmam anusmara
GE07mbh_12_u:1814: 12,034.002c svadharmeṇa hatā hy ete kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:1815: 12,034.003a kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ śriyaṃ kṛtsnāṃ pṛthivyāṃ ca mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1817: 12,034.004a na tvaṃ hantā na bhīmo 'pi nārjuno na yamāv api
GE07mbh_12_u:1818: 12,034.004c kālaḥ paryāyadharmeṇa prāṇān ādatta dehinām 12,034.005a na yasya mātāpitarau nānugrāhyo 'sti kaś cana 12,034.005c karmasākṣī prajānāṃ yas tena kālena saṃhṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1819: 12,034.006a hetumātram idaṃ tasya kālasya puruṣarṣabha 12,034.006c yad dhanti bhūtair bhūtāni tad asmai rūpam aiśvaram 12,034.007a karmamūrtyātmakaṃ viddhi sākṣiṇaṃ śubhapāpayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1821: 12,034.008a teṣām api mahābāho karmāṇi paricintaya 12,034.008c vināśahetukāritve yais te kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ 12,034.009a ātmanaś ca vijānīhi niyamavrataśīlatām
GE07mbh_12_u:1822: 12,034.009c yadā tvam īdṛśaṃ karma vidhinākramya kāritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1823: 12,034.010a tvaṣṭreva vihitaṃ yantraṃ yathā sthāpayitur vaśe
GE07mbh_12_u:1824: 12,034.010c karmaṇā kālayuktena tathedaṃ bhrāmyate jagat 12,034.011a puruṣasya hi dṛṣṭvemām utpattim animittataḥ 12,034.011c yadṛcchayā vināśaṃ ca śokaharṣāv anarthakau 12,034.012a vyalīkaṃ cāpi yat tv atra cittavaitaṃsikaṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:1825: 12,034.012c tadartham iṣyate rājan prāyaścittaṃ tad ācara
GE07mbh_12_u:1826: 12,034.013a idaṃ ca śrūyate pārtha yuddhe devāsure purā
GE07mbh_12_u:1827: 12,034.013c asurā bhrātaro jyeṣṭhā devāś cāpi yavīyasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1828: 12,034.014a teṣām api śrīnimittaṃ mahān āsīt samucchrayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1829: 12,034.014c yuddhaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi dvātriṃśad abhavat kila 12,034.015a ekārṇavāṃ mahīṃ kṛtvā rudhireṇa pariplutām 12,034.015c jaghnur daityāṃs tadā devās tridivaṃ caiva lebhire
GE07mbh_12_u:1830: 12,034.016a tathaiva pṛthivīṃ labdhvā brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ 12,034.016c saṃśritā dānavānāṃ vai sāhyārthe darpamohitāḥ 12,034.017a śālāvṛkā iti khyātās triṣu lokeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:1831: 12,034.017c aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi te cāpi vibudhair hatāḥ 12,034.018a dharmavyucchittim icchanto ye 'dharmasya pravartakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1832: 12,034.018c hantavyās te durātmāno devair daityā ivolbaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1833: 12,034.019a ekaṃ hatvā yadi kule śiṣṭānāṃ syād anāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:1834: 12,034.019c kulaṃ hatvātha rāṣṭraṃ vā na tad vṛttopaghātakam
GE07mbh_12_u:1835: 12,034.020a adharmarūpo dharmo hi kaś cid asti narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:1836: 12,034.020c dharmaś cādharmarūpo 'sti tac ca jñeyaṃ vipaścitā
GE07mbh_12_u:1837: 12,034.021a tasmāt saṃstambhayātmānaṃ śrutavān asi pāṇḍava 12,034.021c devaiḥ pūrvagataṃ mārgam anuyāto 'si bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:1838: 12,034.022a na hīdṛśā gamiṣyanti narakaṃ pāṇḍavarṣabha 12,034.022c bhrātṝn āśvāsayaitāṃs tvaṃ suhṛdaś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:1839: 12,034.023a yo hi pāpasamārambhe kārye tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ 12,034.023c kurvann api tathaiva syāt kṛtvā ca nirapatrapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1840: 12,034.024a tasmiṃs tat kaluṣaṃ sarvaṃ samāptam iti śabditam
GE07mbh_12_u:1841: 12,034.024c prāyaścittaṃ na tasyāsti hrāso vā pāpakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1842: 12,034.025a tvaṃ tu śuklābhijātīyaḥ paradoṣeṇa kāritaḥ 12,034.025c anicchamānaḥ karmedaṃ kṛtvā ca paritapyase 12,034.026a aśvamedho mahāyajñaḥ prāyaścittam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:1843: 12,034.026c tam āhara mahārāja vipāpmaivaṃ bhaviṣyasi 12,034.027a marudbhiḥ saha jitvārīn maghavān pākaśāsanaḥ 12,034.027c ekaikaṃ kratum āhṛtya śatakṛtvaḥ śatakratuḥ 12,034.028a pūtapāpmā jitasvargo lokān prāpya sukhodayān 12,034.028c marudgaṇavṛtaḥ śakraḥ śuśubhe bhāsayan diśaḥ 12,034.029a svargaloke mahīyantam apsarobhiḥ śacīpatim
GE07mbh_12_u:1844: 12,034.029c ṛṣayaḥ paryupāsante devāś ca vibudheśvaram 12,034.030a so 'yaṃ tvam iha saṃkrānto vikrameṇa vasuṃdharām 12,034.030c nirjitāś ca mahīpālā vikrameṇa tvayānagha 12,034.031a teṣāṃ purāṇi rāṣṭrāṇi gatvā rājan suhṛdvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1845: 12,034.031c bhrātṝn putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca sve sve rājye 'bhiṣecaya
GE07mbh_12_u:1846: 12,034.032a bālān api ca garbhasthān sāntvāni samudācaran
GE07mbh_12_u:1847: 12,034.032c rañjayan prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ paripāhi vasuṃdharām 12,034.033a kumāro nāsti yeṣāṃ ca kanyās tatrābhiṣecaya
GE07mbh_12_u:1848: 12,034.033c kāmāśayo hi strīvargaḥ śokam evaṃ prahāsyati
GE07mbh_12_u:1849: 12,034.034a evam āśvāsanaṃ kṛtvā sarvarāṣṭreṣu bhārata 12,034.034c yajasva vājimedhena yathendro vijayī purā 12,034.035a aśocyās te mahātmānaḥ kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabha 12,034.035c svakarmabhir gatā nāśaṃ kṛtāntabalamohitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1850: 12,034.036a avāptaḥ kṣatradharmas te rājyaṃ prāptam akalmaṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:1851: 12,034.036c carasva dharmaṃ kaunteya śreyān yaḥ pretya bhāvikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1852: 12,035.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,035.001a kāni kṛtveha karmāṇi prāyaścittīyate naraḥ 12,035.001c kiṃ kṛtvā caiva mucyeta tan me brūhi pitāmaha 12,035.002 vyāsa uvāca 12,035.002a akurvan vihitaṃ karma pratiṣiddhāni cācaran 12,035.002c prāyaścittīyate hy evaṃ naro mithyā ca vartayan
GE07mbh_12_u:1853: 12,035.003a sūryeṇābhyudito yaś ca brahmacārī bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:1854: 12,035.003c tathā sūryābhinirmuktaḥ kunakhī śyāvadann api 12,035.004a parivittiḥ parivettā brahmojjho yaś ca kutsakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1855: 12,035.004c didhiṣūpatis tathā yaḥ syād agredidhiṣur eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:1856: 12,035.005a avakīrṇī bhaved yaś ca dvijātivadhakas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:1857: 12,035.005c atīrthe brahmaṇas tyāgī tīrthe cāpratipādakaḥ 12,035.006a grāmayājī ca kaunteya rājñaś ca parivikrayī
GE07mbh_12_u:1858: 12,035.006c śūdrastrīvadhako yaś ca pūrvaḥ pūrvas tu garhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1860: 12,035.007c anṛtenopacartā ca pratiroddhā guros tathā 12,035.008a yaś cāgnīn apavidhyeta tathaiva brahmavikrayī 12,035.008c etāny enāṃsi sarvāṇi vyutkrāntasamayaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1861: 12,035.009a akāryāṇy api vakṣyāmi yāni tāni nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:1863: 12,035.010a svadharmasya parityāgaḥ paradharmasya ca kriyā 12,035.010c ayājyayājanaṃ caiva tathābhakṣyasya bhakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:1865: 12,035.011c rasānāṃ vikrayaś cāpi tiryagyonivadhas tathā 12,035.012a ādhānādīni karmāṇi śaktimān na karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1866: 12,035.012c aprayacchaṃś ca sarvāṇi nityaṃ deyāni bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:1868: 12,035.013c sarvāṇy etāny akāryāṇi prāhur dharmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1869: 12,035.014a pitrā vibhajate putro yaś ca syād gurutalpagaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1870: 12,035.014c aprajāyann adharmeṇa bhavaty ādharmiko janaḥ 12,035.015a uktāny etāni karmāṇi vistareṇetareṇa ca 12,035.015c yāni kurvann akurvaṃś ca prāyaścittīyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:1871: 12,035.016a etāny eva tu karmāṇi kriyamāṇāni mānavān
GE07mbh_12_u:1872: 12,035.016c yeṣu yeṣu nimitteṣu na limpanty atha tac chṛṇu 12,035.017a pragṛhya śastram āyāntam api vedāntagaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:1873: 12,035.017c jighāṃsantaṃ nihatyājau na tena brahmahā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:1874: 12,035.018a api cāpy atra kaunteya mantro vedeṣu paṭhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:1875: 12,035.018c vedapramāṇavihitaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ prabravīmi te 12,035.019a apetaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vṛttād yo hanyād ātatāyinam
GE07mbh_12_u:1876: 12,035.019c na tena brahmahā sa syān manyus taṃ manyum ṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:1877: 12,035.020a prāṇātyaye tathājñānād ācaran madirām api 12,035.020c acodito dharmaparaḥ punaḥ saṃskāram arhati 12,035.021a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kaunteyābhakṣyabhakṣaṇam 12,035.021c prāyaścittavidhānena sarvam etena śudhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:1878: 12,035.022a gurutalpaṃ hi gurvarthe na dūṣayati mānavam
GE07mbh_12_u:1879: 12,035.022c uddālakaḥ śvetaketuṃ janayām āsa śiṣyataḥ 12,035.023a steyaṃ kurvaṃs tu gurvartham āpatsu na nibadhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:1880: 12,035.023c bahuśaḥ kāmakāreṇa na ced yaḥ saṃpravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:1881: 12,035.024a anyatra brāhmaṇasvebhya ādadāno na duṣyati 12,035.024c svayam aprāśitā yaś ca na sa pāpena lipyate 12,035.025a prāṇatrāṇe 'nṛtaṃ vācyam ātmano vā parasya vā 12,035.025c gurvarthe strīṣu caiva syād vivāhakaraṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:1882: 12,035.026a nāvartate vrataṃ svapne śukramokṣe kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:1883: 12,035.026c ājyahomaḥ samiddhe 'gnau prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate 12,035.027a pārivittyaṃ ca patite nāsti pravrajite tathā

GE07mbh_12_u:2726: 12,050.007a upāsyamānaṃ munibhir devair iva śatakratum 12,050.007c deśe paramadharmiṣṭhe nadīmoghavatīm anu
GE07mbh_12_u:2727: 12,050.008a dūrād eva tam ālokya kṛṣṇo rājā ca dharmarāṭ 12,050.008c catvāraḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva te ca śāradvatādayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2728: 12,050.009a avaskandyātha vāhebhyaḥ saṃyamya pracalaṃ manaḥ 12,050.009c ekīkṛtyendriyagrāmam upatasthur mahāmunīn
GE07mbh_12_u:2729: 12,050.010a abhivādya ca govindaḥ sātyakis te ca kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2730: 12,050.010c vyāsādīṃs tān ṛṣīn paścād gāṅgeyam upatasthire
GE07mbh_12_u:2731: 12,050.011a tapovṛddhiṃ tataḥ pṛṣṭvā gāṅgeyaṃ yadukauravāḥ 12,050.011c parivārya tataḥ sarve niṣeduḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ 12,050.012a tato niśamya gāṅgeyaṃ śāmyamānam ivānalam 12,050.012c kiṃ cid dīnamanā bhīṣmam iti hovāca keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2732: 12,050.013a kaccij jñānāni te rājan prasannāni yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:2733: 12,050.013c kaccid avyākulā caiva buddhis te vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:2734: 12,050.014a śarābhighātaduḥkhāt te kaccid gātraṃ na dūyate
GE07mbh_12_u:2735: 12,050.014c mānasād api duḥkhād dhi śārīraṃ balavattaram
GE07mbh_12_u:2736: 12,050.015a varadānāt pituḥ kāmaṃ chandamṛtyur asi prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:2737: 12,050.015c śaṃtanor dharmaśīlasya na tv etac chamakāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:2738: 12,050.016a susūkṣmo 'pīha dehe vai śalyo janayate rujam 12,050.016c kiṃ punaḥ śarasaṃghātaiś citasya tava bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:2739: 12,050.017a kāmaṃ naitat tavākhyeyaṃ prāṇināṃ prabhavāpyayau 12,050.017c bhavān hy upadiśec chreyo devānām api bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:2740: 12,050.018a yad dhi bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca bhavac ca puruṣarṣabha 12,050.018c sarvaṃ taj jñānavṛddhasya tava pāṇāv ivāhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:2741: 12,050.019a saṃsāraś caiva bhūtānāṃ dharmasya ca phalodayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2742: 12,050.019c viditas te mahāprājña tvaṃ hi brahmamayo nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2743: 12,050.020a tvāṃ hi rājye sthitaṃ sphīte samagrāṅgam arogiṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:2745: 12,050.021a ṛte śāṃtanavād bhīṣmāt triṣu lokeṣu pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:2748: 12,050.022c nisargaprabhavaṃ kiṃ cin na ca tātānuśuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:2749: 12,050.023a satye tapasi dāne ca yajñādhikaraṇe tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:2750: 12,050.023c dhanurvede ca vede ca nityaṃ caivānvavekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:2751: 12,050.024a anṛśaṃsaṃ śuciṃ dāntaṃ sarvabhūtahite ratam 12,050.024c mahārathaṃ tvatsadṛśaṃ na kaṃ cid anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:2752: 12,050.025a tvaṃ hi devān sagandharvān sasurāsurarākṣasān 12,050.025c śakta ekarathenaiva vijetuṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ 12,050.026a tvaṃ hi bhīṣma mahābāho vasūnāṃ vāsavopamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2754: 12,050.027a ahaṃ hi tvābhijānāmi yas tvaṃ puruṣasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:2755: 12,050.027c tridaśeṣv api vikhyātaḥ svaśaktyā sumahābalaḥ 12,050.028a manuṣyeṣu manuṣyendra na dṛṣṭo na ca me śrutaḥ 12,050.028c bhavato yo guṇais tulyaḥ pṛthivyāṃ puruṣaḥ kva cit 12,050.029a tvaṃ hi sarvair guṇai rājan devān apy atiricyase 12,050.029c tapasā hi bhavāñ śaktaḥ sraṣṭuṃ lokāṃś carācarān
GE07mbh_12_u:2756: 12,050.029d*0116_01 kiṃ punaś cātmano lokān uttamān uttamair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2757: 12,050.030a tad asya tapyamānasya jñātīnāṃ saṃkṣayeṇa vai
GE07mbh_12_u:2758: 12,050.030c jyeṣṭhasya pāṇḍuputrasya śokaṃ bhīṣma vyapānuda 12,050.031a ye hi dharmāḥ samākhyātāś cāturvarṇyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:2759: 12,050.031c cāturāśramyasaṃsṛṣṭās te sarve viditās tava 12,050.032a cāturvedye ca ye proktāś cāturhotre ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:2760: 12,050.032c sāṃkhye yoge ca niyatā ye ca dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ 12,050.033a cāturvarṇyena yaś caiko dharmo na sma virudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:2761: 12,050.033c sevyamānaḥ sa caivādyo gāṅgeya viditas tava
GE07mbh_12_u:2762: 12,050.033d*0117_01 pratilomaprasūtānāṃ mlecchānāṃ caiva yaḥ smṛtaḥ 12,050.033d*0117_02 deśajātikulānāṃ ca jānīṣe dharmalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:2763: 12,050.033d*0117_03 vedokto yaś ca śiṣṭoktaḥ sa caiva viditas tava 12,050.033d*0118_01 pravṛttaś ca nivṛttaś ca sa cāpi viditas tava 12,050.034a itihāsapurāṇaṃ ca kārtsnyena viditaṃ tava 12,050.034c dharmaśāstraṃ ca sakalaṃ nityaṃ manasi te sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:2764: 12,050.035a ye ca ke cana loke 'sminn arthāḥ saṃśayakārakāḥ 12,050.035c teṣāṃ chettā nāsti loke tvad anyaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:2765: 12,050.036a sa pāṇḍaveyasya manaḥsamutthitaṃ; narendra śokaṃ vyapakarṣa
GE07mbh_12_u:2767: 12,050.036c bhavadvidhā hy uttamabuddhivistarā; vimuhyamānasya janasya śāntaye
GE07mbh_12_u:2768: 12,051.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,051.001a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ bhīṣmo vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2769: 12,051.001c kiṃ cid unnāmya vadanaṃ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:2770: 12,051.002a namas te bhagavan viṣṇo lokānāṃ nidhanodbhava
GE07mbh_12_u:2771: 12,051.002c tvaṃ hi kartā hṛṣīkeśa saṃhartā cāparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2772: 12,051.003a viśvakarman namas te 'stu viśvātman viśvasaṃbhava 12,051.003c apavargo 'si bhūtānāṃ pañcānāṃ parataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2773: 12,051.004a namas te triṣu lokeṣu namas te paratas triṣu 12,051.004c yogeśvara namas te 'stu tvaṃ hi sarvaparāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:2774: 12,051.005a matsaṃśritaṃ yad āttha tvaṃ vacaḥ puruṣasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:2775: 12,051.005c tena paśyāmi te divyān bhāvān hi triṣu vartmasu 12,051.006a tac ca paśyāmi tattvena yat te rūpaṃ sanātanam 12,051.006c sapta mārgā niruddhās te vāyor amitatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2776: 12,051.007a divaṃ te śirasā vyāptaṃ padbhyāṃ devī vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_12_u:2777: 12,051.007c diśo bhujau raviś cakṣur vīrye śakraḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2779: 12,051.008c vapur hy anumimīmas te meghasyeva savidyutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2780: 12,051.009a tvatprapannāya bhaktāya gatim iṣṭāṃ jigīṣave 12,051.009c yac chreyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣa tad dhyāyasva surottama
GE07mbh_12_u:2781: 12,051.010 vāsudeva uvāca 12,051.010a yataḥ khalu parā bhaktir mayi te puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:2782: 12,051.010c tato vapur mayā divyaṃ tava rājan pradarśitam
GE07mbh_12_u:2783: 12,051.011a na hy abhaktāya rājendra bhaktāyānṛjave na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:2784: 12,051.011c darśayāmy aham ātmānaṃ na cādāntāya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:2785: 12,051.012a bhavāṃs tu mama bhaktaś ca nityaṃ cārjavam āsthitaḥ 12,051.012c dame tapasi satye ca dāne ca nirataḥ śuciḥ 12,051.013a arhas tvaṃ bhīṣma māṃ draṣṭuṃ tapasā svena pārthiva 12,051.013c tava hy upasthitā lokā yebhyo nāvartate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2786: 12,051.014a pañcāśataṃ ṣaṭ ca kurupravīra; śeṣaṃ dinānāṃ tava jīvitasya
GE07mbh_12_u:2787: 12,051.014c tataḥ śubhaiḥ karmaphalodayais tvaṃ; sameṣyase bhīṣma vimucya
GE07mbh_12_u:2789: 12,051.015a ete hi devā vasavo vimānāny; āsthāya sarve jvalitāgnikalpāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2790: 12,051.015c antarhitās tvāṃ pratipālayanti; kāṣṭhāṃ prapadyantam udak
GE07mbh_12_u:2792: 12,051.016a vyāvṛttamātre bhagavaty udīcīṃ; sūrye diśaṃ kālavaśāt prapanne
GE07mbh_12_u:2793: 12,051.016c gantāsi lokān puruṣapravīra; nāvartate yān upalabhya vidvān
GE07mbh_12_u:2794: 12,051.017a amuṃ ca lokaṃ tvayi bhīṣma yāte; jñānāni naṅkṣyanty akhilena
GE07mbh_12_u:2796: 12,051.017c ataḥ sma sarve tvayi saṃnikarṣaṃ; samāgatā dharmavivecanāya 12,051.018a tajjñātiśokopahataśrutāya; satyābhisaṃdhāya yudhiṣṭhirāya 12,051.018c prabrūhi dharmārthasamādhiyuktam; arthyaṃ vaco 'syāpanudāsya
GE07mbh_12_u:2798: 12,052.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,052.001a tataḥ kṛṣṇasya tad vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:2799: 12,052.001c śrutvā śāṃtanavo bhīṣmaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ 12,052.002a lokanātha mahābāho śiva nārāyaṇācyuta
GE07mbh_12_u:2800: 12,052.002c tava vākyam abhiśrutya harṣeṇāsmi pariplutaḥ 12,052.003a kiṃ cāham abhidhāsyāmi vākpate tava saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_12_u:2801: 12,052.003c yadā vācogataṃ sarvaṃ tava vāci samāhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:2802: 12,052.004a yad dhi kiṃ cit kṛtaṃ loke kartavyaṃ kriyate ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:2803: 12,052.004c tvattas tan niḥsṛtaṃ deva lokā buddhimayā hi te 12,052.005a kathayed devalokaṃ yo devarājasamīpataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2804: 12,052.005c dharmakāmārthaśāstrāṇāṃ so 'rthān brūyāt tavāgrataḥ 12,052.006a śarābhighātād vyathitaṃ mano me madhusūdana 12,052.006c gātrāṇi cāvasīdanti na ca buddhiḥ prasīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:2805: 12,052.007a na ca me pratibhā kā cid asti kiṃ cit prabhāṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:2807: 12,052.008a balaṃ medhāḥ prajarati prāṇāḥ saṃtvarayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:2808: 12,052.008c marmāṇi paritapyante bhrāntaṃ cetas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:2809: 12,052.009a daurbalyāt sajjate vāṅ me sa kathaṃ vaktum utsahe 12,052.009c sādhu me tvaṃ prasīdasva dāśārhakulanandana 12,052.010a tat kṣamasva mahābāho na brūyāṃ kiṃ cid acyuta 12,052.010c tvatsaṃnidhau ca sīdeta vācaspatir api bruvan
GE07mbh_12_u:2810: 12,052.011a na diśaḥ saṃprajānāmi nākāśaṃ na ca medinīm
GE07mbh_12_u:2811: 12,052.011c kevalaṃ tava vīryeṇa tiṣṭhāmi madhusūdana 12,052.012a svayam eva prabho tasmād dharmarājasya yad dhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:2812: 12,052.012c tad bravīhy āśu sarveṣām āgamānāṃ tvam āgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2813: 12,052.013a kathaṃ tvayi sthite loke śāśvate lokakartari
GE07mbh_12_u:2814: 12,052.013c prabrūyān madvidhaḥ kaś cid gurau śiṣya iva sthite 12,052.014 vāsudeva uvāca 12,052.014a upapannam idaṃ vākyaṃ kauravāṇāṃ dhuraṃdhare 12,052.014c mahāvīrye mahāsattve sthite sarvārthadarśini
GE07mbh_12_u:2815: 12,052.015a yac ca mām āttha gāṅgeya bāṇaghātarujaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:2816: 12,052.015c gṛhāṇātra varaṃ bhīṣma matprasādakṛtaṃ vibho 12,052.016a na te glānir na te mūrchā na dāho na ca te rujā
GE07mbh_12_u:2817: 12,052.016c prabhaviṣyanti gāṅgeya kṣutpipāse na cāpy uta
GE07mbh_12_u:2819: 12,052.017c na ca te kva cid āsaktir buddheḥ prādurbhaviṣyati 12,052.018a sattvasthaṃ ca mano nityaṃ tava bhīṣma bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:2820: 12,052.018c rajas tamobhyāṃ rahitaṃ ghanair mukta ivoḍurāṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:2821: 12,052.019a yad yac ca dharmasaṃyuktam arthayuktam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:2822: 12,052.019c cintayiṣyasi tatrāgryā buddhis tava bhaviṣyati 12,052.020a imaṃ ca rājaśārdūla bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidham 12,052.020c cakṣur divyaṃ samāśritya drakṣyasy amitavikrama 12,052.021a caturvidhaṃ prajājālaṃ saṃyukto jñānacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:2823: 12,052.021c bhīṣma drakṣyasi tattvena jale mīna ivāmale
GE07mbh_12_u:2824: 12,052.022 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,052.022a tatas te vyāsasahitāḥ sarva eva maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2826: 12,052.023a tataḥ sarvārtavaṃ divyaṃ puṣpavarṣaṃ nabhastalāt 12,052.023c papāta yatra vārṣṇeyaḥ sagāṅgeyaḥ sapāṇḍavaḥ 12,052.024a vāditrāṇi ca divyāni jaguś cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2827: 12,052.024c na cāhitam aniṣṭaṃ vā kiṃ cit tatra vyadṛśyata 12,052.025a vavau śivaḥ sukho vāyuḥ sarvagandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2828: 12,052.025c śāntāyāṃ diśi śāntāś ca prāvadan mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2829: 12,052.026a tato muhūrtād bhagavān sahasrāṃśur divākaraḥ 12,052.026c dahan vanam ivaikānte pratīcyāṃ pratyadṛśyata 12,052.027a tato maharṣayaḥ sarve samutthāya janārdanam 12,052.027c bhīṣmam āmantrayāṃ cakrū rājānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_12_u:2830: 12,052.028a tataḥ praṇāmam akarot keśavaḥ pāṇḍavas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:2831: 12,052.028c sātyakiḥ saṃjayaś caiva sa ca śāradvataḥ kṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2832: 12,052.029a tatas te dharmaniratāḥ samyak tair abhipūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2833: 12,052.029c śvaḥ sameṣyāma ity uktvā yatheṣṭaṃ tvaritā yayuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2834: 12,052.030a tathaivāmantrya gāṅgeyaṃ keśavas te ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2835: 12,052.030c pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya rathān āruruhuḥ śubhān 12,052.031a tato rathaiḥ kāñcanadantakūbarair; mahīdharābhaiḥ samadaiś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:2837: 12,052.031c hayaiḥ suparṇair iva cāśugāmibhiḥ; padātibhiś cāttaśarāsanādibhiḥ 12,052.032a yayau rathānāṃ purato hi sā camūs; tathaiva paścād atimātrasāriṇī
GE07mbh_12_u:2838: 12,052.032c puraś ca paścāc ca yathā mahānadī; purarkṣavantaṃ girim etya
GE07mbh_12_u:2840: 12,052.033a tataḥ purastād bhagavān niśākaraḥ; samutthitas tām abhiharṣayaṃś camūm 12,052.033c divākarāpītarasās tathauṣadhīḥ; punaḥ svakenaiva guṇena
GE07mbh_12_u:2842: 12,052.034a tataḥ puraṃ surapurasaṃnibhadyuti; praviśya te yaduvṛṣapāṇḍavās tadā 12,052.034c yathocitān bhavanavarān samāviśañ; śramānvitā mṛgapatayo guhā
GE07mbh_12_u:2844: 12,053.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,053.001a tataḥ praviśya bhavanaṃ prasupto madhusūdanaḥ 12,053.001c yāmamātrāvaśeṣāyāṃ yāminyāṃ pratyabudhyata
GE07mbh_12_u:2845: 12,053.002a sa dhyānapatham āśritya sarvajñānāni mādhavaḥ 12,053.002c avalokya tataḥ paścād dadhyau brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:2848: 12,053.004a paṭhanti pāṇisvanikās tathā gāyanti gāyanāḥ 12,053.004c śaṅkhānakamṛdaṅgāṃś ca pravādyanta sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2850: 12,053.005c prahāsa iva vistīrṇaḥ śuśruve tasya veśmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2853: 12,053.007a tata utthāya dāśārhaḥ snātaḥ prāñjalir acyutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2854: 12,053.007c japtvā guhyaṃ mahābāhur agnīn āśritya tasthivān
GE07mbh_12_u:2855: 12,053.008a tataḥ sahasraṃ viprāṇāṃ caturvedavidāṃ tathā 12,053.008c gavāṃ sahasreṇaikaikaṃ vācayām āsa mādhavaḥ 12,053.009a maṅgalālambhanaṃ kṛtvā ātmānam avalokya ca 12,053.009c ādarśe vimale kṛṣṇas tataḥ sātyakim abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:2856: 12,053.010a gaccha śaineya jānīhi gatvā rājaniveśanam 12,053.010c api sajjo mahātejā bhīṣmaṃ draṣṭuṃ yuthiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:2857: 12,053.011a tataḥ kṛṣṇasya vacanāt sātyakis tvarito yayau
GE07mbh_12_u:2858: 12,053.011c upagamya ca rājānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:2859: 12,053.012a yukto rathavaro rājan vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ 12,053.012c samīpam āpageyasya prayāsyati
GE07mbh_12_u:2860: 12,053.013a bhavatpratīkṣaḥ kṛṣṇo 'sau dharmarāja mahādyute 12,053.013c yad atrānantaraṃ kṛtyaṃ tad bhavān kartum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:2861: 12,053.013d*0119_01 evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ 12,053.014 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,053.014a yujyatāṃ me rathavaraḥ phalgunāpratimadyute
GE07mbh_12_u:2862: 12,053.014c na sainikaiś ca yātavyaṃ yāsyāmo vayam eva hi 12,053.015a na ca pīḍayitavyo me bhīṣmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
