GE07mbh_12_u:3004: 12,056.030a vinaśyamānaṃ dharmaṃ hi yo rakṣati sa dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:3005: 12,056.030c na tena bhrūṇahā sa syān manyus taṃ manum ṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:3006: 12,056.031a evaṃ caiva naraśreṣṭha rakṣyā eva dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3007: 12,056.031c svaparāddhān api hi tān viṣayānte samutsṛjet
GE07mbh_12_u:3008: 12,056.032a abhiśastam api hy eṣāṃ kṛpāyīta viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:3009: 12,056.032c brahmaghne gurutalpe ca bhrūṇahatye tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:3010: 12,056.033a rājadviṣṭe ca viprasya viṣayānte visarjanam 12,056.033b*0123_01 vapanaṃ draviṇādānaṃ svapuryāś ca visarjanam 12,056.033c vidhīyate na śārīraṃ bhayam eṣāṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:3011: 12,056.034a dayitāś ca narās te syur nityaṃ puruṣasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:3012: 12,056.034c na kośaḥ paramo hy anyo rājñāṃ puruṣasaṃcayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:3013: 12,056.035a durgeṣu ca mahārāja ṣaṭsu ye śāstraniścitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3014: 12,056.035c sarveṣu teṣu manyante naradurgaṃ sudustaram 12,056.036a tasmān nityaṃ dayā kāryā cāturvarṇye vipaścitā
GE07mbh_12_u:3015: 12,056.036c dharmātmā satyavāk caiva rājā rañjayati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3016: 12,056.037a na ca kṣāntena te bhāvyaṃ nityaṃ puruṣasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:3017: 12,056.037c adharmyo hi mṛdū rājā kṣamāvān iva kuñjaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3018: 12,056.038a bārhaspatye ca śāstre vai ślokā viniyatāḥ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:3019: 12,056.038c asminn arthe mahārāja tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:3020: 12,056.039a kṣamamāṇaṃ nṛpaṃ nityaṃ nīcaḥ paribhavej janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3022: 12,056.040a tasmān naiva mṛdur nityaṃ tīkṣṇo vāpi bhaven nṛpaḥ 12,056.040c vasante 'rka iva śrīmān na śīto na ca gharmadaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3023: 12,056.041a pratyakṣeṇānumānena tathaupamyopadeśataḥ 12,056.041c parīkṣyās te mahārāja sve pare caiva sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:3024: 12,056.042a vyasanāni ca sarvāṇi tyajethā bhūridakṣiṇa 12,056.042c na caiva na prayuñjīta saṅgaṃ tu parivarjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:3025: 12,056.043a nityaṃ hi vyasanī loke paribhūto bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:3026: 12,056.043c udvejayati lokaṃ cāpy atidveṣī mahīpatiḥ 12,056.044a bhavitavyaṃ sadā rājñā
GE07mbh_12_u:3027: 12,056.044c kāraṇaṃ ca mahārāja śṛṇu yenedam iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:3028: 12,056.045a yathā hi garbhiṇī hitvā svaṃ priyaṃ manaso 'nugam
GE07mbh_12_u:3029: 12,056.045c garbhasya hitam ādhatte tathā rājñāpy asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:3031: 12,056.046c svaṃ priyaṃ samabhityajya yad yal lokahitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:3032: 12,056.047a na saṃtyājyaṃ ca te dhairyaṃ kadā cid api pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:3033: 12,056.047c dhīrasya spaṣṭadaṇḍasya na hy ājñā pratihanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:3034: 12,056.048a parihāsaś ca bhṛtyais te na nityaṃ vadatāṃ vara 12,056.048c kartavyo rājaśārdūla doṣam atra hi me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:3036: 12,056.049c sve sthāne na ca tiṣṭhanti laṅghayanti hi tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3037: 12,056.050a preṣyamāṇā vikalpante guhyaṃ cāpy anuyuñjate 12,056.050c ayācyaṃ caiva yācante 'bhojyāny āhārayanti ca 12,056.051a krudhyanti paridīpyanti bhūmim adhyāsate 'sya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:3038: 12,056.051c utkocair vañcanābhiś ca kāryāṇy anuvihanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:3039: 12,056.052a jarjaraṃ cāsya viṣayaṃ kurvanti pratirūpakaiḥ 12,056.052c strīr akṣibhiś ca sajjante tulyaveṣā bhavanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:3040: 12,056.053a vātaṃ ca ṣṭhīvanaṃ caiva kurvate cāsya saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_12_u:3041: 12,056.053c nirlajjā naraśārdūla vyāharanti ca tadvacaḥ 12,056.054a hayaṃ vā dantinaṃ vāpi rathaṃ nṛpatisaṃmatam
GE07mbh_12_u:3042: 12,056.054c adhirohanty anādṛtya harṣule pārthive mṛdau 12,056.055a idaṃ te duṣkaraṃ rājann idaṃ te durviceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_12_u:3043: 12,056.055c ity evaṃ suhṛdo nāma bruvanti pariṣadgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3044: 12,056.056a kruddhe cāsmin hasanty eva na ca hṛṣyanti pūjitāḥ 12,056.056c saṃgharṣaśīlāś ca sadā bhavanty anyonyakāraṇāt 12,056.057a visraṃsayanti mantraṃ ca vivṛṇvanti ca duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:3045: 12,056.057c līlayā caiva kurvanti sāvajñās tasya śāsanam
GE07mbh_12_u:3048: 12,056.058c nindanti svān adhīkārān saṃtyajanti ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:3049: 12,056.059a na vṛttyā parituṣyanti rājadeyaṃ haranti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:3050: 12,056.059c krīḍituṃ tena cecchanti sasūtreṇeva pakṣiṇā 12,056.059e asmatpraṇeyo rājeti loke caiva vadanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:3051: 12,056.060a ete caivāpare caiva doṣāḥ prādurbhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:3052: 12,056.060c nṛpatau mārdavopete harṣule ca yudhiṣṭhira 12,057.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,057.001a nityodyuktena vai rājñā bhavitavyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira 12,057.001c praśāmyate ca rājā hi nārīvodyamavarjitaḥ 12,057.002a bhagavān uśanā cāha ślokam atra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:3053: 12,057.002c tam ihaikamanā rājan gadatas tvaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:3054: 12,057.003a dvāv etau grasate bhūmiḥ sarpo bilaśayān iva
GE07mbh_12_u:3056: 12,057.004a tad etan naraśārdūla hṛdi tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:3057: 12,057.004c saṃdheyān api saṃdhatsva virodhyāṃś ca virodhaya
GE07mbh_12_u:3058: 12,057.004d*0124_01 svāmyamātyasuhṛtkośarāṣṭradurgabalāni ca 12,057.005a saptāṅge yaś ca te rājye vaiparītyaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:3059: 12,057.005c gurur vā yadi vā mitraṃ pratihantavya eva saḥ 12,057.006a maruttena hi rājñāyaṃ gītaḥ ślokaḥ purātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3061: 12,057.007a guror apy avaliptasya kāryākāryam ajānataḥ 12,057.007c utpathapratipannasya parityāgo vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:3062: 12,057.008a bāhoḥ putreṇa rājñā ca sagareṇeha dhīmatā
GE07mbh_12_u:3063: 12,057.008c asamañjāḥ suto jyeṣṭhas tyaktaḥ paurahitaiṣiṇā 12,057.009a asamañjāḥ sarayvāṃ prāk paurāṇāṃ bālakān nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:3064: 12,057.009c nyamajjayad ataḥ pitrā nirbhartsya sa vivāsitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3066: 12,057.010c mithyā viprān upacaran saṃtyakto dayitaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3067: 12,057.011a lokarañjanam evātra rājñāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ 12,057.011c satyasya rakṣaṇaṃ caiva vyavahārasya cārjavam 12,057.012a na hiṃsyāt paravittāni deyaṃ kāle ca dāpayet
GE07mbh_12_u:3068: 12,057.012c vikrāntaḥ satyavāk kṣānto nṛpo na calate pathaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3070: 12,057.013c dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ca satataṃ rataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3071: 12,057.014a trayyā saṃvṛtarandhraś ca rājā bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:3072: 12,057.014c vṛjinasya narendrāṇāṃ nānyat saṃvaraṇāt param 12,057.015a cāturvarṇyasya dharmāś ca rakṣitavyā mahīkṣitā 12,057.015c dharmasaṃkararakṣā hi rājñāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ 12,057.016a na viśvasec ca nṛpatir na cātyarthaṃ na viśvaset 12,057.016c ṣāḍguṇyaguṇadoṣāṃś ca nityaṃ buddhyāvalokayet
GE07mbh_12_u:3073: 12,057.017a dviṭchidradarśī nṛpatir nityam eva praśasyate 12,057.017c trivargaviditārthaś ca yuktacāropadhiś ca yaḥ 12,057.018a kośasyopārjanaratir yamavaiśravaṇopamaḥ 12,057.018c vettā ca daśavargasya sthānavṛddhikṣayātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3074: 12,057.019a abhṛtānāṃ bhaved bhartā bhṛtānāṃ cānvavekṣakaḥ 12,057.019c nṛpatiḥ sumukhaś ca syāt smitapūrvābhibhāṣitā 12,057.020a upāsitā ca vṛddhānāṃ jitatandrīr alolupaḥ 12,057.020c satāṃ vṛtte sthitamatiḥ santo hy ācāradarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3075: 12,057.021a na cādadīta vittāni satāṃ hastāt kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:3076: 12,057.021c asadbhyas tu samādadyāt sadbhyaḥ saṃpratipādayet 12,057.022a svayaṃ prahartādātā ca vaśyātmā vaśyasādhanaḥ 12,057.022c kāle dātā ca bhoktā ca śuddhācāras tathaiva ca 12,057.023a śūrān bhaktān asaṃhāryān kule jātān arogiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3079: 12,057.024c dharmeṣu niratān sādhūn acalān acalān iva
GE07mbh_12_u:3080: 12,057.025a sahāyān satataṃ kuryād rājā bhūtipuraskṛtaḥ 12,057.025c tais tulyaś ca bhaved bhogaiś chatramātrājñayādhikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3081: 12,057.026a pratyakṣā ca parokṣā ca vṛttiś cāsya bhavet sadā 12,057.026c evaṃ kṛtvā narendro hi na khedam iha vindati 12,057.027a sarvātiśaṅkī nṛpatir yaś ca sarvaharo bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:3082: 12,057.027c sa kṣipram anṛjur lubdhaḥ svajanenaiva bādhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:3083: 12,057.028a śucis tu pṛthivīpālo lokacittagrahe rataḥ 12,057.028c na pataty aribhir grastaḥ patitaś cāvatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_12_u:3084: 12,057.029a akrodhano 'thāvyasanī mṛdudaṇḍo jitendriyaḥ 12,057.029c rājā bhavati bhūtānāṃ viśvāsyo himavān iva
GE07mbh_12_u:3089: 12,057.032a ārabdhāny eva kāryāṇi na paryavasitāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:3090: 12,057.032c yasya rājñaḥ pradṛśyante sa rājā rājasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3091: 12,057.033a putrā iva pitur gehe viṣaye yasya mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3092: 12,057.033c nirbhayā vicariṣyanti sa rājā rājasattamaḥ 12,057.034a agūḍhavibhavā yasya paurā rāṣṭranivāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3096: 12,057.036a vaśyā neyā vinītāś ca na ca saṃgharṣaśīlinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3097: 12,057.036c viṣaye dānarucayo narā yasya sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3098: 12,057.037a na yasya kūṭakapaṭaṃ na māyā na ca matsaraḥ 12,057.037c viṣaye bhūmipālasya tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ 12,057.038a yaḥ satkaroti jñānāni neyaḥ paurahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3099: 12,057.038c satāṃ dharmānugas tyāgī sa rājā rājyam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:3100: 12,057.039a yasya cāraś ca mantraś ca nityaṃ caiva kṛtākṛte 12,057.039c na jñāyate hi ripubhiḥ sa rājā rājyam arhati 12,057.040a ślokaś cāyaṃ purā gīto bhārgaveṇa mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:3101: 12,057.040c ākhyāte rāmacarite nṛpatiṃ prati bhārata 12,057.041a rājānaṃ prathamaṃ vindet tato bhāryāṃ tato dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:3102: 12,057.041c rājany asati lokasya kuto bhāryā kuto dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:3103: 12,057.042a tad rājan rājasiṃhānāṃ nānyo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3104: 12,057.042c ṛte rakṣāṃ suvispaṣṭāṃ rakṣā lokasya dhāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:3105: 12,057.043a prācetasena manunā ślokau cemāv udāhṛtau 12,057.043c rājadharmeṣu rājendra tāv ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu 12,057.044a ṣaḍ etān puruṣo jahyād bhinnāṃ nāvam ivārṇave
GE07mbh_12_u:3108: 12,057.045c grāmakāmaṃ ca gopālaṃ vanakāmaṃ ca nāpitam
GE07mbh_12_u:3110: 12,058.000*0125_01 etāvad uktvā bhūyo 'pi bhīṣmaḥ kurupitāmahaḥ 12,058.000*0125_02 uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān sarvataḥ sārasaṃgraham 12,058.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,058.001a etat te rājadharmāṇāṃ navanītaṃ yudhiṣṭhira 12,058.001c bṛhaspatir hi bhagavān nānyaṃ dharmaṃ praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_12_u:3111: 12,058.002a viśālākṣaś ca bhagavān kāvyaś caiva mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3112: 12,058.002c sahasrākṣo mahendraś ca tathā prācetaso manuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3113: 12,058.003a bharadvājaś ca bhagavāṃs tathā gauraśirā muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3115: 12,058.004a rakṣām eva praśaṃsanti dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:3116: 12,058.004c rājñāṃ rājīvatāmrākṣa sādhanaṃ cātra vai śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:3117: 12,058.005a cāraś ca praṇidhiś caiva kāle dānam amatsaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3118: 12,058.005c yuktyādānaṃ na cādānam ayogena yudhiṣṭhira 12,058.006a satāṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ śauryaṃ dākṣyaṃ satyaṃ prajāhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:3119: 12,058.006c anārjavair ārjavaiś ca śatrupakṣasya bhedanam 12,058.007a sādhūnām aparityāgaḥ kulīnānāṃ ca dhāraṇam 12,058.007c nicayaś ca niceyānāṃ sevā buddhimatām api
GE07mbh_12_u:3120: 12,058.008a balānāṃ harṣaṇaṃ nityaṃ prajānām anvavekṣaṇam 12,058.008c kāryeṣv akhedaḥ kośasya tathaiva ca vivardhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:3122: 12,058.009c ketanānāṃ ca jīrṇānām avekṣā caiva sīdatām
GE07mbh_12_u:3123: 12,058.010a dvividhasya ca daṇḍasya prayogaḥ kālacoditaḥ 12,058.010c arimadhyasthamitrāṇāṃ yathāvac cānvavekṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:3124: 12,058.011a upajāpaś ca bhṛtyānām ātmanaḥ paradarśanāt 12,058.011c aviśvāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva parasyāśvāsanaṃ tathā 12,058.012a nītidharmānusaraṇaṃ nityam utthānam eva ca 12,058.012c ripūṇām anavajñānaṃ nityaṃ cānāryavarjanam
GE07mbh_12_u:3125: 12,058.013a utthānaṃ hi narendrāṇāṃ bṛhaspatir abhāṣata 12,058.013c rājadharmasya yan mūlaṃ ślokāṃś cātra nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:3127: 12,058.014c utthānena mahendreṇa śraiṣṭhyaṃ prāptaṃ divīha ca
GE07mbh_12_u:3130: 12,058.016a utthānahīno rājā hi buddhimān api nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3131: 12,058.016c dharṣaṇīyo ripūṇāṃ syād bhujaṃga iva nirviṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3132: 12,058.017a na ca śatrur avajñeyo durbalo 'pi balīyasā
GE07mbh_12_u:3133: 12,058.017c alpo 'pi hi dahaty agnir viṣam alpaṃ hinasti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:3135: 12,058.018c taṃ taṃ tāpayate deśam api rājñaḥ samṛddhinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3136: 12,058.019a rājño rahasyaṃ yad vākyaṃ jayārthaṃ lokasaṃgrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3137: 12,058.019c hṛdi yac cāsya jihmaṃ syāt kāraṇārthaṃ ca yad bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:3138: 12,058.020a yac cāsya kāryaṃ vṛjinam ārjavenaiva dhāryate
GE07mbh_12_u:3139: 12,058.020c dambhanārthāya lokasya dharmiṣṭhām ācaret kriyām 12,058.021a rājyaṃ hi sumahat tantraṃ durdhāryam akṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3140: 12,058.021c na śakyaṃ mṛdunā voḍhum āghātasthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:3141: 12,058.022a rājyaṃ sarvāmiṣaṃ nityam ārjaveneha dhāryate 12,058.022c tasmān miśreṇa satataṃ vartitavyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira 12,058.023a yady apy asya vipattiḥ syād rakṣamāṇasya vai prajāḥ 12,058.023c so 'py asya vipulo dharma evaṃvṛttā hi bhūmipāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3142: 12,058.024a eṣa te rājadharmāṇāṃ leśaḥ samanuvarṇitaḥ 12,058.024c bhūyas te yatra saṃdehas tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara 12,058.025 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,058.025a tato vyāsaś ca bhagavān devasthāno 'śmanā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:3143: 12,058.025c vāsudevaḥ kṛpaś caiva sātyakiḥ saṃjayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:3144: 12,058.026a sādhu sādhv iti saṃhṛṣṭāḥ puṣyamāṇair ivānanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:3145: 12,058.026c astuvaṃs te naravyāghraṃ bhīṣmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_12_u:3146: 12,058.027a tato dīnamanā bhīṣmam uvāca kurusattamaḥ 12,058.027c netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ pādau tasya śanaiḥ spṛśan
GE07mbh_12_u:3147: 12,058.028a śva idānīṃ svasaṃdehaṃ prakṣyāmi tvaṃ pitāmaha

GE07mbh_12_u:3149: 12,058.029a tato dvijātīn abhivādya keśavaḥ; kṛpaś ca te caiva yudhiṣṭhirādayaḥ 12,058.029c pradakṣiṇīkṛtya mahānadīsutaṃ; tato rathān āruruhur mudā yutāḥ 12,058.030a dṛṣadvatīṃ cāpy avagāhya suvratāḥ; kṛtodakāryāḥ kṛtajapyamaṅgalāḥ 12,058.030c upāsya saṃdhyāṃ vidhivat paraṃtapās; tataḥ puraṃ te viviśur gajāhvayam 12,059.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,059.001a tataḥ kālyaṃ samutthāya kṛtapaurvāhṇikakriyāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:6055: 12,110.014a akūjanena cen mokṣo nātra kūjet kathaṃ cana

GE07mbh_12_u:6070: 12,110.019a pratiśrutya tu dātavyaṃ śvaḥkāryas tu balātkṛtaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:6077: 12,110.022b*0257_01 niryajñās tapasā hīnā mā sma taiḥ saha saṃgamaḥ 12,110.022c dhanādānād duḥkhataraṃ jīvitād viprayojanam

GE07mbh_12_u:6079: 12,110.023c na kaś cid asti pāpānāṃ dharma ity eṣa niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6080: 12,110.024a tathāgataṃ ca yo hanyān nāsau pāpena lipyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6081: 12,110.024c svakarmaṇā hataṃ hanti hata eva sa hanyate

GE07mbh_12_u:6085: 12,111.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,111.001a kliśyamāneṣu bhūteṣu tais tair bhāvais tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6086: 12,111.001c durgāṇy atitared yena tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:6087: 12,111.002 bhīṣma uvāca 12,111.002a āśrameṣu yathokteṣu yathoktaṃ ye dvijātayaḥ 12,111.002c vartante saṃyatātmāno durgāṇy atitaranti te 12,111.003a ye dambhān na japanti sma yeṣāṃ vṛttiś ca saṃvṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:6088: 12,111.003c viṣayāṃś ca nigṛhṇanti durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6089: 12,111.003d*0258_01 pratyāhur nocyamānā ye na hiṃsanti ca hiṃsitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6090: 12,111.003d*0258_02 prayacchanti na yācante durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6091: 12,111.004a vāsayanty atithīn nityaṃ nityaṃ ye cānasūyakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6092: 12,111.004c nityaṃ svādhyāyaśīlāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6093: 12,111.005a mātāpitroś ca ye vṛttiṃ vartante dharmakovidāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:6095: 12,111.006c agnihotraparāḥ santo durgāṇy atitaranti te 12,111.007a ye na lobhān nayanty arthān rājāno rajasāvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6096: 12,111.007c viṣayān parirakṣanto durgāṇy atitaranti te 12,111.008a āhaveṣu ca ye śūrās tyaktvā maraṇajaṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:6097: 12,111.008c dharmeṇa jayam icchanto durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6098: 12,111.009a ye pāpāni na kurvanti karmaṇā manasā girā
GE07mbh_12_u:6099: 12,111.009c nikṣiptadaṇḍā bhūteṣu durgāṇy atitaranti te 12,111.010a ye vadantīha satyāni prāṇatyāge 'py upasthite
GE07mbh_12_u:6100: 12,111.010c pramāṇabhūtā bhūtānāṃ durgāṇy atitaranti te 12,111.011a anadhyāyeṣu ye viprāḥ svādhyāyaṃ naiva kurvate
GE07mbh_12_u:6101: 12,111.011c taponityāḥ sutapaso durgāṇy atitaranti te 12,111.012a karmāṇy akuhakārthāni yeṣāṃ vācaś ca sūnṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6102: 12,111.012c yeṣām arthāś ca sādhvarthā durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6103: 12,111.013a ye tapaś ca tapasyanti kaumārabrahmacāriṇaḥ 12,111.013c vidyāvedavratasnātā durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6104: 12,111.014a ye ca saṃśāntarajasaḥ saṃśāntatamasaś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:6105: 12,111.014c satye sthitā mahātmāno durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6106: 12,111.015a yeṣāṃ na kaś cit trasati trasanti na ca kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:6107: 12,111.015c yeṣām ātmasamo loko durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6108: 12,111.016a paraśriyā na tapyante ye santaḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6109: 12,111.016c grāmyād annān nivṛttāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6110: 12,111.017a sarvān devān namasyanti sarvān dharmāṃś ca śṛṇvate
GE07mbh_12_u:6111: 12,111.017c ye śraddadhānā dāntāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6112: 12,111.018a ye na mānitam icchanti mānayanti ca ye param 12,111.018c mānyamānā na manyante durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6113: 12,111.019a ye śrāddhāni ca kurvanti tithyāṃ tithyāṃ prajārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6114: 12,111.019c suviśuddhena manasā durgāṇy atitaranti te 12,111.020a ye krodhaṃ naiva kurvanti kruddhān saṃśamayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6115: 12,111.020c na ca kupyanti bhṛtyebhyo durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6116: 12,111.021a madhu māṃsaṃ ca ye nityaṃ varjayantīha mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6117: 12,111.021c janmaprabhṛti madyaṃ ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6118: 12,111.022a yātrārthaṃ bhojanaṃ yeṣāṃ saṃtānārthaṃ ca maithunam
GE07mbh_12_u:6119: 12,111.022c vāk satyavacanārthāya durgāṇy atitaranti te 12,111.023a īśvaraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jagataḥ prabhavāpyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:6120: 12,111.023c bhaktā nārāyaṇaṃ ye ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6121: 12,111.024a ya eṣa raktapadmākṣaḥ pītavāsā mahābhujaḥ 12,111.024c suhṛd bhrātā ca mitraṃ ca saṃbandhī ca tavācyutaḥ 12,111.025a ya imān sakalāṃl lokāṃś carmavat pariveṣṭayet
GE07mbh_12_u:6122: 12,111.025c icchan prabhur acintyātmā govindaḥ puruṣottamaḥ 12,111.026a sthitaḥ priyahite jiṣṇoḥ sa eṣa puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:6123: 12,111.026c rājaṃs tava ca durdharṣo vaikuṇṭhaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6124: 12,111.027a ya enaṃ saṃśrayantīha bhaktyā nārāyaṇaṃ harim
GE07mbh_12_u:6125: 12,111.027c te tarantīha durgāṇi na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:6127: 12,111.027d*0259_02 kṛṣṇe kamalapatrākṣe durgāṇy atitaranti te 12,111.027d*0259_03 lokarakṣārtham utpannam adityāṃ kaśyapātmajam
GE07mbh_12_u:6128: 12,111.027d*0259_04 devam indraṃ namasyanti durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6129: 12,111.027d*0259_05 brahmāṇaṃ lokakartāraṃ ye namasyanti satpatim 12,111.027d*0259_06 yaṣṭavyaṃ kratubhir devaṃ durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6130: 12,111.027d*0259_07 yaṃ viṣṇur indraḥ śaṃbhuś ca brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6131: 12,111.027d*0259_08 stuvanti vividhaiḥ stotrair devadevaṃ maheśvaram 12,111.027d*0259_09 tam arcayanti ye śaśvad durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6132: 12,111.028a durgātitaraṇaṃ ye ca paṭhanti śrāvayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6133: 12,111.028c pāṭhayanti ca viprebhyo durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6134: 12,111.029a iti kṛtyasamuddeśaḥ kīrtitas te mayānagha 12,111.029c saṃtared yena durgāṇi paratreha ca mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6135: 12,112.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,112.001a asaumyāḥ saumyarūpeṇa saumyāś cāsaumyadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6136: 12,112.001c īdṛśān puruṣāṃs tāta kathaṃ vidyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:6137: 12,112.002 bhīṣma uvāca 12,112.002a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:6139: 12,112.003a purikāyāṃ puri purā śrīmatyāṃ pauriko nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6141: 12,112.004a sa tv āyuṣi parikṣīṇe jagāmānīpsitāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:6142: 12,112.004c gomāyutvaṃ ca saṃprāpto dūṣitaḥ pūrvakarmaṇā 12,112.005a saṃsmṛtya pūrvajātiṃ sa nirvedaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6143: 12,112.005c na bhakṣayati māṃsāni parair upahṛtāny api
GE07mbh_12_u:6145: 12,112.006c cakāra ca yathākāmam āhāraṃ patitaiḥ phalaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6146: 12,112.006d*0260_01 parṇāhāraḥ kadā cic ca niyamavratavān api
GE07mbh_12_u:6147: 12,112.006d*0260_02 kadā cid udakenāpi vartayann anuyantritaḥ 12,112.007a śmaśāne tasya cāvāso gomāyoḥ saṃmato 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:6148: 12,112.007c janmabhūmyanurodhāc ca nānyad vāsam arocayat 12,112.008a tasya śaucam amṛṣyantaḥ sarve te sahajātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6149: 12,112.008c cālayanti sma tāṃ buddhiṃ vacanaiḥ praśrayottaraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6150: 12,112.009a vasan pitṛvane raudre śaucaṃ lapsitum icchasi

GE07mbh_12_u:6152: 12,112.010a tatsamo vā bhavāsmābhir bhakṣyān dāsyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:6153: 12,112.010c bhuṅkṣva śaucaṃ parityajya yad dhi bhuktaṃ tad asti te
GE07mbh_12_u:6154: 12,112.011a iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā pratyuvāca samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6155: 12,112.011c madhuraiḥ praśritair vākyair hetumadbhir aniṣṭhuraiḥ 12,112.012a apramāṇaṃ prasūtir me śīlataḥ kriyate kulam
GE07mbh_12_u:6156: 12,112.012c prārthayiṣye tu tat karma yena vistīryate yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6157: 12,112.013a śmaśāne yadi vāso me samādhir me niśāmyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:6158: 12,112.013c ātmā phalati karmāṇi nāśramo dharmalakṣaṇam 12,112.014a āśrame yo dvijaṃ hanyād gāṃ vā dadyād anāśrame 12,112.014c kiṃ nu tat pātakaṃ na syāt tad vā dattaṃ vṛthā bhavet 12,112.015a bhavantaḥ sarvalobhena kevalaṃ bhakṣaṇe ratāḥ 12,112.015c anubandhe tu ye doṣās tān na paśyanti mohitāḥ 12,112.016a apratyayakṛtāṃ garhyām arthāpanayadūṣitām
GE07mbh_12_u:6159: 12,112.016c iha cāmutra cāniṣṭāṃ tasmād vṛttiṃ na rocaye
GE07mbh_12_u:6160: 12,112.017a taṃ śuciṃ paṇḍitaṃ matvā śārdūlaḥ khyātavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6162: 12,112.018a saumya vijñātarūpas tvaṃ gaccha yātrāṃ mayā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:6163: 12,112.018c vriyantām īpsitā bhogāḥ parihāryāś ca puṣkalāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6164: 12,112.019a tīkṣṇā vayam iti khyātā bhavato jñāpayāmahe
GE07mbh_12_u:6165: 12,112.019c mṛdupūrvaṃ ghātinas te śreyaś cādhigamiṣyati 12,112.020a atha saṃpūjya tad vākyaṃ mṛgendrasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6166: 12,112.020c gomāyuḥ praśritaṃ vākyaṃ babhāṣe kiṃ cid ānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6167: 12,112.021a sadṛśaṃ mṛgarājaitat tava vākyaṃ madantare 12,112.021c yat sahāyān mṛgayase dharmārthakuśalāñ śucīn 12,112.022a na śakyam anamātyena mahattvam anuśāsitum 12,112.022c duṣṭāmātyena vā vīra śarīraparipanthinā
GE07mbh_12_u:6170: 12,112.024a tān atītopadhān prājñān hite yuktān manasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6171: 12,112.024c pūjayethā mahābhāgān yathācāryān yathā pitṝn 12,112.025a na tv evaṃ mama saṃtoṣād rocate 'nyan mṛgādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:6172: 12,112.025c na kāmaye sukhān bhogān aiśvaryaṃ vā tvadāśrayam
GE07mbh_12_u:6173: 12,112.026a na yokṣyati hi me śīlaṃ tava bhṛtyaiḥ purātanaiḥ 12,112.026c te tvāṃ vibhedayiṣyanti duḥkhaśīlā madantare 12,112.027a saṃśrayaḥ ślāghanīyas tvam anyeṣām api bhāsvatām
GE07mbh_12_u:6174: 12,112.027c kṛtātmā sumahābhāgaḥ pāpakeṣv apy adāruṇaḥ 12,112.028a dīrghadarśī mahotsāhaḥ sthūlalakṣyo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6175: 12,112.028c kṛtī cāmoghakartāsi bhāvyaiś ca samalaṃkṛtaḥ 12,112.029a kiṃ tu svenāsmi saṃtuṣṭo duḥkhā vṛttir anuṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:6176: 12,112.029c sevāyāś cāpi nābhijñaḥ svacchandena vanecaraḥ 12,112.030a rājopakrośadoṣāś ca sarve saṃśrayavāsinām
GE07mbh_12_u:6177: 12,112.030c vanacaryā ca niḥsaṅgā nirbhayā niravagrahā 12,112.031a nṛpeṇāhūyamānasya yat tiṣṭhati bhayaṃ hṛdi 12,112.031c na tat tiṣṭhati tuṣṭānāṃ vane mūlaphalāśinām
GE07mbh_12_u:6178: 12,112.032a pānīyaṃ vā nirāyāsaṃ svādv annaṃ vā bhayottaram
GE07mbh_12_u:6179: 12,112.032c vicārya khalu paśyāmi tat sukhaṃ yatra nirvṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6180: 12,112.033a aparādhair na tāvanto bhṛtyāḥ śiṣṭā narādhipaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6181: 12,112.033c upaghātair yathā bhṛtyā dūṣitā nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6182: 12,112.034a yadi tv etan mayā kāryaṃ mṛgendro yadi manyate 12,112.034c samayaṃ kṛtam icchāmi vartitavyaṃ yathā mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:6183: 12,112.035a madīyā mānanīyās te śrotavyaṃ ca hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6184: 12,112.035c kalpitā yā ca te vṛttiḥ sā bhavet tava susthirā
GE07mbh_12_u:6185: 12,112.036a na mantrayeyam anyais te sacivaiḥ saha karhi cit 12,112.036c nītimantaḥ parīpsanto vṛthā brūyuḥ pare mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:6186: 12,112.037a eka ekena saṃgamya raho brūyāṃ hitaṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:6187: 12,112.037c na ca te jñātikāryeṣu praṣṭavyo 'haṃ hitāhite
GE07mbh_12_u:6188: 12,112.038a mayā saṃmantrya paścāc ca na hiṃsyāḥ sacivās tvayā 12,112.038c madīyānāṃ ca kupito mā tvaṃ daṇḍaṃ nipātayeḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6189: 12,112.039a evam astv iti tenāsau mṛgendreṇābhipūjitaḥ 12,112.039c prāptavān matisācivyaṃ gomāyur vyāghrayonitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6190: 12,112.040a taṃ tathā satkṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā yujyamānaṃ ca karmaṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:6191: 12,112.040c prādviṣan kṛtasaṃghātāḥ pūrvabhṛtyā muhur muhuḥ 12,112.041a mitrabuddhyā ca gomāyuṃ sāntvayitvā praveśya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6192: 12,112.041c doṣeṣu samatāṃ netum aicchann aśubhabuddhayaḥ 12,112.042a anyathā hy ucitāḥ pūrvaṃ paradravyāpahāriṇaḥ 12,112.042c aśaktāḥ kiṃ cid ādātuṃ dravyaṃ gomāyuyantritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6193: 12,112.043a vyutthānaṃ cātra kāṅkṣadbhiḥ kathābhiḥ pravilobhyate 12,112.043c dhanena mahatā caiva buddhir asya vilobhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6194: 12,112.044a na cāpi sa mahāprājñas tasmād dhairyāc cacāla ha 12,112.044c athāsya samayaṃ kṛtvā vināśāya sthitāḥ pare
GE07mbh_12_u:6195: 12,112.045a īpsitaṃ ca mṛgendrasya māṃsaṃ yat tatra saṃskṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:6196: 12,112.045c apanīya svayaṃ tad dhi tair nyastaṃ tasya veśmani 12,112.046a yadarthaṃ cāpy apahṛtaṃ yena yac caiva mantritam
GE07mbh_12_u:6197: 12,112.046c tasya tad viditaṃ sarvaṃ kāraṇārthaṃ ca marṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:6199: 12,112.047c nopaghātas tvayā grāhyo rājan maitrīm ihecchatā
GE07mbh_12_u:6200: 12,112.047d*0261_01 iti tasya ca mantrasya sthityarthaṃ tad upekṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:6201: 12,112.047d*0262_00 bhīṣma uvāca 12,112.047d*0262_01 kṣudhitasya mṛgendrasya bhoktum abhyutthitasya ca 12,112.048a bhojane copahartavye tan māṃsaṃ na sma dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6202: 12,112.048c mṛgarājena cājñaptaṃ mṛgyatāṃ cora ity uta
GE07mbh_12_u:6203: 12,112.049a kṛtakaiś cāpi tan māṃsaṃ mṛgendrāyopavarṇitam 12,112.049c sacivenopanītaṃ te viduṣā prājñamāninā
GE07mbh_12_u:6204: 12,112.050a saroṣas tv atha śārdūlaḥ śrutvā gomāyucāpalam
GE07mbh_12_u:6206: 12,112.051a chidraṃ tu tasya tad dṛṣṭvā procus te pūrvamantriṇaḥ 12,112.051c sarveṣām eva so 'smākaṃ vṛttibhaṅgeṣu vartate 12,112.051d*0263_01 niścityaivaṃ tatas tasya te tat karmāṇy avarṇayan
GE07mbh_12_u:6207: 12,112.052a idaṃ cāsyedṛśaṃ karma vāllabhyena tu rakṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6208: 12,112.052c śrutaś ca svāminā pūrvaṃ yādṛśo naiṣa tādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6209: 12,112.053a vāṅmātreṇaiva dharmiṣṭhaḥ svabhāvena tu dāruṇaḥ 12,112.053c dharmacchadmā hy ayaṃ pāpo vṛthācāraparigrahaḥ 12,112.053e kāryārthaṃ bhojanārtheṣu vrateṣu kṛtavāñ śramam 12,112.053f*0264_01 yadi vipratyayo hy eṣa tad idaṃ darśayāma te 12,112.053f*0264_02 tanmāṃsaṃ caiva gomāyos tatkṣaṇāt tais tu ḍaukitam
GE07mbh_12_u:6210: 12,112.054a māṃsāpanayanaṃ jñātvā vyāghras teṣāṃ tu tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6211: 12,112.054c ājñāpayām āsa tadā gomāyur vadhyatām iti
GE07mbh_12_u:6213: 12,112.055c mṛgarājaṃ hitair vākyaiḥ saṃbodhayitum āgamat 12,112.056a putra naitat tvayā grāhyaṃ kapaṭārambhasaṃvṛtam 12,112.056c karmasaṃgharṣajair doṣair duṣyaty aśucibhiḥ śuciḥ 12,112.057a nocchritaṃ sahate kaś cit prakriyā vairakārikā
GE07mbh_12_u:6214: 12,112.057c śucer api hi yuktasya doṣa eva nipātyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6215: 12,112.057d*0265_01 muner api vanasthasya svāni karmāṇi kurvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6217: 12,112.058a lubdhānāṃ śucayo dveṣyāḥ kātarāṇāṃ tarasvinaḥ 12,112.058c mūrkhāṇāṃ paṇḍitā dveṣyā daridrāṇāṃ mahādhanāḥ 12,112.058e adhārmikāṇāṃ dharmiṣṭhā virūpāṇāṃ surūpakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6218: 12,112.059a bahavaḥ paṇḍitā lubdhāḥ sarve māyopajīvinaḥ 12,112.059c kuryur doṣam adoṣasya bṛhaspatimater api 12,112.060a śūnyāt tac ca gṛhān māṃsaṃ yad adyāpahṛtaṃ tava 12,112.060c necchate dīyamānaṃ ca sādhu tāvad vimṛśyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:6220: 12,112.061c dṛśyante vividhā bhāvās teṣu yuktaṃ parīkṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:6221: 12,112.062a talavad dṛśyate vyoma khadyoto havyavāḍ iva
GE07mbh_12_u:6222: 12,112.062c na caivāsti talaṃ vyomni na khadyote hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6224: 12,112.063c parīkṣya jñāpayan hy arthān na paścāt paritapyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6225: 12,112.064a na duṣkaram idaṃ putra yat prabhur ghātayet param 12,112.064c ślāghanīyā ca varyā ca loke prabhavatāṃ kṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:6226: 12,112.065a sthāpito 'yaṃ putra tvayā sāmanteṣv adhi viśrutaḥ 12,112.065c duḥkhenāsādyate pātraṃ dhāryatām eṣa te suhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:6227: 12,112.066a dūṣitaṃ paradoṣair hi gṛhṇīte yo 'nyathā śucim
GE07mbh_12_u:6228: 12,112.066c svayaṃ saṃdūṣitāmātyaḥ kṣipram eva vinaśyati 12,112.067a tasmād athārisaṃghātād gomāyoḥ kaś cid āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6229: 12,112.067c dharmātmā tena cākhyātaṃ yathaitat kapaṭaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:6230: 12,112.068a tato vijñātacāritraḥ satkṛtya sa vimokṣitaḥ 12,112.068c pariṣvaktaś ca sasnehaṃ mṛgendreṇa punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6231: 12,112.069a anujñāpya mṛgendraṃ tu gomāyur nītiśāstravit 12,112.069c tenāmarṣeṇa saṃtaptaḥ prāyam āsitum aicchata 12,112.070a śārdūlas tatra gomāyuṃ snehāt prasrutalocanaḥ 12,112.070c avārayat sa dharmiṣṭhaṃ pūjayā pratipūjayan 12,112.071a taṃ sa gomāyur ālokya snehād āgatasaṃbhramam
GE07mbh_12_u:6232: 12,112.071c babhāṣe praṇato vākyaṃ bāṣpagadgadayā girā 12,112.072a pūjito 'haṃ tvayā pūrvaṃ paścāc caiva vimānitaḥ 12,112.072c pareṣām āspadaṃ nīto vastuṃ nārhāmy ahaṃ tvayi
GE07mbh_12_u:6233: 12,112.073a svasaṃtuṣṭāś cyutāḥ sthānān mānāt pratyavaropitāḥ 12,112.073c svayaṃ copahṛtā bhṛtyā ye cāpy upahṛtāḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6234: 12,112.074a parikṣīṇāś ca lubdhāś ca krūrāḥ kārābhitāpitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6235: 12,112.074c hṛtasvā mānino ye ca tyaktopāttā mahepsavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6236: 12,112.075a saṃtāpitāś ca ye ke cid vyasanaughapratīkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6237: 12,112.075c antarhitāḥ sopahitāḥ sarve te parasādhanāḥ 12,112.076a avamānena yuktasya sthāpitasya ca me punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6238: 12,112.076c kathaṃ yāsyasi viśvāsam aham eṣyāmi vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6239: 12,112.077a samartha iti saṃgṛhya sthāpayitvā parīkṣya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6240: 12,112.077c kṛtaṃ ca samayaṃ bhittvā tvayāham avamānitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6241: 12,112.078a prathamaṃ yaḥ samākhyātaḥ śīlavān iti saṃsadi
GE07mbh_12_u:6242: 12,112.078c na vācyaṃ tasya vaiguṇyaṃ pratijñāṃ parirakṣatā
GE07mbh_12_u:6243: 12,112.079a evaṃ cāvamatasyeha viśvāsaṃ kiṃ prayāsyasi 12,112.079c tvayi caiva hy aviśvāse mamodvego bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:6244: 12,112.080a śaṅkitas tvam ahaṃ bhītaḥ pare chidrānudarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6245: 12,112.080c asnigdhāś caiva dustoṣāḥ karma caitad bahucchalam
GE07mbh_12_u:6246: 12,112.080d*0266_01 pūrvasaṃmānatā yatra paścāc caiva vimānanā 12,112.080d*0266_02 na taṃ dhīrāḥ praśaṃsanti saṃmānitavimānitam 12,112.081a duḥkhena śleṣyate bhinnaṃ śliṣṭaṃ duḥkhena bhidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6247: 12,112.081c bhinnaśliṣṭā tu yā prītir na sā snehena vartate 12,112.082a kaś cid eva hi bhītas tu dṛśyate na parātmanoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6248: 12,112.082c kāryāpekṣā hi vartante bhāvāḥ snigdhās tu durlabhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6249: 12,112.083a suduḥkhaṃ puruṣajñānaṃ cittaṃ hy eṣāṃ calācalam
GE07mbh_12_u:6250: 12,112.083c samartho vāpy aśakto vā śateṣv eko 'dhigamyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6251: 12,112.084a akasmāt prakriyā nṝṇām akasmāc cāpakarṣaṇam 12,112.084c śubhāśubhe mahattvaṃ ca prakartuṃ buddhilāghavāt 12,112.085a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ sāntvam uktvā dharmārthahetumat 12,112.085c prasādayitvā rājānaṃ gomāyur vanam abhyagāt 12,112.086a agṛhyānunayaṃ tasya mṛgendrasya sa buddhimān 12,112.086c gomāyuḥ prāyam āsīnas tyaktvā dehaṃ divaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_12_u:6252: 12,113.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,113.001a kiṃ pārthivena kartavyaṃ kiṃ ca kṛtvā sukhī bhavet 12,113.001c tan mamācakṣva tattvena sarvaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:6253: 12,113.002 bhīṣma uvāca 12,113.002a hanta te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kāryaikaniścayam
GE07mbh_12_u:6254: 12,113.002c yathā rājñeha kartavyaṃ yac ca kṛtvā sukhī bhavet 12,113.003a na tv evaṃ vartitavyaṃ sma yathedam anuśuśrumaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6255: 12,113.003c uṣṭrasya sumahad vṛttaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:6257: 12,113.004c tapaḥ sumahad ātiṣṭhad araṇye saṃśitavrataḥ 12,113.005a tapasas tasya cānte vai prītimān abhavat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6258: 12,113.005c vareṇa chandayām āsa tataś cainaṃ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6259: 12,113.006 uṣṭra uvāca 12,113.006a bhagavaṃs tvatprasādān me dīrghā grīvā bhaved iyam
GE07mbh_12_u:6260: 12,113.006c yojanānāṃ śataṃ sāgraṃ yā gacchec carituṃ vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:6261: 12,113.007 bhīṣma uvāca 12,113.007a evam astv iti coktaḥ sa varadena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:6262: 12,113.007c pratilabhya varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yayāv uṣṭraḥ svakaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_12_u:6263: 12,113.008a sa cakāra tad ālasyaṃ varadānāt sa durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6264: 12,113.008c na caicchac carituṃ gantuṃ durātmā kālamohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6265: 12,113.009a sa kadā cit prasāryaivaṃ tāṃ grīvāṃ śatayojanām
GE07mbh_12_u:6266: 12,113.009c cacārāśrāntahṛdayo vātaś cāgāt tato mahān 12,113.010a sa guhāyāṃ śirogrīvaṃ nidhāya paśur ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6267: 12,113.010c āstātha varṣam abhyāgāt sumahat plāvayaj jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:6269: 12,113.011c sadāras tāṃ guhām āśu praviveśa jalārditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6270: 12,113.012a sa dṛṣṭvā māṃsajīvī tu subhṛśaṃ kṣucchramānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6271: 12,113.012c abhakṣayat tato grīvām uṣṭrasya bharatarṣabha 12,113.013a yadā tv abudhyatātmānaṃ bhakṣyamāṇaṃ sa vai paśuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6272: 12,113.013c tadā saṃkocane yatnam akarod bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ 12,113.014a yāvad ūrdhvam adhaś caiva grīvāṃ saṃkṣipate paśuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6273: 12,113.014c tāvat tena sadāreṇa jambukena sa bhakṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6274: 12,113.015a sa hatvā bhakṣayitvā ca jambukoṣṭraṃ tatas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:6275: 12,113.015c vigate vātavarṣe ca niścakrāma guhāmukhāt 12,113.016a evaṃ durbuddhinā prāptam uṣṭreṇa nidhanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:6276: 12,113.016c ālasyasya kramāt paśya mahad doṣam upāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:6277: 12,113.017a tvam apy etaṃ vidhiṃ tyaktvā yogena niyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6278: 12,113.017c vartasva buddhimūlaṃ hi vijayaṃ manur abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:6281: 12,113.019a rājyaṃ tiṣṭhati dakṣasya saṃgṛhītendriyasya ca 12,113.019c guptamantraśrutavataḥ susahāyasya cānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:6282: 12,113.019d*0267_01 asahāyavato hy arthā na tiṣṭhanti kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:6284: 12,113.020c sahāyayuktena mahī kṛtsnā śakyā praśāsitum 12,113.021a idaṃ hi sadbhiḥ kathitaṃ vidhijñaiḥ; purā mahendrapratimaprabhāva 12,113.021c mayāpi coktaṃ tava śāstradṛṣṭyā; tvam atra yuktaḥ pracarasva rājan 12,114.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,114.001a rājā rājyam anuprāpya durbalo bharatarṣabha 12,114.001c amitrasyātivṛddhasya kathaṃ tiṣṭhed asādhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6285: 12,114.002 bhīṣma uvāca 12,114.002a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:6286: 12,114.002c saritāṃ caiva saṃvādaṃ sāgarasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:6287: 12,114.003a surārinilayaḥ śaśvat sāgaraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ 12,114.003c papraccha saritaḥ sarvāḥ saṃśayaṃ jātam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6288: 12,114.004a samūlaśākhān paśyāmi nihatāṃś chāyino drumān 12,114.004c yuṣmābhir iha pūrṇābhir anyāṃs tatra na vetasam
GE07mbh_12_u:6289: 12,114.005a akāyaś cālpasāraś ca vetasaḥ kūlajaś ca vaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6290: 12,114.005c avajñāya naśakyo vā kiṃ cid vā tena vaḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:6291: 12,114.006a tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi sarvāsām eva vo matam 12,114.006c yathā kūlāni cemāni bhittvā nānīyate vaśam
GE07mbh_12_u:6292: 12,114.007a tataḥ prāha nadī gaṅgā vākyam uttaram arthavat
GE07mbh_12_u:6293: 12,114.007c hetumad grāhakaṃ caiva sāgaraṃ saritāṃ patim
GE07mbh_12_u:6294: 12,114.008a tiṣṭhanty ete yathāsthānaṃ nagā hy ekaniketanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6295: 12,114.008c tatas tyajanti tat sthānaṃ prātilomyād acetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6296: 12,114.009a vetaso vegam āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā namati netaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6297: 12,114.009c sa ca vege 'bhyatikrānte sthānam āsādya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:6298: 12,114.010a kālajñaḥ samayajñaś ca sadā vaśyaś ca nodrumaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6299: 12,114.010c anulomas tathāstabdhas tena nābhyeti vetasaḥ 12,114.011a mārutodakavegena ye namanty unnamanti ca 12,114.011c oṣadhyaḥ pādapā gulmā na te yānti parābhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:6300: 12,114.012a yo hi śatror vivṛddhasya prabhor vadhavināśane
GE07mbh_12_u:6301: 12,114.012c pūrvaṃ na sahate vegaṃ kṣipram eva sa naśyati 12,114.013a sārāsāraṃ balaṃ vīryam ātmano dviṣataś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6302: 12,114.013c jānan vicarati prājño na sa yāti parābhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:6303: 12,114.014a evam eva yadā vidvān manyetātibalaṃ ripum
GE07mbh_12_u:6304: 12,114.014c saṃśrayed vaitasīṃ vṛttim evaṃ prajñānalakṣaṇam 12,115.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,115.001a vidvān mūrkhapragalbhena mṛdus tīkṣṇena bhārata 12,115.001c ākruśyamānaḥ sadasi kathaṃ kuryād ariṃdama 12,115.002 bhīṣma uvāca 12,115.002a śrūyatāṃ pṛthivīpāla yathaiṣo 'rtho 'nugīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6306: 12,115.003a aruṣyan kruśyamānasya sukṛtaṃ nāma vindati 12,115.003c duṣkṛtaṃ cātmano marṣī ruṣyaty evāpamārṣṭi vai
GE07mbh_12_u:6307: 12,115.004a ṭiṭṭibhaṃ tam upekṣeta vāśamānam ivāturam 12,115.004c lokavidveṣam āpanno niṣphalaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:6308: 12,115.005a iti sa ślāghate nityaṃ tena pāpena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:6309: 12,115.005c idam ukto mayā kaś cit saṃmato janasaṃsadi

GE07mbh_12_u:6369: 12,117.011c śvārtham atyantasaṃduṣṭaḥ krūraḥ kāla ivāntakaḥ 12,117.012a lelihyamānas tṛṣitaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:6499: 12,119.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,119.001a evaṃ śunāsamān bhṛtyān svasthāne yo narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6500: 12,119.001c niyojayati kṛtyeṣu sa rājyaphalam aśnute 12,119.002a na śvā svasthānam utkramya pramāṇam abhi satkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6501: 12,119.002c āropyaḥ śvā svakāt sthānād utkramyānyat prapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6503: 12,119.003c prakartavyā budhā bhṛtyā nāsthāne prakriyā kṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:6504: 12,119.004a anurūpāṇi karmāṇi bhṛtyebhyo yaḥ prayacchati 12,119.004c sa bhṛtyaguṇasaṃpannaṃ rājā phalam upāśnute 12,119.005a śarabhaḥ śarabhasthāne siṃhaḥ siṃha ivorjitaḥ 12,119.005c vyāghro vyāghra iva sthāpyo dvīpī dvīpī yathā tathā 12,119.006a karmasv ihānurūpeṣu nyasyā bhṛtyā yathāvidhi 12,119.006c pratilomaṃ na bhṛtyās te sthāpyāḥ karmaphalaiṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:6505: 12,119.007a yaḥ pramāṇam atikramya pratilomaṃ narādhipaḥ 12,119.007c bhṛtyān sthāpayate 'buddhir na sa rañjayate prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6506: 12,119.008a na bāliśā na ca kṣudrā na cāpratimitendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6507: 12,119.008c nākulīnā narāḥ pārśve sthāpyā rājñā hitaiṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:6509: 12,119.009c akṣudrāḥ śucayo dakṣā narāḥ syuḥ pāripārśvakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6510: 12,119.010a nyagbhūtās tatparāḥ kṣāntāś caukṣāḥ prakṛtijāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6511: 12,119.010c sve sve sthāne 'parikruṣṭās te syū rājño bahiścarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6512: 12,119.011a siṃhasya satataṃ pārśve siṃha eva jano bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:6513: 12,119.011c asiṃhaḥ siṃhasahitaḥ siṃhaval labhate phalam 12,119.012a yas tu siṃhaḥ śvabhiḥ kīrṇaḥ siṃhakarmaphale rataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6514: 12,119.012c na sa siṃhaphalaṃ bhoktuṃ śaktaḥ śvabhir upāsitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6515: 12,119.013a evam etair manuṣyendra śūraiḥ prājñair bahuśrutaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6516: 12,119.013c kulīnaiḥ saha śakyeta kṛtsnāṃ jetuṃ vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_12_u:6517: 12,119.014a nāvaidyo nānṛjuḥ pārśve nāvidyo nāmahādhanaḥ 12,119.014c saṃgrāhyo vasudhāpālair bhṛtyo bhṛtyavatāṃ vara 12,119.015a bāṇavad visṛtā yānti svāmikāryaparā janāḥ 12,119.015c ye bhṛtyāḥ pārthivahitās teṣāṃ sāntvaṃ prayojayet
GE07mbh_12_u:6518: 12,119.016a kośaś ca satataṃ rakṣyo yatnam āsthāya rājabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6519: 12,119.016c kośamūlā hi rājānaḥ kośamūlakaro bhava 12,119.017a koṣṭhāgāraṃ ca te nityaṃ sphītaṃ dhānyaiḥ susaṃcitam
GE07mbh_12_u:6520: 12,119.017c sadāstu satsu saṃnyastaṃ dhanadhānyaparo bhava 12,119.018a nityayuktāś ca te bhṛtyā bhavantu raṇakovidāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6521: 12,119.018c vājināṃ ca prayogeṣu vaiśāradyam iheṣyate 12,119.019a jñātibandhujanāvekṣī mitrasaṃbandhisaṃvṛtaḥ 12,119.019c paurakāryahitānveṣī bhava kauravanandana
GE07mbh_12_u:6522: 12,119.020a eṣā te naiṣṭhikī buddhiḥ prajñā cābhihitā mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:6523: 12,119.020c śvā te nidarśanaṃ tāta kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi 12,120.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,120.001a rājavṛttāny anekāni tvayā proktāni bhārata 12,120.001c pūrvaiḥ pūrvaniyuktāni rājadharmārthavedibhiḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:6528: 12,120.004a yathā barhāṇi citrāṇi bibharti bhujagāśanaḥ 12,120.004c tathā bahuvidhaṃ rājā rūpaṃ kurvīta dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:6529: 12,120.005a taikṣṇyaṃ jihmatvam ādāntyaṃ satyam ārjavam eva ca

GE07mbh_12_u:6531: 12,120.006a yasminn arthe hitaṃ yat syāt tad varṇaṃ rūpam āviśet

GE07mbh_12_u:6537: 12,120.010a mṛjāvān syāt svayūthyeṣu bhāvāni caraṇaiḥ kṣipet
GE07mbh_12_u:6538: 12,120.010c jātapakṣaḥ parispanded rakṣed vaikalyam ātmanaḥ 12,120.011a doṣān vivṛṇuyāc chatroḥ parapakṣān vidhūnayet 12,120.011c kānaneṣv iva puṣpāṇi barhīvārthān samācaret 12,120.012a ucchritān āśrayet sphītān narendrān acalopamān 12,120.012c śrayec chāyām avijñātāṃ guptaṃ śaraṇam āśrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:6540: 12,120.013c māyūreṇa guṇenaiva strībhiś cālakṣitaś caret 12,120.013e na jahyāc ca tanutrāṇaṃ rakṣed ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:6541: 12,120.014a cārabhūmiṣv abhigamān pāśāṃś ca parivarjayet 12,120.014c pīḍayec cāpi tāṃ bhūmiṃ praṇaśyed gahane punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6542: 12,120.014d*0278_01 evaṃ mayūradharmeṇa vartayan satataṃ naraḥ 12,120.015a hanyāt kruddhān ativiṣān ye jihmagatayo 'hitān
GE07mbh_12_u:6544: 12,120.016a sadā barhinibhaḥ kāmaṃ prasaktikṛtam ācaret 12,120.016c sarvataś cādadet prajñāṃ pataṃgān gahaneṣv iva
GE07mbh_12_u:6545: 12,120.016e evaṃ mayūravad rājā svarāṣṭraṃ paripālayet 12,120.017a ātmavṛddhikarīṃ nītiṃ vidadhīta vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6548: 12,120.018a paraṃ cāśvāsayet sāmnā svaśaktiṃ copalakṣayet 12,120.018c ātmanaḥ parimarśena buddhiṃ buddhyā vicārayet 12,120.018e sāntvayogamatiḥ prājñaḥ kāryākāryavicārakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6549: 12,120.019a nigūḍhabuddhir dhīraḥ syād vaktavye vakṣyate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:6550: 12,120.019c saṃnikṛṣṭāṃ kathāṃ prājño yadi buddhyā bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6551: 12,120.019e svabhāvam eṣyate taptaṃ kṛṣṇāyasam ivodake 12,120.020a anuyuñjīta kṛtyāni sarvāṇy eva mahīpatiḥ 12,120.020c āgamair upadiṣṭāni svasya caiva parasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6552: 12,120.021a kṣudraṃ krūraṃ tathā prājñaṃ śūraṃ cārthaviśāradam
GE07mbh_12_u:6553: 12,120.021c svakarmaṇi niyuñjīta ye cānye vacanādhikāḥ 12,120.022a apy adṛṣṭvā niyuktāni anurūpeṣu karmasu 12,120.022c sarvāṃs tān anuvarteta svarāṃs tantrīr ivāyatā
GE07mbh_12_u:6554: 12,120.023a dharmāṇām avirodhena sarveṣāṃ priyam ācaret 12,120.023c mamāyam iti rājā yaḥ sa parvata ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6555: 12,120.024a vyavasāyaṃ samādhāya sūryo raśmim ivāyatām 12,120.024c dharmam evābhirakṣeta kṛtvā tulye priyāpriye 12,120.025a kulaprakṛtideśānāṃ dharmajñān mṛdubhāṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6556: 12,120.025c madhye vayasi nirdoṣān hite yuktāñ jitendriyān
GE07mbh_12_u:6557: 12,120.026a alubdhāñ śikṣitān dāntān dharmeṣu pariniṣṭhitān 12,120.026c sthāpayet sarvakāryeṣu rājā dharmārtharakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6558: 12,120.027a etenaiva prakāreṇa kṛtyānām āgatiṃ gatim 12,120.027c yuktaḥ samanutiṣṭheta tuṣṭaś cārair upaskṛtaḥ 12,120.028a amoghakrodhaharṣasya svayaṃ kṛtyānvavekṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6560: 12,120.029a vyaktaś cānugraho yasya yathārthaś cāpi nigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6561: 12,120.029c guptātmā guptarāṣṭraś ca sa rājā rājadharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:6562: 12,120.030a nityaṃ rāṣṭram avekṣeta gobhiḥ sūrya ivotpatan
GE07mbh_12_u:6563: 12,120.030c cārāṃś ca nacarān vidyāt tathā buddhyā na saṃjvaret 12,120.031a kālaprāptam upādadyān nārthaṃ rājā prasūcayet 12,120.031c ahany ahani saṃduhyān mahīṃ gām iva buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:6564: 12,120.032a yathā krameṇa puṣpebhyaś cinoti madhu ṣaṭpadaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6565: 12,120.032c tathā dravyam upādāya rājā kurvīta saṃcayam
GE07mbh_12_u:6566: 12,120.033a yad dhi guptāvaśiṣṭaṃ syāt tad dhitaṃ dharmakāmayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6567: 12,120.033c saṃcayānuvisargī syād rājā śāstravid ātmavān 12,120.034a nālpam arthaṃ paribhaven nāvamanyeta śātravān 12,120.034c buddhyāvabudhyed ātmānaṃ na cābuddhiṣu viśvaset 12,120.035a dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ saṃyamo buddhir agryā; dhairyaṃ śauryaṃ deśakālo 'pramādaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6568: 12,120.035c svalpasya vā mahato vāpi vṛddhau; dhanasyaitāny aṣṭa samindhanāni
GE07mbh_12_u:6569: 12,120.036a agnistoko vardhate hy ājyasikto; bījaṃ caikaṃ bahusāhasram eti
GE07mbh_12_u:6570: 12,120.036c kṣayodayau vipulau saṃniśāmya; tasmād alpaṃ nāvamanyeta vidvān
GE07mbh_12_u:6571: 12,120.037a bālo 'bālaḥ sthaviro vā ripur yaḥ; sadā pramattaṃ puruṣaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:6573: 12,120.037c kālenānyas tasya mūlaṃ hareta; kālajñātā pārthivānāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6574: 12,120.038a haret kīrtiṃ dharmam asyoparundhyād; arthe dīrghaṃ vīryam
GE07mbh_12_u:6576: 12,120.038c ripur dveṣṭā durbalo vā balī vā; tasmāc chatrau naiva heḍed yatātmā 12,120.039a kṣayaṃ śatroḥ saṃcayaṃ pālanaṃ cāpy; ubhau cārthau sahitau
GE07mbh_12_u:6578: 12,120.039c ataś cānyan matimān saṃdadhīta; tasmād rājā buddhimantaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:6580: 12,120.040a buddhir dīptā balavantaṃ hinasti; balaṃ buddhyā vardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:6582: 12,120.040c śatrur buddhyā sīdate vardhamāno; buddheḥ paścāt karma yat tat praśastam
GE07mbh_12_u:6583: 12,120.041a sarvān kāmān kāmayāno hi dhīraḥ; sattvenālpenāplute hīnadehaḥ 12,120.041c yathātmānaṃ prārthayate 'rthamānaiḥ; śreyaḥpātraṃ pūrayate hy

GE07mbh_12_u:6744: 12,122.025d@013_0013 śatāni trīṇi śāstrāṇām āha tantrāṇi saptatim
GE07mbh_12_u:6745: 12,122.025d@013_0014 vyāsa eva tu vidyānāṃ mahādevena kīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6746: 12,122.025d@013_0015 tantraṃ pāśupataṃ nāma pāñcarātraṃ ca viśrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:6747: 12,122.025d@013_0016 yogaśāstraṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ ca tantraṃ lokāyataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:6748: 12,122.025d@013_0017 tantraṃ brahmatulā nāma tarkavidyā divaukasām 12,122.025d@013_0018 sukhaduḥkhārthajijñāsā kārakaṃ ceti viśrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:6749: 12,122.025d@013_0019 tarkavidyās tathā cāṣṭau sa cokto nyāyavistaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6750: 12,122.025d@013_0020 daśa cāṣṭau ca vijñeyāḥ paurāṇā yajñasaṃhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6751: 12,122.025d@013_0021 purāṇāś ca praṇītāś ca tāvad eva hi saṃhitāḥ 12,122.025d@013_0022 dharmaśāstrāṇi tadvac ca ekārthānīti nānyathā 12,122.025d@013_0023 ekārthāni purāṇāni vedāś caikārthasaṃhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6752: 12,122.025d@013_0024 nānārthāni ca sarvāṇi tarkaśāstrāṇi śaṃkaraḥ 12,122.025d@013_0025 provāca bhagavān devaḥ kālajñānāni yāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6754: 12,122.025d@013_0027 aṣṭādaśa vikalpāntāṃ daṇḍanītiṃ ca śāśvatīm 12,122.025d@013_0028 gāndharvam itihāsaṃ ca nānāvistaram uktavān 12,122.025d@013_0029 ity etāḥ śaṃkaraproktā vidyāḥ śabdārthasaṃyutāḥ 12,122.025d@013_0030 punar bhedasahasraṃ ca tāsām eva tu vistaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6756: 12,122.025d@013_0032 śaśvad abhyasyate loke veda eva ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6757: 12,122.025d@013_0033 vidyāś catasraḥ saṃkṣiptā vedavādāś ca te smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6758: 12,122.025d@013_0034 etāsāṃ pārago yaś ca sa cokto vedapāragaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6759: 12,122.025d@013_0035 vedānāṃ pārago rudro viṣṇur indro bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6760: 12,122.025d@013_0036 śukraḥ svāyaṃbhuvaś caiva manuḥ paramadharmavit 12,122.025d@013_0037 brahmā ca paramo devaḥ sadā sarvaiḥ surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6761: 12,122.025d@013_0038 śarvasyānugrahāc caiva vyāso vai vedapāragaḥ 12,122.025d@013_0039 ahaṃ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmaḥ prasādān mādhavasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6762: 12,122.025d@013_0040 śaṃkarasya prasādāc ca brahmaṇaś ca kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_12_u:6763: 12,122.025d@013_0041 vedapāraga ity ukto yājñavalkyaś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6764: 12,122.025d@013_0042 kalpe kalpe mahābhāgair ṛṣibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ 12,122.025d@013_0043 ṛṣiputrair ṛṣīkaiś ca bhidyante miśrakair api
GE07mbh_12_u:6765: 12,122.025d@013_0044 śivena brahmaṇā caiva viṣṇunā ca vikalpitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6766: 12,122.025d@013_0045 ādikalpe punaś caiva bhidyante sādhubhiḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6767: 12,122.025d@013_0046 idānīm api vidvadbhir bhidyante ca vikalpakaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6769: 12,122.026a bhūyaḥ sa bhagavān dhyātvā ciraṃ śūlavarāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6770: 12,122.026c tasya tasya nikāyasya cakāraikaikam īśaram 12,122.027a devānām īśvaraṃ cakre devaṃ daśaśatekṣaṇam 12,122.027c yamaṃ vaivasvataṃ cāpi pitṝṇām akarot patim
GE07mbh_12_u:6771: 12,122.028a dhanānāṃ rakṣasāṃ cāpi kuberam api ceśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:6772: 12,122.028c parvatānāṃ patiṃ meruṃ saritāṃ ca mahodadhim
GE07mbh_12_u:6773: 12,122.029a apāṃ rājye surāṇāṃ ca vidadhe varuṇaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:6774: 12,122.029c mṛtyuṃ prāṇeśvaram atho tejasāṃ ca hutāśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:6775: 12,122.030a rudrāṇām api ceśānaṃ goptāraṃ vidadhe prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6777: 12,122.030d*0281_01 daśa caikaṃ ca ye rudrās tasyaite mūrtisaṃbhavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6778: 12,122.030d*0281_02 nānārūpadharo devaḥ sa eva bhagavāñ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6779: 12,122.031a vasiṣṭham īśaṃ viprāṇāṃ vasūnāṃ jātavedasam 12,122.031c tejasāṃ bhāskaraṃ cakre nakṣatrāṇāṃ niśākaram 12,122.032a vīrudhām aṃśumantaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ca prabhuṃ varam
GE07mbh_12_u:6780: 12,122.032c kumāraṃ dvādaśabhujaṃ skandaṃ rājānam ādiśat 12,122.033a kālaṃ sarveśam akarot
GE07mbh_12_u:6781: 12,122.033c mṛtyoś caturvibhāgasya duḥkhasya ca sukhasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6782: 12,122.034a īśvaraḥ sarvadehas tu rājarājo dhanādhipaḥ 12,122.034c sarveṣām eva rudrāṇāṃ śūlapāṇir iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6783: 12,122.034d*0282_01 īśvaraś cetanaḥ kartā puruṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6784: 12,122.034d*0282_02 viṣṇur brahmā śaśī sūryaḥ śakro devāś ca sānvayāḥ 12,122.034d*0282_03 jñānātmakaḥ śivo hy eva eteṣām api kāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:6785: 12,122.034d*0282_04 sṛjate grasate caiva tamobhūtam idaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:6786: 12,122.034d*0282_05 aprajñātaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tadā hy eko maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6787: 12,122.035a tam ekaṃ brahmaṇaḥ putram anujātaṃ kṣupaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:6788: 12,122.035c prajānām adhipaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvadharmabhṛtām api 12,122.036a mahādevas tatas tasmin vṛtte yajñe yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:6789: 12,122.036c daṇḍaṃ dharmasya goptāraṃ viṣṇave satkṛtaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:6790: 12,122.037a viṣṇur aṅgirase prādād aṅgirā munisattamaḥ 12,122.037c prādād indramarīcibhyāṃ marīcir bhṛgave dadau 12,122.038a bhṛgur dadāv ṛṣibhyas tu taṃ daṇḍaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:6791: 12,122.038c ṛṣayo lokapālebhyo lokapālāḥ kṣupāya ca 12,122.039a kṣupas tu manave prādād ādityatanayāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6793: 12,122.039e taṃ dadau sūryaputras tu manur vai rakṣaṇātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:6794: 12,122.040a vibhajya daṇḍaḥ kartavyo dharmeṇa na yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:6795: 12,122.040c durvācā nigraho bandho hiraṇyaṃ bāhyataḥkriyā 12,122.041a vyaṅgatvaṃ ca śarīrasya vadho vā nālpakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:6796: 12,122.041c śarīrapīḍās tās tās tu dehatyāgo vivāsanam
GE07mbh_12_u:6797: 12,122.042a ānupūrvyā ca daṇḍo 'sau prajā jāgarti pālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:6798: 12,122.042c indro jāgarti bhagavān indrād agnir vibhāvasuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6799: 12,122.043a agner jāgarti varuṇo varuṇāc ca prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6800: 12,122.043c prajāpates tato dharmo jāgarti vinayātmakaḥ 12,122.044a dharmāc ca brahmaṇaḥ putro vyavasāyaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6801: 12,122.044c vyavasāyāt tatas tejo jāgarti paripālayan 12,122.045a oṣadhyas tejasas tasmād oṣadhibhyaś ca parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6802: 12,122.045c parvatebhyaś ca jāgarti raso rasaguṇāt tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:6803: 12,122.046a jāgarti nirṛtir devī jyotīṃṣi nirṛter api
GE07mbh_12_u:6804: 12,122.046c vedāḥ pratiṣṭhā jyotirbhyas tato hayaśirāḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6805: 12,122.047a brahmā pitāmahas tasmāj jāgarti prabhur avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6806: 12,122.047c pitāmahān mahādevo jāgarti bhagavāñ śivaḥ 12,122.048a viśvedevāḥ śivāc cāpi viśvebhyaś ca tatharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6807: 12,122.048c ṛṣibhyo bhagavān somaḥ somād devāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6808: 12,122.049a devebhyo brāhmaṇā loke jāgratīty upadhāraya 12,122.049c brāhmaṇebhyaś ca rājanyā lokān rakṣanti dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6809: 12,122.049e sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva kṣatriyebhyaḥ sanātanam 12,122.050a prajā jāgrati loke 'smin daṇḍo jāgarti tāsu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6811: 12,122.051a jāgarti kālaḥ pūrvaṃ ca madhye cānte ca bhārata 12,122.051c īśvaraḥ sarvalokasya mahādevaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6812: 12,122.052a devadevaḥ śivaḥ śarvo jāgarti satataṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6813: 12,122.052c kapardī śaṃkaro rudro bhavaḥ sthāṇur umāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6814: 12,122.053a ity eṣa daṇḍo vikhyāta ādau madhye tathāvare
GE07mbh_12_u:6816: 12,122.054 bhīṣma uvāca 12,122.054a itīdaṃ vasuhomasya śṛṇuyād yo mataṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6817: 12,122.054c śrutvā ca samyag varteta sa kāmān āpnuyān nṛpaḥ 12,122.055a iti te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yo daṇḍo manujarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:6819: 12,122.055d*0283_01 vasuhomāc chrutaṃ rājñā māndhātrā bhūbhṛtā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:6820: 12,122.055d*0283_02 mayāpi kathitaṃ puṇyam ākhyānaṃ prathitaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:6821: 12,123.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,123.001a tāta dharmārthakāmānāṃ śrotum icchāmi niścayam 12,123.001c lokayātrā hi kārtsnyena triṣv eteṣu pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:6822: 12,123.002a dharmārthakāmāḥ kiṃmūlās trayāṇāṃ prabhavaś ca kaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6823: 12,123.002c anyonyaṃ cānuṣajjante vartante ca pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:6824: 12,123.003 bhīṣma uvāca 12,123.003a yadā te syuḥ sumanaso lokasaṃsthārthaniścaye 12,123.003c kālaprabhavasaṃsthāsu sajjante ca trayas tadā 12,123.004a dharmamūlas tu deho 'rthaḥ kāmo 'rthaphalam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6825: 12,123.004c saṃkalpamūlās te sarve saṃkalpo viṣayātmakaḥ 12,123.005a viṣayāś caiva kārtsnyena sarva āhārasiddhaye 12,123.005c mūlam etat trivargasya nivṛttir mokṣa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6826: 12,123.006a dharmaḥ śarīrasaṃguptir dharmārthaṃ cārtha iṣyate 12,123.006c kāmo ratiphalaś cātra sarve caite rajasvalāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6827: 12,123.007a saṃnikṛṣṭāṃś cared enān na cainān manasā tyajet
GE07mbh_12_u:6828: 12,123.007c vimuktas tamasā sarvān dharmādīn kāmanaiṣṭhikān 12,123.008a śreṣṭhabuddhis trivargasya yad ayaṃ prāpnuyāt kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:6829: 12,123.008b*0284_01 karmaṇā buddhipūrveṇa bhavaty artho na vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6830: 12,123.008b*0285_01 arthārtham anyad bhavati viparītam athāparam 12,123.008b*0285_02 anarthārtham avāpyārtham anyatrādyopakārakam
GE07mbh_12_u:6831: 12,123.008c buddhyā budhyed ihārthe na tad ahnā tu nikṛṣṭayā 12,123.009a apadhyānamalo dharmo malo 'rthasya nigūhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:6834: 12,123.010c kāmandasya ca saṃvādam aṅgāriṣṭhasya cobhayoḥ 12,123.011a kāmandam ṛṣim āsīnam abhivādya narādhipaḥ 12,123.011c aṅgāriṣṭho 'tha papraccha kṛtvā samayaparyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:6835: 12,123.012a yaḥ pāpaṃ kurute rājā kāmamohabalātkṛtaḥ 12,123.012c pratyāsannasya tasyarṣe kiṃ syāt pāpapraṇāśanam 12,123.013a adharmo dharma iti ha yo 'jñānād ācared iha 12,123.013c taṃ cāpi prathitaṃ loke kathaṃ rājā nivartayet
GE07mbh_12_u:6836: 12,123.014 kāmanda uvāca 12,123.014a yo dharmārthau samutsṛjya kāmam evānuvartate 12,123.014c sa dharmārthaparityāgāt prajñānāśam ihārchati
GE07mbh_12_u:6838: 12,123.015c tasmān nāstikatā caiva durācāraś ca jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6839: 12,123.016a durācārān yadā rājā praduṣṭān na niyacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:6840: 12,123.016c tasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarpād veśmagatād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:6841: 12,123.017a taṃ prajā nānuvartante brāhmaṇā na ca sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6842: 12,123.017c tataḥ saṃkṣayam āpnoti tathā vadhyatvam eti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6843: 12,123.018a apadhvastas tv avamato duḥkhaṃ jīvati jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:6844: 12,123.018c jīvec ca yad apadhvastas tac chuddhaṃ maraṇaṃ bhavet 12,123.019a atraitad āhur ācāryāḥ pāpasya ca nibarhaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:6845: 12,123.019c sevitavyā trayī vidyā satkāro brāhmaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6846: 12,123.020a mahāmanā bhaved dharme vivahec ca mahākule
GE07mbh_12_u:6847: 12,123.020c brāhmaṇāṃś cāpi seveta kṣamāyuktān manasvinaḥ 12,123.021a japed udakaśīlaḥ syāt sumukho nānyad āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6848: 12,123.021c dharmānvitān saṃpraviśed bahiḥ kṛtvaiva duṣkṛtīn 12,123.022a prasādayen madhuraya vācāpy atha ca karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:6849: 12,123.022c ity asmīti vaden nityaṃ pareṣāṃ kīrtayan guṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:6850: 12,123.023a apāpo hy evam ācāraḥ kṣipraṃ bahumato bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:6851: 12,123.023c pāpāny api ca kṛcchrāṇi śamayen nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6852: 12,123.024a guravo 'pi paraṃ dharmaṃ yad brūyus tat tathā kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:6853: 12,123.024c gurūṇāṃ hi prasādād dhi śreyaḥ param avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:6854: 12,124.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,124.001a ime janā naraśreṣṭha praśaṃsanti sadā bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:6855: 12,124.001c dharmasya śīlam evādau tato me saṃśayo mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:6856: 12,124.002a yadi tac chakyam asmābhir jñātuṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:6857: 12,124.002c śrotum icchāmi tat sarvaṃ yathaitad upalabhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6858: 12,124.003a kathaṃ nu prāpyate śīlaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:6859: 12,124.003c kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ ca tat proktaṃ brūhi me vadatāṃ vara 12,124.004 bhīṣma uvāca 12,124.004a purā duryodhaneneha dhṛtarāṣṭrāya mānada
GE07mbh_12_u:6860: 12,124.004c ākhyātaṃ tapyamānena śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāgatām 12,124.005a indraprasthe mahārāja tava sabhrātṛkasya ha 12,124.005c sabhāyāṃ cāvahasanaṃ tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:6861: 12,124.006a bhavatas tāṃ sabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā samṛddhiṃ cāpy anuttamām
GE07mbh_12_u:6862: 12,124.006c duryodhanas tadāsīnaḥ sarvaṃ pitre nyavedayat 12,124.007a śrutvā ca dhṛtarāṣṭro 'pi duryodhanavacas tadā 12,124.007c abravīt karṇasahitaṃ duryodhanam idaṃ vacaḥ 12,124.008a kimarthaṃ tapyase putra śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6863: 12,124.008c śrutvā tvām anuneṣyāmi yadi samyag bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:6864: 12,124.009a yathā tvaṃ mahad aiśvaryaṃ prāptaḥ parapuraṃjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:6865: 12,124.009c kiṃkarā bhrātaraḥ sarve mitrāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:6867: 12,124.010c ājāneyā vahanti tvāṃ kasmāc chocasi putraka
GE07mbh_12_u:6868: 12,124.011 duryodhana uvāca 12,124.011a daśa tāni sahasrāṇi snātakānāṃ mahātmanām 12,124.011c bhuñjate rukmapātrīṣu yudhiṣṭhiraniveśane
GE07mbh_12_u:6869: 12,124.012a dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ sabhāṃ divyāṃ divyapuṣpaphalānvitām
GE07mbh_12_u:6870: 12,124.012c aśvāṃs tittirakalmāṣān ratnāni vividhāni ca 12,124.013a dṛṣṭvā tāṃ pāṇḍaveyānām ṛddhim indropamāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_12_u:6872: 12,124.014 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 12,124.014a yadīcchasi śriyaṃ tāta yādṛśīṃ tāṃ yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_12_u:6873: 12,124.014c viśiṣṭāṃ vā naravyāghra śīlavān bhava putraka
GE07mbh_12_u:6874: 12,124.015a śīlena hi trayo lokāḥ śakyā jetuṃ na saṃśayaḥ 12,124.015c na hi kiṃ cid asādhyaṃ vai loke śīlavatāṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:6877: 12,124.017a ete hi pārthivāḥ sarve śīlavanto damānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6878: 12,124.017c atas teṣāṃ guṇakrītā vasudhā svayam āgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:6879: 12,124.017d*0286_00 duryodhana uvāca 12,124.017d*0286_01 kathaṃ tat prāpyate śīlaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:6880: 12,124.017d*0286_02 yena śīlena saṃprāptāḥ kṣipram ete vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_12_u:6882: 12,124.018c nāradena purā proktaṃ śīlam āśritya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:6883: 12,124.019a prahrādena hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ mahendrasya mahātmanaḥ 12,124.019c śīlam āśritya daityena trailokyaṃ ca vaśīkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:6884: 12,124.020a tato bṛhaspatiṃ śakraḥ prāñjaliḥ samupasthitaḥ 12,124.020c uvāca ca mahāprājñaḥ śreya icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_12_u:6885: 12,124.021a tato bṛhaspatis tasmai jñānaṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ param
GE07mbh_12_u:6886: 12,124.021c kathayām āsa bhagavān devendrāya kurūdvaha 12,124.022a etāvac chreya ity eva bṛhaspatir abhāṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:6887: 12,124.022c indras tu bhūyaḥ papraccha kva viśeṣo bhaved iti 12,124.023 bṛhaspatir uvāca 12,124.023a viśeṣo 'sti mahāṃs tāta bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6888: 12,124.023c tatrāgamaya bhadraṃ te bhūya eva puraṃdara
GE07mbh_12_u:6889: 12,124.024 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 12,124.024a ātmanas tu tataḥ śreyo bhārgavāt sumahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6890: 12,124.024c jñānam āgamayat prītyā punaḥ sa paramadyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6892: 12,124.025c śreyo 'stīti punar bhūyaḥ śukram āha śatakratuḥ 12,124.026a bhārgavas tv āha dharmajñaḥ prahrādasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6893: 12,124.026c jñānam asti viśeṣeṇa tato hṛṣṭaś ca so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:6894: 12,124.027a sa tato brāhmaṇo bhūtvā prahrādaṃ pākaśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6895: 12,124.027c sṛtvā provāca medhāvī śreya icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_12_u:6896: 12,124.028a prahrādas tv abravīd vipraṃ kṣaṇo nāsti dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:6897: 12,124.028c trailokyarājye saktasya tato nopadiśāmi te 12,124.029a brāhmaṇas tv abravīd vākyaṃ kasmin kāle kṣaṇo bhavet 12,124.029c tatopadiṣṭam icchāmi yad yat kāryāntaraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:6899: 12,124.030c tathety uktvā śubhe kāle jñānatattvaṃ dadau tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:6901: 12,124.031c cakāra sarvabhāvena yadvat sa manasecchati 12,124.032a pṛṣṭaś ca tena bahuśaḥ prāptaṃ katham ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:6902: 12,124.032c trailokyarājyaṃ dharmajña kāraṇaṃ tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:6904: 12,124.033 prahrāda uvāca 12,124.033a nāsūyāmi dvijaśreṣṭha rājāsmīti kadā cana 12,124.033c kavyāni vadatāṃ tāta saṃyacchāmi vahāmi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6905: 12,124.034a te visrabdhāḥ prabhāṣante saṃyacchanti ca māṃ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:6906: 12,124.034c te mā kavyapade saktaṃ śuśrūṣum anasūyakam
GE07mbh_12_u:6908: 12,124.035c samācinvanti śāstāraḥ kṣaudraṃ madhv iva makṣikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6911: 12,124.037a etat pṛthivyām amṛtam etac cakṣur anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:6912: 12,124.037c yad brāhmaṇamukhe kavyam etac chrutvā pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:6913: 12,124.038 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 12,124.038a etāvac chreya ity āha prahrādo brahmavādinam
GE07mbh_12_u:6914: 12,124.038c śuśrūṣitas tena tadā daityendro vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:6916: 12,124.039c varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te pradātāsmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6917: 12,124.040a kṛtam ity eva daityendram uvāca sa ca vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6918: 12,124.040c prahrādas tv abravīt prīto gṛhyatāṃ vara ity uta 12,124.041 brāhmaṇa uvāca 12,124.041a yadi rājan prasannas tvaṃ mama cecchasi ced dhitam 12,124.041c bhavataḥ śīlam icchāmi prāptum eṣa varo mama
GE07mbh_12_u:6919: 12,124.042 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 12,124.042a tataḥ prītaś ca daityendro bhayaṃ cāsyābhavan
GE07mbh_12_u:6920: 12,124.042c vare pradiṣṭe vipreṇa nālpatejāyam ity uta
GE07mbh_12_u:6921: 12,124.043a evam astv iti taṃ prāha prahrādo vismitas tadā 12,124.043c upākṛtya tu viprāya varaṃ duḥkhānvito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:6922: 12,124.044a datte vare gate vipre cintāsīn mahatī tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6923: 12,124.044c prahrādasya mahārāja niścayaṃ na ca jagmivān
GE07mbh_12_u:6924: 12,124.045a tasya cintayatas tāta chāyābhūtaṃ mahādyute 12,124.045c tejo vigrahavat tāta śarīram ajahāt tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:6925: 12,124.046a tam apṛcchan mahākāyaṃ prahrādaḥ ko bhavān iti
GE07mbh_12_u:6926: 12,124.046c pratyāha nanu śīlo 'smi tyakto gacchāmy ahaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:6927: 12,124.047a tasmin dvijavare rājan vatsyāmy aham aninditam
GE07mbh_12_u:6928: 12,124.047c yo 'sau śiṣyatvam āgamya tvayi nityaṃ samāhitaḥ 12,124.047e ity uktvāntarhitaṃ tad vai śakraṃ cānvaviśat prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:6929: 12,124.048a tasmiṃs tejasi yāte tu tādṛgrūpas tato 'paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6930: 12,124.048c śarīrān niḥsṛtas tasya ko bhavān iti cābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:6931: 12,124.049a dharmaṃ prahrāda māṃ viddhi yatrāsau dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6932: 12,124.049c tatra yāsyāmi daityendra yataḥ śīlaṃ tato hy aham 12,124.050a tato 'paro mahārāja prajvalann iva tejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:6933: 12,124.050c śarīrān niḥsṛtas tasya prahrādasya mahātmanaḥ 12,124.051a ko bhavān iti pṛṣṭaś ca tam āha sa mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6934: 12,124.051c satyam asmy asurendrāgrya yāsye 'haṃ dharmam anv iha
GE07mbh_12_u:6936: 12,124.052c niścakrāma tatas tasmāt pṛṣṭaś cāha mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:6937: 12,124.052e vṛttaṃ prahrāda māṃ viddhi yataḥ satyaṃ tato hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:6938: 12,124.053a tasmin gate mahāśvetaḥ śarīrāt tasya niryayau
GE07mbh_12_u:6939: 12,124.053c pṛṣṭaś cāha balaṃ viddhi yato vṛttam ahaṃ tataḥ 12,124.053e ity uktvā ca yayau tatra yato vṛttaṃ narādhipa 12,124.054a tataḥ prabhāmayī devī śarīrāt tasya niryayau
GE07mbh_12_u:6940: 12,124.054c tām apṛcchat sa daityendraḥ sā śrīr ity evam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:6941: 12,124.055a uṣitāsmi sukhaṃ vīra tvayi satyaparākrame 12,124.055c tvayā tyaktā gamiṣyāmi balaṃ yatra tato hy aham 12,124.056a tato bhayaṃ prādurāsīt prahrādasya mahātmanaḥ 12,124.056c apṛcchata ca tāṃ bhūyaḥ kva yāsi kamalālaye
GE07mbh_12_u:6942: 12,124.057a tvaṃ hi satyavratā devī lokasya parameśvarī
GE07mbh_12_u:6943: 12,124.057c kaś cāsau brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhas tattvam icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_12_u:6944: 12,124.058 śrīr uvāca 12,124.058a sa śakro brahmacārī ca yas tvayā copaśikṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6945: 12,124.058c trailokye te yad aiśvaryaṃ tat tenāpahṛtaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:6946: 12,124.059a śīlena hi tvayā lokāḥ sarve dharmajña nirjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6947: 12,124.059c tad vijñāya mahendreṇa tava śīlaṃ hṛtaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:6948: 12,124.060a dharmaḥ satyaṃ tathā vṛttaṃ balaṃ caiva tathā hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:6949: 12,124.060c śīlamūlā mahāprājña sadā nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6950: 12,124.061 bhīṣma uvāca 12,124.061a evam uktvā gatā tu śrīs te ca sarve yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:6951: 12,124.061c duryodhanas tu pitaraṃ bhūya evābravīd idam
GE07mbh_12_u:6952: 12,124.062a śīlasya tattvam icchāmi vettuṃ kauravanandana 12,124.062c prāpyate ca yathā śīlaṃ tam upāyaṃ vadasva me 12,124.063 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 12,124.063a sopāyaṃ pūrvam uddiṣṭaṃ prahrādena mahātmanā 12,124.063c saṃkṣepatas tu śīlasya śṛṇu prāptiṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:6953: 12,124.064a adrohaḥ sarvabhūteṣu karmaṇā manasā girā 12,124.064c anugrahaś ca dānaṃ ca śīlam etat praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:6954: 12,124.065a yad anyeṣāṃ hitaṃ na syād ātmanaḥ karma pauruṣam 12,124.065c apatrapeta vā yena na tat kuryāt kathaṃ cana 12,124.066a tat tu karma tathā kuryād yena ślāgheta saṃsadi 12,124.066c etac chīlaṃ samāsena kathitaṃ kurusattama 12,124.067a yady apy aśīlā nṛpate prāpnuvanti kva cic chriyam 12,124.067c na bhuñjate ciraṃ tāta samūlāś ca patanti te 12,124.068a etad viditvā tattvena śīlavān bhava putraka
GE07mbh_12_u:6955: 12,124.068c yadīcchasi śriyaṃ tāta suviśiṣṭāṃ yudhiṣṭhirāt 12,124.068d*0288_01 jitā sabhā śāstravatā samāsā[? -masyā] gomatā jitā 12,124.068d*0288_02 adhvā jito yānavatā sarvaṃ śīlavatā jitam
GE07mbh_12_u:6956: 12,124.068d*0289_01 adhikāṃ vāpi rājendra tatas tvaṃ śīlavān bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:6957: 12,124.069 bhīṣma uvāca 12,124.069a etat kathitavān putre dhṛtarāṣṭro narādhipa 12,124.069c etat kuruṣva kaunteya tataḥ prāpsyasi tat phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:6958: 12,125.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,125.001a śīlaṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣe kathitaṃ te pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:6959: 12,125.001c katham āśā samutpannā yā ca sā tad vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:6960: 12,125.002a saṃśayo me mahān eṣa samutpannaḥ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:6961: 12,125.002c chettā ca tasya nānyo 'sti tvattaḥ parapuraṃjaya 12,125.003a pitāmahāśā mahatī mamāsīd dhi suyodhane 12,125.003c prāpte yuddhe tu yad yuktaṃ tat kartāyam iti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:6963: 12,125.004c tasyāṃ vihanyamānāyāṃ duḥkho mṛtyur asaṃśayam 12,125.005a so 'haṃ hatāśo durbuddhiḥ kṛtas tena durātmanā 12,125.005c dhārtarāṣṭreṇa rājendra paśya mandātmatāṃ mama 12,125.006a āśāṃ mahattarāṃ manye parvatād api sadrumāt
GE07mbh_12_u:6964: 12,125.006c ākāśād api vā rājann aprameyaiva vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6965: 12,125.007a eṣā caiva kuruśreṣṭha durvicintyā sudurlabhā 12,125.007c durlabhatvāc ca paśyāmi kim anyad durlabhaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6966: 12,125.008 bhīṣma uvāca 12,125.008a atra te vartayiṣyāmi yudhiṣṭhira nibodha tat
GE07mbh_12_u:6967: 12,125.008c itihāsaṃ sumitrasya nirvṛttam ṛṣabhasya ca 12,125.009a sumitro nāma rājarṣir haihayo mṛgayāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6968: 12,125.009c sasāra sa mṛgaṃ viddhvā bāṇena nataparvaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:6969: 12,125.010a sa mṛgo bāṇam ādāya yayāv amitavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6970: 12,125.010c sa ca rājā balī tūrṇaṃ sasāra mṛgam antikāt 12,125.011a tato nimnaṃ sthalaṃ caiva sa mṛgo 'dravad āśugaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6971: 12,125.011c muhūrtam eva rājendra samena sa pathāgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:6972: 12,125.012a tataḥ sa rājā tāruṇyād aurasena balena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6973: 12,125.012c sasāra bāṇāsanabhṛt sakhaḍgo haṃsavat tadā 12,125.013a tīrtvā nadān nadīś caiva palvalāni vanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:6975: 12,125.014a sa tu kāmān mṛgo rājann āsādyāsādya taṃ nṛpam 12,125.014c punar abhyeti javano javena mahatā tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6976: 12,125.015a sa tasya bāṇair bahubhiḥ samabhyasto vanecaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6977: 12,125.015c prakrīḍann iva rājendra punar abhyeti cāntikam
GE07mbh_12_u:6978: 12,125.016a punaś ca javam āsthāya javano mṛgayūthapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6979: 12,125.016c atītyātītya rājendra punar abhyeti cāntikam 12,125.017a tasya marmacchidaṃ ghoraṃ sumitro 'mitrakarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6982: 12,125.018c tasya bāṇapathaṃ tyaktvā tasthivān prahasann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:6983: 12,125.019a tasmin nipatite bāṇe bhūmau prajvalite tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6984: 12,125.019c praviveśa mahāraṇyaṃ mṛgo rājāpy athādravat 12,125.020a praviśya tu mahāraṇyaṃ tāpasānām athāśramam 12,125.020c āsasāda tato rājā śrāntaś copāviśat punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6985: 12,125.021a taṃ kārmukadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā śramārtaṃ kṣudhitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:6986: 12,125.021c sametya ṛṣayas tasmin pūjāṃ cakrur yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:6987: 12,125.021d*0290_01 sa pūjām ṛṣibhir dattāṃ pratigṛhya narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6988: 12,125.021d*0290_02 apṛcchat tāpasān sarvāṃs tapaso vṛddhim uttamām
GE07mbh_12_u:6989: 12,125.021d*0290_03 te tasya rājño vacanaṃ pratigṛhya tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6990: 12,125.022a ṛṣayo rājaśārdūlam apṛcchan svaṃ prayojanam 12,125.022c kena bhadramukhārthena saṃprāpto 'si tapovanam
GE07mbh_12_u:6991: 12,125.023a padātir baddhanistriṃśo dhanvī bāṇī nareśvara 12,125.023c etad icchāma vijñātuṃ kutaḥ prāpto 'si mānada
GE07mbh_12_u:6992: 12,125.023e kasmin kule hi jātas tvaṃ kiṃnāmāsi bravīhi naḥ 12,125.024a tataḥ sa rājā sarvebhyo dvijebhyaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:6993: 12,125.024c ācakhyau tad yathānyāyaṃ paricaryāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:6994: 12,125.025a haihayānāṃ kule jātaḥ sumitro mitranandanaḥ 12,125.025c carāmi mṛgayūthāni nighnan bāṇaiḥ sahasraśaḥ 12,125.025e balena mahatā guptaḥ sāmātyaḥ sāvarodhanaḥ 12,125.026a mṛgas tu viddho bāṇena mayā sarati śalyavān
GE07mbh_12_u:6995: 12,125.026c taṃ dravantam anu prāpto vanam etad yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:6997: 12,125.027a kiṃ nu duḥkham ato 'nyad vai yad ahaṃ śramakarśitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:6998: 12,125.027c bhavatām āśramaṃ prāpto hatāśo naṣṭalakṣaṇaḥ 12,125.028a na rājalakṣaṇatyāgo na purasya tapodhanāḥ 12,125.028c duḥkhaṃ karoti tat tīvraṃ yathāśā vihatā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:6999: 12,125.029a himavān vā mahāśailaḥ samudro vā mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7000: 12,125.029c mahattvān nānvapadyetāṃ rodasyor antaraṃ yathā 12,125.029e āśāyās tapasi śreṣṭhās tathā nāntam ahaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7001: 12,125.030a bhavatāṃ viditaṃ sarvaṃ sarvajñā hi tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7002: 12,125.030c bhavantaḥ sumahābhāgās tasmāt prakṣyāmi saṃśayam 12,125.031a āśāvān puruṣo yaḥ syād antarikṣam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:7003: 12,125.031c kiṃ nu jyāyastaraṃ loke mahattvāt pratibhāti vaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7004: 12,125.031e etad icchāmi tattvena śrotuṃ kim iha durlabham
GE07mbh_12_u:7005: 12,125.032a yadi guhyaṃ taponityā na vo brūteha māciram
GE07mbh_12_u:7006: 12,125.032c na hi guhyam ataḥ śrotum icchāmi dvijapuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7007: 12,125.033a bhavattapovighāto vā yena syād virame tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7008: 12,125.033c yadi vāsti kathāyogo yo 'yaṃ praśno mayeritaḥ 12,125.034a etat kāraṇasāmagryaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ 12,125.034c bhavanto hi taponityā brūyur etat samāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7009: 12,126.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,126.001a tatas teṣāṃ samastānām ṛṣīṇām ṛṣisattamaḥ 12,126.001c ṛṣabho nāma viprarṣiḥ smayann iva tato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:7010: 12,126.002a purāhaṃ rājaśārdūla tīrthāny anucaran prabho 12,126.002c samāsāditavān divyaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:7011: 12,126.003a yatra sā badarī ramyā hrado vaihāyasas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7012: 12,126.003c yatra cāśvaśirā rājan vedān paṭhati śāśvatān
GE07mbh_12_u:7013: 12,126.004a tasmin sarasi kṛtvāhaṃ vidhivat tarpaṇaṃ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:7014: 12,126.004c pitṝṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca tato ''śramam iyāṃ tadā 12,126.005a remāte yatra tau nityaṃ naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
GE07mbh_12_u:7015: 12,126.005c adūrād āśramaṃ kaṃ cid vāsārtham agamaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7016: 12,126.006a tataś cīrājinadharaṃ kṛśam uccam atīva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7017: 12,126.006c adrākṣam ṛṣim āyāntaṃ tanuṃ nāma taponidhim
GE07mbh_12_u:7019: 12,126.007c kṛśatā cāpi rājarṣe na dṛṣṭā tādṛśī kva cit 12,126.008a śarīram api rājendra tasya kāniṣṭhikāsamam 12,126.008c grīvā bāhū tathā pādau keśāś cādbhutadarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7020: 12,126.009a śiraḥ kāyānurūpaṃ ca karṇau netre tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7021: 12,126.009c tasya vāk caiva ceṣṭā ca sāmānye rājasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:7022: 12,126.010a dṛṣṭvāhaṃ taṃ kṛśaṃ vipraṃ bhītaḥ paramadurmanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7023: 12,126.010c pādau tasyābhivādyātha sthitaḥ prāñjalir agrataḥ 12,126.011a nivedya nāma gotraṃ ca pitaraṃ ca nararṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:7024: 12,126.011c pradiṣṭe cāsane tena śanair aham upāviśam

GE07mbh_12_u:7026: 12,126.012c ṛṣimadhye mahārāja tatra dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ 12,126.013a tasmiṃs tu kathayaty eva rājā rājīvalocanaḥ
