GE07mbh_12_u:7167: 12,128.043c satyaṃ ca dharmavacanaṃ yathā nāsty adhanas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7169: 12,128.044c na tulyadoṣaḥ syād evaṃ kāryākāryeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:7170: 12,128.045a naitau saṃbhavato rājan kathaṃ cid api bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:7171: 12,128.045c na hy araṇyeṣu paśyāmi dhanavṛddhān ahaṃ kva cit 12,128.046a yad idaṃ dṛśyate vittaṃ pṛthivyām iha kiṃ cana 12,128.046c mamedaṃ syān mamedaṃ syād ity ayaṃ kāṅkṣate janaḥ 12,128.047a na ca rājyasamo dharmaḥ kaś cid asti paraṃtapa 12,128.047c dharmaṃ śaṃsanti te rājñām āpadartham ito 'nyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7172: 12,128.048a dānena karmaṇā cānye tapasānye tapasvinaḥ 12,128.048c buddhyā dākṣyeṇa cāpy anye cinvanti dhanasaṃcayān
GE07mbh_12_u:7173: 12,128.049a adhanaṃ durbalaṃ prāhur dhanena balavān bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:7174: 12,128.049c sarvaṃ dhanavataḥ prāpyaṃ sarvaṃ tarati kośavān
GE07mbh_12_u:7175: 12,128.049e kośād dharmaś ca kāmaś ca paro lokas tathāpy ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:7176: 12,128.049f*0300_01 taṃ ca dharmeṇa lipseta nādharmeṇa kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:7177: 12,128.049f*0301_01 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam 12,128.049f*0301_02 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:7178: 12,129.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,129.001a kṣīṇasya dīrghasūtrasya sānukrośasya bandhuṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:7183: 12,129.003c āpannacetaso brūhi kiṃ kāryam avaśiṣyate 12,129.004 bhīṣma uvāca 12,129.004a bāhyaś ced vijigīṣuḥ syād dharmārthakuśalaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7184: 12,129.004c javena saṃdhiṃ kurvīta pūrvān pūrvān vimokṣayan
GE07mbh_12_u:7187: 12,129.006a apāsya rājadhānīṃ vā tared anyena vāpadam
GE07mbh_12_u:7188: 12,129.006c tadbhāvabhāve dravyāṇi jīvan punar upārjayet 12,129.007a yās tu syuḥ kevalatyāgāc chakyās taritum āpadaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7189: 12,129.007c kas tatrādhikam ātmānaṃ saṃtyajed arthadharmavit 12,129.008a avarodhāj jugupseta kā sapatnadhane dayā 12,129.008c na tv evātmā pradātavyaḥ śakye sati kathaṃ cana 12,129.009 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,129.009a ābhyantare prakupite bāhye copanipīḍite
GE07mbh_12_u:7190: 12,129.009c kṣīṇe kośe srute mantre kiṃ kāryam avaśiṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:7191: 12,129.010 bhīṣma uvāca 12,129.010a kṣipraṃ vā saṃdhikāmaḥ syāt kṣipraṃ vā tīkṣṇavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7194: 12,129.011c alpenāpi hi sainyena mahīṃ jayati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7195: 12,129.012a hato vā divam ārohed vijayī kṣitim āvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:7196: 12,129.012c yuddhe tu saṃtyajan prāṇāñ śakrasyaiti salokatām
GE07mbh_12_u:7197: 12,129.013a sarvalokāgamaṃ kṛtvā mṛdutvaṃ gantum eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7198: 12,129.013c viśvāsād vinayaṃ kuryād vyavasyed vāpy upānahau
GE07mbh_12_u:7199: 12,129.014a apakramitum icched vā yathākāmaṃ tu sāntvayet
GE07mbh_12_u:7200: 12,129.014c viliṅgamitvā mitreṇa tataḥ svayam upakramet 12,130.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,130.001a hīne paramake dharme sarvalokātilaṅghini
GE07mbh_12_u:7201: 12,130.001c sarvasmin dasyusād bhūte pṛthivyām upajīvane 12,130.002a kenāsmin brāhmaṇo jīvej jaghanye kāla āgate
GE07mbh_12_u:7203: 12,130.003 bhīṣma uvāca 12,130.003a vijñānabalam āsthāya jīvitavyaṃ tathāgate
GE07mbh_12_u:7204: 12,130.003c sarvaṃ sādhvartham evedam asādhvarthaṃ na kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:7205: 12,130.004a asādhubhyo nirādāya sādhubhyo yaḥ prayacchati 12,130.004c ātmānaṃ saṃkramaṃ kṛtvā kṛtsnadharmavid eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7206: 12,130.005a suroṣeṇātmano rājan rājye sthitim akopayan 12,130.005c adattam apy ādadīta dātur vittaṃ mameti vā
GE07mbh_12_u:7207: 12,130.006a vijñānabalapūto yo vartate ninditeṣv api 12,130.006c vṛttavijñānavān dhīraḥ kas taṃ kiṃ vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:7208: 12,130.007a yeṣāṃ balakṛtā vṛttir naiṣām anyābhirocate 12,130.007c tejasābhipravardhante balavanto yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:7209: 12,130.008a yad eva prakṛtaṃ śāstram aviśeṣeṇa vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:7210: 12,130.008c tad eva madhyāḥ sevante medhāvī cāpy athottaram
GE07mbh_12_u:7212: 12,130.009c na brāhmaṇān yātayeta doṣān prāpnoti yātayan
GE07mbh_12_u:7213: 12,130.010a etat pramāṇaṃ lokasya cakṣur etat sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:7214: 12,130.010c tat pramāṇo 'vagāheta tena tat sādhv asādhu vā 12,130.011a bahūni grāmavāstavyā roṣād brūyuḥ parasparam 12,130.011c na teṣāṃ vacanād rājā satkuryād yātayeta vā
GE07mbh_12_u:7215: 12,130.012a na vācyaḥ parivādo vai na śrotavyaḥ kathaṃ cana 12,130.012c karṇāv eva pidhātavyau prastheyaṃ vā tato 'nyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7216: 12,130.013a na vai satāṃ vṛttam etat parivādo na paiśunam 12,130.013c guṇānām eva vaktāraḥ santaḥ satsu yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:7217: 12,130.014a yathā samadhurau damyau sudāntau sādhuvāhinau 12,130.014c dhuram udyamya vahatas tathā varteta vai nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7218: 12,130.014e yathā yathāsya vahataḥ sahāyāḥ syus tathāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:7219: 12,130.015a ācāram eva manyante garīyo dharmalakṣaṇam 12,130.015c apare naivam icchanti ye śaṅkhalikhitapriyāḥ 12,130.015e mārdavād atha lobhād vā te brūyur vākyam īdṛśam 12,130.016a ārṣam apy atra paśyanti vikarmasthasya yāpanam
GE07mbh_12_u:7220: 12,130.016c na cārṣāt sadṛśaṃ kiṃ cit pramāṇaṃ vidyate kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:7221: 12,130.017a devā api vikarmasthaṃ yātayanti narādhamam 12,130.017c vyājena vindan vittaṃ hi dharmāt tu parihīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:7223: 12,130.018c hṛdayenābhyanujñāto yo dharmas taṃ vyavasyati 12,130.019a yaś caturguṇasaṃpannaṃ dharmaṃ veda sa dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:7224: 12,130.019c aher iva hi dharmasya padaṃ duḥkhaṃ gaveṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:7225: 12,130.020a yathā mṛgasya viddhasya mṛgavyādhaḥ padaṃ nayet
GE07mbh_12_u:7226: 12,130.020c kakṣe rudhirapātena tathā dharmapadaṃ nayet 12,130.021a evaṃ sadbhir vinītena pathā gantavyam acyuta
GE07mbh_12_u:7227: 12,130.021c rājarṣīṇāṃ vṛttam etad avagaccha yudhiṣṭhira 12,131.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,131.001a svarāṣṭrāt pararāṣṭrāc ca kośaṃ saṃjanayen nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7228: 12,131.001c kośād dhi dharmaḥ kaunteya rājyamūlaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:7229: 12,131.002a tasmāt saṃjanayet kośaṃ saṃhṛtya paripālayet 12,131.002c paripālyānugṛhṇīyād eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7230: 12,131.003a na kośaḥ śuddhaśaucena na nṛśaṃsena jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:7231: 12,131.003c padaṃ madhyamam āsthāya kośasaṃgrahaṇaṃ caret 12,131.004a abalasya kutaḥ kośo hy akośasya kuto balam
GE07mbh_12_u:7232: 12,131.004c abalasya kuto rājyam arājñaḥ śrīḥ kuto bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:7233: 12,131.005a uccair vṛtteḥ śriyo hānir yathaiva maraṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7234: 12,131.005c tasmāt kośaṃ balaṃ mitrāṇy atha rājā vivardhayet
GE07mbh_12_u:7235: 12,131.006a hīnakośaṃ hi rājānam avajānanti mānavāḥ 12,131.006c na cāsyālpena tuṣyanti kāryam abhyutsahanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7236: 12,131.007a śriyo hi kāraṇād rājā satkriyāṃ labhate parām
GE07mbh_12_u:7237: 12,131.007c sāsya gūhati pāpāni vāso guhyam iva striyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7238: 12,131.008a ṛddhim asyānuvartante purā viprakṛtā janāḥ 12,131.008c śālāvṛkā ivājasraṃ jighāṃsūn iva vindati 12,131.008e īdṛśasya kuto rājñaḥ sukhaṃ bharatasattama 12,131.009a udyacched eva na glāyed udyamo hy eva pauruṣam 12,131.009c apy aparvaṇi bhajyeta na nameteha kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:7239: 12,131.010a apy araṇyaṃ samāśritya cared dasyugaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:7240: 12,131.010c na tv evoddhṛtamaryādair dasyubhiḥ sahitaś caret
GE07mbh_12_u:7241: 12,131.010e dasyūnāṃ sulabhā senā raudrakarmasu bhārata 12,131.011a ekāntena hy amaryādāt sarvo 'py udvijate janaḥ 12,131.011c dasyavo 'py upaśaṅkante niranukrośakāriṇaḥ 12,131.012a sthāpayed eva maryādāṃ janacittaprasādinīm
GE07mbh_12_u:7242: 12,131.012c alpāpy atheha maryādā loke bhavati pūjitā
GE07mbh_12_u:7243: 12,131.013a nāyaṃ loko 'sti na para iti vyavasito janaḥ 12,131.013c nālaṃ gantuṃ ca viśvāsaṃ nāstike bhayaśaṅkini
GE07mbh_12_u:7244: 12,131.014a yathā sadbhiḥ parādānam ahiṃsā dasyubhis tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7248: 12,131.015e striyā moṣaḥ paristhānaṃ dasyuṣv etad vigarhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:7249: 12,131.016a sa eṣa eva bhavati dasyur etāni varjayan
GE07mbh_12_u:7250: 12,131.016c abhisaṃdadhate ye na vināśāyāsya bhārata 12,131.016e naśeṣam evopālabhya na kurvantīti niścayaḥ 12,131.017a tasmāt saśeṣaṃ kartavyaṃ svādhīnam api dasyubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7252: 12,131.018a saśeṣakāriṇas tāta śeṣaṃ paśyanti sarvataḥ 12,131.018c niḥśeṣakāriṇo nityam aśeṣakaraṇād bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:7253: 12,132.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,132.001*0302_01 atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:7255: 12,132.001c pratyakṣāv eva dharmārthau kṣatriyasya vijānataḥ 12,132.001e tatra na vyavadhātavyaṃ parokṣā dharmayāpanā 12,132.002a adharmo dharma ity etad yathā vṛkapadaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7256: 12,132.002c dharmādharmaphale jātu na dadarśeha kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:7257: 12,132.003a bubhūṣed balavān eva sarvaṃ balavato vaśe
GE07mbh_12_u:7258: 12,132.003c śriyaṃ balam amātyāṃś ca balavān iha vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:7259: 12,132.004a yo hy anāḍhyaḥ sa patitas tad ucchiṣṭaṃ yad alpakam
GE07mbh_12_u:7260: 12,132.004c bahv apathyaṃ balavati na kiṃ cit trāyate bhayāt 12,132.005a ubhau satyādhikārau tau trāyete mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:7261: 12,132.005c ati dharmād balaṃ manye balād dharmaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:7262: 12,132.006a bale pratiṣṭhito dharmo dharaṇyām iva jaṅgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7263: 12,132.006c dhūmo vāyor iva vaśaṃ balaṃ dharmo 'nuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:7264: 12,132.007a anīśvare balaṃ dharmo drumaṃ vallīva saṃśritā
GE07mbh_12_u:7265: 12,132.007c vaśyo balavatāṃ dharmaḥ sukhaṃ bhogavatām iva
GE07mbh_12_u:7266: 12,132.007e nāsty asādhyaṃ balavatāṃ sarvaṃ balavatāṃ śuci
GE07mbh_12_u:7268: 12,132.008c atha tasmād udvijate sarvo loko vṛkād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:7269: 12,132.009a apadhvasto hy avamato duḥkhaṃ jīvati jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:7270: 12,132.009c jīvitaṃ yad avakṣiptaṃ yathaiva maraṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7271: 12,132.010a yad enam āhuḥ pāpena cāritreṇa vinikṣatam
GE07mbh_12_u:7272: 12,132.010c sa bhṛśaṃ tapyate 'nena vākśalyena parikṣataḥ 12,132.011a atraitad āhur ācāryāḥ pāpasya parimokṣaṇe 12,132.011c trayīṃ vidyāṃ niṣeveta tathopāsīta sa dvijān
GE07mbh_12_u:7273: 12,132.012a prasādayen madhurayā vācāpy atha ca karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:7274: 12,132.012c mahāmanāś caiva bhaved vivahec ca mahākule
GE07mbh_12_u:7275: 12,132.013a ity asmīti vaded evaṃ pareṣāṃ kīrtayan guṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:7276: 12,132.013c japed udakaśīlaḥ syāt peśalo nātijalpanaḥ 12,132.014a brahmakṣatraṃ saṃpraviśed bahu kṛtvā suduṣkaram 12,132.014c ucyamāno 'pi lokena bahu tat tad acintayan 12,132.015a apāpo hy evam ācāraḥ kṣipraṃ bahumato bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:7277: 12,132.015c sukhaṃ vittaṃ ca bhuñjīta vṛttenaitena gopayet
GE07mbh_12_u:7278: 12,132.015d*0303_01 api tebhyo mṛgān hatvā nayec ca satataṃ vane 12,132.015d*0303_02 yasmin na pratigṛhṇanti dasyubhojanaśaṅkayā
GE07mbh_12_u:7279: 12,132.015e loke ca labhate pūjāṃ paratra ca mahat phalam 12,133.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,133.001a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:7280: 12,133.001c yathā dasyuḥ samaryādaḥ pretyabhāve na naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:7281: 12,133.002a prahartā matimāñ śūraḥ śrutavān anṛśaṃsavān 12,133.002c rakṣann akṣayiṇaṃ dharmaṃ brahmaṇyo gurupūjakaḥ 12,133.003a niṣādyāṃ kṣatriyāj jātaḥ kṣatradharmānupālakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7282: 12,133.003c kāpavyo nāma naiṣādir dasyutvāt siddhim āptavān
GE07mbh_12_u:7284: 12,133.004b*0304_01 asti kāpalyasa iti mṛgayur dharmakovidaḥ 12,133.004c vidhijño mṛgajātīnāṃ nipānānāṃ ca kovidaḥ 12,133.005a sarvakānanadeśajñaḥ pāriyātracaraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:7286: 12,133.006a apy anekaśatāḥ senā eka eva jigāya saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7288: 12,133.007a madhumāṃsair mūlaphalair annair uccāvacair api 12,133.007c satkṛtya bhojayām āsa samyak paricacāra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7290: 12,133.008c api tebhyo mṛgān hatvā nināya ca mahāvane
GE07mbh_12_u:7291: 12,133.009a ye sma na pratigṛhṇanti dasyubhojanaśaṅkayā 12,133.009c teṣām āsajya geheṣu kālya eva sa gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:7295: 12,133.011c grāmaṇīr bhava no mukhyaḥ sarveṣām eva saṃmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7296: 12,133.012a yathā yathā vakṣyasi naḥ kariṣyāmas tathā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7297: 12,133.012c pālayāsmān yathānyāyaṃ yathā mātā yathā pitā
GE07mbh_12_u:7298: 12,133.013 kāpavya uvāca 12,133.013a mā vadhīs tvaṃ striyaṃ bhīruṃ mā śiśuṃ mā tapasvinam
GE07mbh_12_u:7299: 12,133.013c nāyudhyamāno hantavyo na ca grāhyā balāt striyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7300: 12,133.014a sarvathā strī na hantavyā sarvasattveṣu yudhyatā
GE07mbh_12_u:7301: 12,133.014c nityaṃ gobrāhmaṇe svasti yoddhavyaṃ ca tadarthataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7302: 12,133.015a sasyaṃ ca nāpahantavyaṃ sīravighnaṃ ca mā kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7303: 12,133.015b*0305_01 pitaro devatā viprāḥ śapanty atra nivārite
GE07mbh_12_u:7304: 12,133.015c pūjyante yatra devāś ca pitaro 'tithayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7305: 12,133.016a sarvabhūteṣv api ca vai brāhmaṇo mokṣam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:7306: 12,133.016c kāryā cāpacitis teṣāṃ sarvasvenāpi yā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:7307: 12,133.017a yasya hy ete saṃpraruṣṭā mantrayanti parābhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:7308: 12,133.017c na tasya triṣu lokeṣu trātā bhavati kaś cana 12,133.018a yo brāhmaṇān paribhaved vināśaṃ vāpi rocayet
GE07mbh_12_u:7309: 12,133.018c sūryodaya ivāvaśyaṃ dhruvaṃ tasya parābhavaḥ 12,133.019a ihaiva phalam āsīnaḥ pratyākāṅkṣati śaktitaḥ 12,133.019c ye ye no na pradāsyanti tāṃs tān senābhiyāsyati 12,133.020a śiṣṭyarthaṃ vihito daṇḍo na vadhārthaṃ viniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7310: 12,133.020c ye ca śiṣṭān prabādhante dharmas teṣāṃ vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ 12,133.021a ye hi rāṣṭroparodhena vṛttiṃ kurvanti ke cana
GE07mbh_12_u:7311: 12,133.021c tad eva te 'nu mīyante kuṇapaṃ kṛmayo yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7312: 12,133.022a ye punar dharmaśāstreṇa varterann iha dasyavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7313: 12,133.022c api te dasyavo bhūtvā kṣipraṃ siddhim avāpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7314: 12,133.023 bhīṣma uvāca 12,133.023a tat sarvam upacakrus te kāpavyasyānuśāsanam 12,133.023c vṛttiṃ ca lebhire sarve pāpebhyaś cāpy upāraman
GE07mbh_12_u:7315: 12,133.024a kāpavyaḥ karmaṇā tena mahatīṃ siddhim āptavān
GE07mbh_12_u:7316: 12,133.024c sādhūnām ācaran kṣemaṃ dasyūn pāpān nivartayan
GE07mbh_12_u:7317: 12,133.025a idaṃ kāpavyacaritaṃ yo nityam anukīrtayet 12,133.025c nāraṇyebhyaḥ sa bhūtebhyo bhayam ārchet kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:7318: 12,133.026a bhayaṃ tasya na martyebhyo nāmartyebhyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:7319: 12,133.026c na sato nāsato rājan sa hy araṇyeṣu gopatiḥ 12,134.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,134.001a atra gāthā brahmagītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ 12,134.001c yena mārgeṇa rājānaḥ kośaṃ saṃjanayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7320: 12,134.002a na dhanaṃ yajñaśīlānāṃ hāryaṃ devasvam eva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:7321: 12,134.002c dasyūnāṃ niṣkriyāṇāṃ ca kṣatriyo hartum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:7322: 12,134.003a imāḥ prajāḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ rakṣyāś cādyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:7323: 12,134.003c dhanaṃ hi kṣatriyasyeha dvitīyasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:7324: 12,134.004a tad asya syād balārthaṃ vā dhanaṃ yajñārtham eva vā
GE07mbh_12_u:7325: 12,134.004c abhogyā hy oṣadhīś chittvā bhogyā eva pacanty uta 12,134.005a yo vai na devān na pitṝn na martyān haviṣārcati
GE07mbh_12_u:7326: 12,134.005c ānantikāṃ tāṃ dhanitām āhur vedavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7327: 12,134.006a haret tad draviṇaṃ rājan dhārmikaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7328: 12,134.006c na hi tat prīṇayel lokān na kośaṃ tadvidhaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7329: 12,134.007a asādhubhyo nirādāya sādhubhyo yaḥ prayacchati 12,134.007c ātmānaṃ saṃkramaṃ kṛtvā manye dharmavid eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7330: 12,134.007d*0306_01 tathā tathā jayel lokāñ śaktyā caiva yathā tathā 12,134.008a audbhijjā jantavaḥ ke cid yuktavāco yathā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7333: 12,134.009c saiva vṛttir ayajñeṣu tathā dharmo vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:7334: 12,134.010a yathā hy akasmād bhavati bhūmau pāṃsutṛṇolapam
GE07mbh_12_u:7335: 12,134.010c tathaiveha bhaved dharmaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sūkṣmataro 'pi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7336: 12,135.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,135.001*0307_01 anāgatavidhātā ca pratyutpannamatiś ca yaḥ 12,135.001*0307_02 dvāv eva sukham edhete dīrghasūtrī vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:7337: 12,135.001a atraiva cedam avyagraḥ śṛṇvākhyānam anuttamam 12,135.001c dīrghasūtraṃ samāśritya
GE07mbh_12_u:7338: 12,135.002a nātigādhe jalasthāye suhṛdaḥ śakulās trayaḥ 12,135.002c prabhūtamatsye kaunteya babhūvuḥ sahacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7340: 12,135.003c dīrghasūtraś ca tatraikas trayāṇāṃ jalacāriṇām 12,135.004a kadā cit taj jalasthāyaṃ matsyabandhāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7341: 12,135.004c niḥsrāvayām āsur atho nimneṣu vividhair mukhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7342: 12,135.005a prakṣīyamāṇaṃ taṃ buddhvā jalasthāyaṃ bhayāgame 12,135.005c abravīd dīrghadarśī tu tāv ubhau suhṛdau tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:7343: 12,135.006a iyam āpat samutpannā sarveṣāṃ salilaukasām 12,135.006c śīghram anyatra gacchāmaḥ panthā yāvan na duṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:7344: 12,135.007a anāgatam anarthaṃ hi sunayair yaḥ prabādhate
GE07mbh_12_u:7345: 12,135.007c na sa saṃśayam āpnoti rocatāṃ vāṃ vrajāmahe
GE07mbh_12_u:7346: 12,135.008a dīrghasūtras tu yas tatra so 'bravīt samyag ucyate 12,135.008c na tu kāryā tvarā yāvad iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7348: 12,135.009c prāpte kāle na me kiṃ cin nyāyataḥ parihāsyate 12,135.010a evam ukto nirākrāmad dīrghadarśī mahāmatiḥ 12,135.010c jagāma srotasaikena gambhīrasalilāśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:7349: 12,135.011a tataḥ prasrutatoyaṃ taṃ samīkṣya salilāśayam 12,135.011c babandhur vividhair yogair matsyān matsyopajīvinaḥ 12,135.012a viloḍyamāne tasmiṃs tu srutatoye jalāśaye 12,135.012c agacchad grahaṇaṃ tatra dīrghasūtraḥ sahāparaiḥ 12,135.013a uddānaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ ca matsyānāṃ vīkṣya rajjubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7351: 12,135.014a grastam eva tad uddānaṃ gṛhītvāsta tathaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7352: 12,135.014c sarvān eva tu tāṃs tatra te vidur grathitā iti
GE07mbh_12_u:7353: 12,135.015a tataḥ prakṣālyamāneṣu matsyeṣu vimale jale 12,135.015c tyaktvā rajjuṃ vimukto 'bhūc chīghraṃ saṃpratipattimān 12,135.016a dīrghasūtras tu mandātmā hīnabuddhir acetanaḥ 12,135.016c maraṇaṃ prāptavān mūḍho yathaivopahatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7354: 12,135.017a evaṃ prāptatamaṃ kālaṃ yo mohān nāvabudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:7355: 12,135.017c sa vinaśyati vai kṣipraṃ dīrghasūtro yathā jhaṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7356: 12,135.018a ādau na kurute śreyaḥ kuśalo 'smīti yaḥ pumān 12,135.018c sa saṃśayam avāpnoti yathā saṃpratipattimān 12,135.019a anāgatavidhānaṃ tu yo naraḥ kurute kṣamam
GE07mbh_12_u:7357: 12,135.019c śreyaḥ prāpnoti so 'tyarthaṃ dīrghadarśī yathā hy asau
GE07mbh_12_u:7358: 12,135.020a kalāḥ kāṣṭhā muhūrtāś ca dinā nāḍyaḥ kṣaṇā lavāḥ 12,135.020c pakṣā māsāś ca ṛtavas tulyāḥ saṃvatsarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7359: 12,135.021a pṛthivī deśa ity uktaḥ kālaḥ sa ca na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:7360: 12,135.021c abhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ nyāyato yac ca tat tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7362: 12,135.022c pradhānāv iti nirdiṣṭau kāmeśābhimatau nṛṇām 12,135.023a parīkṣyakārī yuktas tu samyak samupapādayet 12,135.023c deśakālāv abhipretau tābhyāṃ phalam avāpnuyāt 12,136.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,136.001a sarvatra buddhiḥ kathitā śreṣṭhā te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:7364: 12,136.002a tad icchāmi parāṃ buddhiṃ śrotuṃ bharatasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:7365: 12,136.002c yathā rājan na muhyeta śatrubhiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7367: 12,136.003c pṛcchāmi tvā kuruśreṣṭha tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:7368: 12,136.004a śatrubhir bahubhir grasto yathā varteta pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7369: 12,136.004c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ sarvam eva yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:7370: 12,136.005a viṣamasthaṃ hi rājānaṃ śatravaḥ paripanthinaḥ 12,136.005c bahavo 'py ekam uddhartuṃ yatante pūrvatāpitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7372: 12,136.006c ekenaivāsahāyena śakyaṃ sthātuṃ kathaṃ bhavet 12,136.007a kathaṃ mitram ariṃ caiva vindeta bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:7373: 12,136.007c ceṣṭitavyaṃ kathaṃ cātra śatror mitrasya cāntare
GE07mbh_12_u:7374: 12,136.008a prajñātalakṣaṇe rājann amitre mitratāṃ gate 12,136.008c kathaṃ nu puruṣaḥ kuryāt kiṃ vā kṛtvā sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:7375: 12,136.009a vigrahaṃ kena vā kuryāt saṃdhiṃ vā kena yojayet 12,136.009c kathaṃ vā śatrumadhyastho vartetābalavān iti 12,136.010a etad vai sarvakṛtyānāṃ paraṃ kṛtyaṃ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:7376: 12,136.010c naitasya kaś cid vaktāsti śrotā cāpi sudurlabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7377: 12,136.011a ṛte śāṃtanavād bhīṣmāt satyasaṃdhāj jitendriyāt 12,136.011c tad anviṣya mahābāho sarvam etad vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:7378: 12,136.012 bhīṣma uvāca 12,136.012a tvadyukto 'yam anupraśno yudhiṣṭhira guṇodayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7379: 12,136.012c śṛṇu me putra kārtsnyena guhyam āpatsu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:7380: 12,136.013a amitro mitratāṃ yāti mitraṃ cāpi praduṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:7381: 12,136.013c sāmarthyayogāt kāryāṇāṃ tadgatyā hi sadā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7382: 12,136.014a tasmād viśvasitavyaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ca samācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:7383: 12,136.014c deśaṃ kālaṃ ca vijñāya kāryākāryaviniścaye 12,136.015a saṃdhātavyaṃ budhair nityaṃ vyavasyaṃ ca hitārthibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7384: 12,136.015c amitrair api saṃdheyaṃ prāṇā rakṣyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:7385: 12,136.016a yo hy amitrair naro nityaṃ na saṃdadhyād apaṇḍitaḥ 12,136.016c na so 'rtham āpnuyāt kiṃ cit phalāny api ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:7386: 12,136.017a yas tv amitreṇa saṃdhatte mitreṇa ca virudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:7387: 12,136.017c arthayuktiṃ samālokya sumahad vindate phalam 12,136.018a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:7388: 12,136.018c mārjārasya ca saṃvādaṃ nyagrodhe mūṣakasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7389: 12,136.019a vane mahati kasmiṃś cin nyagrodhaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE07mbh_12_u:7390: 12,136.019c latājālaparicchanno nānādvijagaṇāyutaḥ 12,136.020a skandhavān meghasaṃkāśaḥ śītacchāyo manoramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7391: 12,136.020c vairantyam abhito jātas tarur vyālamṛgākulaḥ 12,136.021a tasya mūlaṃ samāśritya kṛtvā śatamukhaṃ bilam
GE07mbh_12_u:7392: 12,136.021c vasati sma mahāprājñaḥ palito nāma mūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7393: 12,136.022a śākhāś ca tasya saṃśritya vasati sma sukhaṃ puraḥ 12,136.022c lomaśo nāma mārjāraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7395: 12,136.023c ayojayat tam unmāthaṃ nityam astaṃ gate ravau
GE07mbh_12_u:7396: 12,136.024a tatra snāyumayān pāśān yathāvat saṃnidhāya saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7397: 12,136.024c gṛhaṃ gatvā sukhaṃ śete prabhātām eti śarvarīm
GE07mbh_12_u:7398: 12,136.025a tatra sma nityaṃ badhyante naktaṃ bahuvidhā mṛgāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7399: 12,136.025c kadā cit tatra mārjāras tv apramatto 'py abadhyata
GE07mbh_12_u:7400: 12,136.026a tasmin baddhe mahāprājñaḥ śatrau nityātatāyini 12,136.026c taṃ kālaṃ palito jñātvā vicacāra sunirbhayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7402: 12,136.027c bhakṣaṃ vicaramāṇena nacirād dṛṣṭam āmiṣam 12,136.028a sa tam unmātham āruhya tad āmiṣam abhakṣayat
GE07mbh_12_u:7403: 12,136.028c tasyopari sapatnasya baddhasya manasā hasan 12,136.029a āmiṣe tu prasaktaḥ sa kadā cid avalokayan
GE07mbh_12_u:7404: 12,136.029c apaśyad aparaṃ ghoram ātmanaḥ śatrum āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:7405: 12,136.030a śaraprasūnasaṃkāśaṃ mahīvivaraśāyinam 12,136.030c nakulaṃ harikaṃ nāma capalaṃ tāmralocanam 12,136.031a tena mūṣakagandhena tvaramāṇam upāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:7406: 12,136.031c bhakṣārthaṃ lelihad vaktraṃ bhūmāv ūrdhvamukhaṃ sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:7407: 12,136.032a śākhāgatam ariṃ cānyad apaśyat koṭarālayam 12,136.032c ulūkaṃ candrakaṃ nāma tīkṣṇatuṇḍaṃ kṣapācaram 12,136.033a gatasya viṣayaṃ tasya nakulolūkayos tadā 12,136.033c athāsyāsīd iyaṃ cintā tat prāpya sumahad bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:7408: 12,136.034a āpady asyāṃ sukaṣṭāyāṃ maraṇe samupasthite 12,136.034c samantād bhaya utpanne kathaṃ kāryaṃ hitaiṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:7409: 12,136.035a sa tathā sarvato ruddhaḥ sarvatra samadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7410: 12,136.035c abhavad bhayasaṃtaptaś cakre cemāṃ parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:7411: 12,136.036a āpad vināśabhūyiṣṭhā śataikīyaṃ ca jīvitam 12,136.036c samantasaṃśayā ceyam asmān āpad upasthitā 12,136.037a gataṃ hi sahasā bhūmiṃ nakulo māṃ samāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:7412: 12,136.037b*0308_01 ulūke mūrdhni saṃnaddhe bhujagārāv avāksthite 12,136.037b*0308_02 mārjāre pāśasaṃbaddhe kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:7413: 12,136.037b*0308_03 kaccid rājaguṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saptopāyās tathānagha 12,136.037c ulūkaś ceha tiṣṭhantaṃ mārjāraḥ pāśasaṃkṣayāt 12,136.038a na tv evāsmadvidhaḥ prājñaḥ saṃmohaṃ gantum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:7414: 12,136.038c kariṣye jīvite yatnaṃ yāvad ucchvāsanigraham 12,136.039a na hi buddhyānvitāḥ prājñā nītiśāstraviśāradāḥ 12,136.039c saṃbhramanty āpadaṃ prāpya mahato 'rthān avāpya ca 12,136.040a na tv anyām iha mārjārād gatiṃ paśyāmi sāṃpratam 12,136.040c viṣamastho hy ayaṃ jantuḥ kṛtyaṃ cāsya mahan mayā 12,136.041a jīvitārthī kathaṃ tv adya prārthitaḥ śatrubhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7415: 12,136.041c tasmād imam ahaṃ śatruṃ mārjāraṃ saṃśrayāmi vai
GE07mbh_12_u:7418: 12,136.043a ayam atyantaśatrur me vaiṣamyaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7419: 12,136.043c mūḍho grāhayituṃ svārthaṃ saṃgatyā yadi śakyate
GE07mbh_12_u:7420: 12,136.044a kadā cid vyasanaṃ prāpya saṃdhiṃ kuryān mayā saha 12,136.044c balinā saṃniviṣṭasya śatror api parigrahaḥ 12,136.044e kārya ity āhur ācāryā viṣame jīvitārthinā
GE07mbh_12_u:7421: 12,136.045a śreyān hi paṇḍitaḥ śatrur na ca mitram apaṇḍitam 12,136.045c mama hy amitre mārjāre jīvitaṃ saṃpratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:7423: 12,136.046c apīdānīm ayaṃ śatruḥ saṃgatyā paṇḍito bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:7424: 12,136.046d*0309_01 evaṃ vicintayām āsa mūṣakaḥ śatruceṣṭitam 12,136.047a tato 'rthagatitattvajñaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7426: 12,136.048a sauhṛdenābhibhāṣe tvā kaccin mārjāra jīvasi 12,136.048c jīvitaṃ hi tavecchāmi śreyaḥ sādhāraṇaṃ hi nau
GE07mbh_12_u:7427: 12,136.049a na te saumya viṣattavyaṃ jīviṣyasi yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:7428: 12,136.049c ahaṃ tvām uddhariṣyāmi prāṇāñ jahyāṃ hi te kṛte 12,136.050a asti kaś cid upāyo 'tra puṣkalaḥ pratibhāti mām
GE07mbh_12_u:7429: 12,136.050c yena śakyas tvayā mokṣaḥ prāptuṃ śreyo yathā mayā 12,136.051a mayā hy upāyo dṛṣṭo 'yaṃ vicārya matim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7430: 12,136.051c ātmārthaṃ ca tvadarthaṃ ca śreyaḥ sādhāraṇaṃ hi nau 12,136.052a idaṃ hi nakulolūkaṃ pāpabuddhy abhitaḥ sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:7431: 12,136.052c na dharṣayati mārjāra tena me svasti sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_12_u:7433: 12,136.053c nagaśākhāgrahas tiṣṭhaṃs tasyāhaṃ bhṛśam udvije 12,136.054a satāṃ sāptapadaṃ sakhyaṃ savāso me 'si paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7434: 12,136.054c sāṃvāsyakaṃ kariṣyāmi nāsti te mṛtyuto bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:7435: 12,136.055a na hi śaknoṣi mārjāra pāśaṃ chettuṃ vinā mayā 12,136.055c ahaṃ chetsyāmi te pāśaṃ yadi māṃ tvaṃ na hiṃsasi
GE07mbh_12_u:7436: 12,136.056a tvam āśrito nagasyāgraṃ mūlaṃ tv aham upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7437: 12,136.056c ciroṣitāv ihāvāṃ vai vṛkṣe 'smin viditaṃ hi te
GE07mbh_12_u:7438: 12,136.057a yasminn āśvasate kaś cid yaś ca nāśvasate kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:7439: 12,136.057c na tau dhīrāḥ praśaṃsanti nityam udvignacetasau
GE07mbh_12_u:7440: 12,136.058a tasmād vivardhatāṃ prītiḥ satyā saṃgatir astu nau
GE07mbh_12_u:7441: 12,136.058c kālātītam apārthaṃ hi na praśaṃsanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7442: 12,136.059a arthayuktim imāṃ tāvad yathābhūtāṃ niśāmaya 12,136.059c tava jīvitam icchāmi tvaṃ mamecchasi jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:7443: 12,136.060a kaś cit tarati kāṣṭhena sugambhīrāṃ mahānadīm
GE07mbh_12_u:7444: 12,136.060c sa tārayati tat kāṣṭhaṃ sa ca kāṣṭhena tāryate 12,136.061a īdṛśo nau samāyogo bhaviṣyati sunistaraḥ 12,136.061c ahaṃ tvāṃ tārayiṣyāmi tvaṃ ca māṃ tārayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:7445: 12,136.062a evam uktvā tu palitas tadartham ubhayor hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:7446: 12,136.062c hetumad grahaṇīyaṃ ca kālākāṅkṣī vyapaikṣata 12,136.063a atha suvyāhṛtaṃ tasya śrutvā śatrur vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7447: 12,136.063c hetumad grahaṇīyārthaṃ mārjāro vākyam abravīt 12,136.064a buddhimān vākyasaṃpannas tad vākyam anuvarṇayan 12,136.064c tām avasthām avekṣyāntyāṃ sāmnaiva pratyapūjayat 12,136.065a tatas tīkṣṇāgradaśano vaiḍūryamaṇilocanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7449: 12,136.066a nandāmi saumya bhadraṃ te yo māṃ jīvantam icchasi 12,136.066c śreyaś ca yadi jānīṣe kriyatāṃ mā vicāraya
GE07mbh_12_u:7450: 12,136.067a ahaṃ hi dṛḍham āpannas tvam āpannataro mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:7451: 12,136.067c dvayor āpannayoḥ saṃdhiḥ kriyatāṃ mā vicāraya
GE07mbh_12_u:7452: 12,136.068a vidhatsva prāptakālaṃ yat kāryaṃ sidhyatu cāvayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7453: 12,136.068c mayi kṛcchrād vinirmukte na vinaṅkṣyati te kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:7455: 12,136.069c nideśavaśavartī ca bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ 12,136.070a ity evam uktaḥ palito mārjāraṃ vaśam āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:7456: 12,136.070c vākyaṃ hitam uvācedam abhinītārtham arthavat 12,136.071a udāraṃ yad bhavān āha naitac citraṃ bhavadvidhe
GE07mbh_12_u:7457: 12,136.071c vidito yas tu mārgo me hitārthaṃ śṛṇu taṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:7458: 12,136.072a ahaṃ tvānupravekṣyāmi nakulān me mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:7459: 12,136.072c trāyasva māṃ mā vadhīś ca śakto 'smi tava mokṣaṇe 12,136.073a ulūkāc caiva māṃ rakṣa kṣudraḥ prārthayate hi mām 12,136.073c ahaṃ chetsyāmi te pāśān sakhe satyena te śape 12,136.074a tad vacaḥ saṃgataṃ śrutvā lomaśo yuktam arthavat
GE07mbh_12_u:7461: 12,136.075a sa taṃ saṃpūjya palitaṃ mārjāraḥ sauhṛde sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7462: 12,136.075c suvicintyābravīd dhīraḥ prītas tvarita eva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:7463: 12,136.076a kṣipram āgaccha bhadraṃ te tvaṃ me prāṇasamaḥ sakhā 12,136.076c tava prājña prasādād dhi kṣipraṃ prāpsyāmi jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:7464: 12,136.077a yad yad evaṃgatenādya śakyaṃ kartuṃ mayā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:7465: 12,136.077c tad ājñāpaya kartāhaṃ saṃdhir evāstu nau sakhe
GE07mbh_12_u:7466: 12,136.078a asmāt te saṃśayān muktaḥ samitragaṇabāndhavaḥ 12,136.078c sarvakāryāṇi kartāhaṃ priyāṇi ca hitāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7467: 12,136.079a muktaś ca vyasanād asmāt saumyāham api nāma te 12,136.079c prītim utpādayeyaṃ ca pratikartuṃ ca śaknuyām
GE07mbh_12_u:7468: 12,136.079d*0310_01 pratyapakurvan bahv api na bhāti pūrvopakāriṇā tulyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7469: 12,136.079d*0310_02 ekaḥ karoti hi kṛte niṣkāraṇam eva kurute 'nyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7470: 12,136.080a grāhayitvā tu taṃ svārthaṃ mārjāraṃ mūṣakas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:7471: 12,136.080c praviveśa suvisrabdhaḥ samyag arthāṃś cacāra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:7472: 12,136.081a evam āśvāsito vidvān mārjāreṇa sa mūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7474: 12,136.082a līnaṃ tu tasya gātreṣu mārjārasyātha mūṣakam
GE07mbh_12_u:7475: 12,136.082c tau dṛṣṭvā nakulolūkau nirāśau jagmatur gṛhān
GE07mbh_12_u:7476: 12,136.082d*0311_01 tathaiva tau susaṃtrastau dṛḍham āgatatandritau 12,136.082d*0311_02 dṛṣṭvā tayoḥ parāṃ prītiṃ vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatau
GE07mbh_12_u:7477: 12,136.082d*0311_03 balinau matimantau ca suvṛttau cāpy upāsitau
GE07mbh_12_u:7478: 12,136.082d*0311_04 aśaktau tu nayāt tasmāt saṃpradharṣayituṃ balāt
GE07mbh_12_u:7480: 12,136.082d*0311_06 ulūkanakulau tūrṇaṃ jagmatus tau svam ālayam
GE07mbh_12_u:7481: 12,136.083a līnas tu tasya gātreṣu palito deśakālavit
GE07mbh_12_u:7482: 12,136.083c ciccheda pāśān nṛpate kālākāṅkṣī śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7483: 12,136.084a atha bandhaparikliṣṭo mārjāro vīkṣya mūṣakam 12,136.084c chindantaṃ vai tadā pāśān atvarantaṃ tvarānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7484: 12,136.085a tam atvarantaṃ palitaṃ pāśānāṃ chedane tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:7485: 12,136.085c saṃcodayitum ārebhe mārjāro mūṣakaṃ tadā 12,136.086a kiṃ saumya nābhitvarase kiṃ kṛtārtho 'vamanyase
GE07mbh_12_u:7486: 12,136.086c chindhi pāśān amitraghna purā śvapaca eti saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7487: 12,136.087a ity uktas tvaratā tena matimān palito 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:7488: 12,136.087c mārjāram akṛtaprajñaṃ vaśyam ātmahitaṃ vacaḥ 12,136.088a tūṣṇīṃ bhava na te saumya tvarā kāryā na saṃbhramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7489: 12,136.088c vayam evātra kālajñā na kālaḥ parihāsyate
GE07mbh_12_u:7490: 12,136.089a akāle kṛtyam ārabdhaṃ kartuṃ nārthāya kalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:7491: 12,136.089c tad eva kāla ārabdhaṃ mahate 'rthāya kalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:7492: 12,136.090a akālavipramuktān me tvatta eva bhayaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:7493: 12,136.090c tasmāt kālaṃ pratīkṣasva kim iti tvarase sakhe
GE07mbh_12_u:7494: 12,136.091a yāvat paśyāmi caṇḍālam āyāntaṃ śastrapāṇinam 12,136.091c tataś chetsyāmi te pāśaṃ prāpte sādhāraṇe bhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:7495: 12,136.092a tasmin kāle pramuktas tvaṃ tarum evādhirohasi
GE07mbh_12_u:7496: 12,136.092c na hi te jīvitād anyat kiṃ cit kṛtyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:7497: 12,136.093a tato bhavaty atikrānte traste bhīte ca lomaśa
GE07mbh_12_u:7498: 12,136.093c ahaṃ bilaṃ pravekṣyāmi bhavāñ śākhāṃ gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:7499: 12,136.094a evam uktas tu mārjāro mūṣakeṇātmano hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:7502: 12,136.095c uvāca lomaśo vākyaṃ mūṣakaṃ cirakāriṇam 12,136.096a na hy evaṃ mitrakāryāṇi prītyā kurvanti sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7503: 12,136.096c yathā tvaṃ mokṣitaḥ kṛcchrāt tvaramāṇena vai mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:7504: 12,136.097a tathaiva tvaramāṇena tvayā kāryaṃ hitaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:7505: 12,136.097c yatnaṃ kuru mahāprājña yathā svasty āvayor bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:7506: 12,136.098a atha vā pūrvavairaṃ tvaṃ smaran kālaṃ vikarṣasi
GE07mbh_12_u:7507: 12,136.098c paśya duṣkṛtakarmatvaṃ vyaktam āyuḥkṣayo mama 12,136.099a yac ca kiṃ cin mayājñānāt purastād vipriyaṃ kṛtam 12,136.099c na tan manasi kartavyaṃ kṣamaye tvāṃ prasīda me 12,136.100a tam evaṃvādinaṃ prājñaḥ śāstravid buddhisaṃmataḥ 12,136.100c uvācedaṃ vacaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ mārjāraṃ mūṣakas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:7508: 12,136.101a śrutaṃ me tava mārjāra svam arthaṃ parigṛhṇataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7509: 12,136.101c mamāpi tvaṃ vijānīhi svam arthaṃ parigṛhṇataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7510: 12,136.102a yan mitraṃ bhītavat sādhyaṃ yan mitraṃ bhayasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:7511: 12,136.102c surakṣitaṃ tataḥ kāryaṃ pāṇiḥ sarpamukhād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:7512: 12,136.103a kṛtvā balavatā saṃdhim ātmānaṃ yo na rakṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:7513: 12,136.103c apathyam iva tad bhuktaṃ tasyānarthāya kalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:7514: 12,136.104a na kaś cit kasya cin mitraṃ na kaś cit kasya cit suhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:7515: 12,136.104b*0312_01 arthatas tu nibadhyante mitrāṇi ripavas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7516: 12,136.104c arthair arthā nibadhyante gajair vanagajā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:7517: 12,136.105a na hi kaś cit kṛte kārye kartāraṃ samavekṣate 12,136.105c tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi sāvaśeṣāṇi kārayet 12,136.106a tasmin kāle 'pi ca bhavān divākīrtibhayānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7518: 12,136.106c mama na grahaṇe śaktaḥ palāyanaparāyaṇaḥ 12,136.107a chinnaṃ tu tantubāhulyaṃ tantur eko 'vaśeṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7519: 12,136.107c chetsyāmy ahaṃ tad apy āśu nirvṛto bhava lomaśa 12,136.108a tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ tathaivāpannayor dvayoḥ 12,136.108c kṣayaṃ jagāma sā rātrir lomaśaṃ cāviśad bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:7523: 12,136.110c parigho nāma caṇḍālaḥ śastrapāṇir adṛśyata 12,136.111a taṃ dṛṣṭvā yamadūtābhaṃ mārjāras trastacetanaḥ 12,136.111c uvāca palitaṃ bhītaḥ kim idānīṃ kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:7524: 12,136.112a atha cāpi susaṃtrastau taṃ dṛṣṭvā ghoradarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:7525: 12,136.112c kṣaṇena nakulolūkau nairāśyaṃ jagmatus tadā 12,136.113a balinau matimantau ca saṃghātaṃ cāpy upāgatau
GE07mbh_12_u:7526: 12,136.113c aśakyau sunayāt tasmāt saṃpradharṣayituṃ balāt 12,136.114a kāryārthaṃ kṛtasaṃdhī tau dṛṣṭvā mārjāramūṣakau 12,136.114c ulūkanakulau tūrṇaṃ jagmatuḥ svaṃ svam ālayam
GE07mbh_12_u:7527: 12,136.115a tataś ciccheda taṃ tantuṃ mārjārasya sa mūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7529: 12,136.116a sa ca tasmād bhayān mukto mukto ghoreṇa śatruṇā 12,136.116c bilaṃ viveśa palitaḥ śākhāṃ bheje ca lomaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7530: 12,136.117a unmātham apy athādāya caṇḍālo vīkṣya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7531: 12,136.117c vihatāśaḥ kṣaṇenātha tasmād deśād apākramat 12,136.117e jagāma ca svabhavanaṃ caṇḍālo bharatarṣabha 12,136.118a tatas tasmād bhayān mukto durlabhaṃ prāpya jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:7533: 12,136.119a akṛtvā saṃvidaṃ kāṃ cit sahasāham upaplutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7534: 12,136.119c kṛtajñaṃ kṛtakalyāṇaṃ kaccin māṃ nābhiśaṅkase 12,136.120a gatvā ca mama viśvāsaṃ dattvā ca mama jīvitam 12,136.120c mitropabhogasamaye kiṃ tvaṃ naivopasarpasi
GE07mbh_12_u:7535: 12,136.121a kṛtvā hi pūrvaṃ mitrāṇi yaḥ paścān nānutiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:7536: 12,136.121c na sa mitrāṇi labhate kṛcchrāsv āpatsu durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7537: 12,136.122a tat kṛto 'haṃ tvayā mitraṃ sāmarthyād ātmanaḥ sakhe 12,136.122c sa māṃ mitratvam āpannam upabhoktuṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:7538: 12,136.123a yāni me santi mitrāṇi ye ca me santi bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7539: 12,136.123c sarve tvāṃ pūjayiṣyanti śiṣyā gurum iva priyam
GE07mbh_12_u:7540: 12,136.124a ahaṃ ca pūjayiṣye tvāṃ samitragaṇabāndhavam 12,136.124c jīvitasya pradātāraṃ kṛtajñaḥ ko na pūjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:7541: 12,136.125a īśvaro me bhavān astu śarīrasya gṛhasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7542: 12,136.125c arthānāṃ caiva sarveṣām anuśāstā ca me bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:7543: 12,136.126a amātyo me bhava prājña piteva hi praśādhi mām 12,136.126c na te 'sti bhayam asmatto jīvitenātmanaḥ śape
GE07mbh_12_u:7544: 12,136.127a buddhyā tvam uśanāḥ sākṣād bale tv adhikṛtā vayam 12,136.127c tvanmantrabalayukto hi vindeta jayam eva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:7545: 12,136.128a evam uktaḥ paraṃ sāntvaṃ mārjāreṇa sa mūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7546: 12,136.128c uvāca paramārthajñaḥ ślakṣṇam ātmahitaṃ vacaḥ 12,136.129a yad bhavān āha tat sarvaṃ mayā te lomaśa śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:7547: 12,136.129c mamāpi tāvad bruvataḥ śṛṇu yat pratibhāti mām
GE07mbh_12_u:7548: 12,136.130a veditavyāni mitrāṇi boddhavyāś cāpi śatravaḥ 12,136.130c etat susūkṣmaṃ loke 'smin dṛśyate prājñasaṃmatam 12,136.131a śatrurūpāś ca suhṛdo mitrarūpāś ca śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7549: 12,136.131b*0313_01 eṣāṃ saumyāni mitrāṇi krodhanāś caiva śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7550: 12,136.131b*0313_02 sāntvitās te na budhyante rāgalobhavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7551: 12,136.131c sāntvitās te na budhyante rāgalobhavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7552: 12,136.132a nāsti jātyā ripur nāma mitraṃ nāma na vidyate 12,136.132c sāmarthyayogāj jāyante mitrāṇi ripavas tathā 12,136.133a yo yasmiñ jīvati svārthaṃ paśyet tāvat sa jīvati 12,136.133c sa tasya tāvan mitraṃ syād yāvan na syād viparyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7553: 12,136.134a nāsti maitrī sthirā nāma na ca dhruvam asauhṛdam 12,136.134c arthayuktyā hi jāyante mitrāṇi ripavas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7554: 12,136.135a mitraṃ ca śatrutām eti kasmiṃś cit kālaparyaye
GE07mbh_12_u:7555: 12,136.135c śatruś ca mitratām eti svārtho hi balavattaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7556: 12,136.136a yo viśvasati mitreṣu na cāśvasati śatruṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:7557: 12,136.136c arthayuktim avijñāya calitaṃ tasya jīvitam 12,136.137a arthayuktim avijñāya yaḥ śubhe kurute matim
GE07mbh_12_u:7558: 12,136.137c mitre vā yadi vā śatrau tasyāpi calitā matiḥ 12,136.138a na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste 'pi na viśvaset 12,136.138c viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati
GE07mbh_12_u:7559: 12,136.139a arthayuktyā hi dṛśyante pitā mātā sutās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7560: 12,136.139c mātulā bhāgineyāś ca tathā saṃbandhibāndhavāḥ 12,136.140a putraṃ hi mātāpitaru tyajataḥ patitaṃ priyam
GE07mbh_12_u:7561: 12,136.140c loko rakṣati cātmānaṃ paśya svārthasya sāratām
GE07mbh_12_u:7562: 12,136.141a taṃ manye nikṛtiprajñaṃ yo mokṣaṃ pratyanantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:7563: 12,136.141c kṛtyaṃ mṛgayase kartuṃ sukhopāyam asaṃśayam 12,136.142a asmin nilaya eva tvaṃ nyagrodhād avatāritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7564: 12,136.142c pūrvaṃ niviṣṭam unmāthaṃ capalatvān na buddhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:7566: 12,136.143c tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi capalo hanty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:7567: 12,136.144a bravīti madhuraṃ kaṃ cit priyo me ha bhavān iti
GE07mbh_12_u:7568: 12,136.144c tan mithyākaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ vistareṇāpi me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:7569: 12,136.145a kāraṇāt priyatām eti dveṣyo bhavati kāraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:7570: 12,136.145c arthārthī jīvaloko 'yaṃ na kaś cit kasya cit priyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7571: 12,136.146a sakhyaṃ sodarayor bhrātror daṃpatyor vā parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:7572: 12,136.146c kasya cin nābhijānāmi prītiṃ niṣkāraṇām iha
GE07mbh_12_u:7573: 12,136.147a yady api bhrātaraḥ kruddhā bhāryā vā kāraṇāntare
GE07mbh_12_u:7574: 12,136.147c svabhāvatas te prīyante netaraḥ prīyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7575: 12,136.148a priyo bhavati dānena priyavādena cāparaḥ 12,136.148c mantrahomajapair anyaḥ kāryārthaṃ prīyate janaḥ 12,136.149a utpanne kāraṇe prītir nāsti nau kāraṇāntare
GE07mbh_12_u:7576: 12,136.149c pradhvaste kāraṇasthāne sā prītir vinivartate 12,136.150a kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ manye yenāhaṃ bhavataḥ priyaḥ 12,136.150c anyatrābhyavahārārthāt tatrāpi ca budhā vayam 12,136.151a kālo hetuṃ vikurute svārthas tam anuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:7578: 12,136.152a na tv īdṛśaṃ tvayā vācyaṃ viduṣi svārthapaṇḍite
GE07mbh_12_u:7580: 12,136.153a tasmān nāhaṃ cale svārthāt susthitaḥ saṃdhivigrahe
GE07mbh_12_u:7581: 12,136.153c abhrāṇām iva rūpāṇi vikurvanti kṣaṇe kṣaṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:7582: 12,136.154a adyaiva hi ripur bhūtvā punar adyaiva sauhṛdam
GE07mbh_12_u:7583: 12,136.154c punaś ca ripur adyaiva yuktīnāṃ paśya cāpalam
GE07mbh_12_u:7584: 12,136.155a āsīt tāvat tu maitrī nau yāvad dhetur abhūt purā
GE07mbh_12_u:7585: 12,136.155c sā gatā saha tenaiva kālayuktena hetunā
GE07mbh_12_u:7586: 12,136.156a tvaṃ hi me 'tyantataḥ śatruḥ sāmarthyān mitratāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7587: 12,136.156c tat kṛtyam abhinirvṛttaṃ prakṛtiḥ śatrutāṃ gatā
GE07mbh_12_u:7588: 12,136.157a so 'ham evaṃ praṇītāni jñātvā śāstrāṇi tattvataḥ 12,136.157c praviśeyaṃ kathaṃ pāśaṃ tvatkṛtaṃ tad vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:7590: 12,136.158c anyonyānugrahe vṛtte nāsti bhūyaḥ samāgamaḥ 12,136.159a tvaṃ hi saumya kṛtārtho 'dya nirvṛttārthās tathā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:7591: 12,136.159c na te 'sty anyan mayā kṛtyaṃ kiṃ cid anyatra bhakṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:7592: 12,136.160a aham annaṃ bhavān bhoktā durbalo 'haṃ bhavān balī 12,136.160c nāvayor vidyate saṃdhir niyukte viṣame bale
GE07mbh_12_u:7593: 12,136.161a saṃmanye 'haṃ tava prajñāṃ yan mokṣāt pratyanantaram 12,136.161c bhakṣyaṃ mṛgayase nūnaṃ sukhopāyam asaṃśayam 12,136.162a bhakṣyārtham eva baddhas tvaṃ sa muktaḥ prasṛtaḥ kṣudhā 12,136.162c śāstrajñam abhisaṃdhāya nūnaṃ bhakṣayitādya mām 12,136.163a jānāmi kṣudhitaṃ hi tvām āhārasamayaś ca te
GE07mbh_12_u:7594: 12,136.163c sa tvaṃ mām abhisaṃdhāya bhakṣyaṃ mṛgayase punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7595: 12,136.164a yac cāpi putradāraṃ svaṃ tat saṃnisṛjase mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:7596: 12,136.164c śuśrūṣāṃ nāma me kartuṃ sakhe mama na tatkṣamam 12,136.165a tvayā māṃ sahitaṃ dṛṣṭvā priyā bhāryā sutāś ca ye

GE07mbh_12_u:7648: 12,136.198a kālena ripuṇā saṃdhiḥ kāle mitreṇa vigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7649: 12,136.198c kārya ity eva tattvajñāḥ prāhur nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:7650: 12,136.199a evaṃ matvā mahārāja śāstrārtham abhigamya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7651: 12,136.199c abhiyukto 'pramattaś ca prāg bhayād bhītavac caret 12,136.200a bhītavat saṃvidhiḥ kāryaḥ pratisaṃdhis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:7653: 12,136.201a na bhayaṃ vidyate rājan bhītasyānāgate bhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:7654: 12,136.201c abhītasya tu visrambhāt sumahaj jāyate bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:7655: 12,136.202a na bhīrur iti cātyantaṃ mantro 'deyaḥ kathaṃ cana 12,136.202c avijñānād dhi vijñāte gacched āspadadarśiṣu 12,136.203a tasmād abhītavad bhīto viśvastavad aviśvasan 12,136.203c kāryāṇāṃ gurutāṃ buddhvā nānṛtaṃ kiṃ cid ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:7656: 12,136.204a evam etan mayā proktam itihāsaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:7657: 12,136.204c śrutvā tvaṃ suhṛdāṃ madhye yathāvat samupācara
GE07mbh_12_u:7658: 12,136.205a upalabhya matiṃ cāgryām arimitrāntaraṃ tathā 12,136.205c saṃdhivigrahakālaṃ ca mokṣopāyaṃ tathāpadi

GE07mbh_12_u:7665: 12,137.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,137.001a ukto mantro mahābāho na viśvāso 'sti śatruṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:7666: 12,137.001c kathaṃ hi rājā varteta yadi sarvatra nāśvaset

GE07mbh_12_u:7671: 12,137.004 bhīṣma uvāca 12,137.004a śṛṇu kaunteya yo vṛtto brahmadattaniveśane 12,137.004c pūjanyā saha saṃvādo brahmadattasya pārthiva 12,137.005a kāmpilye brahmadattasya antaḥpuranivāsinī

GE07mbh_12_u:7683: 12,137.011a atha sā śakunī rājann āgamat phalahārikā
GE07mbh_12_u:7684: 12,137.011c apaśyan nihataṃ putraṃ tena bālena bhūtale

GE07mbh_12_u:7687: 12,137.015a aham asya karomy adya sadṛśīṃ vairayātanām
GE07mbh_12_u:7690: 12,137.016c śaraṇāgatasya ca vadhas trividhaṃ hy asya kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:7691: 12,137.017a ity uktvā caraṇābhyāṃ tu netre nṛpasutasya sā
GE07mbh_12_u:7692: 12,137.017c bhittvā svasthā tata idaṃ pūjanī vākyam abravīt

GE07mbh_12_u:7695: 12,137.020 brahmadatta uvāca 12,137.020a asti vai kṛtam asmābhir asti pratikṛtaṃ tvayā

GE07mbh_12_u:7698: 12,137.021c na tad budhāḥ praśaṃsanti śreyas tatrāpasarpaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:7699: 12,137.022a sāntve prayukte nṛpate kṛtavaire na viśvaset

GE07mbh_12_u:7702: 12,137.023c putrapautre vinaṣṭe tu paralokaṃ nigacchati 12,137.024a sarveṣāṃ kṛtavairāṇām aviśvāsaḥ sukhāvahaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:7704: 12,137.025c kāmaṃ viśvāsayed anyān pareṣāṃ tu na viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:7705: 12,137.025d*0324_01 aviśvāsāt paraṃ hanti viśvāsād vadhyate paraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7706: 12,137.026a mātā pitā bāndhavānāṃ variṣṭhau; bhāryā jarā bījamātraṃ tu putraḥ 12,137.026c bhrātā śatruḥ klinnapāṇir vayasya; ātmā hy ekaḥ sukhaduḥkhasya vettā 12,137.027a anyonyakṛtavairāṇāṃ na saṃdhir upapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:7707: 12,137.027c sa ca hetur atikrānto yadartham aham āvasam
GE07mbh_12_u:7709: 12,137.028c ceto bhavaty aviśvastaṃ pūrvaṃ trāsayate balāt
GE07mbh_12_u:7710: 12,137.029a pūrvaṃ saṃmānanā yatra paścāc caiva vimānanā
GE07mbh_12_u:7711: 12,137.029c jahyāt taṃ sattvavān vāsaṃ saṃmānitavimānitaḥ 12,137.030a uṣitāsmi tavāgāre dīrghakālam ahiṃsitā
GE07mbh_12_u:7712: 12,137.030c tad idaṃ vairam utpannaṃ sukham āssva vrajāmy aham 12,137.031 brahmadatta uvāca 12,137.031a yatkṛte pratikuryād vai na sa tatrāparādhnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:7713: 12,137.031c anṛṇas tena bhavati vasa pūjani mā gamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7714: 12,137.032 pūjany uvāca 12,137.032a na kṛtasya na kartuś ca sakhyaṃ saṃdhīyate punaḥ 12,137.032c hṛdayaṃ tatra jānāti kartuś caiva kṛtasya ca

GE07mbh_12_u:7716: 12,137.033c vairasyopaśamo dṛṣṭaḥ pāpaṃ nopāśnute punaḥ 12,137.034 pūjany uvāca 12,137.034a nāsti vairam upakrāntaṃ sāntvito 'smīti nāśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:7717: 12,137.034c viśvāsād badhyate bālas tasmāc chreyo hy adarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:7718: 12,137.035a tarasā ye na śakyante śastraiḥ suniśitair api
GE07mbh_12_u:7719: 12,137.035c sāmnā te vinigṛhyante gajā iva kareṇubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7720: 12,137.036 brahmadatta uvāca 12,137.036a saṃvāsāj jāyate sneho jīvitāntakareṣv api 12,137.036c anyonyasya ca viśvāsaḥ śvapacena śuno yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:7722: 12,137.037c naiva tiṣṭhati tad vairaṃ puṣkarastham ivodakam
GE07mbh_12_u:7723: 12,137.038 pūjany uvāca 12,137.038a vairaṃ pañcasamutthānaṃ tac ca budhyanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7725: 12,137.039a tatra dātā nihantavyaḥ kṣatriyeṇa viśeṣataḥ 12,137.039c prakāśaṃ vāprakāśaṃ vā buddhvā deśabalādikam 12,137.040a kṛtavaire na viśvāsaḥ kāryas tv iha suhṛdy api 12,137.040c channaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate vairaṃ gūḍho 'gnir iva dāruṣu 12,137.041a na vittena na pāruṣyair na sāntvena na ca śrutaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:7726: 12,137.041c vairāgniḥ śāmyate rājann aurvāgnir iva sāgare
GE07mbh_12_u:7727: 12,137.042a na hi vairāgnir udbhūtaḥ karma vāpy aparādhajam
GE07mbh_12_u:7728: 12,137.042c śāmyaty adagdhvā nṛpate vinā hy ekatarakṣayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:7730: 12,137.043c naiva śāntir na viśvāsaḥ karma trāsayate balāt
GE07mbh_12_u:7731: 12,137.044a naivāpakāre kasmiṃś cid ahaṃ tvayi tathā bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:7732: 12,137.044c viśvāsād uṣitā pūrvaṃ nedānīṃ viśvasāmy aham

GE07mbh_12_u:8162: 12,142.002a tasya kālyaṃ gatā bhāryā carituṃ nābhyavartata

GE07mbh_12_u:8169: 12,142.004d*0364_03 na gṛhaṃ gṛham ity āhur gṛhiṇī gṛham ucyate 12,142.004d*0364_04 gṛhaṃ tu gṛhiṇīhīnam araṇyasadṛśaṃ matam 12,142.005a yadi sā raktanetrāntā citrāṅgī madhurasvarā 12,142.005c adya nābhyeti me kāntā na kāryaṃ jīvitena me 12,142.005d*0365_01 na bhuṅkte mayy abhukte yā nāsnāte snāti suvratā 12,142.005d*0365_02 nātiṣṭhaty upatiṣṭheta śete ca śayite mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:8170: 12,142.005d*0365_03 hṛṣṭe bhavati sā hṛṣṭā duḥkhite mayi duḥkhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:8171: 12,142.005d*0365_04 proṣite dīnavadanā kruddhe ca priyavādinī 12,142.006a patidharmaratā sādhvī prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī
GE07mbh_12_u:8172: 12,142.006c sā hi śrāntaṃ kṣudhārtaṃ ca jānīte māṃ tapasvinī 12,142.007a anuraktā hitā caiva snigdhā caiva pativratā
GE07mbh_12_u:8173: 12,142.007c yasya vai tādṛśī bhāryā dhanyaḥ sa manujo bhuvi 12,142.007d*0366_01 vṛkṣamūle 'pi dayitā yasya tiṣṭhati tad gṛham 12,142.007d*0366_02 prāsādo 'pi tayā hīnaḥ kāntāra iti niścitam 12,142.007d*0366_03 dharmārthakāmakāleṣu bhāryā puṃsaḥ sahāyinī
GE07mbh_12_u:8175: 12,142.007d*0367_01 yasya bhāryā sadā raktā tathā chandānuvartinī

GE07mbh_12_u:8180: 12,142.007d*0367_06 yā cātīva hi saṃhṛṣṭā sā śrīḥ sākṣān na vai dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:8181: 12,142.008a bhāryā hi paramo nāthaḥ puruṣasyeha paṭhyate

GE07mbh_12_u:8185: 12,142.010c nāsti bhāryāsamo loke sahāyo dharmasādhanaḥ 12,142.010d*0368_01 yasya bhāryā gṛhe nāsti sādhvī ca priyavādinī
GE07mbh_12_u:8186: 12,142.010d*0368_02 araṇyaṃ tena gantavyaṃ yathāraṇyaṃ tathā gṛham
GE07mbh_12_u:8187: 12,142.010d*0369_01 aho mama vinā vahniṃ dahyate gātrasaṃcayam
GE07mbh_12_u:8189: 12,142.011a evaṃ vilapatas tasya dvijasyārtasya tatra vai
GE07mbh_12_u:8190: 12,142.011c gṛhītā śakunaghnena bhāryā śuśrāva bhāratīm 12,142.011d*0370_00 kapoty uvāca 12,142.011d*0370_01 aho 'tīva subhāgyāhaṃ yasyā me dayitaḥ patiḥ 12,142.011d*0370_02 asato vā sato vāpi guṇān evaṃ prabhāṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:8191: 12,142.012a na sā strīty abhibhāṣā syād yasyā bhartā na tuṣyati

GE07mbh_12_u:8193: 12,142.012c agnisākṣikam apy etad bhartā hi śaraṇaṃ striyaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:8196: 12,142.013a iti saṃcintya duḥkhārtā bhartāraṃ duḥkhitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:8197: 12,142.013c kapotī lubdhakenātha yattā vacanam abravīt 12,142.014a hanta vakṣyāmi te śreyaḥ śrutvā ca kuru tat tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:8199: 12,142.015a eṣa śākunikaḥ śete tava vāsaṃ samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8200: 12,142.015c śītārtaś ca kṣudhārtaś ca pūjām asmai prayojaya
GE07mbh_12_u:8201: 12,142.016a yo hi kaś cid dvijaṃ hanyād gāṃ vā lokasya mātaram

GE07mbh_12_u:8203: 12,142.018a yas tu dharmaṃ yathāśakti gṛhastho hy anuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:8204: 12,142.018c sa pretya labhate lokān akṣayān iti śuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:8205: 12,142.019a sa tvaṃ saṃtānavān adya putravān api ca dvija 12,142.019c tat svadehe dayāṃ tyaktvā dharmārthau parigṛhya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:8206: 12,142.019e pūjām asmai prayuṅkṣva tvaṃ prīyetāsya mano yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:8207: 12,142.019f*0373_01 matkṛte mā ca saṃtāpaṃ kurvīthās tvaṃ vihaṃgama
GE07mbh_12_u:8209: 12,142.020a iti sā śakunī vākyaṃ kṣārakasthā tapasvinī
GE07mbh_12_u:8211: 12,142.021a sa patnyā vacanaṃ śrutvā dharmayuktisamanvitam 12,142.021c harṣeṇa mahatā yukto
GE07mbh_12_u:8212: 12,142.022a taṃ vai śākunikaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:8213: 12,142.022c pūjayām āsa yatnena sa pakṣī pakṣijīvinam
GE07mbh_12_u:8214: 12,142.023a uvāca ca svāgataṃ te brūhi kiṃ karavāṇy aham 12,142.023c saṃtāpaś ca na kartavyaḥ svagṛhe vartate bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:8215: 12,142.024a tad bravītu bhavān kṣipraṃ kiṃ karomi kim icchasi 12,142.024c praṇayena bravīmi tvāṃ tvaṃ hi naḥ śaraṇāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8216: 12,142.024d*0374_01 arāv apy ucitaṃ kāryam ātithyaṃ gṛham āgate
GE07mbh_12_u:8217: 12,142.024d*0374_02 chettum apy āgate chāyāṃ nopasaṃharate drumaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8218: 12,142.025a śaraṇāgatasya kartavyam ātithyam iha yatnataḥ 12,142.025c pañcayajñapravṛttena gṛhasthena viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8219: 12,142.026a pañcayajñāṃs tu yo mohān na karoti gṛhāśramī
GE07mbh_12_u:8220: 12,142.026c tasya nāyaṃ na ca paro loko bhavati dharmataḥ 12,142.027a tad brūhi tvaṃ suvisrabdho yat tvaṃ vācā vadiṣyasi 12,142.027c tat kariṣyāmy ahaṃ sarvaṃ mā tvaṃ śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8221: 12,142.028a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā śakuner lubdhako 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:8222: 12,142.028c bādhate khalu mā śītaṃ himatrāṇaṃ vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:8223: 12,142.029a evam uktas tataḥ pakṣī parṇāny āstīrya bhūtale
GE07mbh_12_u:8224: 12,142.029c yathāśuṣkāṇi yatnena jvalanārthaṃ drutaṃ yayau 12,142.030a sa gatvāṅgārakarmāntaṃ gṛhītvāgnim athāgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:8226: 12,142.031a susaṃdīptaṃ mahat kṛtvā tam āha śaraṇāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:8228: 12,142.032a sa tathoktas tathety uktvā lubdho gātrāṇy atāpayat
GE07mbh_12_u:8231: 12,142.032d*0375_02 tathemaṃ śakuniṃ dṛṣṭvā vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā 12,142.033a dattam āhāram icchāmi tvayā kṣud bādhate hi mām 12,142.033c tad vacaḥ sa pratiśrutya vākyam āha vihaṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8232: 12,142.034a na me 'sti vibhavo yena nāśayāmi tava kṣudhām 12,142.034c utpannena hi jīvāmo vayaṃ nityaṃ vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8233: 12,142.035a saṃcayo nāsti cāsmākaṃ munīnām iva kānane

GE07mbh_12_u:8236: 12,142.036c babhūva bharataśreṣṭha garhayan vṛttim ātmanaḥ 12,142.037a muhūrtāl labdhasaṃjñas tu sa pakṣī pakṣighātakam

GE07mbh_12_u:8238: 12,142.038c harṣeṇa mahatā yuktaḥ kapotaḥ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:8239: 12,142.039a devānāṃ ca munīnāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:8240: 12,142.039c śrutapūrvo mayā dharmo mahān atithipūjane 12,142.040a kuruṣvānugrahaṃ me 'dya satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:8241: 12,142.040c niścitā khalu me buddhir atithipratipūjane 12,142.041a tataḥ satyapratijño vai sa pakṣī prahasann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:8242: 12,142.041c tam agniṃ triḥ parikramya praviveśa mahīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:8243: 12,142.042a agnimadhyaṃ praviṣṭaṃ taṃ lubdho dṛṣṭvātha pakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:8244: 12,142.042c cintayām āsa manasā kim idaṃ nu kṛtaṃ mayā 12,142.043a aho mama nṛśaṃsasya garhitasya svakarmaṇā 12,142.043c adharmaḥ sumahān ghoro bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8245: 12,142.044a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhūri vilalāpa sa lubdhakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8246: 12,142.044c garhayan svāni karmāṇi dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:8247: 12,143.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,143.001a tatas taṃ lubdhakaḥ paśyan kṛpayābhipariplutaḥ 12,143.001c kapotam agnau patitaṃ vākyaṃ punar uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:8248: 12,143.002a kim īdṛśaṃ nṛśaṃsena mayā kṛtam abuddhinā
GE07mbh_12_u:8249: 12,143.002c bhaviṣyati hi me nityaṃ pātakaṃ hṛdi jīvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8250: 12,143.003a sa vinindann athātmānaṃ punaḥ punar uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:8251: 12,143.003c dhiṅ mām astu sudurbuddhiṃ sadā nikṛtiniścayam
GE07mbh_12_u:8253: 12,143.004a nṛśaṃsasya mamādyāyaṃ pratyādeśo na saṃśayaḥ 12,143.004c dattaḥ svamāṃsaṃ dadatā kapotena mahātmanā 12,143.005a so 'haṃ tyakṣye priyān prāṇān putradāraṃ visṛjya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:8254: 12,143.005c upadiṣṭo hi me dharmaḥ kapotenātidharmiṇā 12,143.006a adya prabhṛti dehaṃ svaṃ sarvabhogair vivarjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:8255: 12,143.006c yathā svalpaṃ jalaṃ grīṣme śoṣayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:8259: 12,143.008c tasmād dharmaṃ cariṣyāmi dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8260: 12,143.008e dṛṣṭo hi dharmo dharmiṣṭhair yādṛśo vihagottame
GE07mbh_12_u:8261: 12,143.009a evam uktvā viniścitya raudrakarmā sa lubdhakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8263: 12,143.010a tato yaṣṭiṃ śalākāś ca kṣārakaṃ pañjaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:8264: 12,143.010c tāṃś ca baddhā kapotān sa saṃpramucyotsasarja ha
GE07mbh_12_u:8265: 12,144.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,144.001a tato gate śākunike kapotī prāha duḥkhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:8266: 12,144.001c saṃsmṛtya bhartāram atho rudatī śokamūrchitā 12,144.002a nāhaṃ te vipriyaṃ kānta kadā cid api saṃsmare 12,144.002c sarvā vai vidhavā nārī bahuputrāpi khecara
GE07mbh_12_u:8267: 12,144.002e śocyā bhavati bandhūnāṃ patihīnā manasvinī 12,144.003a lālitāhaṃ tvayā nityaṃ bahumānāc ca sāntvitā
GE07mbh_12_u:8268: 12,144.003c vacanair madhuraiḥ snigdhair asakṛt sumanoharaiḥ 12,144.004a kandareṣu ca śailānāṃ nadīnāṃ nirjhareṣu ca

GE07mbh_12_u:8273: 12,144.008a na kāryam iha me nātha jīvitena tvayā vinā 12,144.008c patihīnāpi kā nārī satī jīvitum utsahet
GE07mbh_12_u:8274: 12,144.009a evaṃ vilapya bahudhā karuṇaṃ sā suduḥkhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:8279: 12,144.011d*0376_01 kapoto 'pi ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kapotīṃ ca surūpiṇīm
GE07mbh_12_u:8280: 12,144.011d*0376_02 harṣeṇa mahatā yuktaḥ pariṣvajyedam abravīt 12,144.011d*0376_03 aho mām anugacchantyā kṛtaṃ sādhu śubhaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:8281: 12,144.011d*0376_04 kṣaṇamātreṇa duḥkhena sukhaṃ tena samārjitam 12,144.011d*0376_05 tisraḥ koṭyardhakoṭī ca yāni lomāni mānave
GE07mbh_12_u:8282: 12,144.011d*0376_06 tāvat kālaṃ vaset svarge bhartāraṃ yānugacchati

GE07mbh_12_u:8284: 12,144.011d*0376_08 tadvad bhartāram uddhṛtya tenaiva saha modate
GE07mbh_12_u:8285: 12,144.012a tataḥ svargagataḥ pakṣī bhāryayā saha saṃgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8286: 12,144.012c karmaṇā pūjitas tena reme tatra sa bhāryayā
GE07mbh_12_u:8287: 12,145.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,145.001a vimānasthau tu tau rājaṃl lubdhako vai dadarśa ha 12,145.001c dṛṣṭvā tau daṃpatī duḥkhād acintayata sadgatim
GE07mbh_12_u:8288: 12,145.002a kīdṛśeneha tapasā gaccheyaṃ paramāṃ gatim 12,145.002c iti buddhyā viniścitya
GE07mbh_12_u:8293: 12,145.004e pipāsārto 'pi tad dṛṣṭvā tṛptaḥ syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8296: 12,145.006a mahāntaṃ niścayaṃ kṛtvā lubdhakaḥ praviveśa ha
GE07mbh_12_u:8297: 12,145.006c praviśann eva ca vanaṃ nigṛhītaḥ sa kaṇṭakaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8300: 12,145.008a tato drumāṇāṃ mahatāṃ pavanena vane tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:8305: 12,145.010c dadāha tad vanaṃ ghoraṃ mṛgapakṣisamākulam 12,145.011a tataḥ sa dehamokṣārthaṃ saṃprahṛṣṭena cetasā 12,145.011c abhyadhāvata saṃvṛddhaṃ pāvakaṃ lubdhakas tadā 12,145.012a tatas tenāgninā dagdho lubdhako naṣṭakilbiṣaḥ 12,145.012c jagāma paramāṃ siddhiṃ tadā bharatasattama 12,145.013a tataḥ svargastham ātmānaṃ so 'paśyad vigatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8307: 12,145.014a evaṃ khalu kapotaś ca kapotī ca pativratā
GE07mbh_12_u:8308: 12,145.014c lubdhakena saha svargaṃ gatāḥ puṇyena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:8309: 12,145.015a yāpi caivaṃvidhā nārī bhartāram anuvartate 12,145.015c virājate hi sā kṣipraṃ kapotīva divi sthitā
GE07mbh_12_u:8310: 12,145.016a evam etat purā vṛttaṃ lubdhakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8311: 12,145.016c kapotasya ca dharmiṣṭhā gatiḥ puṇyena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:8312: 12,145.017a yaś cedaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ yaś cedaṃ parikīrtayet
GE07mbh_12_u:8313: 12,145.017c nāśubhaṃ vidyate tasya manasāpi pramādyataḥ 12,145.018a yudhiṣṭhira mahān eṣa dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:8314: 12,145.018c goghneṣv api bhaved asmin niṣkṛtiḥ pāpakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8315: 12,145.018e niṣkṛtir na bhavet tasmin yo hanyāc charaṇāgatam

GE07mbh_12_u:8615: 12,150.000*0397_00 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,150.000*0397_01 balinaḥ pratyamitrasya nityam āsannavartinaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:8621: 12,150.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,150.001a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam

GE07mbh_12_u:8623: 12,150.003b*0398_01 yā varāhamṛgaśārdūlapatatrigaṇasaṃkulāḥ 12,150.003c viśramanti mahābāho tathānyā mṛgajātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8626: 12,150.004d*0399_01 taṃ kadā cin munir dṛṣṭvā nārado vismito 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:8627: 12,150.004d*0399_02 dhanyas tvam eka evāsi śālmale vāyuvallabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8628: 12,150.005a sārthikā vaṇijaś cāpi tāpasāś ca vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8629: 12,150.005c vasanti vāsān mārgasthāḥ suramye tarusattame 12,150.006a tasyā tā vipulāḥ śākhā dṛṣṭvā skandhāṃś ca sarvataḥ 12,150.006c abhigamyābravīd enaṃ nārado bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:8630: 12,150.007a aho nu ramaṇīyas tvam aho cāsi manoramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8631: 12,150.007c prīyāmahe tvayā nityaṃ tarupravara śalmale 12,150.008a sadaiva śakunās tāta mṛgāś cādhas tathā gajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8632: 12,150.008c vasanti tava saṃhṛṣṭā manoharatarās tathā 12,150.009a tava śākhā mahāśākha skandhaṃ ca vipulaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:8633: 12,150.009c na vai prabhagnān paśyāmi mārutena kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:8635: 12,150.010a kiṃ nu te mārutas tāta prītimān atha vā suhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:8636: 12,150.010c tvāṃ rakṣati sadā yena vane 'smin pavano dhruvam 12,150.011a vivān hi pavanaḥ sthānād vṛkṣān uccāvacān api
GE07mbh_12_u:8637: 12,150.011c parvatānāṃ ca śikharāṇy ācālayati vegavān 12,150.012a śoṣayaty eva pātālaṃ vivān gandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8638: 12,150.012c hradāṃś ca saritaś caiva sāgarāṃś ca tathaiva ha 12,150.013a tvāṃ saṃrakṣeta pavanaḥ sakhitvena na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8640: 12,150.014a idaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ te pratibhāti vanaspate
GE07mbh_12_u:8641: 12,150.014c yad ime vihagās tāta ramante muditās tvayi
GE07mbh_12_u:8642: 12,150.015a eṣāṃ pṛthak samastānāṃ śrūyate madhuraḥ svaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8645: 12,150.016c gharmārtās tvāṃ samāsādya sukhaṃ vindanti śalmale
GE07mbh_12_u:8647: 12,150.017c tathā sārthādhivāsaiś ca śobhase meruvad druma
GE07mbh_12_u:8648: 12,150.018a brāhmaṇaiś ca tapaḥsiddhais tāpasaiḥ śramaṇair api
GE07mbh_12_u:8649: 12,150.018c triviṣṭapasamaṃ manye tavāyatanam eva ha 12,150.019a bandhutvād atha vā sakhyāc chalmale nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8651: 12,150.020a nyagbhāvaṃ paramaṃ vāyoḥ śalmale tvam upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8652: 12,150.020c tavāham asmīti sadā yena rakṣati mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8653: 12,150.021a na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ vṛkṣaṃ parvataṃ vāpi taṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_12_u:8654: 12,150.021c yo na vāyubalād bhagnaḥ pṛthivyām iti me matiḥ 12,150.022a tvaṃ punaḥ kāraṇair nūnaṃ śalmale rakṣyase sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:8655: 12,150.022c vāyunā saparīvāras tena tiṣṭhasy asaṃśayam 12,150.023 śalmalir uvāca 12,150.023a na me vāyuḥ sakhā brahman na bandhur na ca me suhṛt 12,150.023c parameṣṭhī tathā naiva yena rakṣati mānilaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8656: 12,150.024a mama tejobalaṃ vāyor bhīmam api hi nārada
GE07mbh_12_u:8657: 12,150.024c kalām aṣṭādaśīṃ prāṇair na me prāpnoti mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8658: 12,150.025a āgacchan paramo vāyur mayā viṣṭambhito balāt
GE07mbh_12_u:8659: 12,150.025c rujan drumān parvatāṃś ca yac cānyad api kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:8660: 12,150.026a sa mayā bahuśo bhagnaḥ prabhañjan vai prabhañjanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8661: 12,150.026c tasmān na bibhye devarṣe kruddhād api samīraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:8662: 12,150.027 nārada uvāca 12,150.027a śalmale viparītaṃ te darśanaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8663: 12,150.027c na hi vāyor balenāsti bhūtaṃ tulyabalaṃ kva cit 12,150.028a indro yamo vaiśravaṇo varuṇaś ca jaleśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8664: 12,150.028c na te 'pi tulyā marutaḥ kiṃ punas tvaṃ vanaspate
GE07mbh_12_u:8665: 12,150.029a yad dhi kiṃ cid iha prāṇi śalmale ceṣṭate bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:8666: 12,150.029c sarvatra bhagavān vāyuś ceṣṭāprāṇakaraḥ prabhuḥ 12,150.030a eṣa ceṣṭayate samyak prāṇinaḥ samyag āyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8667: 12,150.030c asamyag āyato bhūyaś ceṣṭate vikṛto nṛṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:8668: 12,150.031a sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ vāyuṃ sarvasattvabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_12_u:8669: 12,150.031c na pūjayasi pūjyaṃ taṃ kim anyad buddhilāghavāt
GE07mbh_12_u:8670: 12,150.032a asāraś cāsi durbuddhe kevalaṃ bahu bhāṣase
GE07mbh_12_u:8671: 12,150.032c krodhādibhir avacchanno mithyā vadasi śalmale 12,150.033a mama roṣaḥ samutpannas tvayy evaṃ saṃprabhāṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:8672: 12,150.033c bravīmy eṣa svayaṃ vāyos tava durbhāṣitaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_12_u:8673: 12,150.034a candanaiḥ spandanaiḥ śālaiḥ saralair devadārubhiḥ 12,150.034c vetasair bandhanaiś cāpi ye cānye balavattarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8674: 12,150.035a taiś cāpi naivaṃ durbuddhe kṣipto vāyuḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8675: 12,150.035c te hi jānanti vāyoś ca balam ātmana eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:8676: 12,150.036a tasmāt te vai namasyanti śvasanaṃ drumasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8677: 12,150.036c tvaṃ tu mohān na jānīṣe vāyor balam anantakam 12,150.036d*0401_01 eṣa tasmād gamiṣyāmi sakāśaṃ mātariśvanaḥ 12,151.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,151.001a evam uktvā tu rājendra śalmaliṃ brahmavittamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8678: 12,151.001c nāradaḥ pavane sarvaṃ śalmaler vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:8679: 12,151.002a himavatpṛṣṭhajaḥ kaś cic chalmaliḥ parivāravān 12,151.002c bṛhanmūlo bṛhacchākhaḥ sa tvāṃ vāyo 'vamanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:8680: 12,151.003a bahūny ākṣepayuktāni tvām āha vacanāni saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8681: 12,151.003c na yuktāni mayā vāyo tāni vaktuṃ tvayi prabho 12,151.004a jānāmi tvām ahaṃ vāyo sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_12_u:8682: 12,151.004c variṣṭhaṃ ca gariṣṭhaṃ ca krodhe vaivasvataṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:8683: 12,151.005a evaṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā nāradasya samīraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8684: 12,151.005c śalmaliṃ tam upāgamya kruddho vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:8685: 12,151.006a śalmale nārade yat tat tvayoktaṃ madvigarhaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:8686: 12,151.006c ahaṃ vāyuḥ prabhāvaṃ te darśayāmy ātmano balam
GE07mbh_12_u:8687: 12,151.007a nāhaṃ tvā nābhijānāmi viditaś cāsi me druma
GE07mbh_12_u:8688: 12,151.007c pitāmahaḥ prajāsarge tvayi viśrāntavān prabhuḥ 12,151.008a tasya viśramaṇād eva prasādo yaḥ kṛtas tava
GE07mbh_12_u:8689: 12,151.008c rakṣyase tena durbuddhe nātmavīryād drumādhama 12,151.009a yan mā tvam avajānīṣe yathānyaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:8690: 12,151.009c darśayāmy eṣa ātmānaṃ yathā mām avabhotsyase
GE07mbh_12_u:8691: 12,151.010a evam uktas tataḥ prāha śalmaliḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:8692: 12,151.010c pavana tvaṃ vane kruddho darśayātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:8693: 12,151.011a mayi vai tyajyatāṃ krodhaḥ kiṃ me kruddhaḥ kariṣyasi 12,151.011c na te bibhemi pavana yady api tvaṃ svayaṃprabhuḥ 12,151.011d*0402_01 balādhiko 'haṃ tvattaś ca na bhīḥ kāryā mayā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:8694: 12,151.011d*0402_02 ye tu buddhyā hi balinas te bhavanti balīyasaḥ 12,151.011d*0402_03 prāṇamātrabalā ye vai naiva te balino matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8695: 12,151.012a ity evam uktaḥ pavanaḥ śva ity evābravīd vacaḥ 12,151.012c darśayiṣyāmi te tejas tato rātrir upāgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:8696: 12,151.013a atha niścitya manasā śalmalir vātakāritam 12,151.013c paśyamānas tadātmānam asamaṃ mātariśvanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8697: 12,151.014a nārade yan mayā proktaṃ pavanaṃ prati tan mṛṣā 12,151.014c asamartho hy ahaṃ vāyor balena balavān hi saḥ 12,151.015a māruto balavān nityaṃ yathainaṃ nārado 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:8698: 12,151.015c ahaṃ hi durbalo 'nyebhyo vṛkṣebhyo nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8699: 12,151.016a kiṃ tu buddhyā samo nāsti mama kaś cid vanaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8700: 12,151.016c tad ahaṃ buddhim āsthāya bhayaṃ mokṣye samīraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:8701: 12,151.017a yadi tāṃ buddhim āsthāya careyuḥ parṇino vane
GE07mbh_12_u:8702: 12,151.017c ariṣṭāḥ syuḥ sadā kruddhāt pavanān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8703: 12,151.018a te 'tra bālā na jānanti yathā nainān samīraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8704: 12,151.018c samīrayeta saṃkruddho yathā jānāmy ahaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:8705: 12,151.019a tato niścitya manasā śalmaliḥ kṣubhitas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:8706: 12,151.019c śākhāḥ skandhān praśākhāś ca svayam eva vyaśātayat
GE07mbh_12_u:8707: 12,151.020a sa parityajya śākhāś ca patrāṇi kusumāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:8708: 12,151.020c prabhāte vāyum āyāntaṃ pratyaikṣata vanaspatiḥ 12,151.021a tataḥ kruddhaḥ śvasan vāyuḥ pātayan vai mahādrumān
GE07mbh_12_u:8709: 12,151.021c ājagāmātha taṃ deśaṃ sthito yatra sa śalmaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8710: 12,151.022a taṃ hīnaparṇaṃ patitāgraśākhaṃ; viśīrṇapuṣpaṃ prasamīkṣya vāyuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8711: 12,151.022c uvāca vākyaṃ smayamāna enaṃ; mudā yutaṃ śalmaliṃ rugṇaśākham
GE07mbh_12_u:8712: 12,151.023a aham apy evam eva tvāṃ kurvāṇaḥ śalmale ruṣā 12,151.023c ātmanā yat kṛtaṃ kṛtsnaṃ śākhānām apakarṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:8715: 12,151.025a etac chrutvā vaco vāyoḥ śalmalir vrīḍitas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:8716: 12,151.025c atapyata vacaḥ smṛtvā nārado yat tadābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:8717: 12,151.026a evaṃ yo rājaśārdūla durbalaḥ san balīyasā
GE07mbh_12_u:8718: 12,151.026c vairam āsajjate bālas tapyate śalmalir yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:8719: 12,151.027a tasmād vairaṃ na kurvīta durbalo balavattaraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8720: 12,151.027c śoced dhi vairaṃ kurvāṇo yathā vai śalmalis tathā 12,151.028a na hi vairaṃ mahātmāno vivṛṇvanty apakāriṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:8721: 12,151.028c śanaiḥ śanair mahārāja darśayanti sma te balam
GE07mbh_12_u:8722: 12,151.029a vairaṃ na kurvīta naro durbuddhir buddhijīvinā
GE07mbh_12_u:8723: 12,151.029c buddhir buddhimato yāti tūleṣv iva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8724: 12,151.030a na hi buddhyā samaṃ kiṃ cid vidyate puruṣe nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:8725: 12,151.030c tathā balena rājendra na samo 'stīti cintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:8726: 12,151.031a tasmāt kṣameta bālāya jaḍāya badhirāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:8727: 12,151.031c balādhikāya rājendra tad dṛṣṭaṃ tvayi śatruhan
GE07mbh_12_u:8728: 12,151.032a akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca sapta caiva mahādyute
GE07mbh_12_u:8729: 12,151.032c balena na samā rājann arjunasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8730: 12,151.033a hatās tāś caiva bhagnāś ca pāṇḍavena yaśasvinā
GE07mbh_12_u:8731: 12,151.033c caratā balam āsthāya pākaśāsaninā mṛdhe 12,151.034a uktās te rājadharmāś ca āpaddharmāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:8732: 12,151.034c vistareṇa mahārāja kiṃ bhūyaḥ prabravīmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:8733: 12,152.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,152.001a pāpasya yad adhiṣṭhānaṃ yataḥ pāpaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:8734: 12,152.001c etad icchāmy ahaṃ jñātuṃ tattvena bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:8735: 12,152.002 bhīṣma uvāca 12,152.002a pāpasya yad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:8736: 12,152.002c eko lobho mahāgrāho lobhāt pāpaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:8737: 12,152.003a ataḥ pāpam adharmaś ca tathā duḥkham anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:8738: 12,152.003c nikṛtyā mūlam etad dhi yena pāpakṛto janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8739: 12,152.004a lobhāt krodhaḥ prabhavati lobhāt kāmaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:8740: 12,152.004c lobhān mohaś ca māyā ca mānastambhaḥ parāsutā
GE07mbh_12_u:8742: 12,152.005c abhidhyāprajñatā caiva sarvaṃ lobhāt pravartate 12,152.006a anyāyaś cāvitarkaś ca vikarmasu ca yāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8747: 12,152.008a vāgvego mānaso vego nindāvegas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:8748: 12,152.008c upasthodarayor vego mṛtyuvegaś ca dāruṇaḥ 12,152.009a īrṣyāvegaś ca balavān mithyāvegaś ca dustyajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8749: 12,152.009c rasavegaś ca durvāraḥ śrotravegaś ca duḥsahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8750: 12,152.010a kutsā vikatthā mātsaryaṃ pāpaṃ duṣkarakāritā 12,152.010c sāhasānāṃ ca sarveṣām akāryāṇāṃ kriyās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:8751: 12,152.011a jātau bālye 'tha kaumāre yauvane cāpi mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8752: 12,152.011c na saṃtyajaty ātmakarma yan na jīryati jīryataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8753: 12,152.012a yo na pūrayituṃ śakyo lobhaḥ prāptyā kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_12_u:8755: 12,152.012e na prahṛṣyati lābhair yo yaś ca kāmair na tṛpyati
GE07mbh_12_u:8756: 12,152.013a yo na devair na gandharvair nāsurair na mahoragaiḥ 12,152.013c jñāyate nṛpa tattvena sarvair bhūtagaṇais tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:8757: 12,152.013e sa lobhaḥ saha mohena vijetavyo jitātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:8758: 12,152.014a dambho drohaś ca nindā ca paiśunyaṃ matsaras tathā 12,152.014c bhavanty etāni kauravya lubdhānām akṛtātmanām 12,152.015a sumahānty api śāstrāṇi dhārayanti bahuśrutāḥ 12,152.015c chettāraḥ saṃśayānāṃ ca kliśyantīhālpabuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8760: 12,152.016c antaḥkṣurā vāṅmadhurāḥ kūpāś channās tṛṇair iva
GE07mbh_12_u:8761: 12,152.016e dharmavaitaṃsikāḥ kṣudrā muṣṇanti dhvajino jagat 12,152.017a kurvate ca bahūn mārgāṃs tāṃs tān hetubalāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8762: 12,152.017c sarvaṃ mārgaṃ vilumpanti lobhājñāneṣu niṣṭhitāḥ 12,152.018a dharmasyāhriyamāṇasya lobhagrastair durātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8763: 12,152.018c yā yā vikriyate saṃsthā tataḥ sābhiprapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:8764: 12,152.019a darpaḥ krodho madaḥ svapno harṣaḥ śoko 'timānitā
GE07mbh_12_u:8765: 12,152.019c tata eva hi kauravya dṛśyante lubdhabuddhiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:8766: 12,152.019e etān aśiṣṭān budhyasva nityaṃ lobhasamanvitān 12,152.020a śiṣṭāṃs tu paripṛcchethā yān vakṣyāmi śucivratān
GE07mbh_12_u:8767: 12,152.020c yeṣu vṛttibhayaṃ nāsti paralokabhayaṃ na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:8768: 12,152.021a nāmiṣeṣu prasaṅgo 'sti na priyeṣv apriyeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:8769: 12,152.021c śiṣṭācāraḥ priyo yeṣu damo yeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:8770: 12,152.022a sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ paraṃ yeṣāṃ satyaṃ yeṣāṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:8771: 12,152.022c dātāro na gṛhītāro dayāvantas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:8772: 12,152.023a pitṛdevātitheyāś ca nityodyuktās tathaiva ca 12,152.023c sarvopakāriṇo dhīrāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:8786: 12,153.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,153.001a anarthānām adhiṣṭhānam ukto lobhaḥ pitāmaha 12,153.001c ajñānam api vai tāta śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:9374: 12,163.012a śriyā juṣṭaṃ mahāvṛkṣaṃ nyagrodhaṃ parimaṇḍalam 12,163.012c śākhābhir anurūpābhir bhūṣitaṃ chatrasaṃnibham

GE07mbh_12_u:9401: 12,164.004c ye caranti mahāmīnās tāṃś ca tasyānvakalpayat
GE07mbh_12_u:9402: 12,164.005a vahniṃ cāpi susaṃdīptaṃ mīnāṃś caiva supīvarān

GE07mbh_12_u:9408: 12,164.008c gandhāḍhyaṃ śayanaṃ prādāt sa śiśye tatra vai sukham 12,164.009a athopaviṣṭaṃ śayane gautamaṃ bakarāṭ tadā 12,164.009c papraccha kāśyapo vāgmī kim āgamanakāraṇam 12,164.010a tato 'bravīd gautamas taṃ daridro 'haṃ mahāmate

GE07mbh_12_u:9411: 12,164.011c kṛtakāryo dvijaśreṣṭha sadravyo yāsyase gṛhān 12,164.012a caturvidhā hy arthagatir bṛhaspatimataṃ yathā 12,164.012c pāraṃparyaṃ tathā daivaṃ karma mitram iti prabho

GE07mbh_12_u:9415: 12,164.016a taṃ gaccha dvijamukhya tvaṃ mama vākyapracoditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9416: 12,164.016c kāmān abhīpsitāṃs tubhyaṃ dātā nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9417: 12,164.017a ity uktaḥ prayayau rājan gautamo vigataklamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9418: 12,164.017c phalāny amṛtakalpāni bhakṣayan sma yatheṣṭataḥ 12,164.018a candanāgurumukhyāni tvakpatrāṇāṃ vanāni ca

GE07mbh_12_u:9422: 12,164.020a viditaś cābhavat tasya rākṣasendrasya dhīmataḥ 12,164.020c prahitaḥ suhṛdā rājan prīyatā vai priyātithiḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:9427: 12,164.023b*0437_02 āgaccha gautamety evaṃ tvaramāṇāḥ sasaṃbhramāḥ 12,164.023c tvarasva tūrṇam āgaccha rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:9428: 12,164.024a rākṣasādhipatir vīro virūpākṣa iti śrutaḥ 12,164.024c sa tvāṃ tvarati vai draṣṭuṃ tat kṣipraṃ saṃvidhīyatām 12,164.025a tataḥ sa prādravad vipro vismayād vigataklamaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:9430: 12,164.026c darśanaṃ rākṣasendrasya kāṅkṣamāṇo dvijas tadā 12,165.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,165.001a tataḥ sa vidito rājñaḥ praviśya gṛham uttamam

GE07mbh_12_u:9433: 12,165.002c na tatra vyājahārānyad gotramātrād ṛte dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9436: 12,165.004a kva te nivāsaḥ kalyāṇa kiṃgotrā brāhmaṇī ca te 12,165.004c tattvaṃ brūhi na bhīḥ kāryā viśramasva yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:9437: 12,165.005 gautama uvāca 12,165.005a madhyadeśaprasūto 'haṃ vāso me śabarālaye
GE07mbh_12_u:9438: 12,165.005c śūdrā punarbhūr bhāryā me satyam etad bravīmi te 12,165.006 bhīṣma uvāca 12,165.006a tato rājā vimamṛśe kathaṃ kāryam idaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:9439: 12,165.006c kathaṃ vā sukṛtaṃ me syād iti buddhyānvacintayat
GE07mbh_12_u:9440: 12,165.007a ayaṃ vai jananād vipraḥ suhṛt tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9441: 12,165.007c saṃpreṣitaś ca tenāyaṃ kāśyapena mamāntikam 12,165.008a tasya priyaṃ kariṣyāmi sa hi mām āśritaḥ sadā 12,165.008c bhrātā me bāndhavaś cāsau sakhā ca hṛdayaṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9442: 12,165.009a kārttikyām adya bhoktāraḥ sahasraṃ me dvijottamāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:9444: 12,165.009d*0439_01 sa cādya divasaḥ puṇyo hy atithiś cāyam āgataḥ 12,165.009d*0439_02 saṃkalpitaṃ caiva dhanaṃ kiṃ vicāryam ataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:9445: 12,165.010a tataḥ sahasraṃ viprāṇāṃ viduṣāṃ samalaṃkṛtam 12,165.010c snātānām anusaṃprāptam
GE07mbh_12_u:9446: 12,165.011a tān āgatān dvijaśreṣṭhān virūpākṣo viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_12_u:9454: 12,165.014a tato jāmbūnadāḥ pātrīr vajrāṅkā vimalāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9456: 12,165.015a tasya nityaṃ tathāṣāḍhyāṃ māghyāṃ ca bahavo dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9457: 12,165.015c īpsitaṃ bhojanavaraṃ labhante satkṛtaṃ sadā 12,165.016a viśeṣatas tu kārttikyāṃ dvijebhyaḥ saṃprayacchati 12,165.016c śaradvyapāye ratnāni paurṇamāsyām iti śrutiḥ 12,165.017a suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ caiva maṇīn atha ca mauktikam

GE07mbh_12_u:9460: 12,165.019e tāny evādāya gacchadhvaṃ svaveśmānīti bhārata 12,165.020a ity uktavacane tasmin rākṣasendre mahātmani 12,165.020c yatheṣṭaṃ tāni ratnāni jagṛhur brāhmaṇarṣabhāḥ 12,165.021a tato mahārhais te sarve ratnair abhyarcitāḥ śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9461: 12,165.021c brāhmaṇā mṛṣṭavasanāḥ suprītāḥ sma tadābhavan 12,165.022a tatas tān rākṣasendraś ca dvijān āha punar vacaḥ 12,165.022c nānādigāgatān rājan rākṣasān pratiṣidhya vai 12,165.023a adhyaikadivasaṃ viprā na vo 'stīha bhayaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:9462: 12,165.023c rākṣasebhyaḥ pramodadhvam iṣṭato yāta māciram 12,165.024a tataḥ pradudruvuḥ sarve viprasaṃghāḥ samantataḥ 12,165.024c gautamo 'pi suvarṇasya bhāram ādāya satvaraḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:9465: 12,165.027a tasya pakṣāgravikṣepaiḥ klamaṃ vyapanayat khagaḥ 12,165.027c pūjāṃ cāpy akarod dhīmān bhojanaṃ cāpy akalpayat
GE07mbh_12_u:9466: 12,165.027d*0441_01 niṣpatraḥ śayane tasmin paryatapyata duṣṭadhīḥ 12,165.027d*0442_01 tatas tau saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā khagendradvijasattamau 12,165.027d*0442_02 nyaṣīdatāṃ mahārāja nyagrodhe vipule tathā 12,165.027d*0442_03 gautamaś cintayām āsa rātrau tasya samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9468: 12,165.028c hāṭakasyābhirūpasya bhāro 'yaṃ sumahān mayā 12,165.028e gṛhīto lobhamohād vai dūraṃ ca gamanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:9469: 12,165.029a na cāsti pathi bhoktavyaṃ prāṇasaṃdhāraṇaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:9470: 12,165.029c kiṃ kṛtvā dhārayeyaṃ vai prāṇān ity abhyacintayat
GE07mbh_12_u:9471: 12,165.030a tataḥ sa pathi bhoktavyaṃ prekṣamāṇo na kiṃ cana 12,165.030c kṛtaghnaḥ puruṣavyāghra manasedam acintayat
GE07mbh_12_u:9472: 12,165.031a ayaṃ bakapatiḥ pārśve māṃsarāśiḥ sthito mama
GE07mbh_12_u:9473: 12,165.031c imaṃ hatvā gṛhītvā ca yāsye 'haṃ samabhidrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:9474: 12,166.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,166.001a atha tatra mahārciṣmān analo vātasārathiḥ 12,166.001c tasyāvidūre rakṣārthaṃ khagendreṇa kṛto 'bhavat

GE07mbh_12_u:9479: 12,166.004b*0443_01 pakvānnaṃ bhakṣayitvā ca kṛtaghnaḥ pāpapūruṣaḥ 12,166.004b*0443_02 jagāma tvarayā rājan svagṛhaṃ kṛtakṛtyavat 12,166.004c taṃ gṛhītvā suvarṇaṃ ca yayau drutataraṃ dvijaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:9482: 12,166.005c na prekṣe rājadharmāṇam adya putra khagottamam

GE07mbh_12_u:9485: 12,166.006c māṃ cādṛṣṭvā kadā cit sa na gacchati gṛhān khagaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:9488: 12,166.008c taṃ gatas tatra me śaṅkā hanyāt taṃ sa dvijādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9489: 12,166.009a durācāras tu durbuddhir iṅgitair lakṣito mayā

GE07mbh_12_u:9494: 12,166.012c tvaramāṇaḥ paraṃ śaktyā gautamagrahaṇāya vai 12,166.013a tato 'vidūre jagṛhur gautamaṃ rākṣasās tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:9496: 12,166.014a tam ādāyātha rakṣāṃsi drutaṃ meruvrajaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9497: 12,166.014c rājñaś ca darśayām āsuḥ śarīraṃ rājadharmaṇaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:9505: 12,166.019a dasyūnāṃ dīyatām eṣa sādhv adya puruṣādhamaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:9508: 12,166.020c na dātum arhasi tvaṃ no bhakṣaṇāyāsya kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:9509: 12,166.021a evam astv iti tān āha rākṣasendro niśācarān
GE07mbh_12_u:9511: 12,166.022a ity ukte tasya te dāsāḥ śūlamudgarapāṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9512: 12,166.022c chittvā taṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ pāpaṃ dasyubhyaḥ pradadus tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:9513: 12,166.023a dasyavaś cāpi naicchanta tam attuṃ pāpakāriṇam

GE07mbh_12_u:9515: 12,166.024c niṣkṛtir vihitā rājan kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9516: 12,166.025a mitradrohī nṛśaṃsaś ca kṛtaghnaś ca narādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9517: 12,166.025c kravyādaiḥ kṛmibhiś cānyair na bhujyante hi tādṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:9518: 12,166.025d*0446_01 nyagrodhe rājadharmāṇam apaśyan nihataṃ tataḥ 12,166.025d*0446_02 ruditvā bahu tat tad vai vilapya ca sa rākṣasaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:10495: 12,187.005a tataḥ sṛṣṭāni tatraiva tāni yānti punaḥ punaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:10502: 12,187.006d*0505_07 ākāśāt khalu yājyeṣu bhavanti sumahāguṇāḥ 12,187.006d*0505_08 iti tanmayam evaitat sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam 12,187.006d*0505_09 pralaye ca tam abhyeti tasmād utsṛjyate punaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:10504: 12,187.007c akarot teṣu vaiṣamyaṃ tat tu jīvo 'nu paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:10505: 12,187.008a śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśayonijam
