GE07mbh_12_u:10507: 12,187.009a rūpaṃ cakṣus tathā paktis trividhaṃ teja ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:10508: 12,187.009c rasaḥ kledaś ca jihvā ca trayo jalaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ 12,187.010a ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca te tu bhūmiguṇās trayaḥ 12,187.010c mahābhūtāni pañcaiva ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu mana ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:10509: 12,187.011a indriyāṇi manaś caiva vijñānāny asya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:10510: 12,187.011c saptamī buddhir ity āhuḥ kṣetrajñaḥ punar aṣṭamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10511: 12,187.012a cakṣur ālokanāyaiva saṃśayaṃ kurute manaḥ 12,187.012c buddhir adhyavasāyāya kṣetrajñaḥ sākṣivat sthitaḥ 12,187.012d*0506_01 cicchaktyādhiṣṭhitā buddhiś cetanety abhiviśrutā
GE07mbh_12_u:10512: 12,187.012d*0506_02 cetanānantaro jīvas tad āvetti ca lakṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:10513: 12,187.012d*0506_03 notsṛjan visṛjaṃś caiva śarīraṃ dṛśyate yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:10514: 12,187.012d*0506_04 tasmiṃś cetopalabdhiḥ syāt tamo vācchādayaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:10515: 12,187.013a ūrdhvaṃ pādatalābhyāṃ yad arvāg ūrdhvaṃ ca paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:10516: 12,187.013c etena sarvam evedaṃ viddhy abhivyāptam antaram
GE07mbh_12_u:10518: 12,187.014c tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi bhāvāṃs tadāśrayān 12,187.015a etāṃ buddhvā naro buddhyā bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:10519: 12,187.015c samavekṣya śanaiś caiva labhate śamam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:10520: 12,187.016a guṇān nenīyate buddhir buddhir evendriyāṇy api
GE07mbh_12_u:10521: 12,187.016c manaḥṣaṣṭhāni sarvāṇi buddhyabhāve kuto guṇāḥ 12,187.016d*0507_01 yena saṃkalpayaty arthaṃ kiṃ cid bhavati tanmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10522: 12,187.017a iti tanmayam evaitat sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam 12,187.017c pralīyate codbhavati tasmān nirdiśyate tathā 12,187.018a yena paśyati tac cakṣuḥ śṛṇoti śrotram ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:10523: 12,187.018c jighrati ghrāṇam ity āhū rasaṃ jānāti jihvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:10524: 12,187.019a tvacā spṛśati ca sparśān buddhir vikriyate 'sakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:10525: 12,187.019c yena saṃkalpayaty arthaṃ kiṃ cid bhavati tan manaḥ 12,187.020a adhiṣṭhānāni buddher hi pṛthag arthāni pañcadhā
GE07mbh_12_u:10527: 12,187.021a puruṣādhiṣṭhitā buddhis triṣu bhāveṣu vartate 12,187.021c kadā cil labhate prītiṃ kadā cid anuśocati
GE07mbh_12_u:10528: 12,187.022a na sukhena na duḥkhena kadā cid api vartate 12,187.022c evaṃ narāṇāṃ manasi triṣu bhāveṣv avasthitā
GE07mbh_12_u:10529: 12,187.023a seyaṃ bhāvātmikā bhāvāṃs trīn etān nātivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:10530: 12,187.023c saritāṃ sāgaro bhartā mahāvelām ivormimān 12,187.024a atibhāvagatā buddhir bhāve manasi vartate 12,187.024c pravartamānaṃ hi rajas tadbhāvam anuvartate 12,187.025a indriyāṇi hi sarvāṇi pradarśayati sā sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:10531: 12,187.025c prītiḥ sattvaṃ rajaḥ śokas tamo mohaś ca te trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10532: 12,187.026a ye ye ca bhāvā loke 'smin sarveṣv eteṣu te triṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:10533: 12,187.026b*0508_01 sattvaṃ buddhis tamobhāvaḥ prītiyogāt pravartate 12,187.026c iti buddhigatiḥ sarvā vyākhyātā tava bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:10534: 12,187.027a indriyāṇi ca sarvāṇi vijetavyāni dhīmatā 12,187.027c sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva prāṇināṃ saṃśritāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:10535: 12,187.028a trividhā vedanā caiva sarvasattveṣu dṛśyate 12,187.028c sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:10538: 12,187.030a tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:10539: 12,187.030c vartate sāttviko bhāva ity avekṣeta tat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:10540: 12,187.031a atha yad duḥkhasaṃyuktam atuṣṭikaram ātmanaḥ 12,187.031c pravṛttaṃ raja ity eva tann asaṃrabhya cintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:10541: 12,187.032a atha yan mohasaṃyuktam avyaktam iva yad bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:10542: 12,187.032c apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhārayet 12,187.033a praharṣaḥ prītir ānandaḥ sukhaṃ saṃśāntacittatā 12,187.033c kathaṃ cid abhivartanta ity ete sāttvikā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10543: 12,187.034a atuṣṭiḥ paritāpaś ca śoko lobhas tathākṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:10544: 12,187.034c liṅgāni rajasas tāni dṛśyante hetvahetubhiḥ 12,187.035a abhimānas tathā mohaḥ pramādaḥ svapnatandritā 12,187.035c kathaṃ cid abhivartante vividhās tāmasā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10546: 12,187.036c manaḥ suniyataṃ yasya sa sukhī pretya ceha ca 12,187.037a sattvakṣetrajñayor etad antaraṃ paśya sūkṣmayoḥ 12,187.037c sṛjate tu guṇān eka eko na sṛjate guṇān 12,187.038a maśakodumbarau cāpi saṃprayuktau yathā sadā 12,187.038c anyonyam anyau ca yathā saṃprayogas tathā tayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10547: 12,187.039a pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyā tau saṃprayuktau ca sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:10548: 12,187.039c yathā matsyo jalaṃ caiva saṃprayuktau tathaiva tau
GE07mbh_12_u:10549: 12,187.040a na guṇā vidur ātmānaṃ sa guṇān vetti sarvaśaḥ 12,187.040c paridraṣṭā guṇānāṃ ca saṃsraṣṭā manyate sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:10550: 12,187.041a indriyais tu pradīpārthaṃ kurute buddhisaptamaiḥ 12,187.041c nirviceṣṭair ajānadbhiḥ paramātmā pradīpavat
GE07mbh_12_u:10551: 12,187.042a sṛjate hi guṇān sattvaṃ kṣetrajñaḥ paripaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:10552: 12,187.042c saṃprayogas tayor eṣa sattvakṣetrajñayor dhruvaḥ 12,187.043a āśrayo nāsti sattvasya kṣetrajñasya ca kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:10553: 12,187.043c sattvaṃ manaḥ saṃsṛjati na guṇān vai kadā cana 12,187.044a raśmīṃs teṣāṃ sa manasā yadā samyaṅ niyacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:10554: 12,187.044c tadā prakāśate 'syātmā ghaṭe dīpo jvalann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:10555: 12,187.045a tyaktvā yaḥ prākṛtaṃ karma nityam ātmaratir muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10556: 12,187.045c sarvabhūtātmabhūtaḥ syāt sa gacchet paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:10557: 12,187.046a yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī lipyamāno na lipyate
GE07mbh_12_u:10558: 12,187.046c evam eva kṛtaprajño bhūteṣu parivartate 12,187.047a evaṃsvabhāvam evaitat svabuddhyā viharen naraḥ 12,187.047c aśocann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca cared vigatamatsaraḥ 12,187.048a svabhāvasiddhyā saṃsiddhān sa nityaṃ sṛjate guṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:10559: 12,187.048c ūrṇanābhir yathā sraṣṭā vijñeyās tantuvad guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10560: 12,187.049a pradhvastā na nivartante nivṛttir nopalabhyate 12,187.049c pratyakṣeṇa parokṣaṃ tad anumānena sidhyati 12,187.050a evam eke vyavasyanti nivṛttir iti cāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:10563: 12,187.051c vimucya sukham āsīta na śocec chinnasaṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10564: 12,187.052a malināḥ prāpnuyuḥ śuddhiṃ yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10565: 12,187.052c avagāhya suvidvaṃso viddhi jñānam idaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:10566: 12,187.053a mahānadīṃ hi pārajñas tapyate na taran yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:10567: 12,187.053b*0509_01 na tu tapyati tattvajñaḥ phale jñāte taraty uta 12,187.053c evaṃ ye vidur adhyātmaṃ kaivalyaṃ jñānam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:10568: 12,187.054a etāṃ buddhvā naraḥ sarvāṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:10569: 12,187.054c avekṣya ca śanair buddhyā labhate śaṃ paraṃ tataḥ 12,187.055a trivargo yasya viditaḥ prāgjyotiḥ sa vimucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:10570: 12,187.055c anviṣya manasā yuktas tattvadarśī nirutsukaḥ 12,187.056a na cātmā śakyate draṣṭum indriyeṣu vibhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10571: 12,187.056c tatra tatra visṛṣṭeṣu durjayeṣv akṛtātmabhiḥ 12,187.057a etad buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:10572: 12,187.057b*0510_01 pratigṛhya ca nihnoti hy anyathā ca pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:10573: 12,187.057b*0510_02 na sarpati ca yaṃ prāhuḥ sarvatra pratihanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:10575: 12,187.057b*0510_04 dhiṣṇyādhipe prasanne tu sthitim etāṃ nirīkṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:10576: 12,187.057b*0510_05 atidūrāc ca sūkṣmatvāt prasthānaṃ na prakāśate
GE07mbh_12_u:10577: 12,187.057b*0510_06 prapadya tac chrutāhvāni cinmayaṃ svīkṛtaṃ vinā
GE07mbh_12_u:10578: 12,187.057c vijñāya tad dhi manyante kṛtakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10579: 12,187.058a na bhavati viduṣāṃ tato bhayaṃ; yad aviduṣāṃ sumahad bhayaṃ bhavet 12,187.058c na hi gatir adhikāsti kasya cit; sati hi guṇe pravadanty atulyatām 12,187.059a yat karoty anabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ; tac ca nirṇudati yat purā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:10580: 12,187.059c nāpriyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ kutaḥ priyaṃ; tasya taj janayatīha
GE07mbh_12_u:10584: 12,187.060a loka āturajanān virāviṇas; tat tad eva bahu paśya śocataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10585: 12,187.060c tatra paśya kuśalān aśocato; ye vidus tad ubhayaṃ padaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:10586: 12,188.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,188.001a hanta vakṣyāmi te pārtha dhyānayogaṃ caturvidham
GE07mbh_12_u:10587: 12,188.001c yaṃ jñātvā śāśvatīṃ siddhiṃ gacchanti paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10588: 12,188.002a yathā svanuṣṭhitaṃ dhyānaṃ tathā kurvanti yoginaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10590: 12,188.003a nāvartante punaḥ pārtha muktāḥ saṃsāradoṣataḥ 12,188.003c janmadoṣaparikṣīṇāḥ svabhāve paryavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10591: 12,188.004a nirdvaṃdvā nityasattvasthā vimuktā nityam āśritāḥ 12,188.004c asaṅgīny avivādīni manaḥśāntikarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:10592: 12,188.005a tatra svādhyāyasaṃśliṣṭam ekāgraṃ dhārayen manaḥ 12,188.005c piṇḍīkṛtyendriyagrāmam āsīnaḥ kāṣṭhavan muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10593: 12,188.006a śabdaṃ na vindec chrotreṇa sparśaṃ tvacā na vedayet 12,188.006c rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣā vidyāj jihvayā na rasāṃs tathā 12,188.007a ghreyāṇy api ca sarvāṇi jahyād dhyānena yogavit
GE07mbh_12_u:10595: 12,188.008a tato manasi saṃsajya pañcavargaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ 12,188.008c samādadhyān mano bhrāntam indriyaiḥ saha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10598: 12,188.010a indriyāṇi manaś caiva yadā piṇḍīkaroty ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:10599: 12,188.010c eṣa dhyānapathaḥ pūrvo mayā samanuvarṇitaḥ 12,188.011a tasya tat pūrvasaṃruddhaṃ manaḥṣaṣṭham anantaram 12,188.011c sphuriṣyati samudbhrāntaṃ vidyud ambudhare yathā 12,188.012a jalabindur yathā lolaḥ parṇasthaḥ sarvataś calaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10600: 12,188.012c evam evāsya tac cittaṃ bhavati dhyānavartmani
GE07mbh_12_u:10601: 12,188.013a samāhitaṃ kṣaṇaṃ kiṃ cid dhyānavartmani tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:10602: 12,188.013c punar vāyupathaṃ bhrāntaṃ mano bhavati vāyuvat
GE07mbh_12_u:10604: 12,188.014c samādadhyāt punaś ceto dhyānena dhyānayogavit 12,188.015a vicāraś ca vitarkaś ca vivekaś copajāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:10605: 12,188.015c muneḥ samādadhānasya prathamaṃ dhyānam āditaḥ 12,188.016a manasā kliśyamānas tu samādhānaṃ ca kārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:10606: 12,188.016c na nirvedaṃ munir gacchet kuryād evātmano hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:10607: 12,188.017a pāṃsubhasmakarīṣāṇāṃ yathā vai rāśayaś citāḥ 12,188.017c sahasā vāriṇā siktā na yānti paribhāvanām
GE07mbh_12_u:10608: 12,188.018a kiṃ cit snigdhaṃ yathā ca syāc chuṣkacūrṇam abhāvitam 12,188.018c kramaśas tu śanair gacchet sarvaṃ tat paribhāvanam
GE07mbh_12_u:10610: 12,188.019c saṃharet kramaśaś caiva sa samyak praśamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:10611: 12,188.020a svayam eva manaś caiva pañcavargaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:10612: 12,188.020c pūrvaṃ dhyānapathaṃ prāpya nityayogena śāmyati 12,188.021a na tat puruṣakāreṇa na ca daivena kena cit 12,188.021c sukham eṣyati tat tasya yad evaṃ saṃyatātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10613: 12,188.022a sukhena tena saṃyukto raṃsyate dhyānakarmaṇi 12,188.022c gacchanti yogino hy evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ tan nirāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:10614: 12,189.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,189.001a cāturāśramyam uktaṃ te rājadharmās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:10615: 12,189.001c nānāśrayāś ca bahava itihāsāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ 12,189.002a śrutās tvattaḥ kathāś caiva dharmayuktā mahāmate
GE07mbh_12_u:10616: 12,189.002c saṃdeho 'sti tu kaś cin me tad bhavān vaktum arhati 12,189.003a jāpakānāṃ phalāvāptiṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata 12,189.003c kiṃ phalaṃ japatām uktaṃ kva vā tiṣṭhanti jāpakāḥ 12,189.004a japasya ca vidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ vaktum arhasi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_12_u:10617: 12,189.004c jāpakā iti kiṃ caitat sāṃkhyayogakriyāvidhiḥ 12,189.005a kiṃ yajñavidhir evaiṣa kim etaj japyam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:10618: 12,189.005c etan me sarvam ācakṣva sarvajño hy asi me mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10619: 12,189.006 bhīṣma uvāca 12,189.006a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:10620: 12,189.006c yamasya yat purā vṛttaṃ kālasya brāhmaṇasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:10621: 12,189.006d*0511_01 sāṃkhyayogau tu yāv uktau munibhir mokṣadarśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10622: 12,189.006d*0512_01 ikṣvākoś caiva mṛtyoś ca vivādo dharmakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:10623: 12,189.007a saṃnyāsa eva vedānte vartate japanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:10625: 12,189.007e mārgau tāv apy ubhāv etau saṃśritau na ca saṃśritau
GE07mbh_12_u:10626: 12,189.008a yathā saṃśrūyate rājan kāraṇaṃ cātra vakṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:10627: 12,189.008b*0513_01 krameṇa caiṣa vihito japayajñavidhir nṛpa 12,189.008b*0513_02 sālambanam iti jñeyaṃ japayajñātmakaṃ śubham 12,189.008c manaḥsamādhir atrāpi tathendriyajayaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:10628: 12,189.009a satyam agniparīcāro viviktānāṃ ca sevanam 12,189.009c dhyānaṃ tapo damaḥ kṣāntir anasūyā mitāśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:10630: 12,189.010c eṣa pravṛttako dharmo nivṛttakam atho śṛṇu

GE07mbh_12_u:10690: 12,192.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,192.001a kālamṛtyuyamānāṃ ca brāhmaṇasya ca sattama 12,192.001c vivādo vyāhṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati

GE07mbh_12_u:14906: 12,253.028c tathaiva tasthau dharmātmā nirviceṣṭaḥ samāhitaḥ 12,253.029a tatas tu kālasamaye babhūvus te 'tha pakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14907: 12,253.029c bubudhe tāṃś ca sa munir jātapakṣāñ śakuntakān
GE07mbh_12_u:14908: 12,253.030a tataḥ kadā cit tāṃs tatra paśyan pakṣīn yatavrataḥ 12,253.030c babhūva paramaprītas tadā matimatāṃ varaḥ 12,253.031a tathā tān abhisaṃvṛddhān dṛṣṭvā cāpnuvatāṃ mudam
GE07mbh_12_u:14909: 12,253.031c śakunau nirbhayau tatra ūṣatuś cātmajaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:14910: 12,253.032a jātapakṣāṃś ca so 'paśyad uḍḍīnān punarāgatān 12,253.032c sāyaṃ sāyaṃ dvijān vipro na cākampata jājaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14911: 12,253.033a kadā cit punar abhyetya punar gacchanti saṃtatam
GE07mbh_12_u:14912: 12,253.033c tyaktā mātṛpitṛbhyāṃ te na cākampata jājaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14913: 12,253.034a atha te divasaṃ cārīṃ gatvā sāyaṃ punar nṛpa 12,253.034c upāvartanta tatraiva nivāsārthaṃ śakuntakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14914: 12,253.035a kadā cid divasān pañca samutpatya vihaṃgamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14916: 12,253.036a krameṇa ca punaḥ sarve divasāni bahūny api
GE07mbh_12_u:14917: 12,253.036c nopāvartanta śakunā jātaprāṇāḥ sma te yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:14918: 12,253.037a kadā cin māsamātreṇa samutpatya vihaṃgamāḥ 12,253.037c naivāgacchaṃs tato rājan prātiṣṭhata sa jājaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14919: 12,253.038a tatas teṣu pralīneṣu jājalir jātavismayaḥ 12,253.038c siddho 'smīti matiṃ cakre tatas taṃ māna āviśat
GE07mbh_12_u:14920: 12,253.039a sa tathā nirgatān dṛṣṭvā śakuntān niyatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14921: 12,253.039c saṃbhāvitātmā saṃbhāvya bhṛśaṃ prītas tadābhavan 12,253.040a sa nadyāṃ samupaspṛśya tarpayitvā hutāśanam 12,253.040c udayantam athādityam abhyagacchan mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14922: 12,253.041a saṃbhāvya caṭakān mūrdhni jājalir japatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14923: 12,253.041c āsphoṭayat tadākāśe dharmaḥ prāpto mayeti vai
GE07mbh_12_u:14924: 12,253.042a athāntarikṣe vāg āsīt tāṃ sa śuśrāva jājaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14925: 12,253.042c dharmeṇa na samas tvaṃ vai tulādhārasya jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:14927: 12,253.043c so 'py evaṃ nārhate vaktuṃ yathā tvaṃ bhāṣase dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:14928: 12,253.044a so 'marṣavaśam āpannas tulādhāradidṛkṣayā 12,253.044c pṛthivīm acarad rājan yatrasāyaṃgṛho muniḥ 12,253.045a kālena mahatāgacchat sa tu vārāṇasīṃ purīm
GE07mbh_12_u:14929: 12,253.045c vikrīṇantaṃ ca paṇyāni tulādhāraṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14930: 12,253.046a so 'pi dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ vipram āyāntaṃ bhāṇḍajīvanaḥ 12,253.046c samutthāya susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14931: 12,253.047 tulādhāra uvāca 12,253.047a āyān evāsi vidito mama brahman na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14932: 12,253.047c bravīmi yat tu vacanaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:14933: 12,253.048a sāgarānūpam āśritya tapas taptaṃ tvayā mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:14934: 12,253.048c na ca dharmasya saṃjñāṃ tvaṃ purā vettha kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:14935: 12,253.049a tataḥ siddhasya tapasā tava vipra śakuntakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14936: 12,253.049c kṣipraṃ śirasy ajāyanta te ca saṃbhāvitās tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:14937: 12,253.050a jātapakṣā yadā te ca gatāś cārīm itas tataḥ 12,253.050c manyamānas tato dharmaṃ caṭakaprabhavaṃ dvija 12,253.050e khe vācaṃ tvam athāśrauṣīr māṃ prati dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:14938: 12,253.051a amarṣavaśam āpannas tataḥ prāpto bhavān iha
GE07mbh_12_u:14939: 12,253.051c karavāṇi priyaṃ kiṃ te tad brūhi dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:14940: 12,254.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,254.001a ity uktaḥ sa tadā tena tulādhāreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_12_u:14941: 12,254.001c provāca vacanaṃ dhīmāñ jājalir japatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14942: 12,254.002a vikrīṇānaḥ sarvarasān sarvagandhāṃś ca vāṇija 12,254.002c vanaspatīn oṣadhīś ca teṣāṃ mūlaphalāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:14943: 12,254.003a adhyagā naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhiṃ kutas tvām idam āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:14944: 12,254.003c etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ nikhilena mahāmate
GE07mbh_12_u:14945: 12,254.004a evam uktas tulādhāro brāhmaṇena yaśasvinā 12,254.004c uvāca dharmasūkṣmāṇi vaiśyo dharmārthatattvavit
GE07mbh_12_u:14946: 12,254.004e jājaliṃ kaṣṭatapasaṃ jñānatṛptas tadā nṛpa 12,254.005a vedāhaṃ jājale dharmaṃ sarahasyaṃ sanātanam 12,254.005c sarvabhūtahitaṃ maitraṃ purāṇaṃ yaṃ janā viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14947: 12,254.006a adroheṇaiva bhūtānām alpadroheṇa vā punaḥ 12,254.006c yā vṛttiḥ sa paro dharmas tena jīvāmi jājale 12,254.007a paricchinnaiḥ kāṣṭhatṛṇair mayedaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtam 12,254.007c alaktaṃ padmakaṃ tuṅgaṃ gandhāṃś coccāvacāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:14948: 12,254.008a rasāṃś ca tāṃs tān viprarṣe madyavarjān ahaṃ bahūn 12,254.008c krītvā vai prativikrīṇe parahastād amāyayā 12,254.009a sarveṣāṃ yaḥ suhṛn nityaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ 12,254.009c karmaṇā manasā vācā sa dharmaṃ veda jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:14949: 12,254.010a nāhaṃ pareṣāṃ karmāṇi praśaṃsāmi śapāmi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:14950: 12,254.010c ākāśasyeva viprarṣe paśyaṃl lokasya citratām 12,254.011a nānurudhye virudhye vā na dveṣmi na ca kāmaye 12,254.011c samo 'smi sarvabhūteṣu paśya me jājale vratam 12,254.012a iṣṭāniṣṭavimuktasya prītirāgabahiṣkṛtaḥ 12,254.012c tulā me sarvabhūteṣu samā tiṣṭhati jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:14951: 12,254.013a iti māṃ tvaṃ vijānīhi sarvalokasya jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:14954: 12,254.014c devair apihitadvārāḥ sopamā paśyato mama 12,254.015a yathā vṛddhāturakṛśā niḥspṛhā viṣayān prati 12,254.015c tathārthakāmabhogeṣu mamāpi vigatā spṛhā
GE07mbh_12_u:14955: 12,254.016a yadā cāyaṃ na bibheti yadā cāsmān na bibhyati 12,254.016c yadā necchati na dveṣṭi tadā sidhyati vai dvijaḥ 12,254.017a yadā na kurute bhāvaṃ sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam
GE07mbh_12_u:14956: 12,254.017c karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:14957: 12,254.018a na bhūto na bhaviṣyaś ca na ca dharmo 'sti kaś cana 12,254.018c yo 'bhayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sa prāpnoty abhayaṃ padam 12,254.019a yasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarvo mṛtyumukhād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:14958: 12,254.019c vākkrūrād daṇḍapāruṣyāt sa prāpnoti mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:14961: 12,254.021a pranaṣṭaḥ śāśvato dharmaḥ sadācāreṇa mohitaḥ 12,254.021c tena vaidyas tapasvī vā balavān vā vimohyate
GE07mbh_12_u:14962: 12,254.022a ācārāj jājale prājñaḥ kṣipraṃ dharmam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:14963: 12,254.022c evaṃ yaḥ sādhubhir dāntaś cared adrohacetasā
GE07mbh_12_u:14964: 12,254.023a nadyāṃ yathā ceha kāṣṭham uhyamānaṃ yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:14965: 12,254.023c yadṛcchayaiva kāṣṭhena saṃdhiṃ gaccheta kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:14966: 12,254.024a tatrāparāṇi dārūṇi saṃsṛjyante tatas tataḥ 12,254.024c tṛṇakāṣṭhakarīṣāṇi kadā cinn asamīkṣayā
GE07mbh_12_u:14967: 12,254.024e evam evāyam ācāraḥ prādurbhūto yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14968: 12,254.025a yasmān nodvijate bhūtaṃ jātu kiṃ cit kathaṃ cana 12,254.025c abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sa prāpnoti sadā mune
GE07mbh_12_u:14969: 12,254.026a yasmād udvijate vidvan sarvaloko vṛkād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:14970: 12,254.026c krośatas tīram āsādya yathā sarve jalecarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14972: 12,254.027c tatas tān eva kavayaḥ śāstreṣu pravadanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:14974: 12,254.028a tapobhir yajñadānaiś ca vākyaiḥ prajñāśritais tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:14975: 12,254.028c prāpnoty abhayadānasya yad yat phalam ihāśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:14976: 12,254.029a loke yaḥ sarvabhūtebhyo dadāty abhayadakṣiṇām 12,254.029c sa sarvayajñair ījānaḥ prāpnoty abhayadakṣiṇām 12,254.029e na bhūtānām ahiṃsāyā jyāyān dharmo 'sti kaś cana 12,254.030a yasmān nodvijate bhūtaṃ jātu kiṃ cit kathaṃ cana 12,254.030c so 'bhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ saṃprāpnoti mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:14977: 12,254.031a yasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarpād veśmagatād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:14978: 12,254.031c na sa dharmam avāpnoti iha loke paratra ca 12,254.032a sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya samyag bhūtāni paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14979: 12,254.032c devāpi mārge muhyanti apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ 12,254.033a dānaṃ bhūtābhayasyāhuḥ sarvadānebhya uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:14980: 12,254.033c bravīmi te satyam idaṃ śraddadhasva ca jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:14981: 12,254.034a sa eva subhago bhūtvā punar bhavati durbhagaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14982: 12,254.034c vyāpattiṃ karmaṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā jugupsanti janāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:14983: 12,254.035a akāraṇo hi nehāsti dharmaḥ sūkṣmo 'pi jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:14985: 12,254.036a sūkṣmatvān na sa vijñātuṃ śakyate bahunihnavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14987: 12,254.037a ye ca chindanti vṛṣaṇān ye ca bhindanti nastakān 12,254.037c vahanti mahato bhārān badhnanti damayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:14988: 12,254.038a hatvā sattvāni khādanti tān kathaṃ na vigarhase
GE07mbh_12_u:14989: 12,254.038c mānuṣā mānuṣān eva dāsabhogena buñjate 12,254.039a vadhabandhavirodhena kārayanti
GE07mbh_12_u:14990: 12,254.039c ātmanā cāpi jānāsi yad duḥkhaṃ vadhatāḍane
GE07mbh_12_u:14991: 12,254.040a pañcendriyeṣu bhūteṣu sarvaṃ vasati daivatam 12,254.040c ādityaś candramā vāyur brahmā prāṇaḥ kratur yamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:14992: 12,254.041a tāni jīvāni vikrīya kā mṛteṣu vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:14993: 12,254.041b*0704_01 ajo 'gnir varuṇo meṣaḥ sūryo 'śvaḥ pṛthivī virāṭ 12,254.041b*0704_02 dhenur vatsaś ca somo vai vikrīyaitan na sidhyati 12,254.041c kā taile kā ghṛte brahman madhuny apsv auṣadheṣu vā
GE07mbh_12_u:14994: 12,254.042a adaṃśamaśake deśe sukhaṃ saṃvardhitān paśūn 12,254.042c tāṃś ca mātuḥ priyāñ jānann ākramya bahudhā narāḥ 12,254.042e bahudaṃśakuśān deśān nayanti bahukardamān
GE07mbh_12_u:14996: 12,254.043c na manye bhrūṇahatyāpi viśiṣṭā tena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:14997: 12,254.044a kṛṣiṃ sādhv iti manyante sā ca vṛttiḥ sudāruṇā 12,254.044c bhūmiṃ bhūmiśayāṃś caiva hanti kāṣṭham ayomukham
GE07mbh_12_u:14999: 12,254.045a aghnyā iti gavāṃ nāma ka enān hantum arhati 12,254.045c mahac cakārākuśalaṃ pṛṣadhro gālabhann iva 12,254.046a ṛṣayo yatayo hy etan nahuṣe pratyavedayan
GE07mbh_12_u:15000: 12,254.046c gāṃ mātaraṃ cāpy avadhīr vṛṣabhaṃ ca prajāpatim
GE07mbh_12_u:15001: 12,254.046e akāryaṃ nahuṣākārṣīr lapsyāmas tvatkṛte bhayam 12,254.047a śataṃ caikaṃ ca rogāṇāṃ sarvabhūteṣv apātayan
GE07mbh_12_u:15002: 12,254.047c ṛṣayas te mahābhāgāḥ prajāsv eva hi jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:15003: 12,254.047e bhrūṇahaṃ nahuṣaṃ tv āhur na te hoṣyāmahe haviḥ 12,254.048a ity uktvā te mahātmānaḥ sarve tattvārthadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15004: 12,254.048c ṛṣayo yatayaḥ śāntās tarasā pratyavedayan 12,254.049a īdṛśān aśivān ghorān ācārān iha jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:15006: 12,254.050a kāraṇād dharmam anvicchen na lokacaritaṃ caret
GE07mbh_12_u:15007: 12,254.050c yo hanyād yaś ca māṃ stauti tatrāpi śṛṇu jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:15008: 12,254.051a samau tāv api me syātāṃ na hi me staḥ priyāpriye
GE07mbh_12_u:15009: 12,254.051c etad īdṛśakaṃ dharmaṃ praśaṃsanti manīṣiṇaḥ 12,254.052a upapattyā hi saṃpanno yatibhiś caiva sevyate
GE07mbh_12_u:15011: 12,255.001 jājalir uvāca 12,255.001a yathā pravartito dharmas tulāṃ dhārayatā tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:15012: 12,255.001c svargadvāraṃ ca vṛttiṃ ca bhūtānām avarotsyate
GE07mbh_12_u:15013: 12,255.002a kṛṣyā hy annaṃ prabhavati tatas tvam api jīvasi 12,255.002c paśubhiś cauṣadhībhiś ca martyā jīvanti vāṇija
GE07mbh_12_u:15014: 12,255.003a yato yajñaḥ prabhavati nāstikyam api jalpasi
GE07mbh_12_u:15015: 12,255.003c na hi varted ayaṃ loko vārtām utsṛjya kevalam 12,255.004 tulādhāra uvāca 12,255.004a vakṣyāmi jājale vṛttiṃ nāsmi brāhmaṇa nāstikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15016: 12,255.004c na ca yajñaṃ vinindāmi yajñavit tu sudurlabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15017: 12,255.005a namo brāhmaṇayajñāya ye ca yajñavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15018: 12,255.005c svayajñaṃ brāhmaṇā hitvā kṣātraṃ yajñam ihāsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15019: 12,255.006a lubdhair vittaparair brahman nāstikaiḥ saṃpravartitam 12,255.006c vedavādān avijñāya satyābhāsam ivānṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:15020: 12,255.007a idaṃ deyam idaṃ deyam iti nāntaṃ cikīrṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:15021: 12,255.007b*0705_01 devaiḥ pravartitaṃ hy etaṃ viddhi dharmaṃ ca jājale 12,255.007b*0705_02 aparā hy anavasthaiṣā nāsmākaṃ buddhir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_12_u:15022: 12,255.007c ataḥ stainyaṃ prabhavati vikarmāṇi ca jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:15023: 12,255.007e tad eva sukṛtaṃ havyaṃ yena tuṣyanti devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15024: 12,255.008a namaskāreṇa haviṣā svādhyāyair auṣadhais tathā 12,255.008c pūjā syād devatānāṃ hi yathā śāstranidarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:15025: 12,255.009a iṣṭāpūrtād asādhūnāṃ viṣamā jāyate prajā 12,255.009c lubdhebhyo jāyate lubdhaḥ samebhyo jāyate samaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15026: 12,255.010a yajamāno yathātmānam ṛtvijaś ca tathā prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15028: 12,255.011a agnau prāstāhutir brahmann ādityam upatiṣṭhati 12,255.011c ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15029: 12,255.012a tasmāt svanuṣṭhitāt pūrve sarvān kāmāṃś ca lebhire
GE07mbh_12_u:15031: 12,255.012e na te yajñeṣv ātmasu vā phalaṃ paśyanti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:15032: 12,255.013a śaṅkamānāḥ phalaṃ yajñe ye yajeran kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:15034: 12,255.014a sa sma pāpakṛtāṃ lokān gacched aśubhakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:15035: 12,255.014c pramāṇam apramāṇena yaḥ kuryād aśubhaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15036: 12,255.014e pāpātmā so 'kṛtaprajñaḥ sadaiveha dvijottama 12,255.015a kartavyam iti kartavyaṃ vetti yo brāhmaṇobhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:15037: 12,255.015c brahmaiva vartate loke naiti kartavyatāṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15038: 12,255.016a viguṇaṃ ca punaḥ karma jyāya ity anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:15039: 12,255.016c sarvabhūtopaghātaś ca phalabhāve ca saṃyamaḥ 12,255.017a satyayajñā damayajñā alubdhāś cātmatṛptayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15041: 12,255.018a kṣetrakṣetrajñatattvajñāḥ svayajñapariniṣṭhitāḥ 12,255.018c brāhmaṃ vedam adhīyantas toṣayanty amarān api
GE07mbh_12_u:15042: 12,255.019a akhilaṃ daivataṃ sarvaṃ brahma brāhmaṇasaṃśritam 12,255.019c tṛpyanti tṛpyato devās tṛptās tṛptasya jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:15043: 12,255.020a yathā sarvarasais tṛpto nābhinandati kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:15044: 12,255.020c tathā prajñānatṛptasya nityaṃ tṛptiḥ sukhodayā 12,255.021a dharmārāmā dharmasukhāḥ kṛtsnavyavasitās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:15045: 12,255.021c asti nas tattvato bhūya iti prajñāgaveṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15046: 12,255.022a jñānavijñāninaḥ ke cit paraṃ pāraṃ titīrṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15047: 12,255.022c atīva tat sadā puṇyaṃ puṇyābhijanasaṃhitam 12,255.023a yatra gatvā na śocanti na cyavanti vyathanti ca 12,255.023c te tu tad brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ prāpnuvantīha sāttvikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15048: 12,255.024a naiva te svargam icchanti na yajanti yaśodhanaiḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:15178: 12,258.044a āśramaṃ mama saṃprāptas trilokeśaḥ puraṃdaraḥ 12,258.044c atithivratam āsthāya brāhmaṇaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ 12,258.045a samayā sāntvito vāgbhiḥ svāgatenābhipūjitaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:15187: 12,258.053b*0710_01 āvayoś cittasaṃtāpaḥ na hy asatphalatas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:15188: 12,258.053c saphalaṃ tat tavādyāstu bhavādya cirakārikaḥ 12,258.054a ciram āśaṃsito mātrā ciraṃ garbheṇa dhāritaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:15200: 12,258.064c cirāyamāṇe tvayi ca ciram asmi suduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15201: 12,258.065a gāthāś cāpy abravīd vidvān gautamo munisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15203: 12,258.066a cireṇa mitraṃ badhnīyāc cireṇa ca kṛtaṃ tyajet

GE07mbh_12_u:15206: 12,258.067c apriye caiva kartavye cirakārī praśasyate 12,258.068a bandhūnāṃ suhṛdāṃ caiva bhṛtyānāṃ strījanasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:15208: 12,258.069a evaṃ sa gautamas tasya prītaḥ putrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:15209: 12,258.069c karmaṇā tena kauravya cirakāritayā tayā 12,258.070a evaṃ sarveṣu kāryeṣu vimṛśya puruṣas tataḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:15217: 12,258.074a bruvataś ca parasyāpi vākyaṃ dharmopasaṃhitam 12,258.074c ciraṃ pṛcchec ciraṃ brūyāc ciraṃ na paribhūyate

GE07mbh_12_u:15219: 12,259.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,259.001a kathaṃ rājā prajā rakṣen na ca kiṃ cit pratāpayet

GE07mbh_12_u:15223: 12,259.004a adharmatāṃ yāti dharmo yāty adharmaś ca dharmatām

GE07mbh_12_u:15232: 12,259.009a tattvābhedena yac chāstraṃ tat kāryaṃ nānyathā vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15234: 12,259.010a dasyūn hinasti vai rājā bhūyaso vāpy anāgasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15235: 12,259.010c bhāryā mātā pitā putro hanyate puruṣe hate

GE07mbh_12_u:15247: 12,259.017c sa tāvat procyate dharmo yāvan na pratilaṅghyate

GE07mbh_12_u:15251: 12,259.020c vadhenāpi na śakyante niyantum apare janāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:15254: 12,259.022c teṣu yaḥ samayaṃ kuryād ajñeṣu hatabuddhiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:15255: 12,259.023 satyavān uvāca 12,259.023a tān na śaknoṣi cet sādhūn paritrātum ahiṃsayā
GE07mbh_12_u:15256: 12,259.023c kasya cid bhūtabhavyasya lābhenāntaṃ tathā kuru

GE07mbh_12_u:15258: 12,259.025c sukṛtenaiva rājāno bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śāsate prajāḥ 12,259.026a śreyasaḥ śreyasīm evaṃ vṛttiṃ loko 'nuvartate

GE07mbh_12_u:15261: 12,259.028c sarvopāyair niyamyaḥ sa tathā pāpān nivartate

GE07mbh_12_u:15265: 12,259.030e iti kāruṇyaśīlas tu vidvān vai brāhmaṇo 'nvaśāt
GE07mbh_12_u:15267: 12,259.031c āśvāsayadbhiḥ subhṛśam anukrośāt tathaiva ca 12,259.032a etat prathamakalpena rājā kṛtayuge 'bhajat
GE07mbh_12_u:15268: 12,259.032c pādonenāpi dharmeṇa gacchet tretāyuge tathā 12,259.032e dvāpare tu dvipādena pādena tv apare yuge

GE07mbh_12_u:15272: 12,260.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,260.001a avirodhena bhūtānāṃ tyāgaḥ ṣāḍguṇyakārakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15273: 12,260.001c yaḥ syād ubhayabhāg dharmas tan me brūhi pitāmaha 12,260.002a gārhasthyasya ca dharmasya tyāgadharmasya cobhayoḥ 12,260.002c adūrasaṃprasthitayoḥ kiṃ svic chreyaḥ pitāmaha 12,260.003 bhīṣma uvāca 12,260.003a ubhau dharmau mahābhāgāv ubhau paramaduścarau 12,260.003c ubhau mahāphalau tāta sadbhir ācaritāv ubhau
GE07mbh_12_u:15274: 12,260.004a atra te vartayiṣyāmi prāmāṇyam ubhayos tayoḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:15280: 12,260.007c jñānavān niyatāhāro dadarśa kapilas tadā 12,260.008a sa buddhim uttamāṃ prāpto naiṣṭhikīm akutobhayām

GE07mbh_12_u:15282: 12,260.009a tāṃ gām ṛṣiḥ syūmaraśmiḥ praviśya yatim abravīt

GE07mbh_12_u:15287: 12,260.011c kā vivakṣāsti vedeṣu nirārambhasya sarvaśaḥ 12,260.012 kapila uvāca 12,260.012a nāhaṃ vedān vinindāmi na vivakṣāmi karhi cit

GE07mbh_12_u:15289: 12,260.013a gacchaty eva parityāgī vānaprasthaś ca gacchati

GE07mbh_12_u:15293: 12,260.015a evaṃ viditvā sarvārthān ārabhed iti vaidikam

GE07mbh_12_u:15297: 12,260.018 syūmaraśmir uvāca 12,260.018a svargakāmo yajeteti satataṃ śrūyate śrutiḥ 12,260.018c phalaṃ prakalpya pūrvaṃ hi tato yajñaḥ pratāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:15298: 12,260.019a ajaś cāśvaś ca meṣaś ca gauś ca pakṣigaṇāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:15299: 12,260.019c grāmyāraṇyā oṣadhayaḥ prāṇasyānnam iti śrutiḥ 12,260.020a tathaivānnaṃ hy aharahaḥ sāyaṃ prātar nirupyate
GE07mbh_12_u:15300: 12,260.020c paśavaś cātha dhānyaṃ ca yajñasyāṅgam iti śrutiḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:15303: 12,260.022b*0711_02 ete grāmyāḥ samākhyātāḥ paśavaḥ sapta sādhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15304: 12,260.022b*0711_03 siṃhā vyāghrā varāhāś ca mahiṣā vāraṇās tathā

GE07mbh_12_u:15307: 12,260.023a etac caivābhyanujñātaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvatarais tathā 12,260.023c ko jātu na vicinvīta vidvān svāṃ śaktim ātmanaḥ 12,260.024a paśavaś ca manuṣyāś ca drumāś cauṣadhibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:15308: 12,260.024c svargam evābhikāṅkṣante na ca svargas tv ṛte makham 12,260.025a oṣadhyaḥ paśavo vṛkṣā vīrud ājyaṃ payo dadhi
GE07mbh_12_u:15309: 12,260.025c havir bhūmir diśaḥ śraddhā kālaś caitāni dvādaśa
GE07mbh_12_u:15310: 12,260.026a ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni yajamānaś ca ṣoḍaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15311: 12,260.026c agnir jñeyo gṛhapatiḥ sa saptadaśa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:15312: 12,260.026e aṅgāny etāni yajñasya yajño mūlam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15313: 12,260.027a ājyena payasā dadhnā śakṛtāmikṣayā tvacā 12,260.027c vālaiḥ śṛṅgeṇa pādena saṃbhavaty eva gaur makham
GE07mbh_12_u:15314: 12,260.027e evaṃ pratyekaśaḥ sarvaṃ yad yad asya vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:15315: 12,260.028a yajñaṃ vahanti saṃbhūya sahartvigbhiḥ sadakṣiṇaiḥ 12,260.028c saṃhatyaitāni sarvāṇi yajñaṃ nirvartayanty uta 12,260.029a yajñārthāni hi sṛṣṭāni yathā vai śrūyate śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15316: 12,260.029c evaṃ pūrve pūrvatarāḥ pravṛttāś caiva mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15317: 12,260.030a na hinasti hy ārabhate nābhidruhyati kiṃ cana

GE07mbh_12_u:15611: 12,265.011a ekaśīlāś ca mitratvaṃ bhajante pāpakarmiṇaḥ 12,265.011c sa neha sukham āpnoti kuta eva paratra vai 12,265.012a evaṃ bhavati pāpātmā dharmātmānaṃ tu me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:15612: 12,265.012c yathā kuśaladharmā sa kuśalaṃ pratipadyate 12,265.012d*0720_01 kuśalenaiva dharmeṇa gatim iṣṭāṃ prapadyate 12,265.013a ya etān prajñayā doṣān pūrvam evānupaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:15613: 12,265.013c kuśalaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ sādhūṃś cāpy upasevate 12,265.014a tasya sādhusamācārād abhyāsāc caiva vardhate 12,265.014c prajñā dharme ca ramate dharmaṃ caivopajīvati
GE07mbh_12_u:15614: 12,265.015a so 'tha dharmād avāpteṣu dhaneṣu kurute manaḥ 12,265.015c tasyaiva siñcate mūlaṃ guṇān paśyati yatra vai
GE07mbh_12_u:15615: 12,265.016a dharmātmā bhavati hy evaṃ mitraṃ ca labhate śubham 12,265.016c sa mitradhanalābhāt tu pretya ceha ca nandati
GE07mbh_12_u:15616: 12,265.017a śabde sparśe tathā rūpe rase gandhe ca bhārata 12,265.017c prabhutvaṃ labhate jantur dharmasyaitat phalaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15617: 12,265.018a sa dharmasya phalaṃ labdhvā na tṛpyati yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:15618: 12,265.018b*0721_01 dharme sthitānāṃ kaunteya sarvabhogakriyāsu ca 12,265.018c atṛpyamāṇo nirvedam ādatte jñānacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:15619: 12,265.019a prajñācakṣur yadā kāme doṣam evānupaśyati 12,265.019c virajyate tadā kāmān na ca dharmaṃ vimuñcati
GE07mbh_12_u:15620: 12,265.020a sarvatyāge ca yatate dṛṣṭvā lokaṃ kṣayātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:15621: 12,265.020c tato mokṣāya yatate nānupāyād upāyataḥ 12,265.021a śanair nirvedam ādatte pāpaṃ karma jahāti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:15622: 12,265.021c dharmātmā caiva bhavati mokṣaṃ ca labhate param
GE07mbh_12_u:15623: 12,265.022a etat te kathitaṃ tāta yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi 12,265.022c pāpaṃ dharmaṃ tathā mokṣaṃ nirvedaṃ caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:15624: 12,265.023a tasmād dharme pravartethāḥ sarvāvasthaṃ yudhiṣṭhira 12,265.023c dharme sthitānāṃ kaunteya siddhir bhavati śāśvatī
GE07mbh_12_u:15625: 12,266.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,266.001a mokṣaḥ pitāmahenokta upāyān nānupāyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15626: 12,266.001c tam upāyaṃ yathānyāyaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:15627: 12,266.002 bhīṣma uvāca 12,266.002a tvayy evaitan mahāprājña yuktaṃ nipuṇadarśanam 12,266.002c yad upāyena sarvārthān nityaṃ mṛgayase 'nagha
GE07mbh_12_u:15628: 12,266.003a karaṇe ghaṭasya yā buddhir ghaṭotpattau na sānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:15629: 12,266.003c evaṃ dharmābhyupāyeṣu nānyad dharmeṣu kāraṇam 12,266.004a pūrve samudre yaḥ panthā na sa gacchati paścimam 12,266.004c ekaḥ panthā hi mokṣasya tan me vistarataḥ śṛṇu 12,266.005a kṣamayā krodham ucchindyāt kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanāt 12,266.005c sattvasaṃsevanād dhīro nidrām ucchetum arhati 12,266.006a apramādād bhayaṃ rakṣec chvāsaṃ kṣetrajñaśīlanāt 12,266.006c icchāṃ dveṣaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dhairyeṇa vinivartayet
GE07mbh_12_u:15630: 12,266.007a bhramaṃ pramoham āvartam abhyāsād vinivartayet 12,266.007c nidrāṃ ca pratibhāṃ caiva jñānābhyāsena tattvavit
GE07mbh_12_u:15632: 12,266.008c lobhaṃ mohaṃ ca saṃtoṣād viṣayāṃs tattvadarśanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:15633: 12,266.009a anukrośād adharmaṃ ca jayed dharmam upekṣayā
GE07mbh_12_u:15634: 12,266.009c āyatyā ca jayed āśām arthaṃ saṅgavivarjanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:15635: 12,266.010a anityatvena ca snehaṃ kṣudhaṃ yogena paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15636: 12,266.010c kāruṇyenātmano mānaṃ tṛṣṇāṃ ca paritoṣataḥ 12,266.011a utthānena jayet tandrīṃ vitarkaṃ niścayāj jayet
GE07mbh_12_u:15637: 12,266.011c maunena bahubhāṣyaṃ ca śauryeṇa ca bhayaṃ jayet
GE07mbh_12_u:15638: 12,266.012a yacched vāṅmanasī buddhyā tāṃ yacchej jñānacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:15639: 12,266.012c jñānam ātmā mahān yacchet taṃ yacchec chāntir ātmanaḥ 12,266.012d*0722_01 jñānam ātmāvabodhena yacched ātmānam ātmanā 12,266.013a tad etad upaśāntena boddhavyaṃ śucikarmaṇā 12,266.013c yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15640: 12,266.014a kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:15642: 12,266.015a dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:15643: 12,266.015c śaucam āhārataḥ śuddhir indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15644: 12,266.016a etair vivardhate tejaḥ pāpmānam apahanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:15645: 12,266.016c sidhyanti cāsya saṃkalpā vijñānaṃ ca pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:15646: 12,266.017a dhūtapāpaḥ sa tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ 12,266.017c kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā ninīṣed brahmaṇaḥ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:15649: 12,266.019a eṣa mārgo hi mokṣasya prasanno vimalaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15652: 12,267.001c nāradasya ca saṃvādaṃ devalasyāsitasya ca 12,267.002a āsīnaṃ devalaṃ vṛddhaṃ buddhvā buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15654: 12,267.003a kutaḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ brahman sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:15655: 12,267.003c pralaye ca kam abhyeti tad bhavān prabravītu me 12,267.004 asita uvāca 12,267.004a yebhyaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni kālo bhāvapracoditaḥ 12,267.004c mahābhūtāni pañceti tāny āhur bhūtacintakāḥ 12,267.005a tebhyaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni kāla ātmapracoditaḥ 12,267.005c etebhyo yaḥ paraṃ brūyād asad brūyād asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:15656: 12,267.006a viddhi nārada pañcaitāñ śāśvatān acalān dhruvān
GE07mbh_12_u:15657: 12,267.006c mahatas tejaso rāśīn kālaṣaṣṭhān svabhāvataḥ 12,267.007a āpaś caivāntarikṣaṃ ca pṛthivī vāyupāvakau 12,267.007c asiddhiḥ param etebhyo bhūtebhyo muktasaṃśayam 12,267.008a nopapattyā na vā yuktyā tv asad brūyād asaṃśayam 12,267.008c vettha tān abhinirvṛttān ṣaḍ ete yasya rāśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15658: 12,267.009a pañcaiva tāni kālaś ca bhāvābhāvau ca kevalau
GE07mbh_12_u:15659: 12,267.009c aṣṭau bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ śāśvatāni bhavāpyayau 12,267.010a abhāvād bhāviteṣv eva tebhyaś ca prabhavanty api
GE07mbh_12_u:15660: 12,267.010c vinaṣṭo 'pi ca tāny eva jantur bhavati pañcadhā
GE07mbh_12_u:15661: 12,267.011a tasya bhūmimayo dehaḥ śrotram ākāśasaṃbhavam 12,267.011c sūryaś cakṣur asur vāyur adbhyas tu khalu śoṇitam 12,267.012a cakṣuṣī nāsikākarṇau tvag jihveti ca pañcamī
GE07mbh_12_u:15663: 12,267.013a darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ sparśanaṃ rasanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:15664: 12,267.013c upapattyā guṇān viddhi pañca pañcasu pañcadhā
GE07mbh_12_u:15665: 12,267.014a rūpaṃ gandho rasaḥ sparśaḥ śabdaś caivātha tadguṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15666: 12,267.014c indriyair upalabhyante pañcadhā pañca pañcabhiḥ 12,267.015a rūpaṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ caitāṃs tu tadguṇān 12,267.015c indriyāṇi na budhyante kṣetrajñas tais tu budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:15667: 12,267.016a cittam indriyasaṃghātāt paraṃ tasmāt paraṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15668: 12,267.016c manasas tu parā buddhiḥ kṣetrajño buddhitaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15669: 12,267.017a pūrvaṃ cetayate jantur indriyair viṣayān pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:15670: 12,267.017c vicārya manasā paścād atha buddhyā vyavasyati
GE07mbh_12_u:15671: 12,267.017e indriyair upalabdhārthān sarvān yas tv adhyavasyati
GE07mbh_12_u:15672: 12,267.018a cittam indriyasaṃghātaṃ mano buddhiṃ tathāṣṭamīm 12,267.018c aṣṭau jñānendriyāṇy āhur etāny adhyātmacintakāḥ 12,267.019a pāṇipādaṃ ca pāyuś ca mehanaṃ pañcamaṃ mukham
GE07mbh_12_u:15673: 12,267.019c iti saṃśabdyamānāni śṛṇu karmendriyāṇy api 12,267.020a jalpanābhyavahārārthaṃ mukham indriyam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:15674: 12,267.020c gamanendriyaṃ tathā pādau karmaṇaḥ karaṇe karau
GE07mbh_12_u:15676: 12,267.021c visarge ca purīṣasya visarge cābhikāmike 12,267.022a balaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ṣaḍ etāni vācā samyag yathāgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:15678: 12,267.023a indriyāṇāṃ svakarmabhyaḥ śramād uparamo yadā 12,267.023c bhavatīndriyasaṃnyāsād atha svapiti vai naraḥ 12,267.024a indriyāṇāṃ vyuparame mano 'nuparataṃ yadi
GE07mbh_12_u:15679: 12,267.024c sevate viṣayān eva tad vidyāt svapnadarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:15680: 12,267.025a sāttvikāś caiva ye bhāvās tathā rājasatāmasāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15681: 12,267.025c karmayuktān praśaṃsanti sāttvikān itarāṃs tathā 12,267.026a ānandaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiḥ pratipattiḥ parā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15682: 12,267.026c sāttvikasya nimittāni bhāvān saṃśrayate smṛtiḥ 12,267.027a jantuṣv ekatameṣv evaṃ bhāvā ye vidhim āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15683: 12,267.027c bhāvayor īpsitaṃ nityaṃ pratyakṣagamanaṃ dvayoḥ 12,267.028a indriyāṇi ca bhāvāś ca guṇāḥ saptadaśa smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15684: 12,267.028c teṣām aṣṭādaśo dehī yaḥ śarīre sa śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15685: 12,267.029a atha vā saśarīrās te guṇāḥ sarve śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:15686: 12,267.029c saṃśritās tadviyoge hi saśarīrā na santi te
GE07mbh_12_u:15687: 12,267.030a atha vā saṃnipāto 'yaṃ śarīraṃ pāñcabhautikam 12,267.030c ekaś ca daśa cāṣṭau ca guṇāḥ saha śarīriṇām 12,267.030e ūṣmaṇā saha viṃśo vā saṃghātaḥ pāñcabhautikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15688: 12,267.031a mahān saṃdhārayaty etac charīraṃ vāyunā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:15690: 12,267.032a yathaivotpadyate kiṃ cit pañcatvaṃ gacchate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:15691: 12,267.032c puṇyapāpavināśānte puṇyapāpasamīritam 12,267.032e dehaṃ viśati kālena tato 'yaṃ karmasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:15692: 12,267.033a hitvā hitvā hy ayaṃ praiti dehād dehaṃ kṛtāśrayaḥ 12,267.033c kālasaṃcoditaḥ kṣetrī viśīrṇād vā gṛhād gṛham
GE07mbh_12_u:15694: 12,267.034c kṛpaṇās tv anutapyante janāḥ saṃbandhimāninaḥ 12,267.035a na hy ayaṃ kasya cit kaś cin nāsya kaś cana vidyate 12,267.035c bhavaty eko hy ayaṃ nityaṃ śarīre sukhaduḥkhabhāk
GE07mbh_12_u:15695: 12,267.036a naiva saṃjāyate jantur na ca jātu vipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:15696: 12,267.036c yāti deham ayaṃ bhuktvā kadā cit paramāṃ gatim 12,267.037a puṇyapāpamayaṃ dehaṃ kṣapayan karmasaṃcayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:15697: 12,267.037c kṣīṇadehaḥ punar dehī brahmatvam upagacchati 12,267.038a puṇyapāpakṣayārthaṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ jñānaṃ vidhīyate 12,267.038c tatkṣaye hy asya paśyanti brahmabhāve parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:15698: 12,268.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,268.001a bhrātaraḥ pitaraḥ putrā jñātayaḥ suhṛdas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:15699: 12,268.001c arthahetor hatāḥ krūrair asmābhiḥ pāpabuddhibhiḥ 12,268.002a yeyam arthodbhavā tṛṣṇā katham etāṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:15700: 12,268.002c nivartayema pāpaṃ hi tṛṣṇayā kāritā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:15701: 12,268.003 bhīṣma uvāca 12,268.003a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:15703: 12,268.004a susukhaṃ bata jīvāmi yasya me nāsti kiṃ cana 12,268.004c mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:15704: 12,268.005a arthāḥ khalu samṛddhā hi bāḍhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānatām
GE07mbh_12_u:15705: 12,268.005c asamṛddhās tv api sadā mohayanty avicakṣaṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:15706: 12,268.006a yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:15708: 12,268.007a yathaiva śṛṅgaṃ goḥ kāle vardhamānasya vardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:15709: 12,268.007c tathaiva tṛṣṇā vittena vardhamānena vardhate 12,268.008a kiṃ cid eva mamatvena yadā bhavati kalpitam
GE07mbh_12_u:15710: 12,268.008c tad eva paritāpāya nāśe saṃpadyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15711: 12,268.009a na kāmān anurudhyeta duḥkhaṃ kāmeṣu vai ratiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15712: 12,268.009c prāpyārtham upayuñjīta dharme kāmaṃ vivarjayet 12,268.010a vidvān sarveṣu bhūteṣu vyāghramāṃsopamo bhavet 12,268.010c kṛtakṛtyo viśuddhātmā sarvaṃ tyajati vai saha
GE07mbh_12_u:15713: 12,268.011a ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā śokānandau priyāpriye 12,268.011c bhayābhaye ca saṃtyajya saṃpraśānto nirāmayaḥ 12,268.012a yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15714: 12,268.012c yo 'sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:15715: 12,268.013a cāritram ātmanaḥ paśyaṃś candraśuddham anāmayam 12,268.013c dharmātmā labhate kīrtiṃ pretya ceha yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:15716: 12,268.014a rājñas tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prītimān abhavad dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15717: 12,268.014c pūjayitvā ca tad vākyaṃ māṇḍavyo mokṣam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15718: 12,269.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,269.001a kiṃśīlaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ kiṃvidyaḥ kiṃparāyaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15719: 12,269.001c prāpnoti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:15720: 12,269.002 bhīṣma uvāca 12,269.002a mokṣadharmeṣu nirato laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:15724: 12,269.003a svagṛhād abhiniḥsṛtya lābhālābhe samo muniḥ 12,269.003c samupoḍheṣu kāmeṣu nirapekṣaḥ parivrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:15725: 12,269.004a na cakṣuṣā na manasā na vācā dūṣayed api 12,269.004c na pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ vā dūṣaṇaṃ vyāharet kva cit 12,269.005a na hiṃsyāt sarvabhūtāni maitrāyaṇagatiś caret 12,269.005c nedaṃ jīvitam āsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:15726: 12,269.006a ativādāṃs titikṣeta nābhimanyet kathaṃ cana 12,269.006c krodhyamānaḥ priyaṃ brūyād ākruṣṭaḥ kuśalaṃ vadet
GE07mbh_12_u:15727: 12,269.007a pradakṣiṇaṃ prasavyaṃ ca grāmamadhye na cācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:15728: 12,269.007c bhaikṣacaryām anāpanno na gacchet pūrvaketitaḥ 12,269.008a avakīrṇaḥ suguptaś ca na vācā hy apriyaṃ vadet 12,269.008c mṛduḥ syād apratikrūro visrabdhaḥ syād aroṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15729: 12,269.009a vidhūme nyastamusale vyaṅgāre bhuktavaj jane 12,269.009c atīte pātrasaṃcāre bhikṣāṃ lipseta vai muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15731: 12,269.010c alābhe na vihanyeta lābhaś cainaṃ na harṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:15732: 12,269.011a lābhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ necchen na bhuñjītābhipūjitaḥ 12,269.011c abhipūjitalābhaṃ hi jugupsetaiva tādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15733: 12,269.012a na cānnadoṣān nindeta na guṇān abhipūjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:15734: 12,269.012c śayyāsane vivikte ca nityam evābhipūjayet 12,269.013a śūnyāgāraṃ vṛkṣamūlam araṇyam atha vā guhām
GE07mbh_12_u:15736: 12,269.014a anurodhavirodhābhyāṃ samaḥ syād acalo dhruvaḥ 12,269.014c sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cobhe nānurudhyeta karmaṇi 12,269.014d*0724_01 nityatṛptaḥ susaṃtuṣṭaḥ prasannavadanendriyaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:15776: 12,270.030a nūnaṃ tu tasya tapasaḥ sāvaśeṣaṃ mamāsti vai
GE07mbh_12_u:15777: 12,270.030c yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi bhavantaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam

GE07mbh_12_u:15824: 12,271.030c prajāvisargasya ca pārimāṇyaṃ; vāpīsahasrāṇi bahūni daitya
GE07mbh_12_u:15825: 12,271.031a vāpyaḥ punar yojanavistṛtās tāḥ; krośaṃ ca gambhīratayāvagāḍhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15826: 12,271.031c āyāmataḥ pañcaśatāś ca sarvāḥ; pratyekaśo yojanataḥ pravṛddhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15827: 12,271.032a vāpyā jalaṃ kṣipyati vālakoṭyā; tv ahnā sakṛc cāpy atha na
GE07mbh_12_u:15829: 12,271.032c tāsāṃ kṣaye viddhi kṛtaṃ visargaṃ; saṃhāram ekaṃ ca tathā prajānām 12,271.033a ṣaḍ jīvavarṇāḥ paramaṃ pramāṇaṃ; kṛṣṇo dhūmro nīlam athāsya madhyam 12,271.033c raktaṃ punaḥ sahyataraṃ sukhaṃ tu; hāridravarṇaṃ susukhaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:15831: 12,271.034a paraṃ tu śuklaṃ vimalaṃ viśokaṃ; gataklamaṃ sidhyati dānavendra
GE07mbh_12_u:15832: 12,271.034c gatvā tu yoniprabhavāni daitya; sahasraśaḥ siddhim upaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:15834: 12,271.035a gatiṃ ca yāṃ darśanam āha devo; gatvā śubhaṃ darśanam eva cāha 12,271.035c gatiḥ punar varṇakṛtā prajānāṃ; varṇas tathā kālakṛto
GE07mbh_12_u:15836: 12,271.036a śataṃ sahasrāṇi caturdaśeha; parā gatir jīvaguṇasya daitya
GE07mbh_12_u:15839: 12,271.036c ārohaṇaṃ tat kṛtam eva viddhi; sthānaṃ tathā niḥsaraṇaṃ ca teṣām 12,271.037a kṛṣṇasya varṇasya gatir nikṛṣṭā; sa majjate narake pacyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15840: 12,271.037c sthānaṃ tathā durgatibhis tu tasya; prajāvisargān subahūn vadanti
GE07mbh_12_u:15841: 12,271.038a śataṃ sahasrāṇi tataś caritvā; prāpnoti varṇaṃ haritaṃ tu paścāt 12,271.038c sa caiva tasmin nivasaty anīśo; yugakṣaye tamasā saṃvṛtātmā
GE07mbh_12_u:15842: 12,271.039a sa vai yadā sattvaguṇena yuktas; tamo vyapohan ghaṭate
GE07mbh_12_u:15844: 12,271.039c sa lohitaṃ varṇam upaiti nīlo; manuṣyaloke parivartate ca
GE07mbh_12_u:15845: 12,271.040a sa tatra saṃhāravisargam eva; svakarmajair bandhanaiḥ kliśyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15846: 12,271.040c tataḥ sa hāridram upaiti varṇaṃ; saṃhāravikṣepaśate vyatīte 12,271.041a hāridravarṇas tu prajāvisargān; sahasraśas tiṣṭhati saṃcaran
GE07mbh_12_u:15848: 12,271.041c avipramukto niraye ca daitya; tataḥ sahasrāṇi daśāparāṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:15849: 12,271.042a gatīḥ sahasrāṇi ca pañca tasya; catvāri saṃvartakṛtāni caiva
GE07mbh_12_u:15850: 12,271.042c vimuktam enaṃ nirayāc ca viddhi; sarveṣu cānyeṣu ca saṃbhaveṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:15851: 12,271.043a sa devaloke viharaty abhīkṣṇaṃ; tataś cyuto mānuṣatām upaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:15852: 12,271.043c saṃhāravikṣepaśatāni cāṣṭau; martyeṣu tiṣṭhann amṛtatvam eti
GE07mbh_12_u:15853: 12,271.044a so 'smād atha bhraśyati kālayogāt; kṛṣṇe tale tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:15855: 12,271.044c yathā tv ayaṃ sidhyati jīvalokas; tat te 'bhidhāsyāmy
GE07mbh_12_u:15857: 12,271.045a daivāni sa vyūhaśatāni sapta; rakto haridro 'tha tathaiva śuklaḥ 12,271.045c saṃśritya saṃdhāvati śuklam etam; aṣṭāparān arcyatamān sa
GE07mbh_12_u:15859: 12,271.046a aṣṭau ca ṣaṣṭiṃ ca śatāni yāni; manoviruddhāni mahādyutīnām 12,271.046c śuklasya varṇasya parā gatir yā; trīṇy eva ruddhāni
GE07mbh_12_u:15861: 12,271.047a saṃhāravikṣepam aniṣṭam ekaṃ; catvāri cānyāni vasaty anīśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15862: 12,271.047c ṣaṣṭhasya varṇasya parā gatir yā; siddhā viśiṣṭasya gataklamasya
GE07mbh_12_u:15863: 12,271.048a saptottaraṃ teṣu vasaty anīśaḥ; saṃhāravikṣepaśataṃ saśeṣam 12,271.048c tasmād upāvṛtya manuṣyaloke; tato mahān mānuṣatām upaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:15864: 12,271.049a tasmād upāvṛtya tataḥ krameṇa; so 'gre sma saṃtiṣṭhati bhūtasargam
GE07mbh_12_u:15865: 12,271.049c sa saptakṛtvaś ca paraiti lokān; saṃhāravikṣepakṛtapravāsaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15866: 12,271.050a saptaiva saṃhāram upaplavāni; saṃbhāvya saṃtiṣṭhati siddhaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:15867: 12,271.050c tato 'vyayaṃ sthānam anantam eti; devasya viṣṇor atha
GE07mbh_12_u:15868: brahmaṇaś ca 12,271.050e śeṣasya caivātha narasya caiva; devasya viṣṇoḥ paramasya caiva
GE07mbh_12_u:15869: 12,271.051a saṃhārakāle paridagdhakāyā; brahmāṇam āyānti sadā prajā hi 12,271.051c ceṣṭātmano devagaṇāś ca sarve; ye brahmalokād amarāḥ sma te 'pi
GE07mbh_12_u:15870: 12,271.052a prajāvisargaṃ tu saśeṣakālaṃ; sthānāni svāny eva saranti jīvāḥ 12,271.052c niḥśeṣāṇāṃ tat padaṃ yānti cānte; sarvāpadā ye sadṛśā manuṣyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:15871: 12,271.053a ye tu cyutāḥ siddhalokāt krameṇa; teṣāṃ gatiṃ yānti
GE07mbh_12_u:15873: 12,271.053c jīvāḥ pare tadbalaveṣarūpā; vidhiṃ svakaṃ yānti viparyayeṇa

GE07mbh_12_u:16475: 12,276.002 bhīṣma uvāca 12,276.002a gurupūjā ca satataṃ vṛddhānāṃ paryupāsanam 12,276.002c śravaṇaṃ caiva vidyānāṃ kūṭasthaṃ śreya ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16477: 12,276.003c gālavasya ca saṃvādaṃ devarṣer nāradasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:16481: 12,276.005a yaiḥ kaiś cit saṃmato loke guṇais tu puruṣo nṛṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:16482: 12,276.005c bhavaty anapagān sarvāṃs tān guṇāṃl lakṣayāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:16485: 12,276.007a jñāne hy evaṃ pravṛttiḥ syāt kāryākārye vijānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16486: 12,276.007c yat kāryaṃ na vyavasyāmas tad bhavān vaktum arhati 12,276.008a bhagavann āśramāḥ sarve pṛthagācāradarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16487: 12,276.008c idaṃ śreya idaṃ śreya iti nānāpradhāvitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16488: 12,276.009a tāṃs tu viprasthitān dṛṣṭvā śāstraiḥ śāstrābhinandinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16489: 12,276.009c svaśāstraiḥ parituṣṭāṃś ca śreyo nopalabhāmahe 12,276.010a śāstraṃ yadi bhaved ekaṃ vyaktaṃ śreyo bhavet tadā 12,276.010c śāstraiś ca bahubhir bhūyaḥ śreyo guhyaṃ praveśitam
GE07mbh_12_u:16490: 12,276.011a etasmāt kāraṇāc chreyaḥ kalilaṃ pratibhāti mām
GE07mbh_12_u:16491: 12,276.011c bravītu bhagavāṃs tan me upasanno 'smy adhīhi bhoḥ 12,276.012 nārada uvāca 12,276.012a āśramās tāta catvāro yathāsaṃkalpitāḥ pṛthak 12,276.012c tān sarvān anupaśya tvaṃ samāśrityaiva gālava
GE07mbh_12_u:16492: 12,276.013a teṣāṃ teṣāṃ tathā hi tvam āśramāṇāṃ tatas tataḥ 12,276.013c nānārūpaguṇoddeśaṃ paśya viprasthitaṃ pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:16493: 12,276.013e nayanti caiva te samyag abhipretam asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:16494: 12,276.014a ṛju paśyaṃs tathā samyag āśramāṇāṃ parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:16495: 12,276.014c yat tu niḥśreyasaṃ samyak tac caivāsaṃśayātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:16496: 12,276.015a anugrahaṃ ca mitrāṇām amitrāṇāṃ ca nigraham
GE07mbh_12_u:16497: 12,276.015c saṃgrahaṃ ca trivargasya śreya āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16498: 12,276.016a nivṛttiḥ karmaṇaḥ pāpāt satataṃ puṇyaśīlatā 12,276.016c sadbhiś ca samudācāraḥ śreya etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:16500: 12,276.017c vāk caiva madhurā proktā śreya etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:16502: 12,276.018c asaṃtyāgaś ca bhṛtyānāṃ śreya etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:16503: 12,276.019a satyasya vacanaṃ śreyaḥ satyajñānaṃ tu duṣkaram
GE07mbh_12_u:16504: 12,276.019c yad bhūtahitam atyantam etat satyaṃ bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:16505: 12,276.020a ahaṃkārasya ca tyāgaḥ praṇayasya ca nigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16506: 12,276.020c saṃtoṣaś caikacaryā ca kūṭasthaṃ śreya ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16507: 12,276.021a dharmeṇa vedādhyayanaṃ vedāṅgānāṃ tathaiva ca 12,276.021c vidyārthānāṃ ca jijñāsā śreya etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:16510: 12,276.023a naktaṃcaryā divāsvapnam ālasyaṃ paiśunaṃ madam 12,276.023c atiyogam ayogaṃ ca śreyaso 'rthī parityajet
GE07mbh_12_u:16511: 12,276.024a karmotkarṣaṃ na mārgeta pareṣāṃ parinindayā 12,276.024c svaguṇair eva mārgeta viprakarṣaṃ pṛthagjanāt 12,276.025a nirguṇās tv eva bhūyiṣṭham ātmasaṃbhāvino narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16512: 12,276.025c doṣair anyān guṇavataḥ kṣipanty ātmaguṇakṣayāt 12,276.026a anucyamānāś ca punas te manyante mahājanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:16513: 12,276.026c guṇavattaram ātmānaṃ svena mānena darpitāḥ 12,276.027a abruvan kasya cin nindām ātmapūjām avarṇayan
GE07mbh_12_u:16514: 12,276.027c vipaścid guṇasaṃpannaḥ prāpnoty eva mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16515: 12,276.028a abruvan vāti surabhir gandhaḥ sumanasāṃ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16516: 12,276.028c tathaivāvyāharan bhāti vimalo bhānur ambare 12,276.029a evamādīni cānyāni parityaktāni
GE07mbh_12_u:16517: 12,276.029c jvalanti yaśasā loke yāni na vyāharanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:16518: 12,276.030a na loke dīpyate mūrkhaḥ kevalātmapraśaṃsayā 12,276.030c api cāpihitaḥ śvabhre kṛtavidyaḥ prakāśate 12,276.031a asann uccair api proktaḥ śabdaḥ samupaśāmyati
GE07mbh_12_u:16519: 12,276.031c dīpyate tv eva lokeṣu śanair api subhāṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:16520: 12,276.032a mūḍhānām avaliptānām asāraṃ bhāṣitaṃ bahu 12,276.032c darśayaty antarātmānaṃ divā rūpam ivāṃśumān 12,276.033a etasmāt kāraṇāt prajñāṃ mṛgayante pṛthagvidhām 12,276.033c prajñālābho hi bhūtānām uttamaḥ pratibhāti mām
GE07mbh_12_u:16521: 12,276.034a nāpṛṣṭaḥ kasya cid brūyān na cānyāyena pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16522: 12,276.034c jñānavān api medhāvī jaḍaval lokam ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:16523: 12,276.035a tato vāsaṃ parīkṣeta dharmanityeṣu sādhuṣu 12,276.035c manuṣyeṣu vadānyeṣu svadharmanirateṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:16524: 12,276.036a caturṇāṃ yatra varṇānāṃ dharmavyatikaro bhavet 12,276.036c na tatra vāsaṃ kurvīta śreyorthī vai kathaṃ cana 12,276.037a nirārambho 'py ayam iha yathālabdhopajīvanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16525: 12,276.037c puṇyaṃ puṇyeṣu vimalaṃ pāpaṃ pāpeṣu cāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:16526: 12,276.038a apām agnes tathendoś ca sparśaṃ vedayate yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:16527: 12,276.038c tathā paśyāmahe sparśam ubhayoḥ pāpapuṇyayoḥ 12,276.039a apaśyanto 'nnaviṣayaṃ bhuñjate vighasāśinaḥ 12,276.039c bhuñjānaṃ cānnaviṣayān viṣayaṃ viddhi karmaṇām 12,276.040a yatrāgamayamānānām asatkāreṇa pṛcchatām
GE07mbh_12_u:16528: 12,276.040c prabrūyād brahmaṇo dharmaṃ tyajet taṃ deśam ātmavān
GE07mbh_12_u:16529: 12,276.040d*0739_01 durvṛtto 'pi varo vipro na ca śūdro jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16530: 12,276.040d*0739_02 kaḥ parityajya gāṃ duṣṭāṃ duhyec chīlavatīṃ kharīm
GE07mbh_12_u:16532: 12,276.040d*0739_04 vacanaṃ tasya na grāhyaṃ śunocchiṣṭaṃ havir yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:16533: 12,276.041a śiṣyopādhyāyikā vṛttir yatra syāt susamāhitā 12,276.041c yathāvac chāstrasaṃpannā kas taṃ deśaṃ parityajet
GE07mbh_12_u:16534: 12,276.042a ākāśasthā dhruvaṃ yatra doṣaṃ brūyur vipaścitām
GE07mbh_12_u:16535: 12,276.042c ātmapūjābhikāmā vai ko vaset tatra paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16536: 12,276.043a yatra saṃloḍitā lubdhaiḥ prāyaśo dharmasetavaḥ 12,276.043c pradīptam iva śailāntaṃ kas taṃ deśaṃ na saṃtyajet 12,276.044a yatra dharmam anāśaṅkāś careyur vītamatsarāḥ 12,276.044c caret tatra vasec caiva puṇyaśīleṣu sādhuṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:16537: 12,276.045a dharmam arthanimittaṃ tu careyur yatra mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16538: 12,276.045c na tān anuvasej jātu te hi pāpakṛto janāḥ 12,276.046a karmaṇā yatra pāpena vartante jīvitespavaḥ 12,276.046c vyavadhāvet tatas tūrṇaṃ sasarpāc charaṇād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:16539: 12,276.047a yena khaṭvāṃ samārūḍhaḥ karmaṇānuśayī bhavet 12,276.047c āditas tan na kartavyam icchatā bhavam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16540: 12,276.048a yatra rājā ca rājñaś ca puruṣāḥ pratyanantarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16541: 12,276.048c kuṭumbinām agrabhujas tyajet tad rāṣṭram ātmavān
GE07mbh_12_u:16542: 12,276.049a śrotriyās tv agrabhoktāro dharmanityāḥ sanātanāḥ 12,276.049c yājanādhyāpane yuktā yatra tad rāṣṭram āvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:16544: 12,276.050c ajasraṃ caiva vartante vaset tatrāvicārayan 12,276.051a aśucīny atra paśyeta brāhmaṇān vṛttikarśitān 12,276.051c tyajet tad rāṣṭram āsannam upasṛṣṭam ivāmiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:16545: 12,276.052a prīyamāṇā narā yatra prayaccheyur ayācitāḥ 12,276.052c svasthacitto vaset tatra kṛtakṛtya ivātmavān 12,276.053a daṇḍo yatrāvinīteṣu satkāraś ca kṛtātmasu 12,276.053c caret tatra vasec caiva puṇyaśīleṣu sādhuṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:16548: 12,276.055a yatra rājā dharmanityo rājyaṃ vai paryupāsitā
GE07mbh_12_u:16549: 12,276.055c apāsya kāmān kāmeśo vaset tatrāvicārayan 12,276.056a tathāśīlā hi rājānaḥ sarvān viṣayavāsinaḥ 12,276.056c śreyasā yojayanty āśu śreyasi pratyupasthite 12,276.057a pṛcchatas te mayā tāta śreya etad udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:16550: 12,276.057c na hi śakyaṃ pradhānena śreyaḥ saṃkhyātum ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16552: 12,276.058c tapasaiveha bahulaṃ śreyo vyaktaṃ bhaviṣyati 12,277.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,277.001a kathaṃ nu muktaḥ pṛthivīṃ cared asmadvidho nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16553: 12,277.001c nityaṃ kaiś ca guṇair yuktaḥ saṅgapāśād vimucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16554: 12,277.002 bhīṣma uvāca 12,277.002a atra te vartayiṣyāmi itihāsaṃ purātanam 12,277.002c ariṣṭaneminā proktaṃ sagarāyānupṛcchate
GE07mbh_12_u:16555: 12,277.003 sagara uvāca 12,277.003a kiṃ śreyaḥ paramaṃ brahman kṛtveha sukham aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:16556: 12,277.003c kathaṃ na śocen na kṣubhyed etad icchāmi veditum 12,277.004 bhīṣma uvāca 12,277.004a evam uktas tadā tārkṣyaḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ 12,277.004c vibudhya saṃpadaṃ cāgryāṃ sad vākyam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:16557: 12,277.005a sukhaṃ mokṣasukhaṃ loke na ca loko 'vagacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:16559: 12,277.006a saktabuddhir aśāntātmā na sa śakyaś cikitsitum
GE07mbh_12_u:16560: 12,277.006c snehapāśasito mūḍho na sa mokṣāya kalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:16561: 12,277.007a snehajān iha te pāśān vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tān mama 12,277.007c sakarṇakena śirasā śakyāś chettuṃ vijānatā 12,277.008a saṃbhāvya putrān kālena yauvanasthān niveśya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:16562: 12,277.008c samarthāñ jīvane jñātvā muktaś cara yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:16563: 12,277.009a bhāryāṃ putravatīṃ vṛddhāṃ lālitāṃ putravatsalām 12,277.009c jñātvā prajahi kāle tvaṃ parārtham anudṛśya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:16564: 12,277.010a sāpatyo nirapatyo vā muktaś cara yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:16565: 12,277.010c indriyair indriyārthāṃs tvam anubhūya yathāvidhi 12,277.011a kṛtakautūhalas teṣu muktaś cara yathāsukham 12,277.011c upapattyopalabdheṣu lābheṣu ca samo bhava 12,277.012a eṣa tāvat samāsena tava saṃkīrtito mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:16566: 12,277.012c mokṣārtho vistareṇāpi bhūyo vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:16567: 12,277.013a muktā vītabhayā loke caranti sukhino narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16568: 12,277.013c saktabhāvā vinaśyanti narās tatra na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16570: 12,277.014c asaktāḥ sukhino loke saktāś caiva vināśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16571: 12,277.015a svajane na ca te cintā kartavyā mokṣabuddhinā
GE07mbh_12_u:16572: 12,277.015c ime mayā vinābhūtā bhaviṣyanti kathaṃ tv iti
GE07mbh_12_u:16573: 12,277.016a svayam utpadyate jantuḥ svayam eva vivardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:16574: 12,277.016c sukhaduḥkhe tathā mṛtyuṃ svayam evādhigacchati 12,277.017a bhojanācchādane caiva mātrā pitrā ca saṃgraham
GE07mbh_12_u:16575: 12,277.017c svakṛtenādhigacchanti loke nāsty akṛtaṃ purā 12,277.018a dhātrā vihitabhakṣyāṇi sarvabhūtāni medinīm
GE07mbh_12_u:16578: 12,277.019c ko hetuḥ svajanaṃ poṣṭuṃ rakṣituṃ vādṛḍhātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16579: 12,277.020a svajanaṃ hi yadā mṛtyur hanty eva tava paśyataḥ 12,277.020c kṛte 'pi yatne mahati tatra boddhavyam ātmanā 12,277.021a jīvantam api caivainaṃ bharaṇe rakṣaṇe tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:16580: 12,277.021c asamāpte parityajya paścād api mariṣyasi 12,277.022a yadā mṛtaś ca svajanaṃ na jñāsyasi kathaṃ cana 12,277.022c sukhitaṃ duḥkhitaṃ vāpi nanu boddhavyam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:16581: 12,277.023a mṛte vā tvayi jīve vā yadi bhokṣyati vai janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16582: 12,277.023c svakṛtaṃ nanu buddhvaivaṃ kartavyaṃ hitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16583: 12,277.024a evaṃ vijānaṃl loke 'smin kaḥ kasyety abhiniścitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16584: 12,277.024c mokṣe niveśaya mano bhūyaś cāpy upadhāraya
GE07mbh_12_u:16585: 12,277.025a kṣutpipāsādayo bhāvā jitā yasyeha dehinaḥ 12,277.025c krodho lobhas tathā mohaḥ sattvavān mukta eva saḥ 12,277.026a dyūte pāne tathā strīṣu mṛgayāyāṃ ca yo naraḥ 12,277.026c na pramādyati saṃmohāt satataṃ mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16586: 12,277.027a divase divase nāma rātrau rātrau sadā sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:16587: 12,277.027c bhoktavyam iti yaḥ khinno doṣabuddhiḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16588: 12,277.028a ātmabhāvaṃ tathā strīṣu muktam eva punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16589: 12,277.028c yaḥ paśyati sadā yukto yathāvan mukta eva saḥ 12,277.029a saṃbhavaṃ ca vināśaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ceṣṭitaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:16590: 12,277.029c yas tattvato vijānāti loke 'smin mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16591: 12,277.030a prasthaṃ vāhasahasreṣu yātrārthaṃ caiva koṭiṣu 12,277.030c prāsāde mañcakasthānaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16593: 12,277.031c avṛttikarśitaṃ caiva yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16594: 12,277.032a yaḥ paśyati sukhī tuṣṭo napaśyaṃś ca vihanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16595: 12,277.032c yaś cāpy alpena saṃtuṣṭo loke 'smin mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16596: 12,277.033a agnīṣomāv idaṃ sarvam iti yaś cānupaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:16597: 12,277.033c na ca saṃspṛśyate bhāvair adbhutair mukta eva saḥ 12,277.034a paryaṅkaśayyā bhūmiś ca samāne yasya dehinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16598: 12,277.034c śālayaś ca kadannaṃ ca yasya syān mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16599: 12,277.035a kṣaumaṃ ca kuśacīraṃ ca kauśeyaṃ valkalāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:16600: 12,277.035c āvikaṃ carma ca samaṃ yasya syān mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16602: 12,277.036c tathā ca vartate dṛṣṭvā loke 'smin mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16603: 12,277.037a sukhaduḥkhe same yasya lābhālābhau jayājayau 12,277.037c icchādveṣau bhayodvegau sarvathā mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16605: 12,277.038c śarīraṃ doṣabahulaṃ dṛṣṭvā cedaṃ vimucyate 12,277.039a valīpalitasaṃyogaṃ kārśyaṃ vaivarṇyam eva ca 12,277.039c kubjabhāvaṃ ca jarayā yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16607: 12,277.040c bādhiryaṃ prāṇamandatvaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16608: 12,277.041a gatān ṛṣīṃs tathā devān asurāṃś ca tathā gatān 12,277.041c lokād asmāt paraṃ lokaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate 12,277.042a prabhāvair anvitās tais taiḥ pārthivendrāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16609: 12,277.042c ye gatāḥ pṛthivīṃ tyaktvā iti jñātvā vimucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16610: 12,277.043a arthāṃś ca durlabhāṃl loke kleśāṃś ca sulabhāṃs tathā 12,277.043c duḥkhaṃ caiva kuṭumbārthe yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16611: 12,277.044a apatyānāṃ ca vaiguṇyaṃ janaṃ viguṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:16612: 12,277.044c paśyan bhūyiṣṭhaśo loke ko mokṣaṃ nābhipūjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:16613: 12,277.045a śāstrāl lokāc ca yo buddhaḥ sarvaṃ paśyati mānavaḥ 12,277.045c asāram iva mānuṣyaṃ sarvathā mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16614: 12,277.046a etac chrutvā mama vaco bhavāṃś caratu muktavat
GE07mbh_12_u:16615: 12,277.046c gārhasthye yadi te mokṣe kṛtā buddhir aviklavā
GE07mbh_12_u:16616: 12,277.047a tat tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā samyak sa pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16617: 12,277.047c mokṣajaiś ca guṇair yuktaḥ pālayām āsa ca prajāḥ 12,278.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,278.001a tiṣṭhate me sadā tāta kautūhalam idaṃ hṛdi
GE07mbh_12_u:16618: 12,278.001c tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tvattaḥ kurupitāmaha

GE07mbh_12_u:16642: 12,278.019a pāṇimadhyagataṃ dṛṣṭvā bhārgavaṃ tam umāpatiḥ 12,278.019c āsyaṃ vivṛtya kakudī pāṇiṃ saṃprākṣipac chanaiḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:16670: 12,279.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,279.001a ataḥ paraṃ mahābāho yac chreyas tad vadasva me 12,279.001c na tṛpyāmy amṛtasyeva vacasas te pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:16671: 12,279.002a kiṃ karma puruṣaḥ kṛtvā śubhaṃ puruṣasattama

GE07mbh_12_u:16673: 12,279.003c parāśaraṃ mahātmānaṃ papraccha janako nṛpaḥ 12,279.004a kiṃ śreyaḥ sarvabhūtānām asmiṃl loke paratra ca

GE07mbh_12_u:16676: 12,279.006a dharma eva kṛtaḥ śreyān iha loke paratra ca 12,279.006c tasmād dhi paramaṃ nāsti yathā prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:16679: 12,279.008c martyā yatrāvatiṣṭhante sā ca kāmāt pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:16680: 12,279.009a sukṛtāsukṛtaṃ karma niṣevya vividhaiḥ kramaiḥ 12,279.009c daśārdhapravibhaktānāṃ bhūtānāṃ bahudhā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16681: 12,279.010a sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ vāpi yathā bhāṇḍaṃ niṣicyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16683: 12,279.011a nābījāj jāyate kiṃ cin nākṛtvā sukham edhate
GE07mbh_12_u:16684: 12,279.011c sukṛtī vindati sukhaṃ prāpya dehakṣayaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16685: 12,279.012a daivaṃ tāta na paśyāmi nāsti daivasya sādhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:16687: 12,279.013a pretya jātikṛtaṃ karma na smaranti sadā janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16688: 12,279.013c te vai tasya phalaprāptau karma cāpi caturvidham
GE07mbh_12_u:16689: 12,279.014a lokayātrāśrayaś caiva śabdo vedāśrayaḥ kṛtaḥ 12,279.014c śāntyarthaṃ manasas tāta naitad vṛddhānuśāsanam 12,279.015a cakṣuṣā manasā vācā karmaṇā ca caturvidham
GE07mbh_12_u:16690: 12,279.015c kurute yādṛśaṃ karma tādṛśaṃ pratipadyate 12,279.016a nirantaraṃ ca miśraṃ ca phalate karma pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:16691: 12,279.016c kalyāṇaṃ yadi vā pāpaṃ na tu nāśo 'sya vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16692: 12,279.017a kadā cit sukṛtaṃ tāta kūṭastham iva tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:16693: 12,279.017c majjamānasya saṃsāre yāvad duḥkhād vimucyate 12,279.018a tato duḥkhakṣayaṃ kṛtvā sukṛtaṃ karma sevate
GE07mbh_12_u:16694: 12,279.018c sukṛtakṣayād duṣkṛtaṃ ca tad viddhi manujādhipa

GE07mbh_12_u:16696: 12,279.019c hrīr ahiṃsāvyasanitā dākṣyaṃ ceti sukhāvahāḥ 12,279.020a duṣkṛte sukṛte vāpi na jantur ayato bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:16698: 12,279.021a nāyaṃ parasya sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vāpi sevate
GE07mbh_12_u:16699: 12,279.021c karoti yādṛśaṃ karma tādṛśaṃ pratipadyate 12,279.022a sukhaduḥkhe samādhāya pumān anyena gacchati 12,279.022c anyenaiva janaḥ sarvaḥ saṃgato yaś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:16700: 12,279.023a pareṣāṃ yad asūyeta na tat kuryāt svayaṃ naraḥ 12,279.023c yo hy asūyus tathāyuktaḥ so 'vahāsaṃ niyacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:16701: 12,279.024a bhīrū rājanyo brāhmaṇaḥ sarvabhakṣo; vaiśyo 'nīhāvān hīnavarṇo

GE07mbh_12_u:16707: 12,280.001 parāśara uvāca 12,280.001a manoratharathaṃ prāpya indriyārthahayaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16708: 12,280.001c raśmibhir jñānasaṃbhūtair yo gacchati sa buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:16710: 12,280.002c dvijātihastān nirvṛttā na tu tulyāt parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:16711: 12,280.003a āyur nasulabhaṃ labdhvā nāvakarṣed viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:16712: 12,280.003c utkarṣārthaṃ prayatate naraḥ puṇyena karmaṇā 12,280.004a varṇebhyo 'pi paribhraṣṭaḥ sa vai saṃmānam arhati 12,280.004c na tu yaḥ satkriyāṃ prāpya rājasaṃ karma sevate 12,280.005a varṇotkarṣam avāpnoti naraḥ puṇyena karmaṇā 12,280.005c durlabhaṃ tam alabdhā hi hanyāt pāpena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:16713: 12,280.006a ajñānād dhi kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tapasaivābhinirṇudet 12,280.006c pāpaṃ hi karma phalati pāpam eva svayaṃ kṛtam 12,280.006e tasmāt pāpaṃ na seveta karma duḥkhaphalodayam
GE07mbh_12_u:16714: 12,280.007a pāpānubandhaṃ yat karma yady api syān mahāphalam
GE07mbh_12_u:16715: 12,280.007c na tat seveta medhāvī śuciḥ kusalilaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:16716: 12,280.008a kiṃkaṣṭam anupaśyāmi phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ 12,280.008c pratyāpannasya hi sato nātmā tāvad virocate
GE07mbh_12_u:16717: 12,280.009a pratyāpattiś ca yasyeha bāliśasya na jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16719: 12,280.010a viraktaṃ śodhyate vastraṃ na tu kṛṣṇopasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:16720: 12,280.010c prayatnena manuṣyendra pāpam evaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:16721: 12,280.011a svayaṃ kṛtvā tu yaḥ pāpaṃ śubham evānutiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:16722: 12,280.011c prāyaścittaṃ naraḥ kartum ubhayaṃ so 'śnute pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:16723: 12,280.012a ajñānāt tu kṛtāṃ hiṃsām ahiṃsā vyapakarṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:16724: 12,280.012c brāhmaṇāḥ śāstranirdeśād ity āhur brahmavādinaḥ 12,280.013a tathā kāmakṛtaṃ cāsya vihiṃsaivāpakarṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:16725: 12,280.013c ity āhur dharmaśāstrajñā brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ 12,280.014a ahaṃ tu tāvat paśyāmi karma yad vartate kṛtam 12,280.014c guṇayuktaṃ prakāśaṃ ca pāpenānupasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:16726: 12,280.015a yathā sūkṣmāṇi karmāṇi phalantīha yathātatham 12,280.015c buddhiyuktāni tānīha kṛtāni manasā saha 12,280.016a bhavaty alpaphalaṃ karma sevitaṃ nityam ulbaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:16727: 12,280.016c abuddhipūrvaṃ dharmajña kṛtam ugreṇa karmaṇā 12,280.017a kṛtāni yāni karmāṇi daivatair munibhis tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:16728: 12,280.017c nācaret tāni dharmātmā śrutvā cāpi na kutsayet
GE07mbh_12_u:16729: 12,280.018a saṃcintya manasā rājan viditvā śaktim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16730: 12,280.018c karoti yaḥ śubhaṃ karma sa vai bhadrāṇi paśyati 12,280.019a nave kapāle salilaṃ saṃnyastaṃ hīyate yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:16732: 12,280.020a satoye 'nyat tu yat toyaṃ tasminn eva prasicyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16733: 12,280.020c vṛddhe vṛddhim avāpnoti salile salilaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:16734: 12,280.021a evaṃ karmāṇi yānīha buddhiyuktāni bhūpate 12,280.021c nasamānīha hīnāni tāni puṇyatamāny api 12,280.022a rājñā jetavyāḥ sāyudhāś connatāś ca; samyak kartavyaṃ pālanaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:16735: ca prajānām 12,280.022c agniś ceyo bahubhiś cāpi yajñair; ante madhye vā vanam āśritya stheyam
GE07mbh_12_u:16736: 12,280.023a damānvitaḥ puruṣo dharmaśīlo; bhūtāni cātmānam ivānupaśyet
GE07mbh_12_u:16737: 12,280.023c garīyasaḥ pūjayed ātmaśaktyā; satyena śīlena sukhaṃ narendra
GE07mbh_12_u:16738: 12,281.001 parāśara uvāca 12,281.001a kaḥ kasya copakurute kaś ca kasmai prayacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:16739: 12,281.001c prāṇī karoty ayaṃ karma sarvam ātmārtham ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:16741: 12,281.002c sodaryaṃ bhrātaram api kim utānyaṃ pṛthagjanam
GE07mbh_12_u:16742: 12,281.003a viśiṣṭasya viśiṣṭāc ca tulyau dānapratigrahau 12,281.003c tayoḥ puṇyataraṃ dānaṃ tad dvijasya prayacchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16743: 12,281.004a nyāyāgataṃ dhanaṃ varṇair nyāyenaiva vivardhitam 12,281.004c saṃrakṣyaṃ yatnam āsthāya dharmārtham iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16744: 12,281.005a na dharmārthī nṛśaṃsena karmaṇā dhanam arjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:16745: 12,281.005c śaktitaḥ sarvakāryāṇi kuryān narddhim anusmaret 12,281.006a apo hi prayataḥ śītās tāpitā jvalanena vā
GE07mbh_12_u:16747: 12,281.007a rantidevena lokeṣṭā siddhiḥ prāptā mahātmanā 12,281.007c phalapatrair atho mūlair munīn arcitavān asau
GE07mbh_12_u:16748: 12,281.008a tair eva phalapatraiś ca sa māṭharam atoṣayat
GE07mbh_12_u:16749: 12,281.008c tasmāl lebhe paraṃ sthānaṃ śaibyo 'pi pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16751: 12,281.009c ṛṇavāñ jāyate martyas tasmād anṛṇatāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:16753: 12,281.010c pitṛbhyaḥ śrāddhadānena nṛṇām abhyarcanena ca 12,281.011a vācaḥ śeṣāvahāryeṇa pālanenātmano 'pi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:16754: 12,281.011c yathāvad bhṛtyavargasya cikīrṣed dharmam āditaḥ 12,281.012a prayatnena ca saṃsiddhā dhanair api vivarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16755: 12,281.012c samyag ghutvā hutavahaṃ munayaḥ siddhim āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16757: 12,281.013c ṛgbhiḥ stutvā mahābhāgo devān vai yajñabhāginaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16759: 12,281.014c devīṃ stutvā tu gagane modate tejasā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16760: 12,281.015a asito devalaś caiva tathā nāradaparvatau 12,281.015c kakṣīvāñ jāmadagnyaś ca rāmas tāṇḍyas tathāṃśumān
GE07mbh_12_u:16761: 12,281.016a vasiṣṭho jamadagniś ca viśvāmitro 'trir eva ca 12,281.016c bharadvājo hariśmaśruḥ kuṇḍadhāraḥ śrutaśravāḥ
