GE07mbh_12_u:16911: 12,285.013c svenaiva tapasā teṣām ṛṣitvaṃ vidadhuḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16912: 12,285.014a pitāmahaś ca me pūrvam ṛśyaśṛṅgaś ca kāśyapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16913: 12,285.014c vaṭas tāṇḍyaḥ kṛpaś caiva kakṣīvān kamaṭhādayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16914: 12,285.015a yavakrītaś ca nṛpate droṇaś ca vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16915: 12,285.015c āyur mataṅgo dattaś ca drupado matsya eva ca 12,285.016a ete svāṃ prakṛtiṃ prāptā vaideha tapaso ''śrayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:16916: 12,285.016c pratiṣṭhitā vedavido dame tapasi caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:16918: 12,285.017c aṅgirāḥ kaśyapaś caiva vasiṣṭho bhṛgur eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:16920: 12,285.018c nāmadheyāni tapasā tāni ca grahaṇaṃ satām
GE07mbh_12_u:16921: 12,285.019 janaka uvāca 12,285.019a viśeṣadharmān varṇānāṃ prabrūhi bhagavan mama 12,285.019c tathā sāmānyadharmāṃś ca sarvatra kuśalo hy asi
GE07mbh_12_u:16922: 12,285.020 parāśara uvāca 12,285.020a pratigraho yājanaṃ ca tathaivādhyāpanaṃ nṛpa 12,285.020c viśeṣadharmo viprāṇāṃ rakṣā kṣatrasya śobhanā 12,285.021a kṛṣiś ca pāśupālyaṃ ca vāṇijyaṃ ca viśām api 12,285.021c dvijānāṃ paricaryā ca śūdrakarma narādhipa 12,285.022a viśeṣadharmā nṛpate varṇānāṃ parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16923: 12,285.022c dharmān sādhāraṇāṃs tāta vistareṇa śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_12_u:16925: 12,285.023c śrāddhakarmātitheyaṃ ca satyam akrodha eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:16926: 12,285.024a sveṣu dāreṣu saṃtoṣaḥ śaucaṃ nityānasūyatā 12,285.024c ātmajñānaṃ titikṣā ca dharmāḥ sādhāraṇā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:16927: 12,285.025a brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyās trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16928: 12,285.025c atra teṣām adhīkāro dharmeṣu dvipadāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:16929: 12,285.026a vikarmāvasthitā varṇāḥ patanti nṛpate trayaḥ 12,285.026c unnamanti yathāsantam āśrityeha svakarmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:16930: 12,285.027a na cāpi śūdraḥ patatīti niścayo; na cāpi saṃskāram ihārhatīti vā 12,285.027c śrutipravṛttaṃ na ca dharmam āpnute; na cāsya dharme
GE07mbh_12_u:16931: pratiṣedhanaṃ kṛtam 12,285.028a vaidehakaṃ śūdram udāharanti; dvijā mahārāja śrutopapannāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16932: 12,285.028c ahaṃ hi paśyāmi narendra devaṃ; viśvasya viṣṇuṃ jagataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16934: 12,285.029a satāṃ vṛttam anuṣṭhāya nihīnā ujjihīrṣavaḥ 12,285.029c mantravarjaṃ na duṣyanti kurvāṇāḥ pauṣṭikīḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16935: 12,285.030a yathā yathā hi sadvṛttam ālambantītare janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16936: 12,285.030c tathā tathā sukhaṃ prāpya pretya ceha ca śerate 12,285.031 janaka uvāca 12,285.031a kiṃ karma dūṣayaty enam atha jātir mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:16937: 12,285.031c saṃdeho me samutpannas tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:16938: 12,285.032 parāśara uvāca 12,285.032a asaṃśayaṃ mahārāja ubhayaṃ doṣakārakam
GE07mbh_12_u:16939: 12,285.032c karma caiva hi jātiś ca viśeṣaṃ tu niśāmaya 12,285.033a jātyā ca karmaṇā caiva duṣṭaṃ karma niṣevate
GE07mbh_12_u:16940: 12,285.033c jātyā duṣṭaś ca yaḥ pāpaṃ na karoti sa pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16941: 12,285.034a jātyā pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ kurvāṇaṃ karma dhikkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:16942: 12,285.034c karma tad dūṣayaty enaṃ tasmāt karma naśobhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:16943: 12,285.035 janaka uvāca 12,285.035a kāni karmāṇi dharmyāṇi loke 'smin dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:16944: 12,285.035c na hiṃsantīha bhūtāni kriyamāṇāni sarvadā 12,285.036 parāśara uvāca 12,285.036a śṛṇu me 'tra mahārāja yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi 12,285.036c yāni karmāṇy ahiṃsrāṇi naraṃ trāyanti sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:16949: 12,285.039a sarve varṇā dharmakāryāṇi samyak; kṛtvā rājan satyavākyāni
GE07mbh_12_u:16951: 12,285.039c tyaktvādharmaṃ dāruṇaṃ jīvaloke; yānti svargaṃ nātra kāryo vicāraḥ 12,286.001 parāśara uvāca 12,286.001a pitā sakhāyo guravaḥ striyaś ca; na nirguṇā nāma bhavanti loke 12,286.001c ananyabhaktāḥ priyavādinaś ca; hitāś ca vaśyāś ca tathaiva rājan
GE07mbh_12_u:16952: 12,286.002a pitā paraṃ daivataṃ mānavānāṃ; mātur viśiṣṭaṃ pitaraṃ vadanti
GE07mbh_12_u:16953: 12,286.002c jñānasya lābhaṃ paramaṃ vadanti; jitendriyārthāḥ param āpnuvanti
GE07mbh_12_u:16954: 12,286.003a raṇājire yatra śarāgnisaṃstare; nṛpātmajo ghātam avāpya
GE07mbh_12_u:16956: 12,286.003c prayāti lokān amaraiḥ sudurlabhān; niṣevate svargaphalaṃ yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:16957: 12,286.004a śrāntaṃ bhītaṃ bhraṣṭaśastraṃ rudantaṃ; parāṅmukhaṃ paribarhaiś ca hīnam
GE07mbh_12_u:16958: 12,286.004c anudyataṃ rogiṇaṃ yācamānaṃ; na vai hiṃsyād bālavṛddhau ca rājan
GE07mbh_12_u:16959: 12,286.005a paribarhaiḥ susaṃpannam udyataṃ tulyatāṃ gatam 12,286.005c atikrameta nṛpatiḥ saṃgrāme kṣatriyātmajam
GE07mbh_12_u:16960: 12,286.006a tulyād iha vadhaḥ śreyān viśiṣṭāc ceti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16961: 12,286.006c nihīnāt kātarāc caiva nṛpāṇāṃ garhito vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16962: 12,286.007a pāpāt pāpasamācārān nihīnāc ca narādhipa 12,286.007c pāpa eva vadhaḥ prokto narakāyeti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16963: 12,286.008a na kaś cit trāti vai rājan diṣṭāntavaśam āgatam 12,286.008c sāvaśeṣāyuṣaṃ cāpi kaś cid evāpakarṣati 12,286.009a snigdhaiś ca kriyamāṇāni karmāṇīha nivartayet 12,286.009c hiṃsātmakāni karmāṇi nāyur icchet parāyuṣā 12,286.010a gṛhasthānāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ vināśam abhikāṅkṣatām 12,286.010c nidhanaṃ śobhanaṃ tāta pulineṣu kriyāvatām 12,286.011a āyuṣi kṣayam āpanne pañcatvam upagacchati 12,286.011c nākāraṇāt tad bhavati kāraṇair upapāditam 12,286.012a tathā śarīraṃ bhavati dehād yenopapāditam 12,286.012c adhvānaṃ gatakaś cāyaṃ prāptaś cāyaṃ gṛhād gṛham
GE07mbh_12_u:16964: 12,286.013a dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra nānyat kiṃ cana vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16965: 12,286.013c tad dehaṃ dehināṃ yuktaṃ mokṣabhūteṣu vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:16966: 12,286.014a sirāsnāyvasthisaṃghātaṃ bībhatsāmedhyasaṃkulam 12,286.014c bhūtānām indriyāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca samāgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:16968: 12,286.015c guṇair api parikṣīṇaṃ śarīraṃ martyatāṃ gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:16970: 12,286.016c bhūtaiḥ prakṛtim āpannais tato bhūmau nimajjati
GE07mbh_12_u:16971: 12,286.017a bhāvitaṃ karmayogena jāyate tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:16972: 12,286.017c idaṃ śarīraṃ vaideha mriyate yatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:16974: 12,286.018a na jāyate tu nṛpate kaṃ cit kālam ayaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16975: 12,286.018c paribhramati bhūtātmā dyām ivāmbudharo mahān 12,286.019a sa punar jāyate rājan prāpyehāyatanaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:16976: 12,286.019c manasaḥ paramo hy ātmā indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16977: 12,286.020a dvividhānāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jaṅgamāḥ paramā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:16978: 12,286.020c jaṅgamānām api tathā dvipadāḥ paramā matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16979: 12,286.020e dvipadānām api tathā dvijā vai paramāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16980: 12,286.021a dvijānām api rājendra prajñāvantaḥ parā matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16982: 12,286.022a jātam anveti maraṇaṃ nṛṇām iti viniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16983: 12,286.022c antavanti hi karmāṇi sevante guṇataḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16984: 12,286.023a āpanne tūttarāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ sūrye yo nidhanaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:16985: 12,286.023c nakṣatre ca muhūrte ca puṇye rājan sa puṇyakṛt 12,286.024a ayojayitvā kleśena janaṃ plāvya ca duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:16987: 12,286.025a viṣam udbandhanaṃ dāho dasyuhastāt tathā vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:16988: 12,286.025c daṃṣṭribhyaś ca paśubhyaś ca prākṛto vadha ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:16989: 12,286.026a na caibhiḥ puṇyakarmāṇo yujyante nābhisaṃdhijaiḥ 12,286.026c evaṃvidhaiś ca bahubhir aparaiḥ prākṛtair api
GE07mbh_12_u:16990: 12,286.027a ūrdhvaṃ hitvā pratiṣṭhante prāṇāḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:16992: 12,286.028a ekaḥ śatrur na dvitīyo 'sti śatrur; ajñānatulyaḥ puruṣasya rājan
GE07mbh_12_u:16993: 12,286.028c yenāvṛtaḥ kurute saṃprayukto; ghorāṇi karmāṇi sudāruṇāni
GE07mbh_12_u:16994: 12,286.029a prabodhanārthaṃ śrutidharmayuktaṃ; vṛddhān upāsyaṃ ca bhaveta yasya 12,286.029c prayatnasādhyo hi sa rājaputra; prajñāśareṇonmathitaḥ paraiti 12,286.030a adhītya vedāṃs tapasā brahmacārī; yajñāñ śaktyā saṃnisṛjyeha
GE07mbh_12_u:16996: 12,286.030c vanaṃ gacchet puruṣo dharmakāmaḥ; śreyaś citvā sthāpayitvā
GE07mbh_12_u:16998: 12,286.031a upabhogair api tyaktaṃ nātmānam avasādayet 12,286.031c caṇḍālatve 'pi mānuṣyaṃ sarvathā tāta durlabham
GE07mbh_12_u:16999: 12,286.032a iyaṃ hi yoniḥ prathamā yāṃ prāpya jagatīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:17000: 12,286.032c ātmā vai śakyate trātuṃ karmabhiḥ śubhalakṣaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17001: 12,286.033a kathaṃ na vipraṇaśyema yonito 'syā iti prabho 12,286.033c kurvanti dharmaṃ manujāḥ śrutiprāmāṇyadarśanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:17002: 12,286.034a yo durlabhataraṃ prāpya mānuṣyam iha vai naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17003: 12,286.034c dharmāvamantā kāmātmā bhavet sa khalu vañcyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17004: 12,286.035a yas tu prītipurogeṇa cakṣuṣā tāta paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:17005: 12,286.035c dīpopamāni bhūtāni yāvad arcir na naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:17007: 12,286.036c samaduḥkhasukho bhūtvā sa paratra mahīyate 12,286.037a dānaṃ tyāgaḥ śobhanā mūrtir adbhyo; bhūyaḥ plāvyaṃ tapasā vai śarīram 12,286.037c sarasvatīnaimiṣapuṣkareṣu; ye cāpy anye puṇyadeśāḥ pṛthivyām 12,286.038a gṛheṣu yeṣām asavaḥ patanti; teṣām atho nirharaṇaṃ praśastam
GE07mbh_12_u:17008: 12,286.038c yānena vai prāpaṇaṃ ca śmaśāne; śaucena nūnaṃ vidhinā caiva dāhaḥ 12,286.039a iṣṭiḥ puṣṭir yajanaṃ yājanaṃ ca; dānaṃ puṇyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca prayogaḥ 12,286.039c śaktyā pitryaṃ yac ca kiṃ cit praśastaṃ; sarvāṇy ātmārthe mānavo yaḥ karoti
GE07mbh_12_u:17009: 12,286.040a dharmaśāstrāṇi vedāś ca ṣaḍaṅgāni narādhipa 12,286.040c śreyaso 'rthe vidhīyante narasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ 12,286.041 bhīṣma uvāca 12,286.041a evad vai sarvam ākhyātaṃ muninā sumahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:17011: 12,287.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,287.001a punar eva tu papraccha janako mithilādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17013: 12,287.002a kiṃ śreyaḥ kā gatir brahman kiṃ kṛtaṃ na vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:17014: 12,287.002c kva gato na nivarteta tan me brūhi mahāmune 12,287.003 parāśara uvāca 12,287.003a asaṅgaḥ śreyaso mūlaṃ jñānaṃ jñānagatiḥ parā
GE07mbh_12_u:17015: 12,287.003c cīrṇaṃ tapo na praṇaśyed vāpaḥ kṣetre na naśyati 12,287.004a chittvādharmamayaṃ pāśaṃ yadā dharme 'bhirajyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17016: 12,287.004c dattvābhayakṛtaṃ dānaṃ tadā siddhim avāpnuyāt 12,287.005a yo dadāti sahasrāṇi gavām aśvaśatāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:17017: 12,287.005c abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyas tad dānam ativartate 12,287.006a vasan viṣayamadhye 'pi na vasaty eva buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:17018: 12,287.006c saṃvasaty eva durbuddhir asatsu viṣayeṣv api
GE07mbh_12_u:17019: 12,287.007a nādharmaḥ śliṣyate prājñam āpaḥ puṣkaraparṇavat 12,287.007c aprājñam adhikaṃ pāpaṃ śliṣyate jatu kāṣṭhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:17021: 12,287.008c kartā khalu yathākālaṃ tat sarvam abhipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17023: 12,287.009a buddhikarmendriyāṇāṃ hi pramatto yo na budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17024: 12,287.009c śubhāśubheṣu saktātmā prāpnoti sumahad bhayam 12,287.010a vītarāgo jitakrodhaḥ samyag bhavati yaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:17025: 12,287.010c viṣaye vartamāno 'pi na sa pāpena yujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17026: 12,287.011a maryādāyāṃ dharmasetur nibaddho naiva sīdati 12,287.011c puṣṭasrota ivāyattaḥ sphīto bhavati saṃcayaḥ 12,287.012a yathā bhānugataṃ tejo maṇiḥ śuddhaḥ samādhinā
GE07mbh_12_u:17027: 12,287.012c ādatte rājaśārdūla tathā yogaḥ pravartate 12,287.013a yathā tilānām iha puṣpasaṃśrayāt; pṛthak pṛthag yāti guṇo
GE07mbh_12_u:17029: 12,287.013c tathā narāṇāṃ bhuvi bhāvitātmanāṃ; yathāśrayaṃ sattvaguṇaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:17030: 12,287.014a jahāti dārān ihate na saṃpadaḥ; sadaśvayānaṃ vividhāś ca yāḥ kriyāḥ 12,287.014c triviṣṭape jātamatir yadā naras; tadāsya buddhir viṣayeṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:17032: 12,287.015a prasaktabuddhir viṣayeṣu yo naro; yo budhyate hy ātmahitaṃ kadā ca na
GE07mbh_12_u:17033: 12,287.015c sa sarvabhāvānugatena cetasā; nṛpāmiṣeṇeva jhaṣo vikṛṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17036: 12,287.017a na dharmakālaḥ puruṣasya niścito; na cāpi mṛtyuḥ puruṣaṃ pratīkṣate 12,287.017c kriyā hi dharmasya sadaiva śobhanā; yadā naro mṛtyumukhe
GE07mbh_12_u:17038: 12,287.018a yathāndhaḥ svagṛhe yukto hy abhyāsād eva gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:17039: 12,287.018c tathā yuktena manasā prājño gacchati tāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:17040: 12,287.019a maraṇaṃ janmani proktaṃ janma vai maraṇāśritam
GE07mbh_12_u:17041: 12,287.019c avidvān mokṣadharmeṣu baddho bhramati cakravat 12,287.020a yathā mṛṇālo 'nugatam āśu muñcati kardamam
GE07mbh_12_u:17044: 12,287.020f*0743_01 yukto yadā sa bhavati tadā tat paśyate param 12,287.021a parārthe vartamānas tu svakāryaṃ yo 'bhimanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17045: 12,287.021c indriyārtheṣu saktaḥ san svakāryāt parihīyate 12,287.022a adhas tiryaggatiṃ caiva svarge caiva parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:17046: 12,287.022c prāpnoti svakṛtair ātmā prājñasyehetarasya ca 12,287.023a mṛnmaye bhājane pakve yathā vai nyasyate dravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17047: 12,287.023c tathā śarīraṃ tapasā taptaṃ viṣayam aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:17048: 12,287.024a viṣayān aśnute yas tu na sa bhokṣyaty asaṃśayam 12,287.024c yas tu bhogāṃs tyajed ātmā sa vai bhoktuṃ vyavasyati
GE07mbh_12_u:17050: 12,287.025c jātyandha iva panthānam āvṛtātmā na budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17051: 12,287.026a vaṇig yathā samudrād vai yathārthaṃ labhate dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:17052: 12,287.026c tathā martyārṇave jantoḥ karmavijñānato gatiḥ 12,287.027a ahorātramaye loke jarārūpeṇa saṃcaran
GE07mbh_12_u:17053: 12,287.027c mṛtyur grasati bhūtāni pavanaṃ pannago yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:17054: 12,287.028a svayaṃ kṛtāni karmāṇi jāto jantuḥ prapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17055: 12,287.028c nākṛtaṃ labhate kaś cit kiṃ cid atra priyāpriyam 12,287.029a śayānaṃ yāntam āsīnaṃ pravṛttaṃ viṣayeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:17056: 12,287.029c śubhāśubhāni karmāṇi prapadyante naraṃ sadā 12,287.030a na hy anyat tīram āsādya punas tartuṃ vyavasyati 12,287.030c durlabho dṛśyate hy asya vinipāto mahārṇave
GE07mbh_12_u:17057: 12,287.031a yathā bhārāvasaktā hi naur mahāmbhasi tantunā

GE07mbh_12_u:17608: 12,294.012c dravyaṃ hy ahīnamanaso nānyatheti viniścayaḥ 12,294.013a vimuktaḥ sarvasaṅgebhyo laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:17612: 12,294.015a sthāṇuvac cāpy akampaḥ syād girivac cāpi niścalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17613: 12,294.015c budhā vidhividhānajñās tadā yuktaṃ pracakṣate 12,294.016a na śṛṇoti na cāghrāti na rasyati na paśyati 12,294.016c na ca sparśaṃ vijānāti na saṃkalpayate manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17614: 12,294.017a na cābhimanyate kiṃ cin na ca budhyati kāṣṭhavat 12,294.017c tadā prakṛtim āpannaṃ yuktam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17615: 12,294.018a nivāte ca yathā dīpyan dīpas tadvat sa dṛśyate 12,294.018c niriṅgaś cācalaś cordhvaṃ na tiryaggatim āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:17616: 12,294.019a tadā tam anupaśyeta yasmin dṛṣṭe tu kathyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17618: 12,294.020a vidhūma iva saptārcir āditya iva raśmimān
GE07mbh_12_u:17620: 12,294.021a yaṃ paśyanti mahātmāno dhṛtimanto manīṣiṇaḥ 12,294.021c brāhmaṇā brahmayoniṣṭhā hy ayonim amṛtātmakam 12,294.022a tad evāhur aṇubhyo 'ṇu tan mahadbhyo mahattaram
GE07mbh_12_u:17621: 12,294.022c tadantaḥ sarvabhūteṣu dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17623: 12,294.023c mahatas tamasas tāta pāre tiṣṭhann atāmasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17624: 12,294.024a sa tamonuda ity uktas tattvajñair vedapāragaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17626: 12,294.025a yogam etad dhi yogānāṃ manye yogasya lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:17627: 12,294.025c evaṃ paśyaṃ prapaśyanti ātmānam ajaraṃ param
GE07mbh_12_u:17628: 12,294.026a yogadarśanam etāvad uktaṃ te tattvato mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:17630: 12,294.027a avyaktam āhuḥ prakṛtiṃ parāṃ prakṛtivādinaḥ 12,294.027c tasmān mahat samutpannaṃ dvitīyaṃ rājasattama 12,294.028a ahaṃkāras tu mahatas tṛtīyam iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:17631: 12,294.028c pañca bhūtāny ahaṃkārād āhuḥ sāṃkhyānudarśinaḥ 12,294.029a etāḥ prakṛtayas tv aṣṭau vikārāś cāpi ṣoḍaśa
GE07mbh_12_u:17632: 12,294.029c pañca caiva viśeṣā vai tathā pañcendriyāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:17633: 12,294.030a etāvad eva tattvānāṃ sāṃkhyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17634: 12,294.030c sāṃkhye vidhividhānajñā nityaṃ sāṃkhyapathe ratāḥ 12,294.031a yasmād yad abhijāyeta tat tatraiva pralīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17637: 12,294.032c guṇā guṇeṣu satataṃ sāgarasyormayo yathā 12,294.033a sargapralaya etāvān prakṛter
GE07mbh_12_u:17638: 12,294.033c ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca yadāsṛjat
GE07mbh_12_u:17639: 12,294.033e evam eva ca rājendra vijñeyaṃ jñeyacintakaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17640: 12,294.034a adhiṣṭhātāram avyaktam asyāpy etan nidarśanam 12,294.034c ekatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ ca prakṛter anu tattvavān
GE07mbh_12_u:17641: 12,294.034e ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca pravartanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:17643: 12,294.035c tac ca kṣetraṃ mahān ātmā pañcaviṃśo 'dhitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:17645: 12,294.036c adhiṣṭhānād adhiṣṭhātā kṣetrāṇām iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:17646: 12,294.037a kṣetraṃ jānāti cāvyaktaṃ kṣetrajña iti cocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17647: 12,294.037c avyaktike pure śete puruṣaś ceti kathyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17648: 12,294.038a anyad eva ca kṣetraṃ syād anyaḥ kṣetrajña ucyate 12,294.038c kṣetram avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñātā vai pañcaviṃśakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17649: 12,294.039a anyad eva ca jñānaṃ syād anyaj jñeyaṃ tad ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17650: 12,294.039c jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyo vai pañcaviṃśakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17651: 12,294.040a avyaktaṃ kṣetram ity uktaṃ tathā sattvaṃ tatheśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:17652: 12,294.040c anīśvaram atattvaṃ ca tattvaṃ tat pañcaviṃśakam
GE07mbh_12_u:17654: 12,294.041c sāṃkhyaṃ prakurute caiva prakṛtiṃ ca pracakṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:17655: 12,294.042a tattvāni ca caturviṃśat parisaṃkhyāya tattvataḥ 12,294.042c sāṃkhyāḥ saha prakṛtyā tu nistattvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17657: 12,294.043c yadā tu budhyate ''tmānaṃ tadā bhavati kevalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17658: 12,294.044a samyag darśanam etāvad bhāṣitaṃ tava tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17659: 12,294.044c evam etad vijānantaḥ sāmyatāṃ pratiyānty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:17660: 12,294.045a samyaṅ nidarśanaṃ nāma pratyakṣaṃ prakṛtes tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:17661: 12,294.045c guṇatattvāny athaitāni nirguṇo 'nyas tathā bhavet 12,294.046a na tv evaṃ vartamānānām āvṛttir vidyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17662: 12,294.046c vidyate 'kṣarabhāvatvād aparasparam avyayam 12,294.047a paśyerann ekamatayo na samyak teṣu darśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:17664: 12,294.048a sarvam etad vijānanto na sarvasya prabodhanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:17666: 12,294.049a sarvam avyaktam ity uktam asarvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17667: 12,294.049c ya enam abhijānanti na bhayaṃ teṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17668: 12,295.001 vasiṣṭha uvāca 12,295.001a sāṃkhyadarśanam etāvad uktaṃ te nṛpasattama 12,295.001c vidyāvidye tv idānīṃ me tvaṃ nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17669: 12,295.002a avidyām āhur avyaktaṃ sargapralayadharmi vai 12,295.002c sargapralayanirmuktaṃ vidyāṃ vai pañcaviṃśakam
GE07mbh_12_u:17670: 12,295.003a parasparam avidyāṃ vai tan nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ 12,295.003c yathoktam ṛṣibhis tāta sāṃkhyasyāsya nidarśanam 12,295.004a karmendriyāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ vidyā buddhīndriyaṃ smṛtam 12,295.004c buddhīndriyāṇāṃ ca tathā viśeṣā iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:17671: 12,295.005a viśeṣāṇāṃ manas teṣāṃ vidyām āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17672: 12,295.005c manasaḥ pañcabhūtāni vidyā ity abhicakṣate 12,295.006a ahaṃkāras tu bhūtānāṃ pañcānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17673: 12,295.006c ahaṃkārasya ca tathā buddhir vidyā nareśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:17674: 12,295.007a buddheḥ prakṛtir avyaktaṃ tattvānāṃ parameśvaram 12,295.007c vidyā jñeyā naraśreṣṭha vidhiś ca paramaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17675: 12,295.008a avyaktasya paraṃ prāhur vidyāṃ vai pañcaviṃśakam
GE07mbh_12_u:17676: 12,295.008c sarvasya sarvam ity uktaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānasya pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:17677: 12,295.009a jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyaṃ vai pañcaviṃśakam
GE07mbh_12_u:17678: 12,295.009c tathaiva jñānam avyaktaṃ vijñātā pañcaviṃśakaḥ 12,295.010a vidyāvidyārthatattvena mayoktaṃ te viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17679: 12,295.010c akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva yad uktaṃ tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:17680: 12,295.011a ubhāv etau kṣarāv uktāv ubhāv etau ca nakṣarau 12,295.011c kāraṇaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathā khyātau tu tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17681: 12,295.012a anādinidhanāv etāv ubhāv eveśvarau matau 12,295.012c tattvasaṃjñāv ubhāv etau procyete jñānacintakaiḥ 12,295.013a sargapralayadharmitvād avyaktaṃ prāhur akṣaram
GE07mbh_12_u:17682: 12,295.013c tad etad guṇasargāya vikurvāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17684: 12,295.014c adhiṣṭhānāt kṣetram āhur etat tat pañcaviṃśakam
GE07mbh_12_u:17685: 12,295.015a yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tad avyaktātmani saṃkṣipet
GE07mbh_12_u:17686: 12,295.015c tadā saha guṇais tais tu pañcaviṃśo vilīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17687: 12,295.016a guṇā guṇeṣu līyante tadaikā prakṛtir bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:17690: 12,295.017c nirguṇatvaṃ ca vaideha guṇeṣu prativartanāt 12,295.018a evam eva ca kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrajñānaparikṣaye 12,295.018c prakṛtyā nirguṇas tv eṣa ity evam anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:17691: 12,295.019a kṣaro bhavaty eṣa yadā tadā guṇavatīm atha
GE07mbh_12_u:17692: 12,295.019c prakṛtiṃ tv abhijānāti nirguṇatvaṃ tathātmanaḥ 12,295.020a tadā viśuddho bhavati prakṛteḥ parivarjanāt 12,295.020c anyo 'ham anyeyam iti yadā budhyati buddhimān 12,295.021a tadaiṣo 'nyatvatām eti na ca miśratvam āvrajet 12,295.021c prakṛtyā caiva rājendra namiśro 'nyaś ca dṛśyate 12,295.022a yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tat prākṛtaṃ vijugupsate
GE07mbh_12_u:17693: 12,295.022c paśyate cāparaṃ paśyaṃ tadā paśyan na saṃjvaret
GE07mbh_12_u:17694: 12,295.023a kiṃ mayā kṛtam etāvad yo 'haṃ kālam imaṃ janam
GE07mbh_12_u:17695: 12,295.023c matsyo jālaṃ hy avijñānād anuvartitavāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:17696: 12,295.024a aham eva hi saṃmohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam 12,295.024c matsyo yathodakajñānād anuvartitavān iha
GE07mbh_12_u:17698: 12,295.025c ātmānaṃ tadvad ajñānād anyatvaṃ caiva vedmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:17699: 12,295.026a mamāstu dhig abuddhasya yo 'haṃ magnam imaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17700: 12,295.026c anuvartitavān mohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam
GE07mbh_12_u:17701: 12,295.027a ayam atra bhaved bandhur anena saha mokṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:17702: 12,295.027c sāmyam ekatvam āyāto yādṛśas tādṛśas tv aham
GE07mbh_12_u:17703: 12,295.028a tulyatām iha paśyāmi sadṛśo 'ham anena vai 12,295.028c ayaṃ hi vimalo vyaktam aham īdṛśakas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:17705: 12,295.029c sasaṅgayāhaṃ niḥsaṅgaḥ sthitaḥ kālam imaṃ tv aham
GE07mbh_12_u:17706: 12,295.030a anayāhaṃ vaśībhūtaḥ kālam etaṃ na buddhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:17707: 12,295.030c uccamadhyamanīcānāṃ tām ahaṃ katham āvase 12,295.031a samānayānayā ceha sahavāsam ahaṃ katham 12,295.031c gacchāmy abuddhabhāvatvād eṣedānīṃ sthiro bhave 12,295.032a sahavāsaṃ na yāsyāmi kālam etad dhi vañcanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:17708: 12,295.032c vañcito 'smy anayā yad dhi nirvikāro vikārayā 12,295.033a na cāyam aparādho 'syā aparādho hy ayaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:17711: 12,295.034c amūrtaś cāpi mūrtātmā mamatvena pradharṣitaḥ 12,295.035a prakṛter anayatvena tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:17712: 12,295.035c nirmamasya mamatvena kiṃ kṛtaṃ tāsu tāsu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:17715: 12,295.036c ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā yeyaṃ bhūyo yunakti mām
GE07mbh_12_u:17716: 12,295.036e idānīm eṣa buddho 'smi nirmamo nirahaṃkṛtaḥ 12,295.037a mamatvam anayā nityam
GE07mbh_12_u:17717: 12,295.037c apetyāham imāṃ hitvā saṃśrayiṣye nirāmayam 12,295.038a anena sāmyaṃ yāsyāmi nānayāham acetasā 12,295.038c kṣamaṃ mama sahānena naikatvam anayā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:17719: 12,295.039a akṣaratvaṃ niyaccheta tyaktvā kṣaram anāmayam 12,295.039c avyaktaṃ vyaktadharmāṇaṃ saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ tathā 12,295.039e nirguṇaṃ prathamaṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛg bhavati maithila
GE07mbh_12_u:17720: 12,295.040a akṣarakṣarayor etad uktaṃ tava nidarśanam 12,295.040c mayeha jñānasaṃpannaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:17721: 12,295.041a niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ ca vibuddhaṃ vimalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:17722: 12,295.041c pravakṣyāmi tu te bhūyas tan nibodha yathāśrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:17724: 12,295.042c yad eva śāstraṃ sāṃkhyoktaṃ yogadarśanam eva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:17726: 12,295.043c vispaṣṭaṃ procyate tatra śiṣyāṇāṃ hitakāmyayā 12,295.044a bṛhac caiva hi tac chāstram ity āhuḥ kuśalā janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17727: 12,295.044c asmiṃś ca śāstre yogānāṃ punar dadhi punaḥ śaraḥ 12,295.045a pañcaviṃśāt paraṃ tattvaṃ na paśyati narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:17728: 12,295.045c sāṃkhyānāṃ tu paraṃ tatra yathāvad anuvarṇitam
GE07mbh_12_u:17729: 12,295.046a buddham apratibuddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17730: 12,295.046c budhyamānaṃ ca buddhaṃ ca prāhur yoganidarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:17731: 12,296.001 vasiṣṭha uvāca 12,296.001a aprabuddham athāvyaktam imaṃ guṇavidhiṃ śṛṇu 12,296.001c guṇān dhārayate hy eṣā sṛjaty ākṣipate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:17732: 12,296.002a ajasraṃ tv iha krīḍārthaṃ vikurvantī narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:17733: 12,296.002c ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā tāny eva ca vicakṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:17734: 12,296.003a etad evaṃ vikurvāṇāṃ budhyamāno na budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17735: 12,296.003c avyaktabodhanāc caiva budhyamānaṃ vadanty api 12,296.004a na tv eva budhyate 'vyaktaṃ saguṇaṃ vātha nirguṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:17736: 12,296.004c kadā cit tv eva khalv etad āhur apratibuddhakam 12,296.005a budhyate yadi vāvyaktam etad vai pañcaviṃśakam
GE07mbh_12_u:17737: 12,296.005c budhyamāno bhavaty eṣa saṅgātmaka iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17739: 12,296.006c avyaktabodhanāc caiva budhyamānaṃ vadanty uta 12,296.007a pañcaviṃśaṃ mahātmānaṃ na cāsāv api budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17740: 12,296.007c ṣaḍviṃśaṃ vimalaṃ buddham aprameyaṃ sanātanam 12,296.008a satataṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ ca caturviṃśaṃ ca budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17741: 12,296.008c dṛśyādṛśye hy anugatam ubhāv eva mahādyutī
GE07mbh_12_u:17742: 12,296.009a avyaktaṃ na tu tad brahma budhyate tāta kevalam 12,296.009c kevalaṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ ca caturviṃśaṃ na paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:17743: 12,296.010a budhyamāno yadātmānam anyo 'ham iti manyate 12,296.010c tadā prakṛtimān eṣa bhavaty avyaktalocanaḥ 12,296.011a budhyate ca parāṃ buddhiṃ viśuddhām amalāṃ yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:17744: 12,296.011c ṣaḍviṃśo rājaśārdūla tadā buddhatvam āvrajet 12,296.012a tatas tyajati so 'vyaktaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:17745: 12,296.012c nirguṇaḥ prakṛtiṃ veda guṇayuktām acetanām 12,296.013a tataḥ kevaladharmāsau bhavaty avyaktadarśanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:17747: 12,296.014a etat tat tattvam ity āhur nistattvam ajarāmaram
GE07mbh_12_u:17748: 12,296.014c tattvasaṃśrayaṇād etat tattvavan na ca mānada
GE07mbh_12_u:17750: 12,296.015a na caiṣa tattvavāṃs tāta nistattvas tv eṣa buddhimān 12,296.015c eṣa muñcati tattvaṃ hi kṣipraṃ buddhasya lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:17752: 12,296.016c kevalena balenaiva samatāṃ yāty asaṃśayam 12,296.017a ṣaḍviṃśena prabuddhena budhyamāno 'py abuddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:17753: 12,296.017c etan nānātvam ity uktaṃ sāṃkhyaśrutinidarśanāt 12,296.018a cetanena sametasya pañcaviṃśatikasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:17754: 12,296.018c ekatvaṃ vai bhavaty asya yadā buddhyā na budhyate 12,296.019a budhyamāno 'prabuddhena samatāṃ yāti maithila
GE07mbh_12_u:17755: 12,296.019c saṅgadharmā bhavaty eṣa niḥsaṅgātmā narādhipa 12,296.020a niḥsaṅgātmānam āsādya ṣaḍviṃśakam ajaṃ viduḥ 12,296.020c vibhus tyajati cāvyaktaṃ yadā tv etad vibudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17756: 12,296.020e caturviṃśam agādhaṃ ca ṣaḍviṃśasya prabodhanāt 12,296.021a eṣa hy apratibuddhaś ca budhyamānaś ca te 'nagha
GE07mbh_12_u:17757: 12,296.021c prokto buddhaś ca tattvena yathāśrutinidarśanāt 12,296.021e nānātvaikatvam etāvad draṣṭavyaṃ śāstradṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:17758: 12,296.022a maśakodumbare yadvad anyatvaṃ tadvad etayoḥ 12,296.022c matsyo 'mbhasi yathā tadvad anyatvam upalabhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:17760: 12,296.023c etad vimokṣa ity uktam avyaktajñānasaṃhitam 12,296.024a pañcaviṃśatikasyāsya yo 'yaṃ deheṣu vartate 12,296.024c eṣa mokṣayitavyeti prāhur avyaktagocarāt
GE07mbh_12_u:17762: 12,296.025c pareṇa paradharmā ca bhavaty eṣa sametya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:17763: 12,296.026a viśuddhadharmā śuddhena buddhena ca sa buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:17765: 12,296.027a niyogadharmiṇā caiva niyogātmā bhavaty api 12,296.027c vimokṣiṇā vimokṣaś ca sametyeha tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:17766: 12,296.028a śucikarmā śuciś caiva bhavaty amitadīptimān 12,296.028c vimalātmā ca bhavati sametya vimalātmanā 12,296.029a kevalātmā tathā caiva kevalena sametya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:17767: 12,296.029c svatantraś ca svatantreṇa svatantratvam avāpnute 12,296.030a etāvad etat kathitaṃ mayā te; tathyaṃ mahārāja yathārthatattvam

GE07mbh_12_u:20448: 12,314.004c kiṃnarāṇāṃ samūhaiś ca bhṛṅgarājais tathaiva ca

GE07mbh_12_u:20452: 12,314.006e yatra nityaṃ samāyānti lokasya hitakāmyayā 12,314.007a viṣṇunā yatra putrārthe tapas taptaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:20453: 12,314.007c yatraiva ca kumāreṇa bālye kṣiptā divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20454: 12,314.008a śaktir nyastā kṣititale trailokyam avamanya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:20455: 12,314.008c yatrovāca jagatskandaḥ kṣipan vākyam idaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:20457: 12,314.009c yo brahmaṇyo dvitīyo 'sti triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān

GE07mbh_12_u:20459: 12,314.010c tac chrutvā vyathitā lokāḥ ka imām uddhared iti 12,314.011a atha devagaṇaṃ sarvaṃ saṃbhrāntendriyamānasam
GE07mbh_12_u:20460: 12,314.011c apaśyad bhagavān viṣṇuḥ kṣiptaṃ sāsurarākṣasam 12,314.011e kiṃ nv atra sukṛtaṃ kāryaṃ bhaved iti vicintayan 12,314.012a sa nāmṛṣyata taṃ kṣepam avaikṣata ca pāvakim
GE07mbh_12_u:20461: 12,314.012c sa prahasya viśuddhātmā śaktiṃ prajvalitāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:20462: 12,314.012e kampayām āsa savyena pāṇinā puruṣottamaḥ 12,314.013a śaktyāṃ tu kampamānāyāṃ viṣṇunā balinā tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:20464: 12,314.014a śaktenāpi samuddhartuṃ kampitā sā na tūddhṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:20466: 12,314.015a tāṃ kampayitvā bhagavān prahrādam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:20467: 12,314.015c paśya vīryaṃ kumārasya naitad anyaḥ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:20469: 12,314.016c jagrāha tāṃ tasya śaktiṃ na cainām apy akampayat 12,314.017a nādaṃ mahāntaṃ muktvā sa mūrchito girimūrdhani
GE07mbh_12_u:20470: 12,314.017c vihvalaḥ prāpatad bhūmau hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sutaḥ 12,314.018a yatrottarāṃ diśaṃ gatvā śailarājasya pārśvataḥ 12,314.018c tapo 'tapyata durdharṣas tāta nityaṃ vṛṣadhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20471: 12,314.019a pāvakena parikṣipto dīpyatā tasya cāśramaḥ 12,314.019c ādityabandhanaṃ nāma durdharṣam akṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20472: 12,314.020a na tatra śakyate gantuṃ yakṣarākṣasadānavaiḥ 12,314.020c daśayojanavistāram agnijvālāsamāvṛtam 12,314.021a bhagavān pāvakas tatra svayaṃ tiṣṭhati vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:20474: 12,314.022a divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ hi pādenaikena tiṣṭhataḥ 12,314.022c devān saṃtāpayaṃs tatra mahādevo dhṛtavrataḥ 12,314.023a aindrīṃ tu diśam āsthāya śailarājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20476: 12,314.023e vedān adhyāpayām āsa vyāsaḥ śiṣyān mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20477: 12,314.024a sumantuṃ ca mahābhāgaṃ vaiśaṃpāyanam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:20478: 12,314.024c jaiminiṃ ca mahāprājñaṃ pailaṃ cāpi tapasvinam
GE07mbh_12_u:20479: 12,314.025a ebhiḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto vyāsa āste mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20480: 12,314.025c tatrāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ dadarśa pitur uttamam 12,314.025e āraṇeyo viśuddhātmā nabhasīva divākaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20481: 12,314.026a atha vyāsaḥ parikṣiptaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_12_u:20483: 12,314.027a asajjamānaṃ vṛkṣeṣu śaileṣu viṣameṣu ca 12,314.027c yogayuktaṃ mahātmānaṃ yathā bāṇaṃ guṇacyutam 12,314.028a so 'bhigamya pituḥ pādāv agṛhṇād araṇīsutaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:20486: 12,314.030a evam adhyāpayañ śiṣyān vyāsaḥ putraṃ ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:20488: 12,314.031a tataḥ kadā cic chiṣyās taṃ parivāryāvatasthire
GE07mbh_12_u:20490: 12,314.032a vedeṣu niṣṭhāṃ saṃprāpya sāṅgeṣv atitapasvinaḥ 12,314.032c athocus te tadā vyāsaṃ śiṣyāḥ prāñjalayo gurum
GE07mbh_12_u:20491: 12,314.033a mahatā śreyasā yuktā yaśasā ca sma vardhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20492: 12,314.033c ekaṃ tv idānīm icchāmo guruṇānugrahaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:20493: 12,314.034a iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā brahmarṣis tān uvāca ha 12,314.034c ucyatām iti tad vatsā yad vaḥ kāryaṃ priyaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:20494: 12,314.035a etad vākyaṃ guroḥ śrutvā śiṣyās te hṛṣṭamānasāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20495: 12,314.035c punaḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā praṇamya śirasā gurum
GE07mbh_12_u:20496: 12,314.036a ūcus te sahitā rājann idaṃ vacanam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:20497: 12,314.036c yadi prīta upādhyāyo dhanyāḥ smo munisattama
GE07mbh_12_u:20498: 12,314.037a kāṅkṣāmas tu vayaṃ sarve varaṃ dattaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:20499: 12,314.037c ṣaṣṭhaḥ śiṣyo na te khyātiṃ gacched atra prasīda naḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20500: 12,314.038a catvāras te vayaṃ śiṣyā guruputraś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20501: 12,314.038c iha vedāḥ pratiṣṭherann eṣa naḥ kāṅkṣito varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20502: 12,314.039a śiṣyāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā vyāso vedārthatattvavit 12,314.039c parāśarātmajo dhīmān
GE07mbh_12_u:20503: 12,314.039e uvāca śiṣyān dharmātmā dharmyaṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20504: 12,314.040a brāhmaṇāya sadā deyaṃ brahma śuśrūṣave bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:20505: 12,314.040c brahmaloke nivāsaṃ yo dhruvaṃ samabhikāṅkṣati 12,314.041a bhavanto bahulāḥ santu vedo vistāryatām ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:20507: 12,314.042a ete śiṣyaguṇāḥ sarve vijñātavyā yathārthataḥ 12,314.042c nāparīkṣitacāritre vidyā deyā kathaṃ cana 12,314.043a yathā hi kanakaṃ śuddhaṃ tāpacchedanigharṣaṇaiḥ 12,314.043c parīkṣeta tathā śiṣyān īkṣet kulaguṇādibhiḥ 12,314.044a na niyojyāś ca vaḥ śiṣyā aniyoge mahābhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:20508: 12,314.044c yathāmati yathāpāṭhaṃ tathā vidyā phaliṣyati 12,314.045a sarvas taratu durgāṇi sarvo bhadrāṇi paśyatu
GE07mbh_12_u:20509: 12,314.045c śrāvayec caturo varṇān kṛtvā brāhmaṇam agrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20510: 12,314.046a vedasyādhyayanaṃ hīdaṃ tac ca kāryaṃ mahat smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:20511: 12,314.046c stutyartham iha devānāṃ vedāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_12_u:20512: 12,314.047a yo nirvadeta saṃmohād brāhmaṇaṃ vedapāragam 12,314.047c so 'padhyānād brāhmaṇasya parābhūyād asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:20513: 12,314.048a yaś cādharmeṇa vibrūyād yaś cādharmeṇa pṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:20514: 12,314.048c tayor anyataraḥ praiti vidveṣaṃ vādhigacchati 12,314.049a etad vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ svādhyāyasya vidhiṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:20515: 12,314.049c upakuryāc ca śiṣyāṇām etac ca hṛdi vo bhavet 12,315.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,315.001a etac chrutvā guror vākyaṃ vyāsaśiṣyā mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20517: 12,315.002a uktāḥ smo yad bhagavatā tadātvāyatisaṃhitam 12,315.002c tan no manasi saṃrūḍhaṃ kariṣyāmas tathā ca tat 12,315.003a anyonyaṃ ca sabhājyaivaṃ suprītamanasaḥ punaḥ 12,315.003c vijñāpayanti sma guruṃ punar vākyaviśāradāḥ 12,315.004a śailād asmān mahīṃ gantuṃ kāṅkṣitaṃ no mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:20518: 12,315.004c vedān anekadhā kartuṃ yadi te rucitaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:20519: 12,315.005a śiṣyāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā parāśarasutaḥ prabhuḥ 12,315.005c pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam 12,315.006a kṣitiṃ vā devalokaṃ vā gamyatāṃ yadi rocate
GE07mbh_12_u:20520: 12,315.006c apramādaś ca vaḥ kāryo brahma hi pracuracchalam

GE07mbh_12_u:20524: 12,315.009a pūjyamānā dvijair nityaṃ modamānā gṛhe ratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20527: 12,315.010c tūṣṇīṃ dhyānaparo dhīmān ekānte samupāviśat 12,315.011a taṃ dadarśāśramapade nāradaḥ sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20528: 12,315.011c athainam abravīt kāle madhurākṣarayā girā 12,315.012a bho bho maharṣe vāsiṣṭha brahmaghoṣo na vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:20529: 12,315.012c eko dhyānaparas tūṣṇīṃ kim āsse cintayann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:20530: 12,315.013a brahmaghoṣair virahitaḥ parvato 'yaṃ na śobhate 12,315.013c rajasā tamasā caiva somaḥ sopaplavo yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:20531: 12,315.014a na bhrājate yathāpūrvaṃ niṣādānām ivālayaḥ 12,315.014c devarṣigaṇajuṣṭo 'pi
GE07mbh_12_u:20532: 12,315.015a ṛṣayaś ca hi devāś ca gandharvāś ca mahaujasaḥ 12,315.015c vimuktā brahmaghoṣeṇa na bhrājante yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:20534: 12,315.016c maharṣe yat tvayā proktaṃ vedavādavicakṣaṇa 12,315.017a etan manonukūlaṃ me bhavān arhati bhāṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:20535: 12,315.017c sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca sarvatra ca kutūhalī
GE07mbh_12_u:20536: 12,315.018a triṣu lokeṣu yad vṛttaṃ sarvaṃ tava mate sthitam 12,315.018c tad ājñāpaya viprarṣe brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_12_u:20537: 12,315.019a yan mayā samanuṣṭheyaṃ brahmarṣe tad udāhara

GE07mbh_12_u:20539: 12,315.020 nārada uvāca 12,315.020a anāmnāyamalā vedā brāhmaṇasyāvrataṃ malam
GE07mbh_12_u:20540: 12,315.020c malaṃ pṛthivyā vāhīkāḥ strīṇāṃ kautūhalaṃ malam
GE07mbh_12_u:20541: 12,315.021a adhīyatāṃ bhavān vedān sārdhaṃ putreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_12_u:20543: 12,315.022 bhīṣma uvāca 12,315.022a nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā vyāsaḥ paramadharmavit 12,315.022c tathety uvāca saṃhṛṣṭo vedābhyāse dṛḍhavrataḥ 12,315.022d@030_0001 uvāca ca mahāprājñaṃ nāradaṃ punar eva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:20544: 12,315.022d@030_0002 malaṃ pṛthivyā bāhlīkā ity uktam adhunā tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:20545: 12,315.022d@030_0003 nārada uvāca 12,315.022d@030_0003 kīdṛśāś caiva bāhlīkā brūhi me vadatāṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:20546: 12,315.022d@030_0004 asyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ catvāro deśāḥ pāpajanair vṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20547: 12,315.022d@030_0005 yugaṃdharas tu prathamas tathā bhūtilakaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20548: 12,315.022d@030_0006 acyutacchala ity uktas tṛtīyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ 12,315.022d@030_0007 caturthas tu mahāpāpo bāhlīka iti saṃjñitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20550: 12,315.022d@030_0009 ekavarṇās tu dṛśyante janā vai hy acyutasthale
GE07mbh_12_u:20551: 12,315.022d@030_0010 mehanti ca malaṃ pāpā visṛjanti jaleṣu vai
GE07mbh_12_u:20552: 12,315.022d@030_0011 nityaṃ bhūtilake 'tyannaṃ taj jalaṃ ca pibanti ca 12,315.022d@030_0012 haribāhyās tu vāhīkā na smaranti hariṃ kva cit 12,315.022d@030_0013 aihalaukikamokṣaṃ te māṃsaśoṇitavardhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20553: 12,315.022d@030_0014 vṛthā jātā bhaviṣyanti bāhlīkā iti viśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:20555: 12,315.022d@030_0016 musuṇṭhīṃ parigṛhyogrāṃ tac chṛṇuṣva mahāmune 12,315.022d@030_0017 brāhmaṇīṃ bahuputrāṃ tāṃ puṣkare snātum āgatām
GE07mbh_12_u:20556: 12,315.022d@030_0018 yugaṃdhare payaḥ pītvā hy ucitā hy acyutasthale
GE07mbh_12_u:20557: 12,315.022d@030_0019 tathā bhūtilake snātvā bāhlīkāṃś ca nirīkṣya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:20558: 12,315.022d@030_0020 āgatāsi tathā snātuṃ kathaṃ svargaṃ na gacchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:20559: 12,315.022d@030_0021 ity uktvā brāhmaṇībhāṇḍaṃ pothayitvā musuṇṭhinā 12,315.022d@030_0022 uvāca krodhatāmrākṣī piśācī tīrthapālikā
GE07mbh_12_u:20560: 12,315.022d@030_0023 etat tu te divā vṛttaṃ rātrau vṛttam athānyathā 12,315.022d@030_0024 gaccha bāhlīkasaṃsargād aśucitvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ 12,315.022d@030_0025 yad dviṣanti mahātmānaṃ na smaranti janārdanam
GE07mbh_12_u:20561: 12,315.022d@030_0026 na teṣāṃ puṇyatīrtheṣu gatiḥ saṃsargiṇām api
GE07mbh_12_u:20562: 12,315.022d@030_0027 udyuktā brāhmaṇī bhītā pratiyātā sutaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:20564: 12,315.022d@030_0029 anantasya hareḥ śuddhaṃ nāma vai dvādaśākṣaram
GE07mbh_12_u:20565: 12,315.022d@030_0030 vatsaratritaye pūrṇe brāhmaṇī punar āgatā 12,315.022d@030_0031 saputrā puṣkaradvāraṃ piśācy āha tathāgatam 12,315.022d@030_0032 namas te brāhmaṇi śubhe pūtāhaṃ tava darśanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:20566: 12,315.022d@030_0033 kuru tīrthābhiṣekaṃ ca saputrā pāpavarjitā 12,315.022d@030_0034 harer nāmnā ca māṃ sādhvī jalena spraṣṭum arhasi 12,315.022d@030_0035 ity uktā brāhmaṇī hṛṣṭā putraiḥ saha śubhavratā
GE07mbh_12_u:20568: 12,315.022d@030_0037 tatkṣaṇād abhavac chuddhā piśācī divyarūpiṇī 12,315.022d@030_0038 apsarā hy abhavad divyā gatā svarlokam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:20570: 12,315.022d@030_0040 saputrā cāgatā sthānam acyutasya paraṃ śubham
GE07mbh_12_u:20571: 12,315.022d@030_0041 etat te kathitaṃ vidvan mune kālo 'yam āgataḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:22576: 12,337.011a sumantur jaiminiś caiva pailaś ca sudṛḍhavrataḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:22585: 12,337.017a prāpte prajāvisarge vai saptame padmasaṃbhave 12,337.017c nārāyaṇo mahāyogī
GE07mbh_12_u:22586: 12,337.018a sasṛje nābhitaḥ putraṃ brahmāṇam amitaprabham 12,337.018c tataḥ sa prādurabhavad athainaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:22587: 12,337.019a mama tvaṃ nābhito jātaḥ prajāsargakaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22588: 12,337.019c sṛja prajās tvaṃ vividhā brahman sajaḍapaṇḍitāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:22593: 12,337.022c cintayām āsa deveśo buddhiṃ buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22594: 12,337.023a svarūpiṇī tato buddhir upatasthe hariṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:22595: 12,337.023c yogena caināṃ niryogaḥ svayaṃ niyuyuje tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:22596: 12,337.024a sa tām aiśvaryayogasthāṃ buddhiṃ śaktimatīṃ satīm
GE07mbh_12_u:22597: 12,337.024c uvāca vacanaṃ devo buddhiṃ vai prabhur avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22599: 12,337.025c tatas tam īśvarādiṣṭā buddhiḥ kṣipraṃ viveśa sā
GE07mbh_12_u:22600: 12,337.026a athainaṃ buddhisaṃyuktaṃ punaḥ sa dadṛśe hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22601: 12,337.026c bhūyaś cainaṃ vacaḥ prāha sṛjemā vividhāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22602: 12,337.026d*0902_01 bāḍham ity eva kṛtvā sa yathājñāṃ śirasā hareḥ 12,337.026d*0903_01 tathākaroc ca dharmātmā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ 12,337.027a evam uktvā sa bhagavāṃs tatraivāntaradhīyata 12,337.027c prāpa caiva muhūrtena svasthānaṃ devasaṃjñitam 12,337.028a tāṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ prāpya ekībhāvagato 'bhavat

GE07mbh_12_u:22606: 12,337.029e jātā hīyaṃ vasumatī bhārākrāntā tapasvinī 12,337.030a bahavo balinaḥ pṛthvyāṃ

GE07mbh_12_u:22629: 12,337.045a dharmāṇāṃ vividhānāṃ ca kartā jñānakaras tathā

GE07mbh_12_u:22658: 12,337.063a pañcarātrasya kṛtsnasya vettā tu bhagavān svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:22659: 12,337.063c sarveṣu ca nṛpaśreṣṭha jñāneṣv eteṣu dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:22660: 12,337.064a yathāgamaṃ yathājñānaṃ niṣṭhā nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ 12,337.064c na cainam evaṃ jānanti tamobhūtā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:22661: 12,337.065a tam eva śāstrakartāraṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ 12,337.065c niṣṭhāṃ nārāyaṇam ṛṣiṃ nānyo 'stīti ca vādinaḥ 12,337.066a niḥsaṃśayeṣu sarveṣu nityaṃ vasati vai hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22663: 12,337.067a pañcarātravido ye tu yathākramaparā nṛpa 12,337.067c ekāntabhāvopagatās te hariṃ praviśanti vai 12,337.068a sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca sanātane dve; vedāś ca sarve nikhilena rājan 12,337.068c sarvaiḥ samastair ṛṣibhir nirukto; nārāyaṇo viśvam idaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:22665: 12,337.069a śubhāśubhaṃ karma samīritaṃ yat; pravartate sarvalokeṣu kiṃ

GE07mbh_12_u:22669: 12,338.002 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 12,338.002a bahavaḥ puruṣā loke sāṃkhyayogavicāriṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:22670: 12,338.002c naitad icchanti puruṣam ekaṃ kurukulodvaha 12,338.003a bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ ca yathaikā yonir ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:22671: 12,338.003c tathā taṃ puruṣaṃ viśvaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi guṇādhikam
GE07mbh_12_u:22674: 12,338.005a idaṃ puruṣasūktaṃ hi sarvavedeṣu pārthiva 12,338.005c ṛtaṃ satyaṃ ca vikhyātam ṛṣisiṃhena cintitam
GE07mbh_12_u:22676: 12,338.006c adhyātmacintām āśritya śāstrāṇy uktāni bhārata 12,338.007a samāsatas tu yad vyāsaḥ puruṣaikatvam uktavān
GE07mbh_12_u:22679: 12,338.008c brahmaṇā saha saṃvādaṃ tryambakasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:22681: 12,338.009c vaijayanta iti khyātaḥ parvatapravaro nṛpa 12,338.010a tatrādhyātmagatiṃ deva ekākī pravicintayan
GE07mbh_12_u:22683: 12,338.011a atha tatrāsatas tasya caturvaktrasya dhīmataḥ 12,338.011c lalāṭaprabhavaḥ putraḥ śiva āgād yadṛcchayā 12,338.011e ākāśenaiva yogīśaḥ purā trinayanaḥ prabhuḥ 12,338.012a tataḥ khān nipapātāśu dharaṇīdharamūrdhani
GE07mbh_12_u:22684: 12,338.012c agrataś cābhavat prīto vavande cāpi pādayoḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:22687: 12,338.014a uvāca cainaṃ bhagavāṃś cirasyāgatam ātmajam 12,338.014c svāgataṃ te mahābāho diṣṭyā prāpto 'si me 'ntikam
GE07mbh_12_u:22688: 12,338.015a kaccit te kuśalaṃ putra svādhyāyatapasoḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:22689: 12,338.015c nityam ugratapās tvaṃ hi tataḥ pṛcchāmi te punaḥ 12,338.016 rudra uvāca 12,338.016a tvatprasādena bhagavan svādhyāyatapasor mama
GE07mbh_12_u:22690: 12,338.016c kuśalaṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva sarvasya jagatas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:22691: 12,338.017a ciradṛṣṭo hi bhagavān vairājasadane mayā 12,338.017c tato 'haṃ parvataṃ prāptas tv imaṃ tvatpādasevitam 12,338.018a kautūhalaṃ cāpi hi me ekāntagamanena te
GE07mbh_12_u:22692: 12,338.018c naitat kāraṇam alpaṃ hi bhaviṣyati pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:22693: 12,338.019a kiṃ nu tat sadanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kṣutpipāsāvivarjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:22695: 12,338.020a gandharvair apsarobhiś ca satataṃ saṃniṣevitam 12,338.020c utsṛjyemaṃ girivaram ekākī prāptavān asi 12,338.021 brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:22696: 12,338.021a vaijayanto girivaraḥ satataṃ sevyate mayā 12,338.021c atraikāgreṇa manasā puruṣaś cintyate virāṭ 12,338.022 rudra uvāca 12,338.022a bahavaḥ puruṣā brahmaṃs tvayā sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_12_u:22697: 12,338.022c sṛjyante cāpare brahman sa caikaḥ puruṣo virāṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:22698: 12,338.023a ko hy asau cintyate brahmaṃs tvayā vai puruṣottamaḥ 12,338.023c etan me saṃśayaṃ brūhi mahat kautūhalaṃ hi me 12,338.024 brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:22699: 12,338.024a bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ putra ye tvayā samudāhṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22700: 12,338.024c evam etad atikrāntaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ naivam ity api
GE07mbh_12_u:22701: 12,338.024e ādhāraṃ tu pravakṣyāmi ekasya puruṣasya te
GE07mbh_12_u:22702: 12,338.025a bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ sa yathaikā yonir ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:22703: 12,338.025c tathā taṃ puruṣaṃ viśvaṃ paramaṃ sumahattamam
GE07mbh_12_u:22704: 12,338.025e nirguṇaṃ nirguṇā bhūtvā praviśanti sanātanam 12,339.001 brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:22705: 12,339.001a śṛṇu putra yathā hy eṣa puruṣaḥ śāśvato 'vyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22706: 12,339.001c akṣayaś cāprameyaś ca sarvagaś ca nirucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:22707: 12,339.002a na sa śakyas tvayā draṣṭuṃ mayānyair vāpi sattama 12,339.002c saguṇo nirguṇo viśvo jñānadṛśyo hy asau smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22708: 12,339.003a aśarīraḥ śarīreṣu sarveṣu nivasaty asau 12,339.003c vasann api śarīreṣu na sa lipyati karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22709: 12,339.004a mamāntarātmā tava ca ye cānye dehasaṃjñitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22710: 12,339.004c sarveṣāṃ sākṣibhūto 'sau na grāhyaḥ kena cit kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:22712: 12,339.005c ekaś carati kṣetreṣu svairacārī yathāsukham 12,339.006a kṣetrāṇi hi śarīrāṇi bījāni ca śubhāśubhe
GE07mbh_12_u:22713: 12,339.006c tāni vetti sa yogātmā tataḥ kṣetrajña ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:22714: 12,339.007a nāgatir na gatis tasya jñeyā bhūtena kena cit 12,339.007c sāṃkhyena vidhinā caiva yogena ca yathākramam
GE07mbh_12_u:22715: 12,339.008a cintayāmi gatiṃ cāsya na gatiṃ vedmi cottamām
GE07mbh_12_u:22716: 12,339.008c yathājñānaṃ tu vakṣyāmi puruṣaṃ taṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:22717: 12,339.009a tasyaikatvaṃ mahattvaṃ hi sa caikaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22718: 12,339.009c mahāpuruṣaśabdaṃ sa bibharty ekaḥ sanātanaḥ 12,339.010a eko hutāśo bahudhā samidhyate; ekaḥ sūryas tapasāṃ yonir ekā 12,339.010c eko vāyur bahudhā vāti loke; mahodadhiś cāmbhasāṃ yonir ekaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22719: 12,339.010e puruṣaś caiko nirguṇo viśvarūpas; taṃ nirguṇaṃ puruṣaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:22721: 12,339.011a hitvā guṇamayaṃ sarvaṃ karma hitvā śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:22722: 12,339.011c ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā evaṃ bhavati nirguṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22723: 12,339.012a acintyaṃ cāpi taṃ jñātvā bhāvasūkṣmaṃ catuṣṭayam
GE07mbh_12_u:22724: 12,339.012c vicared yo yatir yattaḥ sa gacchet puruṣaṃ prabhum 12,339.013a evaṃ hi paramātmānaṃ ke cid icchanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22726: 12,339.014a tatra yaḥ paramātmā hi sa nityaṃ nirguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ 12,339.014c sa hi nārāyaṇo jñeyaḥ sarvātmā puruṣo hi saḥ 12,339.014e na lipyate phalaiś cāpi padmapatram ivāmbhasā
GE07mbh_12_u:22727: 12,339.015a karmātmā tv aparo yo 'sau mokṣabandhaiḥ sa yujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:22728: 12,339.015c sasaptadaśakenāpi rāśinā yujyate hi saḥ 12,339.015e evaṃ bahuvidhaḥ proktaḥ puruṣas te yathākramam
GE07mbh_12_u:22729: 12,339.016a yat tat kṛtsnaṃ lokatantrasya dhāma; vedyaṃ paraṃ bodhanīyaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:22731: 12,339.016c mantā mantavyaṃ prāśitā prāśitavyaṃ; ghrātā ghreyaṃ sparśitā
GE07mbh_12_u:22733: 12,339.017a draṣṭā draṣṭavyaṃ śrāvitā śrāvaṇīyaṃ; jñātā jñeyaṃ saguṇaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:22734: nirguṇaṃ ca 12,339.017c yad vai proktaṃ guṇasāmyaṃ pradhānaṃ; nityaṃ caitac chāśvataṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:22735: cāvyayaṃ ca 12,339.018a yad vai sūte dhātur ādyaṃ nidhānaṃ; tad vai viprāḥ pravadante
GE07mbh_12_u:22737: 12,339.018c yad vai loke vaidikaṃ karma sādhu; āśīryuktaṃ tad dhi
GE07mbh_12_u:22739: 12,339.019a devāḥ sarve munayaḥ sādhu dāntās; taṃ prāg yajñair yajñabhāgaṃ yajante 12,339.019c ahaṃ brahmā ādya īśaḥ prajānāṃ; tasmāj jātas tvaṃ ca mattaḥ prasūtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22740: 12,339.019e matto jagaj jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ ca; sarve vedāḥ sarahasyā hi putra 12,339.020a caturvibhaktaḥ puruṣaḥ sa krīḍati yathecchati 12,339.020c evaṃ sa eva bhagavāñ jñānena pratibodhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22741: 12,339.021a etat te kathitaṃ putra yathāvad anupṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22742: 12,339.021c sāṃkhyajñāne tathā yoge yathāvad anuvarṇitam 12,340.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 12,340.001a dharmāḥ pitāmahenoktā mokṣadharmāśritāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22743: 12,340.001c dharmam āśramiṇāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vaktum arhati me bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:22744: 12,340.002 bhīṣma uvāca 12,340.002a sarvatra vihito dharmaḥ svargyaḥ satyaphalodayaḥ 12,340.002c bahudvārasya dharmasya nehāsti viphalā kriyā 12,340.003a yasmin yasmiṃs tu viṣaye yo yo yāti viniścayam 12,340.003c sa tam evābhijānāti nānyaṃ bharatasattama 12,340.004a api ca tvaṃ naravyāghra śrotum arhasi me kathām 12,340.004c purā śakrasya kathitāṃ nāradena surarṣiṇā 12,340.005a surarṣir nārado rājan siddhas trailokyasaṃmataḥ 12,340.005c paryeti kramaśo lokān vāyur avyāhato yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:22745: 12,340.006a sa kadā cin maheṣvāsa devarājālayaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22747: 12,340.007a taṃ kṛtakṣaṇam āsīnaṃ paryapṛcchac chacīpatiḥ 12,340.007c brahmarṣe kiṃ cid āścaryam asti dṛṣṭaṃ tvayānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:22748: 12,340.008a yathā tvam api viprarṣe trailokyaṃ sacarācaram
GE07mbh_12_u:22749: 12,340.008c jātakautūhalo nityaṃ siddhaś carasi sākṣivat 12,340.009a na hy asty aviditaṃ loke devarṣe tava kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:22750: 12,340.009c śrutaṃ vāpy anubhūtaṃ vā dṛṣṭaṃ vā kathayasva me 12,340.010a tasmai rājan surendrāya nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22752: 12,340.011a yathā yena ca kalpena sa tasmai dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22753: 12,340.011c kathāṃ kathitavān pṛṣṭas tathā tvam api me śṛṇu 12,341.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,341.001a āsīt kila kuruśreṣṭha mahāpadme purottame 12,341.001c gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe tīre kaś cid vipraḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22754: 12,341.002a saumyaḥ somānvaye vede gatādhvā chinnasaṃśayaḥ 12,341.002c dharmanityo jitakrodho nityatṛpto jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22756: 12,341.003c nyāyaprāptena vittena svena śīlena cānvitaḥ 12,341.004a jñātisaṃbandhivipule mitrāpāśrayasaṃmate 12,341.004c kule mahati vikhyāte viśiṣṭāṃ vṛttim āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22757: 12,341.005a sa putrān bahulān dṛṣṭvā vipule karmaṇi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22759: 12,341.006a tataḥ sa dharmaṃ vedoktaṃ yathāśāstroktam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:22760: 12,341.006c śiṣṭācīrṇaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca trividhaṃ cintya cetasā
GE07mbh_12_u:22761: 12,341.007a kiṃ nu me syāc chubhaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ kṣamaṃ kiṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:22762: 12,341.007c ity evaṃ khidyate nityaṃ na ca yāti viniścayam 12,341.008a tasyaivaṃ khidyamānasya dharmaṃ paramam āsthitaḥ 12,341.008c kadā cid atithiḥ prāpto brāhmaṇaḥ susamāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22763: 12,341.009a sa tasmai satkriyāṃ cakre kriyāyuktena hetunā
GE07mbh_12_u:22764: 12,341.009c viśrāntaṃ cainam āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:22766: 12,342.001c mitratām abhipannas tvāṃ kiṃ cid vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu 12,342.002a gṛhasthadharmaṃ viprendra kṛtvā putragataṃ tv aham
GE07mbh_12_u:22767: 12,342.002c dharmaṃ paramakaṃ kuryāṃ ko hi mārgo bhaved dvija 12,342.003a aham ātmānam ātmastham eka evātmani sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22768: 12,342.003c kartuṃ kāṅkṣāmi necchāmi baddhaḥ sādhāraṇair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22769: 12,342.004a yāvad evānatītaṃ me vayaḥ putraphalāśritam 12,342.004c tāvad icchāmi pātheyam ādātuṃ pāralaukikam 12,342.005a asmin hi lokasaṃtāne paraṃ pāram abhīpsataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22770: 12,342.005c utpannā me matir iyaṃ kuto dharmamayaḥ plavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22771: 12,342.006a samuhyamānāni niśamya loke; niryātyamānāni ca sāttvikāni
GE07mbh_12_u:22772: 12,342.006c dṛṣṭvā ca dharmadhvajaketumālāṃ; prakīryamāṇām upari prajānām
GE07mbh_12_u:22773: 12,342.007a na me mano rajyati bhogakāle; dṛṣṭvā yatīn prārthayataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22777: 12,342.008 bhīṣma uvāca 12,342.008a so 'tithir vacanaṃ tasya śrutvā dharmābhilāṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22778: 12,342.008c provāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ prājño madhurayā girā
GE07mbh_12_u:22779: 12,342.009a aham apy atra muhyāmi mamāpy eṣa manorathaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22780: 12,342.009c na ca saṃniścayaṃ yāmi bahudvāre triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_12_u:22781: 12,342.010a ke cin mokṣaṃ praśaṃsanti ke cid yajñaphalaṃ dvijāḥ 12,342.010c vānaprasthāśramaṃ ke cid gārhasthyaṃ ke cid āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22782: 12,342.011a rājadharmāśrayaṃ ke cit ke cid ātmaphalāśrayam
GE07mbh_12_u:22783: 12,342.011c gurucaryāśrayaṃ ke cit ke cid vākyaṃ yam āśrayam 12,342.012a mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ke cic chuśrūṣanto divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22784: 12,342.012c ahiṃsayā pare svargaṃ satyena ca tathā pare
GE07mbh_12_u:22785: 12,342.013a āhave 'bhimukhāḥ ke cin nihatāḥ svid divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22786: 12,342.013c ke cid uñchavrataiḥ siddhāḥ svargamārgasamāśritāḥ 12,342.014a ke cid adhyayane yuktā vedavrataparāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22787: 12,342.014c buddhimanto gatāḥ svargaṃ tuṣṭātmāno jitendriyāḥ 12,342.015a ārjavenāpare yuktā nihatānārjavair janaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22788: 12,342.015c ṛjavo nākapṛṣṭhe vai śuddhātmānaḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ 12,342.016a evaṃ bahuvidhair loke dharmadvārair anāvṛtaiḥ 12,342.016c mamāpi matir āvignā meghalekheva vāyunā 12,343.001 atithir uvāca 12,343.001a upadeśaṃ tu te vipra kariṣye 'haṃ yathāgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:22789: 12,343.001c guruṇā me yathākhyātam arthatas tac ca me śṛṇu 12,343.001d*0906_01 tathaitām eva guruṇā yathākhyātaṃ gatārthataḥ 12,343.002a yatra pūrvābhisargeṇa dharmacakraṃ pravartitam
GE07mbh_12_u:22790: 12,343.002c naimiṣe gomatītīre tatra nāgāhvayaṃ puram 12,343.003a samagrais tridaśais tatra iṣṭam āsīd dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:22792: 12,343.004a kṛtādhivāso dharmātmā tatra cakṣuḥśravā mahān 12,343.004c padmanābho mahābhāgaḥ padma ity eva viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22793: 12,343.005a sa vācā karmaṇā caiva manasā ca dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:22794: 12,343.005c prasādayati bhūtāni trividhe vartmani sthitaḥ 12,343.006a sāmnā dānena bhedena daṇḍeneti caturvidham 12,343.006c viṣamasthaṃ janaṃ svaṃ ca cakṣurdhyānena rakṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:22795: 12,343.007a tam abhikramya vidhinā praṣṭum arhasi kāṅkṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:22796: 12,343.007c sa te paramakaṃ dharmaṃ namithyā darśayiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:22797: 12,343.008a sa hi sarvātithir nāgo buddhiśāstraviśāradaḥ 12,343.008c guṇair anavamair yuktaḥ samastair ābhikāmikaiḥ 12,343.009a prakṛtyā nityasalilo nityam adhyayane rataḥ 12,343.009c tapodamābhyāṃ saṃyukto vṛttenānavareṇa ca
GE07mbh_12_u:22798: 12,343.010a yajvā dānaruciḥ kṣānto vṛtte ca parame sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22799: 12,343.010c satyavāg anasūyuś ca śīlavān abhisaṃśritaḥ 12,343.011a śeṣānnabhoktā vacanānukūlo;
GE07mbh_12_u:22802: 12,344.001c parāśvāsakaraṃ vākyam idaṃ me bhavataḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:22804: 12,344.002c tṛṣitasya ca pānīyaṃ kṣudhārtasya ca bhojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:22806: 12,344.003c eṣitasyātmanaḥ kāle vṛddhasyeva suto yathā 12,344.004a manasā cintitasyeva prītisnigdhasya darśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:22807: 12,344.004c prahrādayati māṃ vākyaṃ bhavatā yad udīritam
GE07mbh_12_u:22808: 12,344.005a dattacakṣur ivākāśe paśyāmi vimṛśāmi ca 12,344.005c prajñānavacanād yo 'yam upadeśo hi me kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22809: 12,344.005e bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā māṃ bhāṣate bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:22810: 12,344.006a ihemāṃ rajanīṃ sādho nivasasva mayā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:22811: 12,344.006c prabhāte yāsyati bhavān paryāśvastaḥ sukhoṣitaḥ 12,344.006e asau hi bhagavān sūryo mandaraśmir avāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22812: 12,344.007 bhīṣma uvāca 12,344.007a tatas tena kṛtātithyaḥ so 'tithiḥ śatrusūdana
GE07mbh_12_u:22813: 12,344.007c uvāsa kila tāṃ rātriṃ saha tena dvijena vai 12,344.008a tat tac ca dharmasaṃyuktaṃ tayoḥ kathayatos tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:22814: 12,344.008c vyatītā sā niśā kṛtsnā sukhena divasopamā
GE07mbh_12_u:22815: 12,344.008d*0907_01 tasya brāhmaṇavaryasya atitheś cāpi bhārata 12,344.009a tataḥ prabhātasamaye so 'tithis tena pūjitaḥ 12,344.009c brāhmaṇena yathāśaktyā svakāryam abhikāṅkṣatā
GE07mbh_12_u:22816: 12,344.010a tataḥ sa vipraḥ kṛtadharmaniścayaḥ; kṛtābhyanujñaḥ svajanena dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:22818: 12,345.001 bhīṣma uvāca 12,345.001a sa vanāni vicitrāṇi tīrthāni ca sarāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:22819: 12,345.001c abhigacchan krameṇa sma kaṃ cin munim upasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22820: 12,345.002a taṃ sa tena yathoddiṣṭaṃ nāgaṃ vipreṇa brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22821: 12,345.002c paryapṛcchad yathānyāyaṃ śrutvaiva ca jagāma saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:22823: 12,345.003c proktavān aham asmīti bhoḥśabdālaṃkṛtaṃ vacaḥ 12,345.004a tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā rūpiṇī dharmavatsalā
GE07mbh_12_u:22824: 12,345.004c darśayām āsa taṃ vipraṃ nāgapatnī pativratā
GE07mbh_12_u:22825: 12,345.005a sā tasmai vidhivat pūjāṃ cakre dharmaparāyaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:22826: 12,345.005c svāgatenāgataṃ kṛtvā kiṃ karomīti cābravīt 12,345.006 brāhmaṇa uvāca 12,345.006a viśrānto 'bhyarcitaś cāsmi bhavatyā ślakṣṇayā girā
GE07mbh_12_u:22827: 12,345.006c draṣṭum icchāmi bhavati taṃ devaṃ nāgam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:22828: 12,345.007a etad dhi paramaṃ kāryam etan me phalam īpsitam 12,345.007c anenārthena cāsmy adya saṃprāptaḥ pannagālayam 12,345.008 nāgabhāryovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:22830: 12,345.008c saptāṣṭabhir dinair vipra darśayiṣyaty asaṃśayam 12,345.009a etad viditam āryasya vivāsakaraṇaṃ mama 12,345.009c bhartur bhavatu kiṃ cānyat kriyatāṃ tad vadasva me 12,345.010 brāhmaṇa uvāca 12,345.010a anena niścayenāhaṃ sādhvi saṃprāptavān iha 12,345.010c pratīkṣann āgamaṃ devi vatsyāmy asmin mahāvane
